item.text: gla @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma dri ya praspu nan nA mam
hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa 'jug
pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang ngo//
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal
byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga stong tham pa'i dge slong gi
dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khri byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po thams
cad kyang mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa yin zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
kyang phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tsha 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'khor de
nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsigs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnam par rtse ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen
thob dang/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' semaMs dpa' chen po byams pa yang 'khor de nyid
@# @#// du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams ba stan las langs te/ bla
gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar sa/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
nas na bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te zhus nas khu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bdag la skabs phyin/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig
zhu'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do// de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa 'di ltar byas pa
dang / zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa skabs 'byed par mdzad do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams ta zhu bar
ma bad/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa las brtsams te zhu bar mkhyed/ nyan thosakyi theg pa las brtsams te zhus bar mi byed/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ rgya mched yongs su shes
par byaba'i phyir zhu bar ma byed/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mugakhrad par bya ba'aphyir zhu bar mi byed/ pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te zhu bar mkhyad/ pha rolatu phyin pa
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar ma byed na/ de ltar n zhusanas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par mdzad do// gal te khyod 'du byed
rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar ma byed dam/ gal te khyod bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ lam dang
lam bsgom par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ gal te khyod 'bras bu thob par bya ba dang/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhu bar ma byed dam/ gal te khyod mi gnas pa'i phyir de bzhinag shags
pa la zhu bar m byed dam/ yi ga rnams mi rjod par zhu bar byed na/ de ltan zhusanas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs 'byed par mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhin/
byams pa tsam du sgro 'dogs pa de tsam du chags pa yod la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyis chos bstan ba chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar nAti
bus 'jam dpala gzhonanur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpalasgro btags pasgro btags pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpalatsam gyisan/ sgro btags par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal
gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa shAr dwa ti'i khu chos thamasacadon stong pa nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ mtshan mamadang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ smon pa mad pa mnyam pa nyid kyisamanyam
pa yin/ ji lta ba bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyamapa yin/ de bzhin nyidamanyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ chos kyidabyibasamanyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ mang dag pa'i mtha'amanyam pa
nyid kyisamanyam pa yin/ mistsama'agagam gnas bamanyamapa nyid kyisamanyam pa man/ ma sam byung ba mnyam pa nyidakyis mnyam pa yani/ chos thams cad nam mkha'adang mnyam pa nyid kyis
mnyam pa yin/ btsun ba shar dwa ti'i bu gang dag 'di ltar chos thams cad manyam pa nyid lami mnyamapar brtags nas/ mad bzhin du skyo 'dogs pas sgro 'dogs par khyed de/ 'dinas nigs rgyas so//
'din chos so// 'don dge 'dunano// 'dani bdag go/ 'donasems can no/ 'dazhigang zag go/ 'di'i shed las skyes pa'o// 'dinished bu'o// 'ani byed pa po'o// 'dinatshor ba/
bo'o da 'chid pa'o// 'ani rtag pa'o// 'anasoso'aspyi bo'o// 'di ni nyan thos so// bzhi'i sasargyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems da pa'o// 'di banam tho ba dang bcas pa'o//
'di ni kha na ma tho ba med bgo/ 'di'i zag ba dang bcas pa'o// 'di ni zig pa med pa'o// 'ani 'dus byas so// 'di'i 'dus ma byas// 'dinakun nas nyon mongs pa'o// 'di'i rnam par
byakha'o// 'di na deg kha'o// 'anas dag kha'o// 'di ni 'garten pa'o// 'dana'agarten las 'das pa'o// 'dani 'khor ba'o// 'din rgya ngan las 'das pa'o/ 'di ni so khogo
'dand ngos po ma yin pa'o// 'di na yod pa'o/ 'danamed pa'o// 'dan thob pa'o/ 'di nam ngon par rtogs pago/ 'di na mngon sum du bya'o// 'dan lamamo// 'di ni lam gyi 'bras bu'o/

zhes byab 'di'islobatags pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mnyam pa nyid na rnam par rtogs pamedatsang/ gang dag 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa de dganamanyam pa nyid du sgro 'dogs pa/
yin te/ mi mnyam par sgro 'dogs pa nam yin la/ gang dag mthong bamed bar mnyam pa nyida mthong ba de dgan/ mnyam pa nyida mthong ba yan/ sgro 'dogs pa la spyod bzhi'amanyam par mthong ba yin
zhing/ gang dag mnyam pa nyid la sgro 'dogs pa dedagan mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin la/ sgro 'dogs pa la spyod panamanyam pa nyid mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyig/ bstan pa 'di bshad pan/
dgaslong nyis brgya len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te/ dge slong de dag 'dul ba la dbang mdzad pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'adasacang mi gsung bar dus/
yol bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa 'chen bokhyams pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad cesasnyasaso// 'jam dpal kho bon nyin thos kyi skrag pa
las brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhukhar mi byed do// rangasangs rgyas kyi thugs las brtsams/ yang dag khar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyithag ba las brtsams te/ de bzhinagshegs
lazhu bar ma byed pa nas/ kho bon mi gnas ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar khyadado// 'jam dpal kho bonadi bzhin gshegs pa 'a nas de bzhin nyid dang ma 'gal ba de ltar zhukhar
byed do// 'jam dpal kho bo ni gang dag de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang/ gang dgachos thams cad dbenApa nyid kyi phyir/ chos ci yang ma dmigs pa dang/ gangadagachos kyi dbyingasami
rgyu g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir/ 'dod chags dang/ zhesdang dang/ gti mug rnams kyisamagos pa dang/ gang dag 'khor ba mdamigs pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'khor ba las 'da' bar mkhyed pa dang/ gang dag
gnasakyang 'ong ba med pa nyid dang/ gang du yang 'grob med pa nyid kyi phyir/ mya ngan las 'das kha thob pa byed pa de dag gi phyir/ de bzhinagshegs pa la zhu bar byed do// 'jam dpal kho bon
nas kyang ya gi rnams kyang brjod/ tshig gi lam la yang ma dpyod la/ shes rab kyis kyang bye brag khyad par 'gyur ba dang/ shes pa yang gang yang medal/ 'di la rnam par grol ba gang yang med pa/
de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ya gi stongapa nyid kyi phyir dang/ thams cad skyabamed pa nyid kyi phyir// de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus
bgyur pa de dag 'disnyam du sams te/ kyamakhyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de kho na ltar ldem po ngag srol zhing 'dug pa'i tshig 'di dgakyang ston l/ brjod pa thams
cad kyang chos nyid dang mthun par sbyorab lasan/ zab mo'i shes rab dang ldan nosnyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen po rnam par rtse bas 'disad/
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chanabo byams ba 'di de tsam du zab mo bzod pa la yes shang/ shes rab dang spobs bston pa lamakhas pan mtshar
lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyams bas yun jisrid ci gnas / blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de/ bcom
ldan 'das skye bosang bo lasman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ lhadang ma rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ de
bgyisan byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo rnams kyis gnas de dag kyang thos la// 'jug pa de yang thos nas slar zhing bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson par 'gyur lags so// deskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'dik+kadaces bka'
stsal to// rigasakyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po byams pas na yun ring ponasatshangs bar spyad pa spyad do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
pas ni sngon gyi rgya'aba rnams la bya ba byas so// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod do// zab mo'abazodang dbaldan no// jigasakyi bu byang chub sems dba'asams dba'achen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs te/
bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stobalenanas/ de'a'og tu gdodangs blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phying chub tu sems bskyodado// deskad ces bka'astsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi thad du/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pakhyabazhudatu sems bskyed ba'amtshan ci lags/ de de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcomab ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyis legs par bka'astsal du gsol/ deskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/
rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa ni/
ba dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'dasakyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'dasadaces bka'astsal to// rnam par rtse ba sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
bskal pa grangasamed pa bsakyang ches grangasamed pa/ yun ring zhing tshadamed/ bsam gyis ma khyab dpag tumed pa'i sngo rol/ de'atsho de'i dusan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan b/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jigarten mkhyen pa/ skyes tu 'dulaba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ blun med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sas rgyas bcom

ldan 'das gsar bzas 'od ces bya ba 'jig rtenadu byung ngo// rigasakyi bu de bzhin gshegs b gsar bzangs 'od kyistsa'i khung bu re renasa'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang bo byung ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag kyang gaser gyi 'od ltar bzang la 'od zer re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khames re re 'od kyis snang bar byed do// 'od zer re res kyang pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag mang po dag gis shar phyogs 'gengs par byed do// lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ phyogasa mtshams dang/ steng dang 'og kyang de dang 'dra'o/

phyogs re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa re resasangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum 'gengs par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skure res kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du
ma sangs rgyas dang chos rnams la 'dul bar mdzad de/ phyir mi ldog pa la 'god do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a sangs rgyas gser bzangs 'od
de'i gser gyi 'od 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing den nyin dang/ zla ba gnyis kyi ming med do// rgyu skar dang/ gza' dang/ skar mdang/ mo' 'od kyisong
yang mi grag go/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltan/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing den ji ltar gdugs mtshan rnam par gzhag par 'gyur lags/ de skadacasagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la
'di skad ces bka'astsalato// rigasakyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar bzangs 'od kyisas rgyas kyi zhing da/ sa gzhi chen po de rin po che sna

bdun las grub pa yin te/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur la rin po che sna bdun gyis gzhi chen po de las kyang rin pochasna bdun gyi pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam la mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang/ dri zhim

po'i ngad ldang la yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'phags te/ bad+ma re re las dri bsung gi ngad ldang ba'i dri des kyang/ stongagasum gyi stong chen po 'a 'jig rten gyi khams khyab ste/ samasacan gang dag gis/

dri datshor ba de dag thams cad kyang blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges so// bad+made dag kyang snga dro'i dusakyi tsho ma tog rgyas la/ byamared kyi dus kyis tshan rnyes par 'gyur te/ des nasems
can de dag 'disnyam du sems te/ phyam red kyi dus la bab bo snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasargyus gser bzas

'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan rnam par gzhag par mngon pa yod do// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nam khom pa brgyad na than ming tsam yang med do// sdug bsngal ba'i ming tsam dang/
nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ming tsam yang med de/ sas rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa'i chos dang bral ba/ dri nga bamed pa 'ba'ashogigs yongs su gang bar 'gyur
tod/ 'dus pa re re yang byang chub sems dpal khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod do// de'i mjug tu bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa' dpagatumed grangs med pa 'dus par 'gyur to// de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar bzangs 'od de yang chos gzhan ma ston te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i/
'khor lo'aba' shag ston par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir ma ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i tshesakyi rnam grangs gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos gang yang de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa
dang chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ chos gang yang yang dag pa'i matha' las phyir ma ldogapa dang/ 'dod chags 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang/
'a[à ]zhe sdang zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ gti mug gti mug gi ngo ba nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ gzugs gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang da tshor ba dang//
'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ migamag gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang
lus dang/ yad yid kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ ngo bo nyid gang yin pade na dngos po med la/ dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni gnasakyang phyir mi ldog la/ gang du yang mi 'jug
pa'od /rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs 'od de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dang 'a de dgal/ byang chub

sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'achis kyi rnam gras yang dag par ston to// de'i tshe chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal bo gser
mdog ces bya ba zhig byung ngo// rigasakyi bu rgyal po gser mdog des/ bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsarobazas 'od de//
byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang bcas pa la/ labye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas
mchod par byas so// rigasakyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ mamajed kyi bdagapo tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pas kyang/ rgyal po chen po gsaramadog gi
ngasam pa ri gnas / bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa gsar bzangs 'od de la bsnyen bkur bya bar spro bar gyurato// rigasab rgyal po gser mdog des/ 'khor gyi khams dpag

tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa zhig byas te/ 'khor gyi khyams der dar gyi lda ldi na bris/ me tog gis ni dusamonub pa tsam du khyab par byas/ stong gi bar snang lan mu tig dmar po'i dra ba bres// snying po'i

sros kyi mchog gsan gdug te/ 'khor gyi khyams der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ra ba'i ras bcos bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bting ba khri'i rkang pa rin po
che du mas sngas ba zhig bshams so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i ston yang bye ba phrag 'bum ra ba dag bshams so// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de dpag tshad nyesastong
lhan bzhugs te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog gis gshigs shul dpag tshad nyis stong legs par brgyananas/ 'di lta ste/ lam de'i ngos g.yas g.yon du stags burin po che sna
tshogs kyis spras pa dag byas so// lam de yang pus monub pa tsam du ma tog gis khebs par byas so// steng gi bar snang la rin po chesnatshog sakyis dra ba'i bla re bresaso// stagasabu de dag la yang

rin po che'ashing ljon pa 'phang du mda' rgyang gang tsam yod pa dag btsugs so// rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig nas na po che'i shing ljon pa gcig tu rin po che'i tha gu bres so// rin po che'i shing ljon
ba gnyis gnyis kyi bar du/ rdzong rin po che'asogs bu bskor ba/ gsar gyi bem bdal ba/ baiDUm+ma'i them skasakyi rim pa bcas pa/ me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ kuchu to dang/
pad+madakar pos gang la/ dur pa skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa dag byas so// de bzhin du rin po che'ashing ljon pa'i bar thams cad du yang rnying dag byas to/ bkod pa de khon dang 'dra bar bkod de// yin

boma'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung dum tog pa sil ma thogs pa'i mi lnga brgyalngabargyabakodado// rin pocha'i shosakyi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkodado// rnga bo che dang/ rdza rnga dang/
'khar rnga dang/ kam pal dang/ pi wang dang/ 'khar dkrol la sogs parol mo'i byad rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danathogs

ba'am lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod go/ de ltar rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i drung thams cad du/ mi brgya phrag de snyad desnyadabakod nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang
'od phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshi/ khyed kyisame tog sil ma 'di dag gis gtocig/ tsan dan gyi byam 'di dag gis gtor cig/ bog por 'di dgagis bdug nga ra gyis shig/ sal
snyan 'di dag kyang dkrol cig/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ bar no 'di dag kyang bsgrungs shig ces bsgo'o// na po che'ashing ljon pa thams cad kyi drud/ rin po che'am tog gi
snod thogs bam lnga brgya lnga brgya yang bkod do// lhagama rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang gi tshe de bzhinagshegs pa de/ lam 'dunas phan tshun du gshogs bdelatsi/ khyad kyis/
rin po che'am tog 'di dgag gtor chug ces bsgo// rigs kyi bu dad ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa gsar bzangs 'od di/ gtsug lag khang de nas byung ma thag tu/
'khor gyi khyamasasu gshegs te/ de'i bar du gtsug lag khang nas/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams l snang babyung ngo// rigasakyi bu 'di ltar lamadapag tshad nyisastong po de dag/ byang chub
sems dapalasems dpa' chen pos gang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po re re phanatshun du mdom re tsaman 'greng ngo// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de
bzhin gshegs pa de phan tshun du gshegs pan/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rera'i mgo bo'i drang thad kyi stengan/ dngul gdugs dkar po gsar gyi rtsa
bcan/ mu tig dmar po'i dra bas g.yogs pa gsar gyi dra'i bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bskor ba/ ma bzung bar nam mkha' la phan tshun du 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de
dang 'dra'o// rin po cha'i gdugs de dag la dril bu g.yer ka'adre ba btagasang gang yan pa de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ napo che'i gdugs
de dag rlung gas bskyod pa las/ sgra ji lta bu 'byung ba de 'dra banasal snyan yan lag 'bum dang ldan pa laso kyang mi 'byung ngo// rin po che'i gdugs dang/ dril bu g.yar ka de dag dang/
rin po tsho'apishing ljon pa' lon de dag dang/ rin po che'i tha gu de dag dang/ rin po che'asigs bu de dag dang/ sil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs de dag lasakyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ chos/

kyasge rnam pa snatshogs kyi sgra 'byung ste/ de nas sems can gang dag sbyin pa la mos pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i sgra thos so// gang dag tshulaM khrims la mos pa de dag gsan tshul khrims kyi sgra thos
so/de bzhin du gang dag bzod ba dang// brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan la mos pa dang/ gang dag shes rab la mos pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi sgra thos so// de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang/
mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ skya khamed pa dang// 'gag pamed pa'i sgra dang/ de bzhin du dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam gyi sgra dang/ de bzhin
du mngon pangashes pa dang/ stobasradang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ soso yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag gi sgra 'byung ste/ sems can rnams ji ltakhuramasapa de lta bu'i

sgra 'byung zhing thos so// chos kyi sgra de thosanasakyang sems can dpag tumed/ grangs med pa dag klanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tunges par gyur to// rigasakyi bu de bzhinagashegrwa/
bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar bzangs 'od de/ lam de nas khanatshun dugashegasapan/ dobu'i drang thad kyi stong gi bar snangal/ rin po che'abum phrag dums smras
balha'i rin po che'i gdugasam bzung bar 'phags te phan tshun du 'grogo/ rin po che'i gdugs do dang dril bu g.yer ka de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba byung ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya pa'i tshosabastan bzung ngo// deskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'disad ces gsol
to bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa gser bzangs 'od de'i rin po che'i gdugs de las byung ba/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i phyag zhes bgyi ba'achos bstan pa gang
lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ deskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen po/
rnam par rtsegal 'di skad cesabaka' stsal to// rigasakyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag 'bartsams patsam ngas bshad par bya'o//
rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang/ smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pamed pa dang/ gnas pa med pa'i/

phyag rgya dang/ dngos po med pa'i phyag rgya dang/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi phyag rgyu dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyadang/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgya dang/ 'dod chag

zla dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dben pa'i phyagargyadang/ rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyu dang/ mtshan nyid mdang 'a phyag rgya dang/ byed bamed pa dang/ 'gro ba med pa'i phyag rgyu dang/ gzung du med pa
dang/ gnasamad pa'i phyag rgyas btabago/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ninam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab po// rigs kyi bu dporan/ nam mkha' lan phyag rgyabarkabar bla ba yang m yin la/
phyag rgyar yang 'dug pa dang/ phyag rgyu'i 'bur yang gdags su med de/ deci'i phyir zhen/ gnas kyang med/ rkyenakyang med/ rgyu yang med/ skyid pa yang med/ rten yang med pa'i phyir/ rigasakyi/
bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangachos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang/ nam mkha'a rnam pa can dang/ nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang/ nam mkhar ston par yang dag
par shes pa dang/ nam mkha' lanachos thams cad gdagasasumed par gnas te/ gdags pa tsam du zad do// ji ltar nam mkha'i chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas taM/ gdagasab
tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang gdagasasu med par gnas te/ gdags pa tsam du zad par yang dag par shes pa dang/ gang chos rnams gadags pa tsam du shes pa de ni di bzhin nyid
dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'o// gang de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bas khyed ba de ni di bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyu shes pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ des na de bzhin nyid la rmos
ba ma 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pan/ byang chub samasadwapa' lnga brgyas m skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnam par rtseb la bka'astsal pa// rigasakyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasargyas gser zangs 'od de/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' dun dang bcas
par 'khor gyi khyams der gshegs te/ der byon pa dang/ lha 'bum dag mchod pa'i las bya ba la slobar gyur te me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ kumuta dang/ pad+ma dkar po rnams 'thor bar

byed do// lha'i mi rtogamanar ba'achar yang bababs so// selasnyan bye ba phrag 'bumadag kyang dkrol bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gsar bzas 'od des/'khor gyi khyams der bzhugs pa

na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lca'adabang po brgya byin dang/ mamadzod kyi bdagapo tshangs pamachod pa'i las bya ba dang/ sAn bkur bya ba dang/ blamar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par gyur te/mchod paji lta bu dag gi phyir sprob

gyuracan/'di lta ste// de bzhinagshegs pa de byang chubs mas dang 'dage 'dunadang bcas pa bzhugs ba la byang nubasams dpa' ri'i 'irgya ban glang po chodakar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nye bar gnas la/ glangapo/

@#che'irgyal po de'i sna la yang 'di lta ste/rlung dang nyi mabaskyab ba'i phyir rin po che'i gdugasagasal zhing bltan sdug pa thogasapa dang/ glang po cha' rgyalapo thams cad kyisA la yang/ mu tigasmon ngo gsal ba'amu tig gi ngo

shal 'phyang ba dang/ mu tig gi do shal de las kyang/ chub sil shing be cha musngonapo 'bral/yan lag brgyadadang ldan pa 'bab ste/ chu des chu'i bya ba byed pa'o// byang chub sems dang 'a dag 'khod pa dag tu/'di lta ste/lha'i mthus

lag ba g.yas pa la rin po che'i lhung bzed byung bar gyur to// wa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lhung bzed 'dzin par byed do// de bzhin gshegs ba gser bzangs 'od de la tshangs pa nyid yin po che'i gdug

thogs te snyam lags n 'dug go/ rin poma'agadugs de las kyamu tig gi do shal dag 'byung ngo// mu tig gi do shal de dag las kyang/ chub sel zhing pa rgyur sngon po 'dra la/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'babaste/

chudes de bzhinagshegs bde 'chu'ibya ba mdzad do// lha'i dbang pob byin n bcom ldan 'adas de'alhung bzed 'dzin to// jigasakyi bu 'diltar de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas par bzhugs ma

thag tu/byang chub sems dapa' de dag la lhamo'i re mdun na 'dug ste/lha'i sposadri zhim po sna dmamachig la 'thag bar byed do// spos de 'thag pan yang rje phyogs dang ji phyogasam yin paser bu ldang ste/ser bu des byang chub sems

dpa' de dag gilus laspos kyis thogabar byed d// skyes bu dam pa de dganadring bamed ba ste/de dag ni lhamo'i'adu shesakyang majug par mi byed l/de dag ni sprosakyimtshan ma yang mi skyed na/chags pa lta ga la 'gyur te/den

gnas med do// rigasakyi bu 'di ltar rgyal pogaser mdog des/de bzhinagshegs pa gser bzangs 'od bazhugs parig nas/bustong dang/ bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ sa bdag

brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhistongadang/ blon po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ bumo brgyad khri bzhastong dang/ gzhan yang skya bo'atshog samang po dag dang lhan cig tu/rang gi la gnas bca' ba dang/ bza' ba bsod pamang

po mchogatugatsang bsam par byas te/cibazhed pa bskabasaso// tshim par byas shing ci bzhi d pa bstabasate/bshosagaso'anasagasang sderasgyu ste/phyag bcabs par gnas/de bzhin gshegs pa la bye ba 'bum phrag dgu
banu ma dgu 'ba' ris bcos bu phrugasacig phul lo/ byang chub sems dpa' re re la yang bye ba phrag 'bumar ba'i ras bcos bu phrugs re re phul lo// thul nasakyang skye bo'ags de dag dang//

yulam gtsobo rnams dang lhan cig tutha'atshosbyang nas/'di lta ste/ chos mnyan pa lagus ba'i phyir/de bzhinagshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khod do// rigs kyakhu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzas 'od des skyebo/

tshog sachen po gus pas 'khod pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod pa thugs sun nas/sgoseso ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan to// des d ces bka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang tshu

sems dpa' sems dapa'i chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasagangabcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegasabagasar bzangs 'od des bstan pa'i phyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisoseso bzho

byabachos kyi rnam grangasadegang lags/bcom ldan 'dasakyisachos kyi rnamagras de legs par baka'astsaladu gsol/de ltar bgyisanabyang chub sems dpa' thig pa ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang gos so/

ba'achos kyi rnamagrangs de la slob par 'gyur ba lags so// deskad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ragasakyi bu de phyir legs par rab tu nyon la

yid la zung shig dang/ sgoso sobachos kyi rnamagras de las brtsam patsamazhig bshad par bya'o// jigasakyi bu byang chub sems dapa'i rnams kyi sgo soso bzhi gazhan ma yin gyi/ba bol tuphyin pajug khonar zad de/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha

yol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu na ba dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi sgosesob ni de lanano// de ci'i phyir zhen/'di nyid 'asngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyisakyang bslabs nas/blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas te/chos kyi 'khor lo yang

bskor/sems can rnams kyang yosasusmin pa mdzad nas/yongs su mya ngan las 'dasal/ma'os pa 'di bzhin gshegs pa rnam sakyang sgo so so ba 'di nyid la bslabasanas/blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

mngon par rdzogasapar 'tshang rgya ba'agyur zhing/ da ltar byung ba'adus kyi de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasargyas ganga dga'ajig rten gyi khams dang gtumed grangs med ba dag bzhugs shing

'tsholagazhes pa'id bzhin gshegs pa de dgakyang sgoso so ba'i chos kyanemagrangs 'di nyid la bslabs nas/bla nAmadang yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyus te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'i phyir

ro/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sgo so so ba yang dag par skyabs sba ban/b.rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yang dgapar skyabs sgruba'o// de la sgo so so ba de'i brag gang yin/zhes ban gangayin/ rnan par
gnon banigang yin nges par 'byungabagangayan zhen/sa snya'isimasan byang chub sems dang 'anyisapa'o// kun tu 'dzin pasamasanabyang chub sems dpa'i sapa'o// yongs su 'dzin pasims ni byang chub sems
dab nyis pa'o// nor kun tu srung ba la bgo bshar m byed pan byang chub sems dpa' nyis pa'o/ de labyang chub sems dpa' gang ser sna'i sems rnam par gnon cing bcom nas/ sbyin pa yid

la byed pa skyed pa de nad rnamapar gnonapa yin no// delos spyod ji ltar chung yang rung las spyod rgya chen ng gakyang lung// dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ slong ba rnams la bgo bsha'abyed l/ de dga' ba'i sems
dang/ kun tu 'dzin pa med ba'i soms dang/ mgu ba'asams dang/ rnam par smin pa lare ba med par sems can thams cad la sAng bas phanapa'i dngos po sngon du btang bsems bskyedangs lag brkyang ste/sprin

[%, ]pasbyin par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de na sgrosaso ba la slob pa yin te/ 'an byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'byung ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'alapa'i tshul khrims ni byang chubs mas dpa nyis pa'o// nyams pa'i tshul khrim

dang 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang/ zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang/ laba'itshul khrims dang/ nag nog ga tshul khrims ni byang chub samasadapa'i nyis pa'o// byang nubasems dpa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang/ nyams pa'i

tshul khrims dang/ 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang/ zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang/ ral ba'atshul khrims dang/ nag nog gi tshul khrims gang zhen/ byang nubasems dpa' gang nyan thos kyisamasasam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi/
sems sam/ dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa dang/ nyanathos kyi thig ra 'am/ rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ dmigs ba'i lta ba 'dod pa dang/ nyan thos kyi gtam mam/ rangasas rgyas kyi gtam mam/

dmigs pa can gyigatam la dga' bar 'dzin pa 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 'chalar dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ tshul khrims 'adres pa dang/ tshul khrims zhig pa dang/ tshul khrims lab dang/
tshul khrims nag nog can zhes bya'o/ byang chub sems dang 'asgos sob lam spyod pa dang/ maslob pa tshul khrims 'chal ba'irab yin no// de skad ces bka'astsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
dpa' samasadapa' chen po rnamarar rtso bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasaci'i slad du/byang chub sems daba'asems dpa' chen pos/ dekhazhinagshegs pa 'baslab pa gzhan las 'gal babagyis

nani tshul khrims 'chal bar mi 'gyur la/ gang gi tshe nyan thosakyisomasasam/ rang sangs rgyas kyisams sam/ dmigs pa can gyisamasabaspyod de'i tshe ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'batu 'gyur lags/des d ces
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang nubasems dapa' sems dpachen po rnamapar rtse ba la 'daskadacas bka'astsal to// rigasakyi bu byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab bgazhalas 'gal

bar byas sam/salhung bar 'gyur ba'ichos bzhigang dgagasungs pa de dag gnyis pabyas sam/midage ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dragapa blangs te 'dug gam/mtshamasamadapa lnga byas su zin kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'

de byang chub kyi sems kyang m btangamasusate/byang chub kyisamasadangamakhral la/dmigs pa can gyisams dang/ mngon par zhen pa'isams kyang mibaskyodan/byang chub samasadapa' ni tshul khrims dang ldan ba khon yin pa dang
tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang/ tshul khrims ma 'dres pa dang/ tshul khrims mazhag pa dang/ tshul khrims maral pa dang/ tshul khrims naganagacan ma yin par gazung bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i/

sgo so so ba'aspyod pa dang slobapa yang yin no// deci'i phyir zhen/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyi go/ byang chusems dang sdig pa'i las byas pas srid par 'gro bskyed

du zin kyang/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' n tsam dusrid par 'gro bskyod pa de tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yos su rdzogs pa'i byed do/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la bslabs

su zin kyang/ de nyan thos kyi sems sam/rangasangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ dmigs par lta ba dang lhan tsaganapar byed na/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims las nyams par 'gyur ro// gas kyi bu

[“]de lta bsan/byang chub sems dbang gang byung chub kyisems mig tong la/ dmigs par lta ba'asimasakyam skyid pa'i phyang chub sems dpa' den/byang chub sems dpa'i sgos sob la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no/ rigs kyi bu

rgyu gzhan yang gnodasems kyi ga ba'inyis pa bsams na byang chub sems dpa'i nyis pa'o// sems can ms lamasnyoms pa'i yid la byed pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyis pa'o// sems can rnams dang chos rnams la thadad

pa'i du shes panabyang chub sems dpa'inyis pa'o// sems can la dmigs pa la rtenaba'i byams pa phyogs gcig ran/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyes ba'o// stong ba nyida' ma bzod ngan byang chub sems dapa'i nyes pa'o// 'di la
na no// 'dilanamasbyin nosnyam pade nakyang nugasems dapa'i nyis ba'o// 'di la yon dbul 'go/ 'dilanam da bul losAmab denabyang chub sems dpa'inyis pa go/ 'di lasa bshad par bya'o// 'dilan tshos

bshad par mi bya'o sAmabaden/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyis pa'o// 'di lanabasnyenabakur bya'o// 'dilanibasnyen bkur ma bye'osnyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nyis ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du so sor

'byed par byed do// 'di'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 'danitshul khrims 'chal ba'osAm du sosor phye nas/ tshul khrims 'chal ba la brnyas par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyis pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/

byang chub sems dpa' nisems can thamasacad la sems manyamab dang/ chos thams cad la sems manyam par bya dgos shing/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang// sa dang chu dang/ me dang rlung dang/ nam

mkha'alta bur snyoms pa'i sems dang/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa dang ldan par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' gangasems can gang yang yongs su mi gtong la gnas pasoms dang/ tshe danges par mkhyidapasasems

cathams cad kyis/snying rjebaskyed cing byams pas mos par byas te khyab bar byas nas bsgrubs te gnas la/ chos rnams la yang stong ngo snyam du bzodapa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ byang chub sems dang 'a sgrogs ba la spyod

bdang slob pa yin no// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor ba latshad nges par byed po den/byang chub sems dpa'i nyes ba ste/ bskal pa 'ditsam gyabar du ni bdag 'khor bar bya'o// bskal ba 'ditsam gyi bar du 'khor
bar mi bya'osnyam pa den/byang chub sems dpa'inyis pa'o/ sems can 'adisnyad cig ni bdag gas grol bar bya'o/ sems can 'dasnyed cig na bdag gis grol bsamabya'o snyam pa na/ khyung

chub sems dpa nyis pa'o// 'din pirtson 'grus so// bdag ni brtson 'grus can no// blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabakhya'osnyam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyos/

ba'o de la byang chubs mas dang 'a rnam par gnon pa ga bzhin/ rigasakyi bu 'di la khyang chub sems dpa' di ltar go bgo bar bya ste/ 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha'ama mngon nozhes snyid du 'byung ba de srid du/ bdag 'khor ba

'khor 'khor te/gal te bdagasems can re re'i phyir yang/ bskal pa de khanar sAd du 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya dgos par gyur na yang bdag bas spro bar bya'o// rnam grangs 'dabazhind sems can thamasacad kyi don gyi phyir/

ma'amatha'amur thug pa de srid du 'khor ba na 'khor dgos na yang dag gis sproste/ de yang brtson 'grus dang/ rgyal dang/ byang chub la mngon par zhenang stangs la/ mi dmigs pa'i brtson 'grusakyi go chasaspro bar

rgyu snyam ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' go cha bgos paden/byang chub sems dpa'isgo sos ba laspyod pa dang slob ba yano// gsakyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/
yul 'khoradang/ rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu songan/sems can rnams kyi don nus shing lcogs la/khos yin bzhin du/ de dgon pa'i phyogs dben pa gcig tu 'dug nas/ dbenang na bsam gtan gyi ro'i ngaga' ba

dang/ bde ba la bstan cing gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nyis pago/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed la/skyob yang med/sems kyi dmigs pa la yang mi na/nang du yang dag 'jog kyang
'phel bar byed/bsam gtan gyi rimyang ba yang med/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan ba mang yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dini byang chub sems dpa'i sgosasab la spyod pa dang slob ba Anano// rigasakyi bu gzhan/

yang byang chub sems dpa' ganga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ban/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par shesanas 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang med do snyam du

de ltar shesan/bdag nyid dul bar bya ba dang/ zha gnas larnal 'byor du brtson par gnas al/sems can gazhan phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i 'dzin 'akhris zer ba de dga'/stong pa nyid bdag med pa'i tshul de mi rjong ma

ston/kharda sprod pa'i m byed pan byung chub sems dang 'de'i thabs lamamakhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/nyes pa byed ba yang yani// byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa laspyod pan/ chos

thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa shes shing/ chos thams cad ngobo nyid kyis stong pa shesanas/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/srog gam/ gang zag gang yang med dosnyam ste/ de ltar ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 'di
dag lus kyi mngon sum du byas te/thamasacad lamidamigs pa'i sems dang ldan l/sems can phyin calog tu sems shing/ dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag kyang/ phyin cilegasazin cing/ dmigs pas na
su gyur ba de las rab tu grol bar byas nas/ dedag la yachos thams cad ngo bo nyidmed do// zhes chos ston cing/ dedagakyang chos thunas rud rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba la 'dzud

zab byed pa'ibadachub sems dpa' den thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa'isgoso so ba la spyod pa dang/ slob bu yang yin no// rigasakyi bu de ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas gsar bzangs 'od bshos gsolanas/ 'khor gyi khyams der 'khong de'inang du byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so bzhes bya ba'achis kyi rnamagras 'a

rgyas par bshad do// bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad don/ semasucan tshad med pa dag klan med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa gyur to// rigs kyi bungs bskal pa 'am bskal/

nga las lhag par byang chub sems dpa' sgos soba' chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te/chos bastan du zin kyang/ spobs pa 'am/chos kyiso rnams zad par mi 'gyumod kyi/'on kyang de brtsam patsam bstanapa yin no//

rigs kyi bu de lta nargyal pogs mdog des/de bzhinagashegasapa de byang chub sems dpa' dige 'dunadapag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu le ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhatham par/ bkod pa de lta bu dang/ bsnyen bkur dang/
phu dud du bya ba de lta bu// bkur sti byas/ bsar byas/rim gros byas/mchod pa byas so////bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal byang chub sems dapa'
sems dpachen bo nas brtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo gsemadog des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gtsug lag khangam bgyis lag/
san de bzhin gshegs pa de dang/ byang chub sems daba'adedag gangan bzhugs bzhugs lags de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po rnam par
rtsib la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gas kyi bu de bzhinagshegs pa de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kha rang rang gis sprul pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na gnasa gnas aso// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la bka'asuld// rigs kyi bu de ltar lo byi ba phrag brgyadatsu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'das pa 'thama'i nyin par rgyal po gseramadog gis de bzhinagshegs ba de

labashos gsol yon phulate/slar gshegs pa ' gnas /bsam pa 'di lta bu zhig bsams te/ci bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du 'gyur ba yongasasubasobar 'am/'onatatshas par 'gyur ba yos su bsngo bar bya
lama'on te 'khor los sgyur ba thobapar gruba'i phyi'i yosasu bsngo bar byasnyam mo// des de'i sems bskyed pa/bcom ldan 'adas de bzhinagshegs pa gser bzangs 'od des thugasuchud de/

denas de bzhin gshegs bs rgyal po'i risams kyi yongs su rtog pa thugasakyisamkhyen nas/ rgyal po dang skye bo'i tshog samang bo de dag gi mdun du steng gi kharasnang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skud khon bzhin du rnam pa thams
cad yongasasu rdzogs pa 'alus shig smralate/de steng gi bar snang de la 'dug nasargyal po gsemadog la tshig bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// dpe na min shes rab 'chal/

[】 ]byis par ng bzhin gyur pa zhig/ rgyal po bsAn bkur byas nasaMni// bya dga'achung du gsol bar byed// de bzhinal las sangs rgyas la// bsam gyisam khyabamachod byas nas// tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal po'i srid//
dma' ba'i gnas la 'dod par byed// rgyal po gyur dang brgya byin dang// de bzhin tshangs par 'gyur ba rnams// 'di dag mi rtag bstan pa yin// brtan m yin te 'jig tshul can// srog chags kun la phan/

pa'i phyir// byang chub sems n bskyed par gyis// sangs rgyas 'jig rtenamakhas rnams kyis// de 'dra'i sems bsngags r yin// rgyal po khyongani yul 'khor bcas// mchod pa rgya chen byas zin gyis// byang chub
samasan bla na med// rgya chen sems na khyod kyis spyod// dma' ba'i smon lamam 'debs shig/ den byis pa'i spyod yul yin// shes rab bzang po mkhas par gyis// byang chub mchogal 'jug par gyis// mya nas
pa 'dod pa'i phyir// sas rgyas de bzhin gshegs rnams la// gang gis stong gsum thams cad kyang// rin chen bkang ste phul ba bas// gang gis thalam sbyar byas nas// sems kyis byang chub bsngos byas la//
tshig tu brjod pa ma byas kyang/ de dibs shin tuche// gang gis sems can thams cad la// bskal pa bye ba brjod med du// sems can kun la bsnyen byas kyang

chub sems bskyed dang// phyogasabcu d gnas ems can dona mdzad pa// rnam 'drenas nigs rgyas gang dag bzhugs rnams la// bsod nams 'dod pa 'ama'aga'asngon chadakyi// 'khor ba'i skal pa byebamachod pa bas//

tshigangamakhas shing mdzangs bar ng bzhin can// bde bar gshegs pa'i stagal yid ches shing// byang chub sems nabartan por bskyod nas kyang// bde gshegs mchod rtan lanam tog 'bul// 'dinadi bas bsod nams

khyad par brjod// byang chub sems kyisame tog 'bul byed la// bsod nams snga ma de ya dpar ma rung// rgyam tshodang ni chu yi thigs pa bzhin// sasargyas zhing 'di'i sems can ji snyed pa// bskal pa re re lasangs
rgyas gyur// bskalang mang bor las gzhan byed bar// bsod nams bshad kyang mtha' na thugapamed// de dag byang chub samasakyi rnamasminabastan// bskal pa mtha' yas bar du bshadan yang// cung zad tsam

yang yongs su brjod mi 'gyur// sa gzhi dag lasajulani ngas ba bzhin// de ltar rgyal po smyos mchog khyod kyis kyang// byang chub sems kyi phanayon 'di thosanas// myur du blo gros dma' ba kun spongs la// byang

chub phyi nargya chen sems skyecig/ 'jig rtan 'dren pa gser gyi mchod sdong 'od// bsam gyisam khyab yon tan kun ldan pa// de yis byang chub sems kyi rnam par smin// 'di dra zhes n phanayon 'di dag bstan

byang chub sems kyi rnamasmin bstanapa ya// bsod nams de la gal tegazugs yodan// zhing rnams gang+gA'aphyisnyed gang byas kyang// de dag bkang bas chatsam zad pa med// rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra thos nas kyang//
rgyal bo gtso bo simasan dga' gyur te// sor mo bcu yi thalano sbyar byas nas// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes n tshig tu smas// byang chub phyir ni bdag gis sems bskyed de// bdag nichos

rjesas rgyas grub par shog/ byang chub rdul bral 'dus ma byas rtogasanas// sems can gang+ga'i byisnyad dgrol bar bgyi// sangs rgyas sku des tshig bcad 'di brjod nas// de tshe rgyal po'i gtso bo dga' gyur pa//

shes nas stong gsum thams cad rab g.yos te/ ngang ba'irgyal po bzhin dumakha' las song// rgyal po gsar mdog sems na yod gyuranas// budang bu mo de bzhin chung ma dang// rgyal po dang natshong dpon khyim bdag

rnams// sangs rgyas lanaphyag 'tshal 'deng zhes bos// bye ba brgya phrag druganus yongs bskoracing// me tog rnams dang phrang dang bdug pa thogs// sas rgyas ga la bar gnyis rgyud song// zhabs la phyag 'tshal

nas ni phyogs gcig 'dug/ de bzhin bu dang bu mo chung ma dang// blonapodang natshod dpon khyim bdagadrang// rgyal po gzhan dang de bzhin 'khor gyi rnams// de dgakyang ni phyag 'tshal gus par 'khod// lha rnams kyis

kyang de bzhin bar snang khyab// salasnyan dakrol zhing me tog char pa phab// gser gyi mdog de yulargyamasabaskor nas// thalamo sbyar byas sangs rgyas zhukhar byed// stobs bcu ldan pa dpagamadalha yi lha// mi 'dul kha
lobasgyur ba khyod la zhu// gang gis byang chub sems brtan por bskyed// de yi bsod nams tsam skyed 'gyur lags// bcom ldan ji ltar sbyod pa spyad bgyisan// bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal ma mthong ba//

nges par bde dang bde blag tshim gyur pas// byang chub bdud rtsi mya ngan med par rtogs// bdag gzhar rkang lag btang yang 'tshal zhing// mgo dang rang sha rtsa la yang mi 'tshal bar// bdagan nges par bder gnas
spyod pa yi// thabs 'dir thub pas bdag la bstan du gsol// rtag tu bde dang bde blag ldan par shog/ nams kyang bdag lus sdug bsngal gyur cig/ byams dang bzod drang dul dang sdom pa la// gnas nas/
bdag gis byang chub mchog rogashog/ la lomamachis rtag tu bslab pa slob// dgags bslab pa rnams kyang ba zhig mi bgyis// 'drenababadag gis dam bcas brtan par bgyi// namasakyang tshigs tsam lhur len

yongasam bgyid// rang byung bsod namasa'abras bu bdag la gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa bde bas gsungs// jiltar spyad ba'i bslab pa bka'astsalagasol// thos nasajaltar bstanabazhina gnas bab bgyi//
gseba'od gaserab kodo'od bawas des gsungs pa/ kyakyis yi bdag pomanyan bar gyis// bde ba'i rgyu yi bsod nams khyod la bshad// bslab pa'i ng bshad kyis de phyir nga las nyon// gang gis stong

gsum ranAchen gang byas la// stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la 'bul byed pa// de bas byang chub tunasmon byed pa// bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phelabar 'gyur// gang gis zhing rnams gang+ga'i byimasnyad// rin chen gang bar

byas nas sbyin par byin// de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed nga// bsod nams shin tumang po 'phel bar 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// sems can thams cad la ni mchod ba byed// de bas byang chub tu
nasmon byed ng// bsod nams shin tumang po 'phel bar 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom gyur// ye shes dbang thob gyur pa de dag la// bsod nams 'dod pa'i gang zag

la la zhig/ bskal pa khrag khrig bar du mchod dbyed// gang gsasnying rje bskyedanas byang chub tu// chen sems n skyod par byed gyur te// sems can la la gang gis byang chub tu// sems kyi gtso bo bskyed pa byas
nas kyang// gom pa bdunan bor ba'i bsod nams 'di// de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin// gal te sems can mtha' dag sas rgyas te// slobs pa mtha' yas ldan pa nyid gyur la// ji ltar
sngon gyi 'khor ba'abaskal pa'i bar// sems can gcig pusamachod pa byas pa dang// mkhas pa'i man gang yang rung ba yis// byang chub mchog tusems n bskyod nasakyang// me togagacig bu phul ba'i bsod

rdzo nams 'di// de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por ni// bsod namasade yi bshad pa brtsams byas kyang// bsod nams 'bras bu de yi bshad pa ni/ nams kyang zad
bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'asade bzhin gshegs ba gsar bzasa'od des rgyal bogaser mdog de la 'di skad ces bka'astsal to/ rgyal po chen po tshos gcig dang ldan/

na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du theg pa bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyural/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde bar yang mi'agyur ro// chos

wa0 gcig po gangazhin/ 'di lta ste/ bag yod pa ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa// myur du glanamed ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de la khag
yod pa gang zhen/'di lta ste/bslab pa yongs su ma la gtong ba dang/ dam bcas pa las ma nyams pa dang/ sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs sumagatong ba dang/

byang chub la 'dun pa brtan pa dang/ brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang/ dge pa'ishes gnyen rnams la sten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ chos la gus pa dang/ thos pa mang pos chog mi shes pa dang/ gzhan dag la chos

bgo bsha' byed pa dang/ zang zi med par chos ston pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang/ yo byadasnyus pa rnams m gtong ba dang/ 'dod pa nyung bdang/ chog shes pa dang/ nga rgyal bcomapa dang/ chos nyan pa la

rna ba blags te nyan pa dang/ blam la gus pa dang/ bzod pa la gnas pa dang/ gnod sems kyi tha ba'inyis pa rnam par spangs pa dang/ zab mo stong nyid kyis chos la mos pa dang/ dmigs par lta ba thams cad

rnam par sbyangs pa dang/ nang du yang dag 'jog la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang/ sems can yosasu sminapar khyab 'am g.yel ba dang/ 'du shes zlog pa dang/ bramo'i gtam rnam par song ba dang/ lus dang
sems dben par gnasapa dang/ dgon bar gnas pa dang/ sems mnyen pa dang/ tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang/ bdag la mi bstod pa dang/ gzhan lamasnodapa dang/ 'gyod pa thams cad las nges
par 'byung bar byed pa dang/ sngonapar 'byung ba dang/ dge sbyong gi tshul rgyun du dga'/gsong por sgrub dang/ bzhin khraganyer mad pa dang/ chos thams cad skyob mad pa dang/ 'gag pa

med pa la 'dzudang dang/ chos tshanas cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rtogs pa 'din byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa zhes bya'o// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa ni 'di lta ste/ nyan/

thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyisoms dang/ dmigs pa lta ba'isams than rmi lam du yang yid lami byed ste/rgyal po chen po 'dan byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod ngago/ rgyal bo chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyang

N+NaM chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mgo bo dang/ rkang lag dang/ mig dang/ yan lag dang/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ rus pa/
dang / kAngadang/ la dang/ mdog dang/ pags pa dang/ lus thams cad yongs su gtong ba ya nga yongs su btang mi dgos par/ bdog pa thamasacad yongs su gtong bar yang 'gyural/ theg pa bde bas

kyi kyang 'amad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// bzhag zhen/ rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' na dge ba'i chos yos su 'tshal ba yid m brtan pa yin

te de na dge ba'i rtsa ba gcibaskyed kyang rung ste/ de la brtan por gnas shing/ zhum dmod pa'i sems dang ldan l/thegapo chen pa la shin tu brtan no// rgyal bonapo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims kyi
phung bo shin tu yongs su dag pa// 'phags pa dngamakhas pas bsngags pa// blamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byang chub kyis yos su zin pa dang ldan pa yin te/ des n bdag nyid tshul khrims la gnas pa'i
nas chos dga' ba nyamasasu myong/ rgyalaponapogazhanayang byang chub samasadapa'i n byams pas gnas pa dang/ bsan gtan la bsam gtan ba dang/ gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa yin te/ rgyal po'i mdo byang

chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing/ mi gnas pa yod la byed pa dang/ sems can thamasacad lasnyomasapa'isims dang ldan pa'i bde bar gnas pa'i rlab de lta bu'i bde ba'i rnam pa gzhan med do/ rgyal po

chen pogazhanayang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ji lta ba bzhin du chos la rtog pa yin te/ den 'di ltar ji lta ba bzhin du yongs surtogaste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa 'di dag thams cad nistongaras/'dil bdagagam/
sems can nam/srog gam/ gang zag gam/yosasu gtong ba gang yin pa 'am/ yongs su btang ba gang yin pa 'am/ lenapagang yin ba 'am/ bzod par byed pa gang yin pa 'am/ gang la bzod par bya ba
lam/ bzod par bya ba gang yin pa 'am/ rtsom pa gang yan pa 'am/ gang gi phyir rtsom pa 'am/ bsam gtan byed pa gang yanang 'om/ bsam gtan du byab gang yin pa 'am/ sgrom par byed pa gang yin
pa 'am/ bsgom par bya ba gang yin pa gang yang med dosAmamo// de de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa na/ 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad rang bzhin gyisastong par ri gnas / dmigs par lta ba gang
la yang mngon par zhen pa medal/ bde bar yang ba gnas te/ rgyal bo chen po chos bazhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bde ba thams cad

dang ldan par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gsang mdog des bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsadagu
ri ba'i gos kyi sbyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa de la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas sgyusagasar bzangs 'od de la 'di skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la glo ba lnga pa'i slad du bdag gis rlan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod do// zhes gsolanas/ de'atsho tshigs su
bcud pa 'di dag ga la to// bdagan zhum pa mamachis sems kyis su// mi mchog spyan sngar tshig 'dis gsol bar bgyi// sems can kun la snying ngaskyed nas kyang// 'dren pa son
ni byang chub gzhol bar bgyi// bdag la nams kyang g.yosgyu ma mchis te// stobs bcu ldan pas bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen// yon tan mnga' ba grags chen 'dra ba ni// lha mi gzhan la
bdag gi dbang ma mchis// bdag ni sdug rnams skyabs dang skyob pa dang// dpung gnyen gyur te sdug bsngal chos rnams dgrol// khyu mchog bdag nyid bde la gnas nas kyang// srog chags
pa rnams ni bdag gis bde la dgod// 'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos gang dag/ de la bdag ni sbyang phyir gnas par bgyi// 'dren pa ji ltar khyod na lha mis mchod// de ltar bdag kyang mi/
rnams mchod rten shog/ byung chung thams cad mchog na tshol bgyid cing/ bskal pa mang por sbyin pa sbyin par bgyi/ zas skom gos dang shing rta bzhon pa dang// gser dngul rin chen du ma'i sbyin
pa bgyi// 'dren pa bdag ni bsrung la gus par bgyi// den ji bzhin yongs su bsrung bar bgyi/ nyams par mi bgyi gang la'ang gnas mi bgyi// 'dren pa bdag ni tshul khrims dag par bgyid//
sems can kun la snyoms pa'i ngagam pa yis// srog gachags rnams la byams pa'i sems su bgyi// bkur stibagyis dang bkur stimabagyis pa// mtho bar 'gyur dang dma' bar 'gyur
mamachis// bskal pa bye ba mang po bsam yas par// bdag ni ji srid sngon chad 'khorab ng gyur// mi dpa' khyod la rten nus ji srid du// sems can gcig g phyir yang spro bar bgyi// lha
mi'i 'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs ba yi// bsam gtan bde ba de la gnas par bgyis// 'dren pa bsam gtan bad pa reg gnas shing// rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas su gnas par bgyis// bdag

ni stong ba nyid la nges par bgyi// lta ba la rten pa yod mi bgyi// dma' ba'i spyod pa rtag tu rnam par spang// mchog gi spyodang dri med spyad nga ra ngagyi// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gsar mdog gis
khan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed ma thag pa de'i mod la/ stong gsum gyi stachen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dim pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so//

rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis kyang blonam dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se mas bskyed do// khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong ba de dag dang/ tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong pa de dag dang/

bu dang bu mo dang/ chung ma de dag dang/ gzhan skye bo'i tshogs chen po dedagadang/ lha'i bu brgyad khri ngan stong rnams rgyal po gsaramadog de'irjes su slob cing/ thams cad kyis blan med pa yang dag
ny+nyo par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po gsar ma tog des/ bu thu borgyal por bcug go/ bcul gnas kyang bu rnams dang/ bumo rnams dang/ chung ma rnams dang/
tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag dang/ blon po dang/ rgyal phran rnams dang lhan cig tu srog cha ba sa bye bas bskor te/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// de dag de ltar rab tu byung nas

sku lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dgapa// yongasasu byang ba spyad do// rgyal po pa ser mdog gis kyang/ mngon par shes pa bsgrubasanas/ mang du thos pa'i mthar phyin par gyur to// byabs
pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs so// de dge ba'irtsa ba de dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa des 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal par gyur bas/ sangs rgyas nyi khri le nyis bar byas te/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la yang/ na nga za' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang gdan dang/ snyan gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ blamar
byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi thad du/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser mdog tu gyur pa de/ gzhan
zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'ab/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom zan/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi ba ltago/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dang ba chen po byams pa 'di/
de'i tshad 'dus na/ rgyal po la gsar mdog tu gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i de'i dusan/ tshangs par gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar

bzangs 'od de la ma rtsod pa li las la brtson par gyur pa gang in pa de ga 'a na zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/ yid la 'as sam/ the tshom za na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir

zhe na rnam par ba khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dusan tshangs pa 'gyur to/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ bcom ldan 'das gser bzangs 'od la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed par
spro bar gyur ba gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyodasom nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ btsom zan/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dusan//
sa @#// lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur te/ byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par mi gnas pa'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsnyen bkur byas so// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus
[】]na sems can ji snyad kyis rgyal pogasar mdog dang lhan cige gzhunganamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chud tu sems bskyed pa de dag gi nang na/ tha na sems can gcig kyang ban med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa ngas ma mthong ste/ de dag thams cad ni shes rab che bdang/ brtson 'grus che ba sha stag ste// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrungs

tsho shing/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs surdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu mtshan ba dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur te/ 'jig rten du byung nas thams cad kyis ches kyi
'khor lo bskor te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de bzhin gshag pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang/ nga dang khyod gang
rgyu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ 'khor 'dir byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis kyang mthong ngo// mchod pa byas so// bsAn bkur byas so/
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang gzung ngo/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom

ldan 'das bla na re dang yang dgang ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub de tsam du yun ring du bregs pa dang/ rgyan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang de tsam dudaka' ba ni ngo mtshar lag
so de ci'i slad du zhen/ der srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag de snyad kyis btsem ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas gsar bzangs
'od de'i gsung rab la/ bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ngargya da la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ma bskyed pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang bachen po rnam par rtse nga la 'di skad ces paka' su la to// rigs kyi bu du na de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin du/ bla na med pa yang dag pardzogs
pa'i byang chub 'de na yun ring du thogs so/ bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang dka'o// rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas gsar ba zangs 'od de'i sngon rol dang/ de'i 'og tu yang sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la ngas ri me byas/ mchod
pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla ma ra byas mod kyi/ de srid dus blanam nga nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyang de/ gzhan du na nga 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
0 nabya@#// 'das 'di dag de tsam dum dzes shing/ de tsam du blta na sdug la/ de tsam du snying du sdug pa'i ngo mtshar tosAm ste/ de dag la nga'i sdug pa'i sams dang/ dga' ba dang/
gus pa skyes par zad de/ sa byan me da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nam yang sums ma bskyod do// rigs kyi bu de bsan rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig bar bya ste// sangs rgyas

byab khrag khrig 'bum phrag dang gtumad grangs med pa dag dang/ rang sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang/ nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bumaphrag dang ga tu med grangs mang

pa dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mchod pa byas su zin kyang de srid du yang/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas nga 'byang chub tu sems m bskyed de/ gzhan du na phyis gang gi tshe dge ba'i/
rtsa ba yongs su 'dus par gyur pa de'i 'og tu bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'khyang chub tu sems bskyed par zad do/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
stsal to// dang por nganadinadam gzigs pa ni/ grags pa chen bo shes rab pha rol son// mi mchog sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang// bsam yas rnams la gus pas mchod pa byed//
dang por yon tan 'byung gnas rnams ma chod kyang// bdag nir khas ba chos kun shes pa'i mchog/ 'jig rtenamachod rten sangs rgyas gyur cig ces// de srid du yang sems ni skyidan byed// de dag rang
0 rgyal bye ba snyed la ya nga// gus pa bskyod nas mchod pa byed med kyi/ mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba rdzogs sangs rgyas// gyur ces sems ni de srid skyong mi byed// gus pa rgya chen yang dag bskyed
nas kyang// dbang du gyur pa bye snyad mchod mod kyi/ ye shes rgya mtsho ma mchog 'dra par ni// de srid du yang sems ni skyong ma byed// don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi gzugs mthong nas//
dga' ba'i shugs ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab// mkhas pa mi 'dul rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su// gyur ces sems nad sringasadam byed// gang tshade dag bsod nams rgya chen bsags/ lus dang
yid kyis bden pa bsgoms pa na/ 'dren pa mi rnams mchog tu gyur cig ces// byang chub ngon dusems ni bskyed parabyed// de dag gisani bskal pa bye ba snyad// bsnyan baskur byas pas bsod
nams tshogs bsags nas// sems dge ba dang 'jam zhing mnyen pa yis// de tshe byang chub tu yang se mas bskyod de// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa// de ni bdag kyang sngams cad
gzigs gyur cig/ nams kyang bdag gi smon lamanyams ma 'gyur// de dug de skad smon lam 'jug pa 'gyur// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang nga sag pa// des n srogs chags thams cang
rgal gyur cig/ mi dge'i las ni bdag gis gang byas pa// de yi 'bras bu mi bzod bdag gis spangs// mthu dang brtson 'grus brtan pa bskyed nas ni// phyi nas byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/
thubya se mas nam yang zhum par ma gyur cig dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas thong gyur cig/ mkhas pa sems la dmigs pa'i m byed de// byang chub mi dmigs bdag nyid
kun mi dmangags// chos 'damatha' dag stong par shes nan// des na byang chub sems ni brjod mi 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po byams pa la byams bzhes bgyi// byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'dis ming 'di ga la red lags// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po
rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa grangasamed pa bas kyang/ ches grangasamed pa yun ring po tshad med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus
na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasargyus rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurab/ bla
na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rina chen g dugs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de btsas ma thag tu gom
ba bdun bor ngan/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ stong gi bar snang la rin chen sna bdun gyi ba gdugs bzung ngo// rin po che'i gdugs des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so// der lha rnams kyis kyam 'din da bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra bsgrags te/ des n de bzhin
gshegs pa de'i mtshan rin chen gdugs rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs kha dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdug
da'i gsung rab la/ dge slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya ba/ tshong dpon gyi rigs nga ya tu byung ba zhig yod de/ rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po de bsod snyoms par gyurato//

de'i tshe de'i dusan/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de'i bstan pa la bab pa na 'dzam bu'i gling den grong rgyud bring zhi stong yod do// grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// grong rdal brgyad/

khri bzhi stong yodado// yul 'khor brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// tshong dus rgyud khri bzhi stong yod do// dge slong blo gros brtan po de yang grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor
dang tshong dus de dag thamasacad du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyubar gyur la/ de 'di ba du sems te/ nam srog chagasabargyatshang bar bslob pa'i gzhi la lam bkod kyi bar du bdag gis gzan mi bza'o
snyache// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po des de lta ba'i yid ma de b.rus nas/ grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ras/ tshong

dadus gang dang gang du ngaso la snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba de dang der srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar du gzun mi bza'o// rigs kyi bu dag slong blo gros brtan po des/ gang gi

tshe nyi ma gcig gis srog chags brgya bslabapa'ibazhilnga la bkod pa da'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do// gangag tshe nyi ma gnyis kyis srog chags rgyu bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang po'i
skabs kyang yod de/ des gzan bcas nas nyi ma gsum pa'i tshe gzan bza'o// gang gi tshe nyi ma gsum gyi srog chags ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do//
nyi ma bzhis srogachags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do// rigs kyi bu gang ga tshanyi ma lnga dang/ drug dang/ bdun gyis srog chags brgya bslab

pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod ba de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod de/ de zhag bdun gyi bar du zan chad kyang sems can rnams la snying rjeba'i phyir sems yongs su mi skyo ste/ zhag brgyadapa'i tsho gzan bza'o//

rigs kyi bu rnam grangs de lta bu s dge slong blo gros brtan po des/ lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yongs sum skyoba'i sems kyis grong khyer chen po de dag tu song zhing/ grong dang/ grong khyeradang/
grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor dang/ tshogs dus de dag tu song nas/ soms na de dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do// rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po des/ lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ba dedag 'das
sa srog chags skyes ba dang/ bud med dang/ khyedudang/ bumo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'di
snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can mang po 'di dag bslab pa 'i gzhi lnga la bkod zin gyis/ bdag gis 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzud gor ma chagago snyam rdo
de de dag gi thad du so nas/ lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi ngar du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do// chos kyi bsngags pa brjod do// dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do// theg pa chen po'i bsngags
pa brjod do// sems can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa gang yin nga 'i sems can de dag gis nang nas/ lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po gzhan 'das nas/ srog chags bye ba phrag gsum du tshang ba/ gang drag

sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ rgya chen po la mos pa de dag bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud do// lhag ma dman pa lams pa rkyen gyi ma thun dang ldan pa de dag ni//

rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems bskyed du bcug go// rigs gyi bu 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thegapa gsum
po la mos par byas zin gyis/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bag yod par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin la gzud pa bstan to sAmamo// rigs kyi bu de ltar dge slong/

blo gros brtan po des/ yang lo nyi khri chig stong gi bar du srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug pa de dag la ting nge 'dzin la dmigasapa'i lung phog go/ rigs kyi bu ngage slong blo gros brtan

bo des/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug po 'i sim sa can de dag thams cad ci nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'gyur nga nge lta de lta bur gdams ngag bstan cing/ de lta nga lta bur

rjes su ston to// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de gang gi tshe grong du 'gro ba de'i tshe/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'gro'o// de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom/
par zhugs nas/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ tshongs su bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ste/ de bgyi ban de na sems can byams pa la gnas pa gang yin
pa de dag thams cad dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i rkang pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa'i tshe/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa dang dge ba'i
rtsa bal yid ches pa dang/ stongang nyid la mos pa 'khyad par la ltos/ de'i phyir dge slong blo gros brtan po'i rkang pasgo'i them pa la bzhag pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag thams cad byams pa'i ting nge
'dzin la ji ltar btsud pa bzhin du/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/// de nas de'i tshe dge slong blogos brtan po de'i byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu
mthong nas/ sabla'i rnams kyis/ al la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor

dang 4 tshong dus su 'gro ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra sgrogs shing skad 'byin par byed do// sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas/ bar snang
gi lha rnams kyis sgra sgrogasashing skad phyung ngo// de dag gis sgra thosanas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/
'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi bar gcig nasagacig tu sgra thos nas/ nas la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po 'don byams pa 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di gong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor dang/ tshong dus su song ba dang/ sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir ro// zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad phyung ngo// de'i ming de la yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[7g]bya// rin chen gdugs des rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/ 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' dage slong blo gro brtan po 'di na srid par 'gro ba'i 'chi'apho dang skye ba thams cad
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par grags par 'gyur ro// byang chub thob pa'itshiyang 'di'i ming de nyid du 'gyur ti/ 'jig
rten du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang/ rin po che bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhingagyi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems cad rnams 'dus pa'i nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
blo ba yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// rigs kyi bu de'i de'i dusan/ dge slong blogres ngartan po zhes bya ba gyur pa re
gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ btsom za srid de/ de tshun chad tshe rabs thams cad du/ ming 'di lta ste/ byams pa zhes bya ba 'ba' shig tu 'gyur ro/
rgyu byang chub thob pa'i tshe yang 'di'i ming 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba de kho nar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu rgyu ni de
yin/ rkyen de ni te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la/ byams pa byams pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sngon byung ba 'di bshad ma thag pa de'i mod la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//
stong gi bar snangal yang lha'i glu dbyangs gragago/ me tog gi char yang bab bo// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ mamadzod kyi bdag
po tshangs pa dang/ gzhan yang lha'i bu 'bum phrag dumadag gis/ lha'i ma tog mnar ba dag khyer nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po byams pa ga la ba der gtor
te tshig 'di skad du/ lam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni skye bo mang bo 'a phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ skyabe mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig
rten la snying rtse ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te/ 'di ltar thums cad mkhyenapanyid ma thob par yang sems
can bye ba khrag khrig 'bumade snyed kyi don byas pa'i phyir ro// sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang red pa'i mchog
legs pa red pa yin na/ sha'i mig gis mngon sum du mthong nas/ dga' ba thob pa de dag lta ci smos/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
'apo byams pa la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag pa de'i mod la/ skye bo'i
tshogs chen po dang bcas/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'dzin gyis/ tshigamathun pa'i tshig 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lozhes smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ srogachags khri nyis stong chos
rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgago/ dge slong lnga stong na lan pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnams par grol lo// srog chags stong phrag du
ma ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'khor 'dus pa gnyis pa la dgra bcom pa mngon
sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di ming lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces/
bka' stsal to// kun dga' po de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming byams pa'i dang bo sems bskyed pa zhes bya ngar zung ga byang chub sems dbang rnam par rtse ngas zhus pa
zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i phyag rgya bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ byang chub sems dapa'i
sgos so bzhi sa bya bar thung shig/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung pa'i phyir dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag bstanapar bya ba' bar gyi phyir khyod la gtad do//
kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin poche sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
la phul ba ngasani/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i dang po 'jug nga 'di byes nas/ sams kyi rgyud byang chub tu gzhol ba dang/ byang chub tu smonapas
mos par byed dam/ 'dzin tam 'chang ngam/ kun chub par byed dam/ sgom mam/ gzhan dga' rgyas par yang dag par ston par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// mi lus thob pa red bar dka'
sangs rgyus 'byung ba'ang rnyed par daka'// sangasargyus dad pared par dka' khya nga chub sems kyang nd par dka'// gnas skabs bzhi bo 'di dgan// bskal pa bye bar red
dka' ste/ de phyir tho bzhi sam sbasangag mthu rtsal dag kyang chudam gzon/ mi lus thob pa red pa dang// sangs rgyas 'byung ba red pa dang// sangasargyus dad ra'angasodapa
dang byang chub sems n skyed gyur na// de phyir brtson 'grus bskyedanas kyang// rtag tu bgan yod par gyis// drang srong chen po de dag gis// bag yod pas byang chub bar s//
sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi gartsa ba'i sgo dngatshul gyi lam// bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus yin// mkhas pa rnams kyang 'dil slob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lham yin dang/
dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rtan yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par bstodade// 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'amadordzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po khra dzAwaram dang/ jig mi tra dang/ su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tshab ban d+he bshes sde lasogs pas bsgyuracibazhus te gtan la phab pa//
rgyu na/ra skad du/ Ar+yad sha b+hAmi na nA ma ma hAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
bam po dang po// sangs rgyus dang/ byang chung sems dpa' thams cad lo phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdagagis thosapa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas nas ring bo ma lon te zhag nga dur pa gnyis pa'i tshe/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nangan/ lha'i dbang po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying
po'i khang pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig
rten gyi khams gzhan dang/ gzhan dag nas 'dus pa sha stag ste/ thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rab tu thob pa 'i gnas pas gnas pa//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang shas yul rtog pa ladran brgyunam gcod pa'i spyod lul ba/ 'gro ba thamasacad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul bar bya ba'i dus bzhin
duphyad pa'i byin rlabs bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dang 'thams cad kyi spyod lam mngon par bsgrub pa rgyun mi gcod cing///
bskal pa dang dus dang/ zhing dang/ spyod pa la gnas pa/ byang chub soms dpa' thums cad kyi 'byor pa'i tshogs khasonganams dang/ ya shos kyis 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'atshob
shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa mi zad pa la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes rab dang/ thabs dam pa mchog thob pa/ 'khor ba dang/ mya nganalas 'dus pa'i sgo yang
rgyu dag par ston pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pargyun mi gcod pa// byang chub sems dang 'ams cad kyi bsam gtan dang/ rnam par tharapa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par
'jugapa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ yi shes kyis mngon par shes pa 'bya ba thams cud yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
rgyu stobasal dbang thob pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba mad par sems kyi skad cig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba la mngon du 'dren pa'i gtam
skyes bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba dang/ sangs rgyus lamachod pa dang/ rim gro rgya chen po bya ba la mngon par brtson pa
