byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad kyi las yang dag par byang ba mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus rab tu snang bar byed pa thob pa/ chos thams cad kyi
dbyings la thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs sgrogs pas khyab par byed pas dus gsum thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems kyi yishes kyi spyod yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ byang chub sem/
dpa' thams cad kyi sde snod kyi yon tan bsgrubs pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa bskal pa brjod du med par byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu bstan pas yon tan bsngags pa'i bstan pa zad mi shes
pa sha sta ga la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems M dpo'asems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po dang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dang la gyi snying po
dang 4 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsang snang byed snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po sa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan bkod pa thams cad snang bar
bya// ston pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal
mdzes pa'i snying bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan dpal gyi su nga po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po me tog dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pom tog rgyas pa'i dar la gyi snying bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ut+pa la dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
zla dpa' chen po lha'i dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon po bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa med pa'i
ya shos rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu'i
rgyudabal gyi snying bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po dri ma dang bral ba'i snying po dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer gyi dra ba chen po snangaba'i snying po dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mdzes pa'i sIng po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po gse ra'akhrigs pa bsags pa yangs shing bzang
ba gzi brjid mdzes pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma tshanathams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i dpal gyi sIng bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de rje 'od 'phro dpal de'u rgyun gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od 'bar zhing 'phro badri ma med pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po snang ba'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod ya shes sgribs pa med pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa med cing nga rosnyan pa'i sAng po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi skye 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yang
dag par 'dzin pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyas tshe bkod pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dpal gyi snying bo dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan thams cad yang dag par ston pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
tsha @#/ dang [“ ]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol pa'i zla ba dang/ de dag
tha la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa//
kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying bo lasog
sgyu pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa rnams dang thabs cigago/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rdo rje'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi mthus
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba zhes bya la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po
sgyu rab tu snang bde ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rol nas de bzhin

gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs

so 4 pa'i di ltar rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu 'di bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phrarab kyi rdul snyed kun kyang mtshan rdordzo'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag
gas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang/ byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang ngar brjod ba
yengashes kyis la 'jug par bya ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cudar tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba dang/ chos la yo shos shin tu
rgyas par bya ba dang/ legs par gnas pa'i tshos bstan pa dang/ ye shes tha mi dad pa rnam par sbyang nga dang/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten las
'das pa'i chos dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa yul khong du chud par bya ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul gyi bar du khong du chud
bar bya ba dang/ gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po dag brtsams pas rab tu thob par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'is ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par bgodapa la mkhas pas
0 thu@#// bstan par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang/ zag pa med pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rnam par gzhig
pa dang/ rnam par 'byed pasashin tu rnam par phye ba shes rab chen po snang ba la mkhas par bya ba dang/ shin tu brtags pa'i ya shes kyi sgo la 'jug par byab dang/ gnas gzhan cirig
su rab tu brjod pa la bag 'chums pa med cing spobs pas snang bar bya ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa chen po'i sa shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med par
byab dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ thams cad la rnam par nges par thob par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi
chos rnams kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i ye shes snanganga'ibyin gyi rlabs dang/ rang gi dge
ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyong ba dang/ sems can gyi khams la phan 'dogs pa dang/ chos kyi sku'i ye shes kyi sku dang/ sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par nod pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus 'byung bad/ 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang/
'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi rgyud yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pas spobs par gyis shig denas/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la zil gyisami non pa'i lus nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de/ thogs pamed pa'i spobs pa ston pa dang/
shin tu sbyangs pa'i lo shos kyis rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa dang/ brjedapa mdang 'a byon gyi rlabs dang/ shin tu nges pa la blo gros mkhas pa dang/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'abrom
'dor ba dang/ yang dpag par rdzogs pa'i sa rgyus kyi stobs rdzi ba med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa zhum pa med pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so so
yang dag par rig pa'i rnam par 'byed pas chos kyi tshul la rtog pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang/ gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan rab tu rnam par phye ba thams cad mngon pa rab sgrub pa nye/
bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi sa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu
yongs su sbyangs pa dang/ ye shes kyi da kyil 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa dang/ yongs su sbyangs ba shin du byas pa dang/ dran pa tshad med pa'i snod dang/
mos pa 'od gsal ba rnam par sbyangs pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thami dad pa shin tu thob pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i phyag rgyas shin tu btab pa'i phyir ro//
de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ de dag nyid na bzhugs bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus phyagagayas pa rnams brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'ihUMng po'i
mgo la byug pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la ting ngeng 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang
chub sems dpa' de dag la sbas pa// khyargyalaba'isras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 'di ni shin tu rnam par nges pa ste/ tha mi dadang/ bltar med pa//
chos kyi dbyings shin tu rgyas pa/ namakha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyi ma'amatha'i mur thug pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dpungaganyen yin te/
k+Sha kye rgyal ba'i sras dag des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen bo rnams 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yoshes kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro//
[z]ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ngashin tu yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub sepas dpa' dag sangs spyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa kyi ye sheng kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang la bsams nas/ bdag gis de skad smras pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcu po de dag ni/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung/
ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo// gsung bar 'gyur ro// datsugang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga'
bzhes bya ba dang/ dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya ba dang/ shin tu sbyang dka' bzhes bya ba dang/ mngon du gyur ces bya ba dang/
ring du song zhes bya ba dang/ mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang/ legs pa'i blo gros can zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin ces bya ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'isras
dag de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ste/ de dag ni 'das pa drang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo/
gsung ba pa 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dgagangan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di nga gnam gsung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams debadag
gsam mthong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kyirgyal pa'i grwa sa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dang lam yongs su spyod
ba chos kyi sgo byung ba 'di ni yang dag phul yin te/ gang 'das rnam par dbye ba rnam par tha/ khug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'dis rnam par dgung pa shes pa zhes bya ba'i gnas
'duno/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdorje'i snying pos byang chung sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig brjod de/ cang mi zer bar 'dug nas de las rab tu
zla phye ste ma bshad pa dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad/ byang chung sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig thos la/ sa rnam par phye ste ma batshong
pas skom par gyuranas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig brjod de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas
de las rab tu phye sta maston pa de la rgyun gang/ rkyen ni ci zhig yod snyam pa dang/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol/
ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba 'dus shing 'dug ste// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i bas/ byang chub samasangapali 'khor de dag gi sems kyirtog pa sems kyis
yongs su shes nas// tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjesnying po la dris pa// kun tu rtog pa dag gyur pa// dran dang ye shes yon tan ldan// sa mchogabarjod
nas ci yi phyir// 'byor pa rang du bshad mi bgyi// 'dikun rnam par nges pa ste// byang chub sems dba'agrags chen ldan// ci phyir khyod kyis sabarjod nas// rnam pa ra dbye ba bshad mi
bgyi// rgyal ba'i sras po 'di dag kun// nyan par 'dod pa 'jigs pamed// sa rnams kyis ni din gyi tshul// yang dag phye ste bshad pa mdzod// 'khor 'deshin tu rnam dag ste// la la
med cing dge dang ldan// dag pa sIng por rang gnas pa// yon tan ye shes shin tu ldan// thams cad gus dang bcas gnas shing// phan tshun gcig la gcig lta ste// sbrang ma'i sbyang chu bdud ts+tsa/
'dra spang bar bya min 'dod pa bzhin// shes rab chen po 'jigasamed pa// rdoN+Di'i snying pos de thob nas// 'khor rnams dga' bar bya ba'iphyir// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras la sbas//
'di ni dka'ab dam pa rmad du byung// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab bstan pa// sa rnam par dbye ba mchog yin te// de las sangs rgyas dngos po yang dag thob// phra zhing blta dka' rnam
rtogs pa spangs// sems kyis dang bral bas bsgrub par dka'// mkhas pa rnams kyis zag med spyod yul te// 'gro ba rnams kyis de thosams par 'gyur// rdorje lta burab sam pa bzhag
byas nas// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog lalhag mos shing// sems kyis la bdag med ri nas na// ye shes shin tu phra ba 'di mnyananus/ ji ltar bar snang tshon
ris bri ba dang// dziltar nam mkha'i dbyings la rlung gnas pa// de ltar 'di yang bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi// ye shes zag med rnam phye blta bar dka'// de la bdag gi blon 'ong snyam du//
'grob gang gis 'di'i rtog 'gyur ba dang// mchog 'dir su zhig dad pa'i ng dkon snyam nas/ de yi phyir na 'di bshad spro ba med// de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol
ba'i zlobs// byang chub soms dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras kyi ma 'khor 'di ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i
bsam pa ni tu yongs su sbyangs pa/ kun tu rtog pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa/ spyad par byang shin tu spyad// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang bo la bsnyen bkurabyas pa/ tshog sashin tu bsag
pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ yid gnyis dang nem nur dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ mos pa la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di
dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pa ste/ de bas na kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gnas 'di la mngon sum du gnas pa sha stag yin gyis/ legs par bshad pa
mdzod cig/ rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa kyirgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa/
kun tu rtog pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa/ spyad par bya ba shin tu spyad pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ tshog sangashin tu bsags pa// yon tan dpag tu med nga
dang ldan pa/ yid gnyis dang nam nur dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa// lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ mos pa la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag la gzhan gyi dwangs
'jog pashastag 'dus mod kyi/ 'on kyang gzhan dag bsam gyisam khyab pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di thos par gyur la thesanas kyang yid gnyis dang/ nem nur skye bar gyur na/ de ni de dag
la yun ring por phan pa med pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta bu zhig tu snying brtse bas de'i phyir bdag ni cang mi zer bar 'dug pa nyid du mas sa/

de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i snying po la don de nyid kyi phyir yang gsol ba btab pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras don de nyid legs par bshad pa mdzod
cig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag shin tu bsungs pa dang/ yid ches par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras 'di/ thog mar spyad pa ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par thob pa'o// kye rgyal ba'isras 'dilta ste/ dper na yi
ge'i 'bru dang/ yi ge dang/ grangs bstan pa dang thams cad kyi mngon du 'gro ba yang yi ge'i phyi mo yin la/ mthar 'byin pa yang yige'i phyi mo yin te/ yi ge'i 'bru dang/ yi ge dang/
grangs bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ yi ge'i phyi mo med par bstan pa ma da do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin dusangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad na spyod pas 'grub pas sa de ni so na
tshe du 'gro ba'o// rang 'byung gi shes kyi mthar thug par 'gyurabs sa de ni mthar 'byin pa'o/ de bas na kye rgyal ba'i sras shod cig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzog
ba'isangs rgyas rnams kyang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlobs pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dgarngams cad kyis dbyangs ngeng rog cig gis tshigs su cad
pa'i dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdoN+Di'i snying po la don de nyid kyi phyir/ de'i tshog sol ba btab pa/ rab mchogatam padri ma med pa'i blo// brjopalegs brjod spobs pa
mtha' yas pa// snyan cing mchog tu byung ba'i gsungs dbyangs kyis// dam pa'i don dang ldan par bshad pa mdzod// dran du dga' dang blon rnamadag pa// stobs bcu'i stobs
thob bsam pa rnam dgapa// so so yang dag rig den rnam 'byed pa// sa bcu phul du byung ba bshad pa mdzod// zhing dul bas g.yeng dge ba'i yid// rgyags dngangargyalaltaba'i
nyon mongs sbyangs// 'khor 'di ma bral bar gyur pa ste// khyod kyis legs par bshad pa 'dod cing 'khod// skom par gyur pa chugang 'dod pa dang// bkres pa zas dang nad pa
sman mchog dang// bung ba'i tshogs rnams sbyang 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin 'bor rnams khyod kyi tshig la sdod// de bas bde gshegs bgrod bstobs bcu ldan// chags pa med pa rab tu
bstan pa'i phyir// dri ma med pa'i sa ya khyad par ni// rdul mdam lus legs par bshad pa mdzod/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mdzod sku nas/ byang chub
sems dpa'i stobs snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od gazer 'khor gyi 'od gzer grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa dang ldan pa byung ste/ des phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
thams cad snang bar byas nas/ ngan song gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun bcad de/ bdud kyi khyim tshamasacad chog mog por byas nas sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa
dag snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam pa'i mthu'i rdzu 'phrulagyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas/ phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jigarten gyi khams rab 'byams thag
cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su chos bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snang bar byas te/
steng gi bar snang la 'od ganger stag po'i sngon gyi dra b.likhang pa brtsegs pa chen po byas nas 'dug go/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gisamadzod spu d gnas kyang/ byang chub se ru/

dpa'i stengs snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od gze 'khor gyi 'od gzer grangs med pa nga yang/ grangs med pa dang ldan pa ngag byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/
rang 'byams thams cad snang bar byas nas/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun bcad de/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khoradang/
tu med pa dag snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam pa'i mathu rdzu 'phrulagyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyisami khyab pa bstan nas/ phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yang/
'byams thams cad dude bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su chos bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snang bar byas nas/ ste

gi bar snang la 'od zer stag po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po byas te 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas byung ba'i 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dgadang/
sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'kho rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus dang/ stan rnams gsal bar snang bar kun tu snang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad me dpa'i sangs rgyas bcom/
ldan 'das de dag gisamadzod spu d gnas byung ba'i 'od gazer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'ajig rten gyi khams 'di dang/ bcom ldan 'das shAkyagrub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' rdo'i snying po'i lus dang/ stan yang gsal bar snang bar kun tu snang ngo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sprin sdug pa'i dre ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po de las 'di lta bu'i
sgra 'byung ngo// mnyamamanyam panam mkha' mnyam pa dag/ stobs bcu'i khyu mchog tshogs rab mtha' yas pa// lha dang mi yi nang na mchog rnams kyi// shAkya'i rigs skyes chos 'byin
slob mdzad// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mthus// chos kyirgyal bo rnams kyi mdzod// spyod pa dam pa rgya chen dang// ye shes sa rab phyob shod// chos kyi rnam grangs gtso bo 'di//
gang rnams rna las grag de dag/ bdegshegs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bzung// sa bcu rdul dang rnam bral ba// mthar gyis rdzogs par byas
nas nii// stobs bcu dag kyang bgyur nas// rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// the tsom med par gyurapa rnams// rgya mtsho'i nang gnas gyur tam// bsreg pa'i bskal tshe 'phosan yang//
chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis 'gyur// ye shes sa yi lam gyi mchog/ 'jug dang gnas dang 'bar ba dang// spyod pa nyid kyi yula rnams ni// go rims bzhin du/
legs par shod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos phyogasabcurA rnam par bltasanas/ 'khora rnams dad pa rgya cher bskyod pa'i phyiratshigs su bcad pa 'di ngagasmras so//
phrazhingashes dka' drang srong chen po'ilam// brtag med rtog bral shin tu regakhar dka'// gsal b.rigapa ma bsabs rtogs pa ste// rang bzhin zhi ba'i 'gogamin 'byungam yin//
rgyu rang bzhin stong yong gnyis min zad mi shes// grol lasa rnam grol mnyam b.res mya ngan 'das// mtha'adang dbung min tshig gis brjod du med// sa gsum rnams lasagrol ba nam mkha'
mnyam// zhi zhing rab zhi bde bar gshegs pas mkhyen// smra ba'i lam rnams kun gyis brjod par dka'// sa dang spong pa rnams kyang de 'dra ste// skya bar dka' mamanyan par ga la nus/
de na bsam dang sems kyi lam rnams kyang// ye shes mngon sgrubathub pa'i dbang pos mkhyen// thung po skye mched khams kyis bskyed ma yin// sems kyis ma shes yid kyis bsam ma
yin// ji ltar bar snang bya rjes ma bsa rnams kyis// brjod par nus ma yin zhing mi mthong ba// de ltar rgyal ba'i sras kyi sa kun kyang// brjod mi nus na mnyan par ga la nus/ 'on kyang
byams dang snying rje'i smon lam gyis// de las phyogs tsam rim patshul bzhin du// bshad byasems kyi spyod yul rnams kyis min// bsam pa ji bzhin ye shes de rdzogs byed// de yi spyod /
lul de 'dra blta dka' ba// de nirang sems gnas kyang brjod nus// 'on kyang rgyal ba'i mthus ni rab ng rjod kyis// thams cad nyon la mthun par gus pa cas kyis// 'di yis 'jug bya ye
shes de 'dra ba// de ni bskal bar brjod par mi nus te// chos don yang dag ma lus ji bzhin gnas// mdo tsam bdag gis bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// gus dang bcas par sta gon gyi
shigeg dang// rgyal ba'i mthu yis bdag gis legs par bshad// dpe ldan 'thadal ya gamanyam pa yis// chos kyi dam pa'i sgrasani bshad par bya// de ni tshig gis shin tu brjod dka'
yang// bde bar gshegs mthu dpag med gang yin pa// 'od gzer lus can don bdag la zhugs// de yi mthusazhingadag bas bshad par nus/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
dgade la sems can dge ba'i rtse ba shin tu bsags pa/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa/ spyod pa shin tu sbyad pa/ gangasargyas byung ba la shin tu bsAn bkur byas pa/ chos dkar bo la shin tu bsdus
pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen shin tubazung ba/ bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa/ lhag pa'i bsam brgya chen pocan/ mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan ng/ snying brtse ba dang snying rje mngon dugyur/
rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par 'dod pang bya bdang/ stobs bcu'i ste bas thob par bya ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos

mnyam pa nyid thob par bya ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyabs par bya ba dang/ snying brtse ba dang/ snying rje chen po rnam par dag pa ra bya ba dang/ phyogs bcu ma lus par shes pa thobapar byang

dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la chags pa me dpa longs su sbyang bar bya bdang/ dus gsum skad cig gcig gis khongadu tshudapar bya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba la 'jigs pa
spyi med par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang/ shes rab dang/ ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa dang/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang/
bsam pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pas rab tu brtan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dpag du med pa dang ldan pa dang/ snying stobs kyi stobs dang/ blo'i stebs kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam
par 'byed pa dang/ rang byung gi ye shes dang mthun pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shes rab dang/ ye shes kyi gdams ngag yang dag par blangs pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa
dang/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs shang/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de skye bar 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de bskyed ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' phyis pa so so'i skye bo'is las shin tu 'angs
pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa 'i skyon med par zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin/ rigs brjod pas kha na ma tho bame da pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba/
thams cad las phyir ldog pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'gro bar zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas larab tu
gnus pa yin/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su nges shing rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol ba yin te// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
chos 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis rab tu gnas pa yin no/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de la/
byang chub sems dpa las rab tu dga' ba lags pa'i byang chub sems dpa 'ani mchog tu dga' bamang ba yin/ dang bamang ba yin/ dga' ba mang ba yin/ rangs pa mang ba yin/ mgu
mang ba yin/ dga' rlabs ma ba yin/ slob mang ba yin/ mi 'khrugs pa mang ba yin/ rnam par 'atshob med pa mang ba yin/ khro bamed pa mang ba yin no// kye
rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i khyad par dang/ byang chub semA
dpa'i mi 'brog pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang/ rjes su bstan pa dang/ sems can gyi don rab tu thob par byed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la 'jug
pa'i sbyor ba rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin no// phyir shinge mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa yin te/ bdagan 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las phyir log ge/ bdag nisangs rgyas dang 'bar
gyur to// bdag ni byis pa so so'i skyi pe'os las ring du gyur to// bangagan ye shes kyi sa dang nyabar gyur to// bdag ni ngan song ngan 'gro rnam par ltung ba thams cad kyi rgyun chad pa'o// bdag
na sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur to// bdag ni dengazhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang nye bar gyur to// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par byung ngo// bdag ni byang chub
sems dang 'thams cad kyimanyam pa nyid dang ldan par gyur to// bdag ni 'jigs pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ bag tsha ba dang bral lo zhes mchog tu ngaga' ba sbyong do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'is rab tu dga' ba 'di thobam thag tu 'jigs pa gang dag 'di lta ste/ 'tsho ba med pas 'jigs pa 'am/ tshigs
0 bcad pa med pas 'jigs pa 'am/ 'chibasa'ajigs pa 'am/ ngana'agros 'khrigs pa'i m/ 'khor gyi nang du bag tsha bas 'jigs pa de dag thams cad de la med pa yin no//
de ci'i phyir na na/ 'di ltar de ni bdag gi 'du shes dang bral pas/ bdag 'phangs par sems pa'i ng med pa yin na/ yo byad thams cad 'phangs par sems pa lta ga la yod/ de'i phyir de la
'tsho bamed pas/ 'jigs pa med pa yin no// de na su las rim gror byub cung zad tsam yang re ba med kyi gzhan du dbangaganyid kyis sems can de dag la yo byad mang po thams cad kyis bsdu bar
bya'o snyam du sems te/ de'i phyir de la tshigs su bcad pa med pas/ 'jigs pa med pa yin no// de bdag tu lta ba dang bral bas bdag gis 'du shes med de/ de'i phyir de la 'chi bas
'jigs pa med pa yin no// bdag shanas kyang gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur rosnyam ste/ de'i phyi'i de la ngan 'gros 'jigs pa
med pa yin no// bdag ga bsam pa dang mtshungs pa yang 'jig rten na su yang medan/ lhag palta ga la yod snyam ste/ de'i phyir de la 'khor gyi nang du bag tshaba'i 'jigs pa med pa yin no//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar 'jigs pa dang/ sngang ba dang/ bgatshabadang/ spu zing zhes byed pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje chen pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir/ lhag
nga bsam pa ma nyams pa dang/ mdama' pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag pa rab sdu ba'i phyir shin tu brtson par byed/ de dad pa'i dbang dang/ dang bamang ba dang//
mos pa rnam par dag pa dang/ yid ches pa mang ba dang/ sAng brtse ba dang/ sAng mngon par sgrub pa dang/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa dang/ yang yongs su mi skyo ba dang/ ngo tsha shes shing
khrel yod pa'i rgyan dang des pa dang ldan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gus pa dang/ mgro byed pa dang nyin mtshan dung ge ba'i
rgyurtsa ba gsogs pas ma ngoms pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang/ chos kyi kun dga' l dga' ba dang/ mang du thos pa tshol ba la ngomasam myongab dang/ ji skad thos pa'i chos
latshul bzhin rtog pa dang/ gnas med pa 'i yid dang/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa la chags pa med pa dang/ yo byad la phangs par soms shing mngon par dga' ba/
med pa dang/ sems bskyed pa rin po che lta bu s ngoms pa med mngon par sgrub pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la mngon par 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ mi'ajig
pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba dag la lhag par dmigs pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa yongs sutshol pa dang/ sbyadang g.yo yongs suspangs pa dang/ ji skad smras pa de
ltar byed ba dang/ rtag tu nam 'chadaparab den pa'i tshig lhur len pa dang/ derazhin gshegs pa'i rigs sun par mi byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa mi gtong ba dang/ ri'i dbang po/
rgyal po tshon blta thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyisamasam bskyal ba dang/ 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thamasacad kyang ma 'doral/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam dang yang ldan pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan/
lag gi tshogs gsogs pa la chog mi shes pa dang/ rtag durgyunam 'tshadapar gong nas gong du khyad du 'phags pa yongs su tshol bdang/ kyirgyalaba'i sras dag sa yongs su sbyong ba'i
chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpon/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ de byang chung sems dba'is rab tu dga' ba ngo la gnas
shing smon lam chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag dang/ brtson pa chen po dang/ mngon par sgrub pachen mngon pa sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas ma lus pa lamachod pa dang/
rim gro lhag ma med pa mtha'adug bya ba'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mos pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa rgya cha ba/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthus
gtugs pa/ ma'amatha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa bgrangs par sangs rgyas 'abyung ba bgrangasapathams cad la mchod pa dang/ rim gro chen po bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smonalamachen po dang po mngon
par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ dpazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gazung ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub
yang dag par yongs su bzung ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su bsung 'phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas
gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa bgrangs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs pa thams cad kyiram pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba rgyunami 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa mngon pa'i
sgrub bo// 'diltaste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad du/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi pho brangan bzhugs pa thog mar mdzad de/ 'pho
ba dang/ gshegs pa dang/ lhums na bzhugs pa dang/ bltams pa dang/ gzhon nu rol pa dang/ btsunamo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang/ mngon par 'byung ba dang/ dka' ba spyod
ba dang/ byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang/ yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa chon

po ston pa'i drung du 'gro zhing mchod pa dang/ chos kyis yang dag par basdu ba'i sbyor ba sngon du'agro thams cad dus gcig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i khams
kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mthasur shug kha/ bskal pa bgrangs pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs pa thams cad kyi gan du 'gro ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen pogasum pa mngon par/
sgrub bo 'a di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad shin turgyus pa che ba/ tshadamed pa thami dedapa// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis bsdus pas yongs su
sbyong ba/ yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag tu bcas pa sgrub pa dang/ mtshan nyidi 'dra ba dang/ mtshan nyid mi'i dra ba dang/ bsdu ba dang/ rgyas pa dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod

par gyur ba'i sa 'alamathams cad ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa rab tu sbyin ng sa brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon bar sgrub/
pa'i phyir/ chos kyidabyings kyis byas par rgya cheb/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugosakha/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa bgrangs par spyod ba bgrangs ba thams cad du rgyunam/
chad pa mngon par sgrub pa'i smon lam chen pa bzhi ba mngon par sgrub bo/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus bathamasacad gazugasacan dang/ gzugs med pa dang/
'du shes can dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ 'dushesamed 'du shosamad min dang/ sgong las skyes pa dang/ mngal nas skyes pa dang/ drod gsholas skyes pa dang/ rdzus te skyes pa dang//
bza @#// khamasagasum dug togs ba/ 'gro ba drug tu 'dus pa/ skye bzams cad du gtogs pa/ ming dang gzugs kyis bsdusapa'i sems can malus pa thams cad yongs su
ka smanapar bya bar sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzudapa dang/ 'gro ba 'grangs pa thams cad rnam par gcad pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis
klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs kha/ phyi ma'amatha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa bgrangs par sems can gyi khams bgrangasab thams cad yongs su smin par bya brgyanami
'char ba'i smon lamachen po lnga ba mngon par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rgyas pa dang/ thog gu che ba dang/ tshad med ba dang/ phra ba dang/ rags pa dang/
smel zhidang/ spyi'atshugs ngos phyal ba dang/ 'jug pa'i khyim can dang/ mig 'phrul ltar rnamapar 'byed pa dang/ tshogs bcu rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa/ ma lus pa ye
shos kyis bong du chud par mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klus par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthasagatugs pa// phyi ma'amatha'i mur thug pa/ bsal pa
bgrangs par 'jig rten gyi khams bgrangs pa thams cad du 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smonalam chen po drug la mngon nga rasgrub bo// 'di ltaste/ zhing thams cad kyizhing gcig dang//
zhing thams cad shang gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba yongs susbyang ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag 'od rnam par bkod pa'irgyun gyis rab tu brgyan pa dang/ yongs su dgapa'i/
lam dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba dang/ sems can ye shes kyi 'byung gnas tshad med pas rab tu gang ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gazhol bdang/ sems
can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bstan cing shin tu tshim par byaba'aphyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par chab/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'akhur thug
pa/ bskal pa bgrangs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrangs pa thamasacad yongasasu sbyong brgyanami 'chad pa'i smon lamachen po bdunapa mngon par sgruba'o// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad bsam pa dang/ sbyor ba gcig par bya ba dang/ 'gran zlumed pa'i dgo ba tsa babasags par bya ngadang/ byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad dang/ dmigs pa gcig bsamanyam pa nyid du
bya ba dang/ rtag tu rgyunama'achadapar byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs shing mi 'bral bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ci dgar bstan par bya ba dang/ rang gi sems bskyed pas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mthu ya shos kyis khong du chud par bya ba dang/ ma nyams shing rjes su 'gro ba'i mngon bangashes pa thob par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thamasacad du rnam par rgyubar bya ba rang/ 'khoragyi
0 bya// dkyil 'khokhrams cad du snang ba thob par bya ba dang/ skye ba thams cad du rag lus rjes su 'grobar byab dang/ theg pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par bya ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya cheb/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs ba/ phyi ma'i b+bau thug pa/ bsal ba 'grangs par
spyod pa bgrangs pa thams cad du theg pa chen la 'dzudab// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lamachen po brgyad pa mngon par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ phyi ma ldog pa'i 'khor lo la yang dag
bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bya ba dang/ lus dang ngag dang/ yid kyi las don yod par bya ba dang/ mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi tshesanges par thob par bya ba dang/

dbyangs brjod m thag tu yengashes khong du chud par bya ba dang/ dadapar gyuram thag tu nyon mongs pa ldog par bya ba dang/ sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba dang/ yid bzhin gyi norapu
lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'chen po 'a spyod pa spyad pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyingesakyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i khams kyimathas gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i
mtha'i mu thug ba/ bskal pa bgrangs par spyod pa bgrangs pa thams cad don yod pargyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lamachen po dgu pa mngon par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad du/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang/ byis pa'i lam gzhi dang tha mi dad por byas pa'i lam thams cad du
cher skye ba dang/ byang chub kyi snying bor gshegs pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan par bya bdang/ sangs rgyas kyi yulachen pag
dang yengashis kyi rjes su 'gro bas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam paji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung bar dal bdalab la rtogs par byed/ zhi bar byed/ thob par byed cing
bstan par bya ba dang/ gcig mngon du yang dag par rtogs pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mya ngan las 'das pas rgyas par bya ba dang/ dbyangs gcig brjod pas sems can thams cad
kyi sems tshim par bya ba dang/ yongs sumya nalas 'das pa chen po bstan kyabaskyod pa'i stobs rgyun mi gcod pa dang/ ye shes chen posachos thams cad 'byung bar byed ba bstan par byab dang/ chos
shes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ sgyu ma'i mngon par shes pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis kyis par rgya che yaM/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas
gtugs pa/ phyim rimatha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa bgrangs par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bgrangs pa thams cad du theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lamachen po
bcupa mngon bar sgrub bo// kyergyal ba'i sras dag de ltar na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang/ brtson 'grusachen po dang/ mngon par sgrub pa che/
pa'i smon lam gyi sgebcu pa 'di dag la sogs pa smon lam brgya stong gras med pa phrag bcu tshang ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chung sems dpasa mngon par
sgrub bo/ smon lam de dag kyang mthar thug pa'i gnas bcus mngon par sgrub ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khamasakyi mthar thug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi
khoms kyi mthar thug pa dang/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang/ chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang/ mya ngan las 'dus pa'i khams kyi mthar thug bar ng/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i
khams kyi mthar thug pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang/ sems kyi dmigs pa'i khams kyi mthar thugapa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
rgyu yul ye shes la 'jug pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang/ chos kyirgyud dang/ ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi mthar thugab dgage/ de ltar bdagagi smon lam chen po 'di
dag sems can gyi khams mthar gang du thug pa de'i mthar thug par gyur cig/ bdag gi smon lam chen po 'di dag ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi bar dag gamatha'agang du blug pa de 'a mthar thug pa
gyur cig/ de ltar sems can gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa med pa ltar bdag gi de ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa medabar gyuracig/ ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi ra dag gi mthub/
mthar thug pa med pa ltar/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa med par gyur cig ces de de ltar smon lam shin tu bslabs te las su rung ba'i soms dang/ mnyen pa'i sems
su gyur pas/ dad pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni di bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'i sbyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang
dag par sdud pa dang/ sa yongs su 'grubapa dang/ mi 'jigs pa yongasasu rdzogs pa dang/ stobs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres nga ma 'phrogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mtha'adang dbung med pa mngon ng ra sgrub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa rjes su song bar 'jug pa dang/ 'bras
bu yongs su 'grub pa la yid ches pa yin te/ mdor bsdun/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du bstan pa dang/ byin gyi rlabs la mngon
par yid ches pa yin no////'phags pa sa bcu pa/ bam po gnyis pa// de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni 'di
ltar zang/ 'di ltar dben/ 'diltar zhi/ 'di ltar stong/ 'di ltar mtshan ma med/ 'di ltar smonapa med/ 'di ltar goms pa med/ 'di ltar tshad mad

cing rta 'di ltar rgya che la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni 'di ltar bsgrub dka'an/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag lta ba ngan par ltung ba'i rgyud dang/ marag pa 'amun pas kun nas khengs

pa'i yid dang/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba'i kun tu rtog pa dang/ srid ba'i dra bas mngon par 'dod pa yid la byed pa dang/ sgyu dang g.yo thibs po'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang/ phrag
spyi dog dang/ ser sna dang rab tu ldan bar 'gro bas skye bar sbyor ba dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la 'dris pa'i la sogs pa dang/ khro ba dang/ khon du 'dzin pa 'bar
bar byas pa'i sems kyim rtse dang phyin calog dang rab tu ldan pa las bya ba mngon par bsgrubs pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ srid pa dang/ ma rig pa'izag pa dang 'brel pa'i sems dang/
rgyu yad dang/ rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis khams gsum du gang 'di mngedang/ gzugs dang lhan cigabyung bam 'bral ba yang srid pa'i myu gu mngon par 'grub par byed do// ming dang
gzugs de rnam par 'phel nas skye mched drug gi grong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// skye mched rnams byung nas phan tshunareg ste/ phrad pas tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba de nyid la phyi phyir zhing
ba mngon ng rad ga' ba'i sred pa dang/ len pa rnam par 'phel lo// rnam par 'phel nas srid pa 'byung ngo// byung nas skye ba dang/ rga shi dang/ myang n dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/
sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khyug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi phung po bdag dang bdag gi med pa// gsong gsog/ steng pa g.yo ba/
med pa// byed pa med pa/ bems po ma dang/ rtsig pa dang/ mig yor lta bu mngon par 'grub kyang 'di khong du mi chud po zhes des sems can sdug bsngal gyi phung po las mthar pa de lta bu dag
mthong nas/ de'i phyir de'asAng rje chen po rgyas par 'byung ste/ sems can 'di de ni bdag gis yongs su dgrol ba dag go/ shin tubade ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dag
go snyam ste/ de'i phyir de'i byams pa chen po rgyas par 'byung ngo// kyargyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam
pa'i sa dang pal gnas pa'i tshe dngos bo thams cad la 'khangs par sems pa'i sems yongs su spangs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yeshes la re ba dang/ 'dod pa rlabs po che'iblos gtong chen
po la rab tu brtson par byed do// gtang bar bya ban 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzong dang/ bong ba yongs su gtang ba'am/ gsor dang/ rnyong bu dang/ mu tig dang/
bai DUrludang/ man shel dang/ byi ru dung/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram yongs sugatung ba 'am/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ lhab lhub yongs su gtang ba 'am/ rta dang
glang bo che dang shing rta'i bzhon pa yongs su gtang ba 'am/ bskyed mos tshal dang dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang/ gtsug lag khang yongs su gtang ba 'am/ branapo dang/ bran mo yongs su
gtangab 'am/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ pho brang 'khor dang/ yul 'khor yongs su gtang ba 'am/ chung ma dang/ budang bumo yongs su gtang ba 'am/
sngagacing yi da du 'ong ba'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba 'am/ mgo dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mig dang yan lag gi dam pa dang/ lus thamasacad yongs su gtang ba
'am/ dngos po de dag thams cad la de 'phangs par sems pa med par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yi shes la re ba dang/ 'dod pa rlabs po che'i blos yongs su gtong ste/ de ltar byang chub sems
dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa degatong bachen por 'gyur ro// de de ltar n snying rngudang/ byams pa dang/ gtong ba'i bsam bang gyur nas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ phyi
phyir zhing 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don yongs su tshol zhing don du gnyer ro// de yongs su tshol zhing don du gnyer ba'i/ yongs suskyo ba'i sems mi skye ste/ deltar de yongs
sum skyopar gyuro/ yongs su skyo ba med pas bstan bcos thams cad l 'jigs pa med pa yin no// de'i phyir de'i bstan bcos shes par gyur te/ de ltar bstan bcos dang ldan pas/
bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa la rnam par brtags pa'i blos/ sems can tha ma dang 'bring dang/ mchoga rnams la ci nus ci 'os su de bzhin nyid du sgrub bo// de'i phyir de'i 'jig rten shes pa yin
te 'jig rten shes pas dus dang/ tshod dang/ ran par sbyod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pas shin tu brgyan pa rgyud kyis bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la rab tu brtson par byed de/
de'i phyir de ngotsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa yin/ sbyor ba de dag la mngon par 'byung bar spyod pa yin/ phyir mi ldogacing ma zlog pa'i stobs bskyed pa yang thob pa yin te/ de ltar de'i dga' ba'i
stobs bskyed pa kun tu skye sa pa yin te/ dag rang 'i stobs bskyed pa thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ rim gro bya bar brtson zhing bstan pa la yang nan tan byed do// de ltar de'i
sa bcu po de dag yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ dad pa dang snying rje dang/ byams pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ skye ba bag la zha bar byed pa dang/ bstan bcos shes pa dang/ 'jig rten
shes pa dang/ ngetshashes pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang/ dga' ba'i stobs bskyed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lamachod pa dang/ rim gro byang kun tu skyes pa yin no/ byang chub
sems dpa'is rab tu dga' ba 'di gnas pa de la mthong ba rgya chen po dang/ smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mad po snang bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba rgya chen po dang/

smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phragamang po dang/ sangasargyus khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang/

sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phragamang bo dang/ sangs rgyas bye brag
khrig brgyastong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas de dga mthong anas lhag pa'ibasamapa rgya chen pos bsti stang byed do/
btsun par byed do// mor byed do// mchod par byed do// na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzimasacha dang/ snyan gsos sman dang/ yo byad dgakyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems

sgyu dpa' bed bar sbyar ba yang da bar sgrubabo// dge 'dun gyi tshogs la yang dag par rimagro byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su skye bar byed
do// des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la ma chod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba kun tu skyes pa yin te/ de bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang/ snyan par smra bas sems can
rnams yongs su smin par byed do// de mos pa'i stobs kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po 'ogam gnyis kyang rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ ye shes kyis ma lus bar rtogs nas thob pa ni ma yin no/ kha

rol tu phyin pa bcupo dag las de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci nus citshul du yang dag bar mi sgrub pa nam yin no// de ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing soms can yongs su sminapar bya ba la brtson pa dang/ sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa de de ltar pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
cang ma khyenabanyid du yongs su bsngos pa de dag de bas kyang shas cher rab tu byang ba dang snu yongs su dag pa dang/ ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyurar// khyergyal ba'i srasadag
'di lta ste dperan/ mgar ba mkhas pas gser gyi sa le sbram ji lta ji ltar mes bsregs pa de lta de ltar rab tu byang ba dang/ yongs su dag pa dang/ ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro/
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dub 'a rnams ji lta dziltar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams la mchod pa byed pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin
par bya ba la brtson par byed pa dang/ sa longs su sbyang ba'i chos 'di dag yang dgapar blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa bzams nang mkhyen ba nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de dag yin
tu byang ba dang/ yongs su dag pa dang/ ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba'i sras dgagazhan yang/ byang chub sems dba'is
dang po 'dila gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dpa nyid kyi rnam pa dang/ thob par bya ba dang/ rgyu mthun pa dgasangasargyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/
dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las yongs su btsal bar bya/ yongs su dri bar bya'o// sa'i yan lag yongasasubasgrub pa'i phyir yang ngomasamangashes par bya ba ste/ sa gnyis panas tsung
chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i bar du yang de bzhin no// de des sa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po la mkhas par bya'o// sa'ajig pa dang/ 'grub pa la mkhas pa dang/ sa'i
rnam pa dang/ rgyumathun pa la mkhas pa dang/ sa glob par bya bsnam par dpyodapa la mkhas pa dang/ sa'i yan lag yongs su sbyang ng lamakhas pa dang/ sa nasasar 'phar ba la
mkhas pa dang/ sa dang sa la gnas pa la mkhas pa dang/ sa dang sa'i khyad par shes pa la mkhas pa dang/ sa dang sa thob nas phyirami ldog pa la mkhas pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su sbyangs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i saganon pa la mkhas bar bya'o// kye rgyal bsras dgade ltar byang chub sems dpa'isinam pa mngon par
bslab pa la mkhas pa nas dang po las gyen tu ma bskyod par s bcu'i bar du gnas shing thob par bya ba la thogs pa med de/ thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang/ sa'i yang shes snang bas sangs rgyas/
kyi ye shes snang ba yang thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste// dper na/ ded dpon makhas pa 'gron po nga la bo che yongs su gdon pa'i bsam ba dang ldan pa grong khyer chen
por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa ni thog ma nyid nas lam gyi yon tan dang/ lam gol ba'anyis pa dang/ lam gyi ra gnas kyi khyad pa dang/ lam gyi ngar gnas las gol ba nyis pa dang/
lam rgyags dang/ bya ba dang/ bya ba ma yin pa rnams yongs su tshol zhing kun tu 'dri'o// lam gyi bar gnas thog ma nyid nas ma 'phags pa nas/ grong khyer chen por phyin gyi bar la
shin tu mkhas pa yin te/ lam bar gnas thog ma nyidanasam 'apags par shes pas rnam par brtags pa'iblo dang/ rgyugs kyi tshogs chen po phun sum tshogs pa 'gron po phal po cha
rnams dang lhan cig tu mthoragyis grong khyer chen ngapo'i bar du phyin par byed de/ 'brog dgon pa'i sapa rnams kyis bdag dang 'gron po rnams la gnod par ma 'gyur bar byed do/
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon makhas pa ang ba gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas shings momathun pa ' phyogs dang/ gnyan
kya// po la mkhas pa dang/ 'jigapa dang/ 'grub ba la mkhas pa dang/ sazhim pa dang/ rgyu mthun pa la mkhas pa dang/ sa thob par bya ba rnam par dpyadang
lamakhas pa dang/ sa'i yan lag yongs su sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa dang/ sa dang sa la gnas pa la mkhas pa dang/ sa dang sa'i khyad par shes pa la
mkhas pa dang/ sa dang sa thob nas phyir ma ldogapa la mkhas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'is thamasacad yong su sbyangs pas de ngazhin gshegs pa'i s gnonapa la mkhas par 'gyur ba de'i
T+Tha tshe/ bsod nams dang/ ya shes kyi tshogs chen po'i rgyags yongs su bzung ba dar/ ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la rnam par phye ba shin tu byas pa dang sems can gyi 'gron pa phal po che yongs su
gdon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen panyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ngara'adod cing brogam nyid nas sa lam gyi yon tan dang/ sa'i lam gol ba'anyos pa dang/ sa'i lam gyi
bar gnas pa'i khyadapar dang/ sa'i lam gyi bar gnas kyi gol ba'i nyes pa dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen pa 'argyags bshams shing gsog pa dag kyang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag las yongs su tshol zhing yongs su 'dri ste/ de lam gyibar gnas dang ponas gyen tu ma bskyod par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya
00 ba'ibar lam khas pa yin no// de de ltar ye shes kyis rnam par brtags pa blo dang/ bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyis tshog sachen po'i rgyugs phun sum tshogs pasasems can gyi 'gron/
bo phal patshoji ltar longs su smin pa bzhin du mthar gyis 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa dang/ mya ngan las bsgral te thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yi shes grong khyer chen po'i bar du phyin pa byed cing
'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa'i nyes pa rnams kyis sems can gyi 'gron po'am/ bdag la gnod par yang mi 'gyur bar byed do// kye rgyal ba sras dag de lta bsan/ byang chub
sems dpas yongs su mi skyo bar yongs su sbyang ba khyad par la brtson pa bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' s rab
tu dga' ba'i sgor 'jug pa mdor bstan pa'o// rgya cher bskal pa mtha' yas pa bstan pa'i mthar thugapar khong du chud par bya'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher
'dzam bu gling gi dbang por 'gyur zhingadabang phyug chen pa la dngangar tu thob pa dang/ chos rjes su srung ba dang/ gtong ba chen pos sems can rnams sdud pa'i gtso bor gyur cing sems can
rnams kyisarasna 'dri ma bzlog pa la mkhas pa yin/ gtong ba chen po rtsom ba yongs su dub bar mi 'gyurab yin no// sbyin pa dang/ snyan par smra ba 'am/ don skyod pa 'am/
[n a]@#// don mthun pas las sang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ka chos yid la bya ba dang/ dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub sem/
dpa' yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang/ parol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang/ sa yid la bya bdang/ stobs yid la bya ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa yid
la bya nga dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yi da la bya ba nas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ ji
ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso nger 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam bar 'gyur/ rang tu 'gyur/ gong mar 'gyur/ dran med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/
rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rton pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam du sems so//
zla 'dod na brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnam pa ji lta bu s khyim dang/ chung ma dang/ longs spyod thams cad spangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ rang tu byung nas kyang

skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la ting nge 'dzin brgyarab tu thob cing snyoms par yang 'jugapa dang/ sangs rgyas ngargya mthong ba dang/ de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang/ 'jig
rten gyi khams brgyagayo bar byed pa dang/ zhing bsgyur 'gro ba dang/ 'jigarten gyi khams brgya snang ba 'byed pa dang/ sems can brgya yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ bskal pa brgyar gnas par
byed pa dang/ bskal pa ba la sngon gyimatha' dang/ phyi ma mthar rab tu 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi sgo brgya rnam par 'byed pa dang/ lug brgya kun tu ston pa dang/ lus re re la yang byang chub sems
dpa'i 'khorab brgya kun tu ston pa brtson 'grus rnam pa de lta burtsom mo// de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi stobs can rnams smon lam khyad par can gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag
ga lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa 'am/ bkod pa 'am/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa'i m/ mngon par 'du byed pa/
dag kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag snyadapa de snyed du yang brjod par sla ba ma yin no// byang chub sems dapa'is dang porab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang
chub sems dpa' sadang po la legs par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' re byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa mngon par 'dod pa yin te/ de'i sems kyi bsam pa bcu 'byung/
bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang po'i bsam pa dang/ 'jam ba'i bsam pa dang/ las su rung ba'i bsam pa dang dul ba'i bsam pa dang/ zhi ba'i bsam pa dang/ dge
0 @#// ba'i bsam pa dang/ ma 'dres pa'ibasam pa dang/ ma ltos pa'i bsam pa dang/ rlabs po che'ibasam pa dang/ che banyid kyi bsam ba dang/ sams kyi bsam pa bcu/
po 'di dag 'byung ste/ de nas byang chung sams dpa 'is gnyis pa dris tshe da pa la gnas pa yin no/ kyi rgyalaba'isras dag de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa drimam da pa la gnas nga 'i byang
chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang ldan pa yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// srog gcod pas nagasapa yin te/ dbyig pa spangs/
mtshon chaspangs/ khon du 'dzin pa spangs nas 'dzem pa dang ldan zhing snying rjel zhugs pas srog chags 'byung po thams cad laphan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sAng brtse ba dang byams pa'i sems
dang ldan te/ de kun tu rtog pa tsam gyis kyang srogachags la rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed na/ sems can gangal sems can du 'du shes shing ched du bsams te/ lus kyis rnam par 'tshe bachen de
bya blta ci smos/ ma byin par lenapa spangs pa yang yin te/ bdag gi longs spyod kyis chog shes shing snying brtse ba dang ldan te/ gzhan gyi longasaspyod la bgod pas/ de gzhan gyis yongs
subazung ba'i dngos po dag las gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba 'du shes shing rku sems nye bar bzhagaste/ than rtswa dang/ la ma yang ma byin par mi lenan/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad gzhan dag lta ci smos
'dod pa la lag pa ragayom pa sbas pa yang yin te/ bdag gi chung mas chog shes shing gazhan gyi chung ma la 'dod pa med pas de gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i bud med gzhan gyi chung ma rus dang//
mtshan ma dang/ chos kyis bsrungs pa rnams la chags sems kyang mi skye na yan lag ma yin pa'i rnam par rigabyed dam gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis dpa lta ci smos/ brdzun du smras pa sngangs pa
yang yid te/ bden par smra zhing dag par ma la dus su smra ste/ de tha na rmi 'a man yang lta ba dang/ bzod pa dang/ 'dopa dang/ rab tu rtog ba bsgyur te/ bslu ba'i bsam pas brdzun gyi
tshig mi smra nad dubasams tedzod pa lta ci smos/ phra ma 'i tshig spangs pa yang yin te/ sems can rnams la dbyen mi byed cing rnam par mi 'tshe ba la zhugs pas/ des de dgadabye ba'i phyir tshul
gyi las bros nas pha girasnyod pa ma yin te/ de dag dbye ba'i phyir/ pa ga las thosanas tshu gir snyod ba ma yin la/ 'dum pa rnams mi 'byed cing byer rnams la yang mi rnon te/ mi 'dum
pa la dga' zhing mi 'dum nga la mes pa ma yin bsabadenanam/ brdzun yang rung mi 'dum par bya ba'i tshig mi sna'o// tshig rtsub bo spangs pa yang yin te/ zher 'debs pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/
gzhan la gnodapa dang/ gzhan gyi mtshang 'dru ba dang/ grong mi'i tshig dang/ ma rabs kyitshig ngor rjod pa dang/ ngorarjod pa la gzhol ba dang/ brdzun dang/ rnarami snyan pa dang/ khro zhingagashe
b.las byung ba dang/ mi snyan pa dang/ yid du mi 'ong bas snying na bar byed cing gdung bar byed pa dang/ bdag gi rgyud dang/ gzhan gyi ngam rung bar byed pa'i tshig rnam
pa de lta bu spangs te/ gang 'di mnyen pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ brdzun ma yin pa dang/ rnar snyan pa dang/ sIngadu sdug pa dang/ grong khyer pa dang/ skye bomang po'i yid du 'ong ba dang/
yid dga' bar byed pa dang/ yid tshim par byed pa dang/ bdag gi rgyud dang/ gzhan gyi rgyung dang ngar byed pa'i tshiga rnam pa de lta bu dag rjod do// tshigakyal pa spangs pa yang yin te/ lan legs
par gyon pa 'i tshig dang/ dus su sba ba dang/ yang dag par smra ba dang/ chos smra ba dang/ rigs pa smra ba dang/ 'dul ba skya bdang/ g.yeng bamed pa dang ldan pa dang/ dus dang/ ched
dang bcas pa'i tshig skya ba yin te/ de than bzhad gad du bya ba'i tshig yongs su spong bar byab yang yongs su na/ tshig ga rnam par g.yeng ba lta ci smos/ brnab sems med pa yang yin te//
gzhan gyi nor dang/ gzhan gyi 'dod pa dang/ gzhan gyi rdzas dang/ yo byad gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la brnab se mas mi skyed la 'dod par mi byed cing mi smon te/ chagasapa'i sems mi skyod la/
gnodasems med pa yang yin te/ sems can thams cad labyamasapa'isims dang/ phan pa'i sems dang/ bde ba'i sems dang/ 'jam pa'isims dang/ skyeb thams cad la phan gdags
pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ gang 'di brong dang/ khon du 'dzin pa dang/ tha ba dang/ dri ma dang/ gnodasems dang/ khong khrob sngon du 'grobade dag spangs te/ gang 'di byams pa dang ldan/
par de dag la rtog pa yin no// yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang bkra shis rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i lta ba dbral ba yin te/ lta ba drang zhing g.yo medal
stsamed pas/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la bsam ba nges pa yin no/ de dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chadang sung zhing 'di ltar sems
kyi bsam pa ngon par bsgrub ste// sems can rnams kyi ngan songadang/ na 'gro dang/ rnam par ltang ba yod pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag tham sacad mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lama rnams dang
dag par blangs pa'i rgyu las byung gas/ bdag gis ni 'di ltar bdag nyid yang dag par sgrub pa la gnas te/ gzhan yang dag par sgrub pa la dgod bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni gnasam
yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang bdag log par sgrub pa la gnas shing gzhan yang dgapar sgrub pa la dgodapar bya ba 'di ni gnas mod do snyam nas yang de 'di ltar dpyadadi/ mi dge babcu'i lam 'di
dag yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'askye gnas dang/ gshini rje'i 'jig rtenagyi 'gro ba rnams yod par gyur to// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la nga dgapar
blangs pa'i rgyus ni lha dang mir skye ba la sogs pa srid pa'i rtse mo'abar du skye ba yod par gyur to// de'i gong du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag 'tshe ba'i sems dngakhams
gsum pas sgrog pa'i yide dang/ snying rje chen po med pa dang/ gzhan las thos pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ sgra'i rjes su 'brang bas shes rab kyi rnam pas yongs su bsnyems na nyan thos kyi theg pasgrub
bo/ de'i gong du gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang/ rang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ thabs mkhasapa med pa dang/ zab mo rkyen 'di khong du chud pas yongos
su sbyangs// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sgrub bo// de'i gong du shin tu rgyas shing tshad med pa'i sems dang/ snying brtse ba dang/ snying rje dang ldan pa dang/ thabs malas pas bsdus pa dang/
smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtopa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yang shes shin tu rgyas pa la dmigs pas yongs su sbyangs na/ byang chub sems
dpa'i sa yongs su dag pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i sbyor pa rgya chen bsgrub bo// de'i gong du rnam pa thams cad yongs su sbyangs pas stobs bcu'i stobs dang/ sangs rgyas
kyichos thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa'i bar du sgrub bo// de lta bsan bodag gis mngon par sgrub tu 'dra ba la/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su sbyang zhing mngon par sgrub panyid
la brtson par bya'o zhes dedabs kyang 'dilta yang dag par slob ste ma dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di deg bsten pa dang/ bsgoms pa dang mang du byas pa'ishas che pas ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i
rgyur 'gyur ro// 'a bring gisan dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi rgyur 'gyur ro// chung ngusani gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te// de lasrog gcod pas na sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud
'gro'i gnasasu khridad/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du brode do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ tshe thung ba dang/ nadamang bar 'gyur
ba'o ma byin bar len pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gan rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// ri nas gal temi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang ma
par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrubaste/ longs spyod chung ba dang/ thun mong gi longs spyod du 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pa la log par g.yem pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i gnas
su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ g.yog 'khor brtan du mi rung ba dang/ 'gran zladang
bcas pa'i chung mar 'gyur ba'o// brdzun du smra bas na sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'o skye gnas su khring do// gshin rdzo'ajig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nan
skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste// skur pa mang ba dang/ gzhan gyis bslabar 'gyur ba'o// phra mas na sems can dmyal bar khring do//
dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du brid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin paganyis mngon par skabaste/ g.yog 'khor ma 'dus pa
dang/ g.yog 'khor ngan par 'gyur ba'o// tshig rtsub bos ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi
rnams kyi nang du skyes n yang rnam par smin pa gshis mngon por sgrub ste// yid du ma 'ong ba thos pa dang 'tha ma'i tshig tu 'gyur ba'o// tshig kyal pas na sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dun
tsha 'bre'i skye gnas su khrid/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ de nas gal te mi rnams kyin ng du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ gzung bar 'os pa'i tshigam yin
pa dang/ ma nges pa'i spobs par 'gyur ba'o// brnabasams kyis ni sems can dmyal ba khrid do// dung 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal
tem rnams kyin ng du skyes na yang rnam par smin paganyis mngon par sgrub// chog mishes pa dang/ 'dod pa che bar 'gyur ba'o// gnod sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/
[# ]dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes n yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ phan pa mi tshol ba dang/
gzhan kyis gnodapa bya bar 'gyur ba'o// log par lta bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'dzig rten du khrid do// de las gal
te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ lta ba ngan par lta ba dang/ g.yo rgyu can du 'gyur ba'o// de ltar na mi dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam 'di dgan sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po tshad med pa sdud par 'gyur gyis/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag bdag gis spangs te/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga'
bar gnas par bya'o snyam nas de mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lamo 'di dag spangs te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas shing gzhan rnams kyang de dag nyid la rab tu dgod do// desems
can rnams la de bas kyang shasacher phan pa'i sems dang/ bde ba'i soms dang/ byams pa'i sems dang/ snying brtse ba'isims dang/ snying rje'i sems dang/ phan gdags pa'i
sems dang/ kun tu bsrungaba'isim sa dang/ mnyan pa'i sems dang/ slob dpon gyi sems dang/ ston pa'i sems bskyed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sems can 'di
dag ni lta ba nganapalcang ba blogres ma mnyam zhing bsam pamimanyamapa/ log pa'i lam thibs por rgyu ba yin gyis de dag bdag gsemanor ba'i lam yang dag par ltaba'i lam
ji lta ba de bzhin nyid la rab tu dgod par bya'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni rigs mi 'phrod pa ma mthun par 'dzin cing rtsodapa laM zhugs pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khro bdang/ len du'adzin
pas 'bar bar gyur pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag gis bla name da pa' byams pa chen po bar bsgrubapa la rab tu dgod par bya'o// kye ma sems can 'di dgan masamamyong zhing gzhan gyi nor la
mngon par 'dod pa can yang ba'i'atshobs rjes su spyod pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag gis lus dang ngagadang/ yid kyi las kyi ma 'a yongs su dag pas 'tsho ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o//
kye masems can 'di dang ni 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gzhi dang ldan pa nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi me lce rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kun tu 'bar bar gyur kyang de las 'byung ba'i
thabs yongs sum tshel ba yin gyis/ de dag bdagagisanyon mongs pa thams cad rang tu zhi ba 'tshabamed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gti
mug gi mun pa'i rab ribadang/ ling thog dang/ mun nag gis bsgribs pamun nagachen po'i thobesang re zhugs pas shes rab kyi snang ba dang/ ring du gyur pa'i mun nag chen po'i nang na 'thom pa/
ltaba'i mya ngan du zhugs pa yin gyis de dag bdag gis ci nas kyang chos thamasacad kyi ji lta ba de bzhin nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi'ajog pa thob par 'gyur bar shes rab kyi mig sgrib pa med par rnam/
par srungabar bya'o// kye ma sems can 'di ngagana 'khor ba'i mya ngan gyi lam du zhugs pas sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jigarten gyi g.yang sa la mngon
du phyogs pa/ lta ba ngan pa'i rgyu nyam nga bar zhugs pa/ gti mug thibs pos kun nas yogapa'i lam du zhugs nga/ ldongs par gyur pa// yongs su 'dren pa med pa// 'byung ba
ma yin pa la 'byung bar lta ba/ bdud kyi lam gyi chom pos zin pa/ bdud kyi bsam pa thibs par zhugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa las ring du gyur pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag
gis rnam pa de lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa bgrod par dka'adra las bsgral bar bya/ 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer chen borarab tu dgod par bya'o// kye ma sem/
can 'di duganadaba' rlabs chen po'inang du bying// 'dod pa dang/ srid pangang/ marig pa dang lta ba'i chu bo zhugs pa/ 'khong ba'i rgyun gyis 'dus pa srid pa'i klong du zhugs pa/ shugs drag
pas bdas te/ blta ba'i mthumed pa/ 'dod pa dang/ gnod sems dang/ rnam bar 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa mang po'irjes su zhugs pa/ 'jigatshogs lo lta ba'i chu'i srin pos zin pa/
bya@#// 'dod pa'i spobs pa'i gling du zhugs pa// dka' ba can ngang/ 'dod chags kyi dkyil du kun tu thogs pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi thang la 'khyams pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/
skyer ched kyi grong nas ma 'phags pa// sgrol ba la mkhas pa dang bral ba yin gyis de dag bdag gis sAng rje chen pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis gten te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling
'tshe ba med pa// rdul med par 'jigs pa dang/ skrag pa thams cad med pa la rang tu dgod par bya'o// kyem sems can 'di dgan 'khor ba'i btson rar bcugapa/sdug bsngal dang/
yA yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa mang po mang ba dang/ sdug ba dang/ mi sdug par 'brel pa/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang bcas pa'i rjes su rgyu ba/ srid pa'i sgrog tu bcug pa//
khams gsum pa'ib rig pa'i thongasabs kun nas lebs pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag gis khams gsum pa'i gnas thams cad las dben pa mya ngan las 'das po la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ khyem
sems can 'di dag ni bdag du mngon par zhen pa/ phung po'i gnas las ma 'phags pa/ phyin calig bzhir 'gyob/ skye mched drugag grong stong pa na gnas pa/ 'byung ba chen pabazhi'i sprul gyis gtsos
pa phung po'i gshedama'i chom pos bcom pa/ sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa myong bar gyur pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag gis gnas ba thams cad dang bral ba 'di ltaste/ sgrib pa thams cad spangs
pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu dgodapar bya'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag mes pa chung bas zhum zhi bzhi n pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog gi sems mi bdog pas/ theg pa chen

po'i 'byung ba yod kyang nyan thos rang/ rangasangs rgyas kyi thig par lcang ba yin gyis/ de dag bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po blos gros rnam par rgyus pas dmigs pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o
snyam mo// kye rgyal ba'isras dag de ltar tshul khrims kyi stobs bskyed pade lta bu dang ldan pa bya ba ma ngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma

med pa la gnas pa de la mthong ba rgya chen po dang/ smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba rgya chen po dang/ smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phragamang po

dang sangs rgyas stong phragamang pa dang/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phragamang po dang sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang pa dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag

mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye bstong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa/
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dga mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos bsti stang byed do// btsun par byed do// ralor byed do// mchod par byed do// na bza' dang zhal zas
dang/ gzimasachadang/ snyan gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad dag kyang dbul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba sbyar ba yanye bar 'grub bo// dge 'dun gyi tshogs la
yang yang dgabarar mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
sangs rgyas de dag las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid kyang gus pa dang/ rim gros rab tu'adzin te ji ltar bzung ba de yang bar ma dor chud zos par mi byed do/ de bskal pa du ma dang/
! bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang/ bsal pa bye ba stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa
bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar ser sna dang/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dril bsal bsagatong ba dang/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yang dag
par 'grub bo/ bkye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid nag tshur du bcuganu de bas kyang dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
kye rgyal ba'isras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa drama med pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bskal pa du ma nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i
par ser sna dang/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi drame bsal bas gtong ba dang/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yang dag par 'grub bo// de'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag las snyan
par smra ba'i shas che ba yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag las tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci nus kyi tshul du lo nga dag par mi sgrub pa nam ya na
no/ dkyirgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis ba dri ma med pa zhes byab mdor bstan pa'o// sa de la gnas pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' ni phal cher gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bor te/ chos kyidabang byed pa thob pa dang/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi 'chal
pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma bzlog pa'i gtso bor gyuracing sems tsan rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la dgod par bya ba la shin tu mkhas pa yin no// sbyin pa 'am/ snyan nga ra sna
ba 'am/ don spyod pa 'am/ don mthun nga sa las gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad sangs rgyas yid la byab dang/ chos yid la bya ba dang/ dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang/ byang ba
sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang/ sa yid la bya ba dang/ snobs yid la bya ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa
yid la bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya/
bdang mi 'bral ba yin te/ ji ltar na rems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ rab tu 'gyur/ gong mar 'gyur/ blan med par
'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rton pa'i bar du
'gyur snyam du sems so// 'dod na brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnag pajilta bu s khyim dang/ chung ma dang/ longs spyod thams cad spangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung

ba dang/ rab tu byung nas kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la ting nge 'dzin stong rab tu thob cing snyoms bar yang 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas stong mthong ba dang/ de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang
yang dag par shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong g.yo bar byed pa dang/ zhing stong du 'gro ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byed pa dang/ sems can stongayongs su smin par
byed pa dang/ bskal pa stong du gnas par byed pa dang/ bskal pa stong la sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mthar rab tu 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi sgo stong rnam par 'byed pa dang/ lus
steng kun tu ston pa dang/ lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong steng kun tu ston pa'i brtson 'grus rnam pa de lta burtsomam// deyan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lamagyi/
stobs can rnams smon lam khyad par can gyis rnam par 'phrulate/ de dag lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod
ba'am/ bkod pa 'am/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa 'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag ji snyed pa de snyed du'ang brjod par sla ba ma yin no//
byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'isras dag byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
de byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa gnon te/ sams kyi bsam ba yi de la byed pa rnam pa bcus gnon te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste// dag pa'i samasakyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/
brtan pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/ skyoba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'isims kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sems//
kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/ sra ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/ rloms pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/
rlabs po che'i soms kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa dang/ che banyid kyi sems kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa ste/ sems kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa bcu pa 'di regags gnon to/
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'de 'du byed du gyur pa thams cad la mi rtag par rab tu rtogag/ sdug bsngal
ba dang/ mi snag pa dang/ yid brtan du mi rung ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa dang/ ring du ma gnas pa dang/ skad cig la 'byung zhing 'gag pa dang/ sngon gyi mthar ma byung ba dang//
ma'i mthar 'pheb med pa dang/ da ltar byung ba la mi gnas par rab tu rtog go/ de 'du byed du gyur pa de lta bu thams cad la yang dag par rtog pa'i tsho/ mngon du gzhol bar bya ba ma yin pa dang/
gsol ba'i gnas med pa dang/ mya ngan dang bcas pa dang/ lcasngags 'don pa dang bcas pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang bcas pa dang/ sdug pa dang/ mi sdug par 'abrel pa dang/ sdug bsngal
dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa mang po mang ba dang/ bsags bamed par gyur pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtimug gim rab tu babarab dang/ nad du ma rnam par
'phel ba'i lus mthong nas de 'du byed du gyur pa thams cad las de bas kyang shasacher sems bskyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi shes la rab tu gtong ngo// des de ngazhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam/
gyis mi khyab pa yang dgapar mthong ste/ mtshungs pa med pa dang/ dpagatumed pa dang/ rnyed dka' dang/ ma dres pa dang/ gnod pa med pa dang/ 'khrug pa med pa dang/ 'jigs/
pa me dpa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba dang/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/ skya bomang de yongs su skyob pa yang dgapar rjes su mthong ngo// des de bzhin gshegs pa'i yoshes de ltar tshad med pa yang dag par
rjes su mthong ste/ 'du byed du gyur pa de ltar gnod pa mang po dang ldan par rtog pan/ sems can rnams la de bas kyang shas cher sems kyi bsam pa bcu bar 'jog// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
mgon med pa dang/ rton pa med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang/ rtagatu dbulaba'i sems kyis bsam pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtamug gi me rab tu 'bar ba'isoms kyibasan
pa dang/ sridapa'i btsanarar chud pa'i soms kyi bsam pa dang/ rtag par rgyun du nyon mongs pa thibs pos bsgribs pa'i sims kyi bsam pa dang/ blta ba'i mthu med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang/
