ga rakyil 'khor gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag 'byung yang/ dengag ma long gi dkyil 'khor de la yod pa yang ma yin la/ de la mi long gi dkyil 'khor de rtsol ba yang
yod/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang mad de// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi ma long lta bu'i ya shas la shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam bdun rnam pa sna tshogs po dag 'byung yang/ shes pa'i
gzugs bar n de dag ma long lta bu'i ye shes kyis dkyil 'khor de la yod pa yang ma yin la/ de la a long lta bu ' ya shes de rtsol ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang mad do// 'di lta
sta/ dpar nam lang gdakyil 'khor ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang bo de dag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ma ldan pa yang ma An to/ de dag mi mnye ba dang de dag gi mtshan
'an pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi long lta bu'i shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang/ shes pa'i gzugs bar n rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang bo de dag dang ldan
pa yang ma yin/ ma ldan pa yang ma yin te/ de dag la nye ba dan bsnyal ba ma mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro// 'dul ste/ dbar na me long bdakyil 'khor ngos thams cad nas legs par/
phyis ba'i mdun dang zur dang rgyab kun nas gzugs nganAn 'byung ba'i rgyun tshan du 'gyur ro// de bzhi du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis long lta bu'i ma shes rnam pa yongs su ma chad cing tshad mar
ba kun nas shin tu sbyangs pa yang shes ba'i gzugs brnyan rnams 'byung ba'i rgyumtshan du'agyur te/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi thog ma can rnams nyan thos kyi thag pas nges par 'byang bar bya

ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa can rnakas rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba dang/ thag ba chen po pa rnams thog pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba bya ba'i phyir/ 'anothos kyi thog
baba'adegs pa'i gzugs bar n rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i shas sbo'i gzub/sakhan rnams dang/ thag khachen bo pa'i shes pa'i gzugs rnams kyi rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro//
'di lta ste/ dpar na me long gi dkyil 'khor la 'di lta ste/ sa dang radang/ shang dang khyim dngagazhal med khang chen po dag dmigs te/ ma long gi dkyil 'khor na 'chadam yin no//
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis long lta bu'i yaMshas kyi dkyil 'khor la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar gyi yi shes kyi gzugs
@#// brnyan dag kyang dmigs 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag kyang dmags te/ ma lang lta bu'i tshadashes la ni tshad yongs
su chad ba gang yang yod do// 'di la sa dparan/ ma long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin dud
bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ma 'a ngalta bu'i la shas kyang sems can m dag ba'i grogs pos zin pa// dam pa ma yin pa'i chos tanar sa bsgribs pa dag gi shes pa'i gzugs bar n 'byung ba ba
rgyu mtshan du ma 'gyur te/ snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na ma long gi dkyil 'khor ni mun pa zhing dazhag pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan dulo 'gyur ro//
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ma long lta bu'i yang shes kyang sems can nyes par spyod pa la dga' ba/ ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa rnams shes pa'i gozugs bon 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan
dus 'gyur te/ song ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'dil// dpar na me long gdakyil 'khor na ha cang bskal pa'i yul na 'dug pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs bar n 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du ma
'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi long lta bu'i yi shes kyang// sems can chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las rnam par ma dag pa la gnas pa rnams dang/ 'dod pa can/
ma yane pa dag ga shes pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du ma 'gyur te/ stod ma an pa'i phyir ro// shAn tu 'dus pa mnyam pa nyid kyi yoshes ni yongs su grub pa rnams bcu
las rag par bya ste/ mtshan ma dang bdag po dang dga' ba mnyam pa 'di khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa las dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyams su myong ba mnyam pa nyid khod du chud
kha yongs su grub pa las dang/ mtshan nyide dban pa can mtshan nyade med pa mnyam pa 'di khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa las dang/ yongs su skyob pa'i rnam pa'i byams pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid
yongs su grub pa las dang/ yal bar ma 'dor ba'i rnam pa'i snying rje chen po'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang/ sems can thams cad la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du gzugs kyi
sku kun tu ston pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang/ sems can thams cad kyis gzung bar 'os pa'i tshige mnyam pa 'di yongs su grub pa las dang 'jag rtan nye bar zhi ba rogacig pa mnyam
ba 'di longs su grub pa las dar/ 'jig rten gyi chos bde ba dang sdug bsngal gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang/ yon tan shen tu bskyod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las so//
shin tu 'dus pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni 'ad lta// dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gyi khams kyi gnas yin no// de khazhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
/// so sor rtog pa' ya shes dang/ gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzanadag gi sgo dang/ so sor yang dag par rig pa dang/ spobs pa bstan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
la/nas yan no// 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'jig rten gyi khams ni cig car sems can rnams kyi rnam par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can gyi rgyu lan no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor

rtog pa'i yi shes kyang/ cig car shes bya thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ya shes kyi rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna tshogs can gyi rgyu yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na kun dag 'a ra pa
dang nags tshal dang/ rdzing bu nyams dga' ba sna tshogs de dag gis lam ma thal le lhang nga'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i yo shes kyang/ parol tu phyin pa
dang (byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dang/ stobs dang/ ma 'dzags pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyams dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag gas lam ma thal la lhang nge'o//
'di lta ste/ dpar na 'jig rten gyi khams na 'di lta ste/ glang bzhi pa dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/
'grul dga' dang/ gzhan 'bul dbang byed dang/ tshangs ris la sogs pa shAn tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no// de bzhin du re bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang 'a ba/
rten pa dang 'dzabag rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang/ rgyud pa dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sanas dpa' yang dag par 'grub
pa ma lus pa la so sor rtog pas shun tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no// 'di lta sta/ dang ra na 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gyi la ngas spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no// de bzhin dudang zhin
gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i m shes kyang rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bstan pas// chos la rdzogs pa rangs spyod pa chen por
'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dang ran 'jig rtan gyi khams na 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ lha dang ma'i 'gro ba dag dmags so/ skad bzhin du de bzhin
gshibs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i gshis la yang/ rgyu dang 'bras bur rus pa'i 'gro ba lnga po rnamar rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dag snang ngo// 'di lta sta dbaran/ 'jig rtenagyi khams
na 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag snang ngo// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa' ya shas la yang/ rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa' khams gsum
po rnams rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dag snang ngo// 'di la sa/ dbar na 'jig rten gyi khams na re rab la sogs pa rin po cha' re dag dmags so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
kyi so sor rtog pa'i cha shas la yang/ sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthu dang ldan pa'i chos rgya chen po ston pa dgasnang ngo/ 'di lta ste/ dbar na 'jig rtenagyi
za khams na rgya mtsho chen po zab pa mi 'khrug pa dag dmigs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i m shes la yang mu stags dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis ma 'khrug
pa'i chos ston pa dag snang ngo// 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'jig rten gyi khams na ra khor yug chen po rnams kyis kyang kun nas yongs su bskor ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshags pa rnams kyis
so sor rtog pa'i yoshas kyang chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan 'di dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun tu rmongs pa med pa 'a ro rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor 'od
shan tu 'dus pa bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes na 'di lta sta/ dpar nas mas rgyun rnams kyi lus kyi las rtsol ba las byung ba des/ sems can rnams zhing las dad/ tshong byed pa dang/ rgyal bo'i zhal
ring byed pa la sogs ris yongs su tshol bar byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i yanasakyi sku sprul ba'i 'phrin las rtsol ba las byung ba des kyang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams sems can las dang/ bzo'i gnas thams cad kyis rgyags shangadegs pa rnams la/ las dang bzo'i gnas thoms cad nye bar bstananas zil gyis mnan te/ thabs mkhas
pa des kyang/ sems can rnams bstan pa la dad par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'ad lta ste// dper na sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las yongs su spyod ba
'gyur ba des sems can rnams gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams la yongs su spyod do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa' ya shes sku sprul pa'i 'phrin las yongs su spyod par
'gyur ba des kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems can so so'iskya mchod du rgyas par gyur pa rnams la/ skya ba mnyam pa nyid rto bar ston par mdzad cing ris mthun pa yongs su spyod pa
mnyam pa nyid bstan pas kyang/ sems can rnams dbang du mdzad nas thabs mkhas pa des kyang bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do//
'ad la sa/ dper na sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba des sa mas can rnams la legs par byas pa dang/ chus bar byas ru 'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu so sor nyams su myong
ngo de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i yo shes/ sku sprul pa'i 'phrin las sku nyams su btang bar 'gyur pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de lta bu byung ba'i sa dang/
skyes pa rabs kyi snga dang/ dka' ba spyod pa thams cad sku nyams su btar ba yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can rnams dod par tshang nas/ thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can namA bstan pa la/
'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su sman pa mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dpar na sems can gyi ngag gi las yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba des sems
can rnams phan tshun snya zhing kun tu skya la so so yang dag par dga' bar byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa 'a ga shes gsung sprul pa'i 'phrin las yang dag par dga'
'a9 bar 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i don bzang bo tsheg 'bru bzang po thos pa tsam gyis kyang/ sems can byis pa'i re shes rab can dad par byed pa'i chos ston pa la rab tu 'jugatsang/
thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dpar na sems can rnams kyi ngag gi
las sbyor bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams phan tshun du bya ba dag la rnam par sbyor bar byed do// der 'khrul pa la rnam par spyod/ ma 'khrul pa la bstod ming 'bod do// da bzhin du de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i yi shas gsung sprul pa'i 'phrin las sbyor bar 'gyur dus kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag pa'i bslab pa 'cha' bar mdzad la/ de la
bag med pa la naslod/ bag yod pa la ni bstod cing dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sogs pa'i gang zag rnam par 'jog pa dag kyang mdzad la/ thabs mkhas pa
des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi ngag gi las yang dag par
go bar 'gyur ba des kyang sems can rnams phan tshun du don bya gag tu mishes pa bye brag tu shes par byed cing/ snyan dngags dang bstan bcos rnams kyang yang dag par rjod par byed do//
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i cha shas gsung sprul pa'i 'o phrani las yang dag par go bar byed pa des kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can dpag tu med pa
dag gi tha rtsom gyi rnam pa dpag tu med pa dag zlog par mdzad cing thabs mkhas ba des kyang/ sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su sman par mdzad/ rnam par
grol bar mdzad do// 'di ltas/ dpar na sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las rnam par nges par 'gyur ba des/ sems can rnams bya ba dang ma bya ba dag rnam par nges par byed do//
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i yaMshes thugs kyi sprul pa'i 'phrin las rnam par nges par 'gyur ba des kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can rnams/
sams kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rnam par nges par mdzad cing/ thebs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su sman par mdzad/
rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste dpar na sems can rnams kyi yod kyi las mngon par du byed bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams bsams nas las kun
nas slong ba mngon par 'du byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ya shes thugs sprul ba'i 'phrin las mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba des kyang/
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi spyod pa de dang de dag kun tu spyod pa dang/ kun tu spyod pa'i yon tan dang/ nyes pa dag yang dag par dpyad nas de dor ba dang bskyed pa'i phyir/
gnyen po rnams mngon par 'du mdzad cing/ thabs mkhas pa des kyang/ sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do//
'ad lta sa/ dbar na sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams las kun nas slong bar byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub
pa'i ya shis thugs sprul pa'i 'phrin las kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i gnyen po' chos bstan pa'i phyir/ mdi ga tshogs dang/ tshig ga tshogs dang/
! yi ge'i tshogs rnams lo dga' bar mdzad cing/ thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad rnam par grol bar mdzad do//
'dal ste/ da pa ran sems can rnams kyi gde kyi las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams bde ba dang sdug bsngal so sor nyams su myong go/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gi
sgrub pa'i a shes thugs sprul pa'i 'phrin las nyams su bkar bar 'gyur ba des kyang/ de bzhin gshags ba rnams 'dra ba lud bstan pa mgo gcig pa dang/ rnam par dbye ba dang/ dra ba dang/ bzhag/

pa dag ni rags par dras pa lung bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang de ltar gyi don rnams nyams su btar bar mdzad do// daskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang
chub sems dpa' ba'itu 'dus kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rtsalags/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag na/ 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ya shes rdzogs par ng
slad pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams khona' lags sam/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shan tu 'dus pa 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa/
ya shes rdzogs par longs spyad pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang yin par blta'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu rob/ga ba shes
rdzogs par longs spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ga lebs bar blta lags/ bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi yata/ mi skya
ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de dag ni gnyis su 'du shes pa'i gnyen po 'ad lta ste/ bdag dang gzhan du 'dushes pa'i gnyen pos sems mnyam pa nyade thob sa/ de dag de lan/
chad bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa yang ma 'byung la/ 'dus pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu rogacig la yi shes rdzogs bar longs spyad bar yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dagagiso bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing/ byang chub sems dopa rnams la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba'i
d mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshags pa dang mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shan tu 'dus pa 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa ba sum pa'i lha rnams ji srid du 'dus
ba'i tshal du zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du de dag la lha' khongs spyod dngos po dang/nyams su myong ba dang/ nga yar 'dzin pa med pa 'asgo nas kyang 'dres pa nyi bar 'dres pa rnams kun tu m gnas
nam 'dres pa 'tshol duzhugs bar 'gyur pa de na 'dres pa'i tshel gyi mthu 'ad 'das/ gang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dar zhugs pa rnams la lha' longs spyod dngos po dang de nyams su myong ba dang/
ngayari 'dzan pa med pa'i skyo nas da/ 'dres la nye bar 'dres pa rnams kun tu gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ja srad du ma skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par ma gyur pa
dasrid du sems mnyam pa nyid ma thob par de dag la btang snyoms nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang yodapa gang dag yane pa yang thob par ma 'gyur la/ gnyas su 'du shes pa de dag la/
'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu rogacig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyod pa yang kun tu m gnas so/ ]nam ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur ma de naganyas su 'du shes pa'i ga
pos lams mnyam pa nyade thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad der thun mong ma Ani ba'i btang snyoms kyang thob rung de dag la 'dus pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa
shas rdzolags par longs spyad pa yang kun du gnas so// shAn tu 'dus pa 'a de la sta/ dpar na bo dang/ chu byan rnam pa mang po dag ni/ ji srid du rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par ma gyur pa

da 'di du gnas tha dad pa dang/ tshum dad pa dang/ chu chung ba dang/ chu skye 'gapo yod pa dang/ so sor rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi chu dang/ srog chags mu skyas nyung du dag gi 'tshob tu bar

rtenab 'i ba nas yan no// nam rgya mtsho chen po la zhan par gyur pa de na gnas tha dad pa ma yin ba dang/ chu tha dad pa ma yin pa dang/ chu tshad med pa dang/ chuskya 'griba med pa dang/ bya ba gci'i sgrub
kha' las can gyi chu dang/ srog chags chu skyes phal po chachen po rnams kyi 'tshos nye bar ston pa'i gnas yon no// de ba zhin du byang chub sogs dpa' rnams tshe srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i so/
kyi dbyang sa rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du/ gnas tha dad pa dang/ yangs tha dad pa dang/ ma shas chud pa dang/ tshashes 'anyal 'grab 'dod pa dang

so so rang ga bya ba sgrub pa' de las can gyi ya shas dang/ gdul ba'i sems can nyung du dag yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas ma yin no/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i rgya
mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa de nyidan/ gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang/ cha shes tha dad ba ma yin pa dang/ ma shes tshad med pa dang/ ye shes 'bal 'grib med pa dang/ 'dris brtse bar 'dres pa
'bras bu rog cig pa'i bya bsgrub pa'i las can gyi yar shes dang/ gdul ba'i sems can phal po che dag yongs su smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas yan no// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de tsho tshigs su ban pa 'di regagasungs so// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhazhi nyade// sgrub gnyis ldan drab mtshan nyid can// dngos po shes pa ded tshogs pa// dbang khrod mi shes
mtshan nyid can// de bzhin nyid shes thams cad nas// bsgoms las yang dag 'grub pa can// sems can kun gyi gnyis spyod pa/ gtun du ma khyad 'bras bu can// sku dang gsung dang thugs sprul
pa/ sbyor ba'i thabs kyi 'phrin las can// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams ni// dpag tu med pa gnyis dang ldan// rang bzhin chos rdzogs longs spyod dngo/ sprul pas tha dad 'jug
kha can/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyadabyanges// rnam dag 'dan yang dag brjod// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan/
bo shan tu'adus bdang/ byang chub sams dpa' de dag dang/ nyan thos de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dA war bcas pa'i
'jage rten de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'dus kyis bgasungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'a pags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
sngon rgya las 'gyur ba rAng pa brda ma bcos pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi ni sa ma nasU tA/ bod skad du/ mngon par byung ba'i mdo
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lego/ gang zhig nyid kyi dbu na rin chen 'od ldan dang/ btsun mo bang khabya ma snyadimadangs ldan mas// slong ba dga' mdzad sangs rgyas go 'phang
b.ros gyur cing// chos rnams ston mdzad zha ba de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang ji snyed pas ngan 'gro'i 'jags las 'das gyur cing// srid pa'i 'aching ba thams cad zad byang zhi 'gyur la//
sdug bsngal mtha' med 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i// zam pa gtsag bu bde gshegs chos la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la yon tan phul byung la gnas sbyin pa'i gnas// mchod pa
cung zad byas kyang rgya chanyid 'gyur ba// bde bar gshegs pas rab bsngags gang zag mchog brgyadakyis// rab brgyan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de la phyag 'tshal lo// thub
tha gsung rnam par brtags na dad pa'i m skyod pa 'am// phan pa ma 'byung gang de ci yang yod min la// tshig bdu ba dang 'dzin pa'i nus dang rnam bral ba// rnam par g.yengs phyir 'bras stsol 'di/
bdag cung zad tsang// 'di ltar rang kha bya'i dbusa gnas bung ba ni// 'a kher zhing pad+ma las cung zad bsogs par byed// da ba zhani thub pa'i zhal gyi pad+ma'i tshal nang nas// rang la dri rab tu
dga' byed cung zad bsdu bar bya// thub pa'i gsung na ma lus shin tu rtogs dka' ba// dad ldan ma la nyin par rgyas par nye 'go ste// rnam par dpyad na tshigs bcad phyadamatha' mi dpog
na/ na chen mdo rgyas bsdu ba 'di ni smos cadegs// phyogs sgo rnams su snyan dang grags pa'i snang bas khyab// rab gsal zhes bya sa ya bdag por gyur pa na// bsod nams stobs kyis dag las
rgyal bas rgyal phran gyis/ btud pas nor bu'i cod pana'od kyis zhabasagatsad dus// glang po'i dbang po rgyags 'khrag 'dod chags kyis chags pa// 'phral du bcos pa'i thabs med rtonamongs skya
gyur la/ gzagisanas 'gro pa'i chags sogs nye bar bzhed pas// thugs brtan thub dbang gyur par des ni smon lam btab// de nas brtsams te sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang//
brtson 'grus bsam gtan mi g.yo blo gros rnon po rnams// nyid bda' ltos med shan tu yun rang yang dag spol// 'gro la phan phyir shani tud ra ba brgya phrag mdzad// thugs cher ldan drang srong
mchog 'di tshog zhan du// nyid kyis 'gro phan don mdzad ma skyo ja snyad te// brjod par 'dan shA ri'i bus kyang ma nus na'ang// ngag dag phur na cung zad yongs su brjod par bya// stag mo sha ba
glang bo sde ru dka' thub dbang// tshangs sogs sku tshe brgya phrag du mar dag mdzad nas// don kun bsgrub brtson bdag nyid chen po tshi gdug thogs// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan
gnas su skye ba bzhes// der bzhugs nas na'agro ba kun la legs gzigs nas// skyabs med g.yo zhing phongs pa du mas yongs khyab la// thugs rje chen pos thugs ni spro ba bskyed
gyur te// gzhan gyi don mdzad thugs dam nyid kyi rgyun dgongs rgyur// de bas 'dani mi yul nye bar rab gshegs te// skye dang rga shan pa'i 'jigs la gzigs nas na/rang byung blo gros zhes mdzad byang
chub yang dag bas// da pa zhani chos ston mdzad pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal po mang por bsod nams dang/
mi shes kyi tshogs da pag tu med rnam pa du mar nye bar bsags pas// byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chu bo stobs dang ldan pa shani tu chod pa rnams la thugs rjes
yongs su khaskul ba/ gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir rtag tu brtson par mdzad pa// da thugs la dgongs pa 'ad lta bu mngon sum du mdzad de/ gang ngas skye ba mang por yongs su 'khor
tha ban rang gi sha dang/ khrag dang/ mgo dang/ mge dang/ bu dang/ chung ma rnams gtong ba dang/ shAn tu gtong bas yongs su btang ba dang/ dka' ba'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang/ gzhan gyis sbyar

ba'i bstan bkur ma yin pa snyatshogs pa bzod par byas pa dang/ rtag tu lhod pa med pa'i spro ba dang/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la ma chags pa dang/ yod pa dang med pa'i don la rnam par

dpyod ba dang ldan pas// bgazhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis/ shani tum bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnam pa mang bos sems la gdungs pa'i sdug phongs pa'i srog chags rnams la mchog tu snying
bskyod nas/ byams pa'i stobs dang/ zla 'od dang/ sha de deng/ glang po dang/ thams cad sgrol dang/ bzod par sla ba dang/ spre'u'i bdag po dang/ mi bzungs dang sman chen po la sogs pa skyes
pa' rabs stong phrag snyad du smon lam byas shange bsags pa// e ma'o kyim bdag gis 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ yongs su 'dren pa med pa/ chos ma yin pa// 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'grog
'ab pa'i chos kyis yongs su khyab pa// sems la mi bzad pa'i chags pa sa sbal gyis non ra khro ba mang pa lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing rnam par brlag pa/ phrag dog dang/ sor sAs kun tu bcings
xxx
bar bya'o// ma grol ba rnams ni bgrol bar bya'o// dbugs mthun pa rnams na dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni// yongs su mya ngan las bzla ber
bya'o zhes ngas yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa yin na/ da na dod pa'i dus la bab pa yan gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'dzag rten gyi gnas skabs ci zhig yin pa bltas na/ gdul bar nus so gdul
par nus so zhes de ltar rnam par dgongs nas/ 'jig rtena'adi dag thams cad la gzigs pa 'jug sa// sun 'ab/ su na dbed pa'i chos rnams kyis 'phul/ su na gnod par gyur/ sun nyes
thag par gyur/ su na sdug bsngal bar gyur/ gang la na ngas ma 'jigs shig ma 'dzegs shig sa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas dbyugs dbyung bar nga/ sun ngan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan song la
'bab[}]su nangan song lo bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las bton te/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag par bya/ sun 'dod pa'i 'dam na byang ba la lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i
nor dang bral ba rnams la 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la gzhag par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag na bskyed par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa dag ni yongs
su smin par bya/ gang ga yongs su sman pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes yod tshadas kyi gzagegs pa 'jug par mdzad pa na/ srog chags brgya stong da tag tu med skal la lan/
dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyod du bskyod par 'os pa dang/ la la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma sman pa yongs su sman par nus pa dang/ la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sman pa bde 'gror 'gro bar gal pa dang/
la la 'bras bu dang bo thob par gzhol ba dang/ la la lan cag byar 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa de dang/ rang byang chub thob par gzhol ba dang/ la la glu na chad/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ la lan sngon gyi smon lag rnams nye bar bsngags ras rkyen la rag las pa gang zhig ma thos pas/ dam kha'i chos las yongs su nya
par gyur ra khakhragis so// gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kyimakho bdag ga kun 'ang po nas yang dag par rtog pa rdzogs par gyur cing/ pa'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to

zhas dbyas shangangs bya ba na bas so// ngas khu bkur ba dka' bzhi mthar phyin te/ gang nga' yongs su dag pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i zhing du gyur cing gdul bya'i skya bo rnams yunarang lor ma thogs par dar

tshag yongs su sman tsang kha bya la ma rag kha'i nyi ma shar bas rgyas par 'gyur ba lta bur gyur byas/ phyi sholas khyogi/ 'dare gnas bzhin du yang dngos po thams cad rdzogs par bya bar zhus kham ma las
nad gzhes kha'i dus ni ma yan gyi sa/ ma la bdag mi 'jag rten du song la/ der kun nas brtson 'grus kyi grob sa dang/ da khazhanagshegs ba'i bla na med pa 'a la shes rtogs par byas/ 'di rnams skal

ba dzilta ba bzhin du bdams na dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su smin la rnam par grol bar bya zhing/ skye ba dang/ rgapa dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sgo sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dar/

ade ma bde ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltungakha/ skyabs med kha yongs su skyob pa chad pa'i srog chags rnams/ dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i lag pa brkyang bas gdon par bya'o/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas rjes
su 'brel ba'i 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtinug gam kun tu gdungs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs bas sdugabasngal ma lus pa bsal bar bya'o zhes da lta
bu'i thugs la dgongs pa brje ba bskyedanas/ 'dzam bu'agling du 'jug par mdzad pa na/ rags dang/ yul dang/ dus dang/ rgyud dang/ budamed de/ gakhrigs pa rnam lngas gzigs par mdzad
go/ byang chub sems dapa' rnams rgyu gang gis rab ga la gzigs par mdzad can/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs kha na 'di snyam dudagongs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams rabs ji lta ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba lenasnyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyalaragis su An la/de la ras 'ga'an bum za 'a tshigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' rgyal rigs te/da ltar
nargya la ragis btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma 'kha dag lagazhan dag byang chub sems dar sa rags nganApar nying mtshams sbyor ba blos so zhes gzhu'adis kha zer bar mi
'gyur bas bdag las rgyal rigs su nyung mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sogasad pas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las lus gang bsags pa dang/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nas bshad pa 'bras bu yod pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dasan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gaThags pa mdzad do/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
rgyu gang gis tshul la gzigs pa mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dar ' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs bzhin 'di snyam dudagongs te/ byang chub sems dar 'o rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor
po len snyam na/ 'bras dang/ bu ram shang dang/ ba glang dang/ ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skya bo med pa/ dadus pa 'a skyo kha gnasal/ gang du skyo bo gcig
khatul bas skyo po'i tshogs chen po 'du la khar yan par gzab sa so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs ti dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi 'brong bu dang/ 'bras dang/
ba glang dang/ mahe phun sum tshogs pa dang/ slong mo ba brgya bdub/ mtha' 'khob kyi skya bo med pa// dbus pa'i skya bo gnas pa/ gang duskya bo gcig btul bas spyi bo'i tshogs chen po/
btul bar 'gyur ba an gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'das kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis
khul dbus su lung mtshams sbyor ba blabar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gam chad pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
'das rnams ni chos bshad ba 'bras bu med pa ma yazhi bas rgyu des n/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul la gzugs par mdzad de// byang nub rams dpa' rnams rgyu gang gse na dus la gzabs pa'i
mdzad can/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'disnyam du dgos// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus da lta ba zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ang mtshams sbyor ba len
snyam na/ skye dgu'i rtsal yar skya ba na/ brgyang khro thub pa yan chad/ nying mtshams sbyor ma len la/ mi rnams kyi lo mar 'bab pa brgya thub ba man chad nying mtshams sbyor bam len no// byang
chub sems da pa' gangags ma rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri phub pa yin tshad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par ma mdzad can/ ma rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khrithub pan/ ad 'byung bar dka' na skyo bar bya

bar dka' la/blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang/ bag mad cing bde ba mang bas/ bden pa rnams kyi snod du ma 'gyur pa'i phyir ro// mar 'grab pa la brgya man chad du yang snyigs tsho lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i
sAges ma dang/ na mongs pa'i snyigs ma rad/ sems can gyi sAgs ma dang/ lta ba'i stobs ma dang/ dus kyi snyal/sa mngashas sa gzhi las/bdag la gzhan dag byang chub
sha sams dpas sAgs ma la shas che ba' dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'das kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam cho// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thogs med pa'i dus na skad/
bar mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams n chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'das na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigA
pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ca na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems

dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhageg tu nyang mtshams sbyor ba len sbom na/ ragis gang zhig btsun par bku 'ang ma mas dung/ pha mas zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med par gzigs nas/ de 'di snyam du
dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing/ mang bos bkur ba nas bzung// spyod pa skyon med pa yan gyis ma la bdag lo gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' rgyud ngan pa
las nying mtshams sbyor ba byas so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar ma 'gyur bar/bdag gse rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rgyud dutung mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas
thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu mad pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'das na byang chub sems
dpa'i rgyud la 'khrigs pa mdzad do// byang chub sams dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs bar mdzad can/ byang chub sams dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgodA/
te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci'odrab zhage ga rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bud mo da gang zhage gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa//
rigs 'bal bar 'gyur ba/ khrobag can ma yin pa/ pha ma can ma yin pa/ ngag rtsub pa ma yan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin bzang ba/ bsam pa dag ba/ rgyud phun sum
tshogs pa/ rigs tshatho ba/ nye du' robs dang ldan pa// shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ mtshan nyid ma g.yo ba/ rang bzhin brtan la rgod bag conam yin pa/
khengs pa med pa// byams pa'i soms dang ldan pa// sdug cing yang du 'ong ba/ 'dzag rten thams cad la chos dang ldan pa/ bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyurab/ sngon gyis ngas rgyas rnams
la/ a ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur rug casaM smon lam btab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum du 'dzin nus pa dang/ rang gi don yang nyams par byed pa yin pa
lagazags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'ad nag mas dang pa mas zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon chad cing gzugs dang/
ldan pa dang/ ragis dang ldan pa dang/ tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas bud mad thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ khro bag can ma yin pa dang/ gas bsal
bar 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang/ rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas
kyi yum du gyur la ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas/ bdag la bdazhan dag byang chub sams dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan po'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba slangs so zhes kha zer bar
mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin
bas rgyu 'das na/ byang chub sems dpas bud med rnams la gzigs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sams dpa' gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas/ dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i
risi rnams la gsungs la/ grogs po dag shes par gyisidashag nga 'dzam bu'i gling du babs nas khul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba len gyis/ khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnor bad
da6 phal ra a la da dus kyi grong khyer chen po drag po 'di la ste/ mnyan yod dang/ sA ka ta dang/ yangs pa can dang/ rtsom pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab pa dang/ wA ra Nasar nying mtshams sbyor ba/
leng shag/ de skad ces bka' su la pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen par mdzod cig/
da ltar 'jig rten na sdig pas gos pa/ skya dgu'i ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu'i gling na rtog meg ba drug dang/ rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa drug gas dkrug
pa lags so// de la rtog ge ba drug gang zhin/ 'di la sgyu/ 'od srungs rdzogs byed dang/ ku na tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang/ smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang/ mi pham
ska' la ba can dang/ ka rkya 'bu nog can dang/ gcer bu ba gnyen gyi bu'o// rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ bram ze sgyus rgyal dang/ bram za rnam rjeg dang/ bram ze

bgrang ldan dang/ bram zetshangs pa'i tshe dang/ bram ze pad+ma'i snying bo dar/ bram ze dmar bo/ gsoms ba ya'ajug ba drug gang zhin/ 'di la sgyu rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi
bu ring 'phur dang kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang/ bram tha' khyab kun rgyal dang/ drang srong nyon mongs mad dang/ stong rgyas 'ozungs ral ba can no// 'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du/ byang chub
sams da pa 'a khyed kyi gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bshad par bgyi zhing/ bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gzhasan/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhug
pas chos bshad do// chos de bdag cag gas thos nas/ cis kyang bdag cag ga yunarang po 'don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur bar lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyidamar sa ma sa lags
so/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ byang chub sems dar sa dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so// grogs po dag/ de'i phyir rol mo'i cha sbyad thams cad brdungs shig dga'
ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'icha spyang thams cad brdungs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas kyang dung dus te gsungs pa/ grogs po dag 'ad la lhag par sgra gang ma bcom ldan
'das dung gi sku lags so// grogs po dag ngaltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad thal gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du/ ngas kyang 'o dzam bu'i gling du song la/ rtog ga ba drug
dang rjesasu sgrogs pa drugadang/ snyoms par 'jug pa drug zal gyis mnan nas bdud rtsirtogs par byas te/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o/ ma rtag pa'i dung bud par bya'o/
stong pa nyid kyi rnga ba rdung bar bya'o// bdag med pa'i seng ge 'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ tshigs su bcad de yang gsungs pa// sang ga gcig ba sa gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma
'joms// rdo rje gcig gis brag gtsamo du ma 'dzag/ brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yanadabang du ma 'dzems// nyin gcig gis mun ba du ma rnam par sel// grogs po dag khyed cag
las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de/ yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug chu nying mtshams sbyor ba 'brong shag/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dasnyam du sems//
byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len pa bzhed kyis/ ma la do la bdag gis gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/lhums kyang spung bar bya'o snyam
nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ btsunamo sgyu 'phrulo chen mo gza brjid bsgrubs shaNi lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a dga' ldan
gnas na bzhugs pa/ yi ga dang/ khul dang/ dus dang/ rgyang dang/ bud mad la gzigos pa lta/ gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas/ nam gyi gung la glang bo char bstan te dga' ldan gyi lha 'a ris nas
'phos nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs so// gang gi byang rgyub sems dpa la dga' ldan gyi lha'i ros nas shi 'phos te// yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'/ sa chen po
'di shin tu g.yos pa ro gyur/ 'jib rten 'di thams cad sangaso rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cang/ 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tugyurar/ gang du nyin dang
zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul chapa/ 'du ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang/ de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// der gams can gang/
dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba las/de rnams snang ba des gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldand sems can gzhan yang 'di'i rgyas so// shes ldan dag sems can gazhan
yang 'dare rgyas so zhes bya bar shes so// ji ltar sprin na rgya chen legs 'dus pa// chu mang bsags parlung gis bskyod pa ltar// dbazhi'i blo ldan de na lhums 'jug pa/// ston ka'i sprin rum zla rgyas
ji bzhin no// gang tshe yul ldan mnyam med nyar bshigs la// de tshe 'jig rten so so'i gleng bar na/u0f38/mun gyis khebs bsal phyob/sa kun shAni tuni// gsal snang du gyur 'ad 'dore tshos nyid
rtagang gi tshabyang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lnga'i sa nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhams su zhugs par mdzad pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo btsun mo sgyu 'orul chen mos rmi lam
khazha mthong// glang po che'i phrug gu dkar po zhig bdag ga rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa dang/ snying gzhim mkha' la rgyal mo krung gas 'chag pa dang/ sang ge'i gdan lo 'jug nas skye bo' tshog
cha chen po la chos ston pa dang/ lha dang lha ma yan du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo las de thos pa dang/ mtshan mkhan rnams la rmi lam 'di ji ltar
ston pa mnazhes dras pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha mkhyen mdzod cig/ gang btsun mos rmi lam du mthong ba'i glang po che'i phug gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dal nas zhugs pa zhu ba/

dun 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras bstan par 'gyur ro// stong gi nam mkha' la 'a ga go zhes bya ba na/ rdzu 'phrul che ba dang/ mthucha ba re 'gyur ro// seng ge 'i gdan la 'dug ste/ chos ston to zhes bya ba
na de yang sa nga ga'i gdan la bzhugs te/ 'khor bzhi la chos ston par 'gyur ro// lha dang lha ma yin dusaMcas ra ba 'jig rten bdag lo phyag byed do zhes bya ba na/ gal te rab tu byung bar gyur na/

lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jabag rtan gyis mchod sang rgyud la mngon par bstod par 'gyur ro// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums
bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi 'am man yan pa sus kyang 'bar ma 'gyur bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi sungs mar 'jog pa na lag na ral gri dang/ lag na ma dung dang
'gan mdung thung dang/ lag na mda' bo che// de la 'di skad ces bu ste/ lha mchogagazhi la brgya byin gyis smras pa// khyed rnams song la lha ma rnams kyin// shani tu mchog gyur yum
de ji ltar su la'ang// gnod ma byed par gus pas yongs su srungs// da nams shani tu 'bad byas dga' ba dang/ brgya byani lung na spyi bos mnos nas su// rnam kun mda' mdung ral gri lag
na thogs/ byung chub sems dpa' yum ni srung bar byed// ga yul du rgyal gyur lha bzhis sbras pa dang// den namtshan su tshogs rgyun 'chang zhing// lha mo rang byas

[H ]zhinga gnas rnama'alag dga' ba'achalan spyod la lta bur spyod// dazhes dus gzhan zhagan/ bcun rgyu 'chu 'chadakahanya 'a zhiganadaba rnamosgra 'bral mcho 'ad lta bu'i 'dod pa skos kyi mkho lta btson thams cad thar par
bgyi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas/ btson thams cad thar bar byas so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo 'don pa skyos pa/ kyi ma'o lhas
grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi dbus su dman pa dang/ long ba dang/ ban bo dang/ sdug longs pa dang/ slong mo ba rnams la sbyin pa byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa dang/ lha dang/ nub drang/
byang dang/ sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang/ long ba dang/ bkren pa dang/ sdug longs pa dang/ slong mo ba rnams la sbyin pa byin/ bsod nams nabagyi'o// de nas rgyal bo bras gcung gas btsun
mo'i tshigs mnyan nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dman pa dang/ la ba dang/ bkren pa dang/ sdug 'ongs pa dang/ slong mo ba rnams la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang/ ji ltar bsangs pa bzhin
!/ du spyan ba ni bani// bsod nams ni dus ba dang/ de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ sul mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang/ long ba dang/ bkren pa dang/ sdug khongs pa dang/ slong mo
ba rnams gang mngon par 'dod pa dang/ ji ltar bslangs ba bzhin du sbyin pa na byin/ bsod nams na byas so// gang gi tsho byang chub lums da pa 'anyakya thub pa dga' ldan gyi lha 'aris nas 'phos
ta yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal skye dran dang/ sha ma'i dril dang/ khrag gi dri ma dwang/ mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbagA
so/ dparan nor bu rin po che kashi'i ras kyis ma gos pa dang/ kar sha'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mgis ba de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na/

mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang/ sha ma'i dri ma dang/ khrag gi dri ma dang/ ma ba/tsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma lhags so// ji lta'i nor bu tshol zhes 'od gsal
dang rab gtsong ka sha'i ras kyang gos pa med// de bzhin thub chen lhums na bzhugs pa na// mngal gyi dri ma cis kyang gos pa med// gang gi tshe byang chub san sa dang 'a dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas

'phos nas/ yum gyi lhumasazhu bzhugs pa de'i tshe// yumagyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo// dpar nanor bu ba cha chu zur brgyad po bzang po// rags dang ldan pa// dang ba/
gsal ba/ dra mi tshad paM/ tshon skud sna lnga/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan la brgyus la de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong n 'di ni skud pa'o// 'ad ni
gnor bu'o// skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ gang ga byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te/ yum gyi/
lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum gyi lhums na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa lhums kyi nang na bzhugs ba mthong ngo// ji ltar dri med nor bu bzum// 'od gsal lag bar gazhag ra
snang ba ltar// de bzhin thub chen yum gyi lhums bzhugs pa// shes shang sams pas yum ni yang dag lta// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dbalaMshAkya thub pa dga' ldan nas 'gos nus
yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i bum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzan pas lus ngal ba 'am/ lus dub par 'gyur ba med do// las kyi rnam smanazad bas mtho ragi 'phos
gang tshe 'di ni lhums zhugs bzhugs pa na// de'i yul ngal bso 'dzazhi par mi byed par// da tshegyur ra 'dare da chos nyid do// chos nyid kyis gang bag tshe byang chub sems dar 'ashAkya thub pa dga'
ldan gyi gnas nas 'thos nas/ yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'atsho/ um de phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa blangs te

zla/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog go/ ma byin par len pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod ba dang/brdzun du smra ba dang/ 'bru'i chang dang/ sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag chad pa'i gnas stangs te/'bru'i
chang dang/ sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa 'a gnas las slar ldog par byed do// srog mi bcod dang ma byan ma len dang// brdzun ma sna dang chang la ma bskam dang// 'khrig pa'i mi tsha
spyod pa spong ba 'di// 'dir ni don grub yan gyis chos nyid yin// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas la bos nas/ yum gyi lhums zhu bzhugs
po ri'i tshi/ dang yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dad ldan pa'i yid gtod pa mad de// nyon mongs rnams la chags par ma 'gyur zhing// de na 'dod rgyus sams gdungs ma 'gyur lag
de yug 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan ma yi/skyes ba rnams la sems na gtod ba med// de nas dus gzhan zhagin/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa spyas pa/kya mo bdag gas rgya mtsho chen po zhig/
chu btung ngo snyam nas/ des rgyal bo zas gtsang la smras pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang gyis mtshan mkhan rnams la sbas/ skortse'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu ba'i dod pa skyo/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis

lha btsun mo sras smyos bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan ba nase bltams par 'gyur te/de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i rgya mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan to//
rgyal bo zas gtsang gis smras pa// gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chum byung na cir 'gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pasras yan lag ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa//
nga'i ming bras gtsang zhes bya'abu yan lag ma tshang bar bya 'am/ de'i tshogrong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na/ kun tu rgyu na dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhage 'dug pa de/

rgyal bos bkug nas rgya mtsho chen bo las chu myur bar khug shasig ces bsgo ba dang/ des de nyid na 'dug bzhin du rgyu mtsho chen bo ba zhu'i chu drangs te/ de rnams la btsun mo 'thung du bcug pa dang/ de'i 'a dod/

ba skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// nga nas dus bzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul 'di lta bu'i 'ded pa skyes Sha/ skya ma'o bdag lum bzhi'i tshul du zhugs la shadi ga rtsa ra yol

ga'i mthar 'dug par bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes par rigs nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs bshams te/ glang po
cha'i tshogs dang/ rta'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ da dung bu chung gi tshogs te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor taM/ btsun mosgra/
'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig tu chas nag lum bzhi'i tshal du phyin to// de nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos 'um ba ni' tshal mthong ba na sams rtsa gcug par gyur pa dang/ phyogs las babs
( shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog yang dag par rgyas pa mthong bas dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes te der song nas/ ma tog dang 'dab ma'i g.yur gyis dud pa'i yal ga la 'jus to/ bud med rgan pas bskor
sa gnas so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'ad snyam du sems te/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo sras bltams par bar gnas gyas/ ma la bdag gas byang chub sems dad 'a de dang po bltamu/
pa na blang bar bya'o// de nas yang bsams pa/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo ni ngo shes pa dang ldan pa ya na pas bdag ga mdun du bltams ma byed kyis/ thabs shag bsham par bya'o snyam nas/

lhal dbang po brgya byin bud mad rgan mo zhig gi cha byad du sprul te/ des gang gis bud med rgan mo de rnams phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung dang tshur drang bo zhig sprul nas/ da rnams
bros pa dang/ bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du 'dug go/ chos nyid kyis byang chub sems da pa ba zhi mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su
'jug pa dang/ mkhyen bzhin du gnas pa dang/ mkhyen bzhin du 'byung ba yin no/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ gang ba dag skyes bu tha mal ra bzhin du ma ngal gyi sgo nas
'byung ba ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yan gyis/ ma la bdag gis yum gyi dku g.yas pa brtol la 'byung bar bya'o zhes/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhum gyi dku g.yas ba brtol te byung ba dang/
lha'i dbang po brgya byan gyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam dudagongs te/ brgya byin 'di dag gse byang chud dpa' 'di dngas so zhes drags pa skyo bar 'gyur
0 ka/ bar mkhyen nas/ ngo bo nyid kyis rdo rje'i nga ro nunagyi skur bzhagyi brlabs te/ lhums su ni yun 'dzanyipas nyon mongs par ma gyur ga snyadu rtagongs/ 4 yang dag par
mdzad de bzhugs pa yan no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byan gyis 'dzin par mi nus par 'dar bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa// ko'u shaka thod thong/ de skad ces bka'
u0f74ra pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhag go/ bzhag pa ma gyasemod la sus kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir ba/zages nas gosapa dadun bdun bor zhang
tshib tu yang gsungs pa/ ke'u sha ka phyogs 'di gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs lags so// byang chub sams dpas bka' stsal pa// ko'u shi kar mas can thams cad kyi
sngon du 'gro bar bya'o// phyogs 'ad gang yani/ lho phyogs lab/sa so// 'gro ba thams cad kyi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o// phyogs 'ad gang yin/ byang phyogs lags so// srid pa'i rgya mtsho las
brgal bar bya'o// phyogs 'di gang yin/ nub phyogs lags so// pa'i skya ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro// skya 'chi mthar byed de na nga ltams pan/ sa la gom pa bdunanang 'ud nas su// 'du nga=
skya ba thamar gyur yin zhes/'jig rten gsum gyi bla na gcig dus gsungs// chos nyidakyise byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas byang ba de'i tshe/ sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par

'a 9/ gyur[']N+Dibs rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing/ 'jig rtenan 'dzag rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyim dang zla ba 'di ltar rdza 'du la chub/ 5da ltar
mthu che ba dag gsos kyang 'od kyis snang bar ma nus pa de dag kyang de'atsho/ snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag gi lag pa brkyang l yang ma mthong pa
las de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dare skyas so zhes bya ba 48 sa go/

gang tsho rnam 'dren bltams par gyur pa na// nga tshes ni rar bcasaShaTan tu g.yo// gang gso 'dzag rtan bar yang skad cig gas// snang byed 'od gsal de yang byang bar gyur// de nas rgyal po phra gtsang mas
sa gsos ka che'u re dang/ snang ba rgya chen po mthong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te/ zhapas ga'us la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so// 'di lta bu'i 'phrul chung
dang mthu che pa'i bu rgyas pa ni bdag gse rad pa legs par red ngo// chos nyid kyis gang ga tshe byang chub sems dang 'ashAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltams nga la ye shugs / sa parlung pa
bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang/ sha ma'i dri ma dang/ khrag gi dri ma dang/ mi gtsang po gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so// ji ltar 'od gsal chon shel nga khrung pa dang ['', ] gsung
tshun gos ma 'gyur// de bzhin thub de lhums nas byung ba na// gser sbyangs ma chen nang nas bton pa 'ad// chos nyan kyas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi
lhums nas bltams pa de'i/ de'i yul mi 'dug ma lul te/ 'greng bzhin durgyal ragres ma des rgyal ragis bltams par byed de// de nas 'dug nyal ba'ang ma yane to// yan lag lnga ldan tshul khram sA
kyis brgyan pas// de 'greng bzhin shin tu dag ba ya/gzhon nu de 'ad brgya byin dag gis blangs// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dan 'ashAkya thub pa yul gyi lhums nas bltams pa de'i tshe/
pa'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po nor bu' u bcan dag 'dzin to// dramad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'dra'i gdugs// lha'i gtso bo dbu yi steng nas 'dzin// gdung 'khrel 'od
gzer gyis 'bar lag pa dang// rdza yang bzang gas 'ad la g.yod par byed// chos nyid kyis gang ga tshibyang chub sems dpa'i shAkya thub pa bltams pa'i mod la bar snang las chu bsal ba gcig dang chu/

dron po gcig ste chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug ga stang du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do// de mod rang dag bsal dang de bzhin dog/ chu yas rkang gnyis gtso bo khrus mdzad do// rigs rgyud ba nga

du byang chub sems da pa' 'khrus/ kun mas de la'ang mchod pa byed par gyur// chos 'adi kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la bstun pa'i yul gyi mdun du chuag chen po byung nas 'bab par gyur to/

da la de'i sum chus chu'abya ba byed do// nang gnyis gtso bo gzhon nubaltams pa na// lha de rnams nashan tu yid dga' bas// der na chub zang byung bar gyur pa la// de yum der na chu yas bya ba bya23 lca
ya rol mo shan tu sgra snyan rnams// shAn tu dga' bas mchog tu rdung bar byed// de rnams gos dang phreng ba 'ther byed cing/ gzhan dgarab tu 'dug cing de bzhin sdod// chos nyid kyis byang chub pa las

dang 'baltams pa'i medal/ lhas bar snang las lha'am tog ut+pa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mud da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ a ka ru'i phyi ma dang/ rgya spos kyi phyi ma dang/ tsan dan gyi phra ma dang/ tA ma la'i
'dakhams 'thor ro// lta'i mi ga anA ra bas kyang 'thor ro// lha'i sa'i snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin te// gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do// na khas pas btud pa'i sangs rgyas bltams pa/
na dri zhim dri mchogachan phab pa dang// de dang de na rang stobs tshul mthun pa'i// rab dga' sams kyis bstod pa brjod par byed// 'das nubyang chub na chog dag thob 'gyur zhing// stag
bsngal zad pa'i 'gro phan mdzad 'gyur la// 'gro ba ma shes rab rib mag mdongs la// sman pa ma rtog 'di lag na rab stsol 'gyur// 'di ni rmongs pas mag khebs lang ba yo da'agro ba'i smin ma/
chen po nyid du 'gyur// lta ngan gyis brlag log pa'i lam zhugs la// ma 'chol drang po'i lam ni ston par 'gyur// ngan 'gro'i lam ni ma lus 'gog 'gyur zhing// lha yaM gnas kyi sa na
@#@#// 'byed 'gyur zhis// 'og man bar na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni// lha ya gnas su yang yang sgrog par byed// gang gi byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams pa de nyid kyi
mnyan yod du rtsabs kyis 'bur// tshangs sbyin bu btsas pa na tshangs sbyin 'di snyam du sems/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na ul gsal ba bzhin du snying pas de bas na/ 'di'imang gsalargyal zhes bya

bar gdags so zhes btagasaso// rgyal po'i khab kyi groper na/ rgyal po pad+ma chen po bu btsas pa na/ pad+ma chen po 'di snyam du soms bdag ga bu btsas pa na 'jig ltanya' gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing
gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas/ 'di'i ming ni gzugs can snying ra zhes bya bar ba/dgas so zhes btags so/ ko'u sham ba ni rgyal po dmag brgya pa bu ngatsas pa na dmag brgya pa 'ang snyam du sems taM/

bdag ga bu btsas pa na 'ag rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas/ 'di'i ming shar pa zhes bya bar gdags se zhes btags so// grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas bu ngatsas pa na 'di snyam

dusams te/ bdag gi bu bcos pa na 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba lta bur gyur pas/ 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te/ da ni de lta ma yin no// 'on kyang de thams cad n byang chub sems
dpa' mthu yin no// gang gi tshe byang chub sems da pa' shAkya thub pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tsho dga' bo la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya btsas pa dang/ grags 'dzan la sogs pa shAkya gzhon

nu ma lnga brgya btsas pa dang/ 'dun pa la sogs pa rim gro pa lnga brgya pa tsas pa dang/ bsngags ldan la so gas pa rta lnga brgya 'brangs so// lha rnams kyis gteralnga'akha yapa nye bar bstan to// khams
rgyal phran rnams dang/ mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams kyis rab turatud cing thams cad kyis kyang dpya shul la// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang na'ang snyam du sa mas/ bdag ga du ba tsas ra

na 'dod pa thams cad grub pas na/ gzhon nu 'di'i ming den thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sa mas dpa' la thog mar mtshan bde dgas so/ sa 'di kyas byang chub sems dar 'ad+d+hashAkya thub pa
bltams pa'i mod la yab yum gyisamtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar son pa yin pas/ shes ldan dag cig gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan na/ 'gro ba ga'us su 'gyur gyis gzhan du

nam an te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po tshes dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po

ma sna bdun na 'di lta bu dag byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rizhi po che dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ chu rin po chadang/ nor bu rani po che dang/ bud mad rin po che dang/ khyim bdag ran po dang/ bdun pa na blon po

'an po che'o// bu dang 'a ba ]rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'dzems pa stong 'phyung ba de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i ma lus par/ gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshab mang nga
nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba mad la/ chos dang 'dul bas 'gas par bab ste gnas par gyur to// gal te skra dang kha spu dwags nas gos ngur smig bgos te/dad pa/

yang dag pa khenas khyamanas khyim med par rab tubyung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgarAr rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jag rten du sla rnam par grags par 'gyur ba/skyes bu chen po'i

mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyasi dang ldan nam/lha sa lagos te/ gzhon nu skyes bu chen po' mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyasi dang ldan pa na 'grob gnyas su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan dun yin ta zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar sa snam pazhan du 'di ni 'di'i chos nyidi yazhin// de la 'di skad ces bya sa/ rgyal pos gzhon nu bltams nas skyes bu la//

mtshan shal bram khro la dwase de tshe smras// rgyal bu gal te khyim na gnas gyur na// nges pa ra 'dazhim dbang dag tu'agyur// rdul bar ldan zhing rgyal po gzhan rnams kyi// spyi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar gyur/
'di ni nga rnams kun tu mngon rgyal ba'i// chos kyis rgyal srid dag na da bar 'gyur// rin chen gyur pa 'di ni rinican bdun// mi mchog bsod nams las kyis thobo par 'gyur// gang gamathu yas sa
nim lus pa// 'di'i lung mi gcog par spyod par 'gyur// gsar las lags byas lte ba b+hani tu zlum// rnabs stong ldan zhing mu khyud ma nyams bang// dang poras la rnam par rgyal 'gyur gang//
'khor lo de 'dases dang por thob par 'gyur// yan lag thams cad legs skyas sa lan// rab gnas gangs can rtsi 'dra'i glang po mchog/ rgyal po la 'os mkha' la 'gro ba na// rinanyen sa gzhiganyas pa/

'das thob 'gyur// tho rangs dus su phyogs kun ma lus pa'i// sa rnams bskor nas slar n ldog gyur gang// rma bya'i mgrin 'dra spu na yang 'od pa'i// 'dis na'od las thob par 'gyur// rin chen dri mad pa chu'i rang

bzhin[：]na tu da pal/tshad tsam du snang byed pa// dri med mtshan mo ru 'dra nyani de bzhin// rani/na ma rtogan zhi ba thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ragarngab thugs dang mdangs ldan ra 'di/ bung mdu dam pa
ldan rnams kyi mchog/ lha mo bzhin du nan kun ldan ba// bud med rin chen de 'dir thob par 'gyur// gang yang 'di na rgyal ba mu tig dang/ gser sogs shin tumang po dbu la da ya// nongasman

khatshungs par nor mang khyim bdag ni// rin chan thob nas rnam par spyod par 'gyur// 'gro dang kun tu gnas rang rnam ldog ga ra ra// ma lus rang la mkhas par byed pa yi// dpal ldan dun pa 'bung bar gyur/
ban ma yi rin chen blon bo zhes bya yin// dpa' zhing rtul phod yan lag mchog bgazugs ldan// bu skyong shug3[' “]gyur zhing// gang gi gza brjodi ni tu stobs che zhing// sa bdag gzhan dag
'dud par byed pa 'byung// gal te khyaan nyes mang gis dkrugs pa// rab 'bar de ni yab spong ba ltar// nye bar zhi bya'i nags sungs songan// de 'dir rang po ma thogs sangs rgyas 'gyur// khyad kyi dus
'di dung na 'ad 'drag gzhon nu 'grob rin chen gcig pa ltams pa// 'gro ba gnyis las gzhan du ma 'gro bar// de ltar sngags kyi tshig las mthong ba lags/

dag gang dag dang ldan pa' sa bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yan zhes bya ba nas/ stam bzhan du'ajage rnan gyi sgra rnam da ra grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyi spyi sa khu chen po'i mtshan sum du rtsa

gnyas po zhigang dag yani/ lha gzhon nu' 'ab ga shan tu gnas pa lags so// zhabs gnyis shani tu gnas pa 'dikyas sa la mnyam bar 'bab ste lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan

lags so// de'i zhabs kyi mthal gyi ngos gnyis la 'khor la rtsa bas stong pa lte ba dang/ chu khyad dubacas pa// rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu

chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i sor mo rang ba dang/ zhabs kyi ngal yangs pa dang/ de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhinga gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa

na da bar na shing bal gyi 'da' ba dang/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin no// lha 'ad ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po' rgyas bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i bu ga dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba lags te

de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba na/dparanangang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyag bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i na tshan lags so/ lha' gzhonanu' zhabs long ba'i tshogs

mngon pa dang/ bzhi pa ni dogs a na ya' lta bu dang sku mdud pa dang/ sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo ngaga'as su slobs shange rig pa ste/ lha 'dani gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
lags so// lha gzhon nu'i 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags to/ de'amadoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa/ 28 'a dang po cang shes kya 'am/ rtacang shes byung ma thag ga zhanano// lha 'dano gzhon nu'i

skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'amtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i skudza srid par 'dom gang de srid la/ 'dzem sar sku sang de sridams shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/ lha 'di ni kha tshon

nu'i sa bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lhagazhenanu'iri stod kyi spu re re nas skye zhing/ de'i sku lu nas skye ba yang ta thang ka 2 g.yas phyogs su 'khya'i bar sku lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon

nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu nu mdog gosar 'dra ba dang/ 'od 'dom pang ba dang/ lpags pa srab cing mdog gsar gyi 'dab la gas ta/lcagApa sub pa nyid kyis rdul
dang drams sku la ma gos pa lta/ lha 'ad ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ lha ba nor 'as na po nam tho ba/ sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni/phyag gnyas dang/
zhabs gnyas dang/ dbung mgogatos dang/ ltag pa lags te/lha 'dan skyis bu chen po'i skyong sa bu chen po 'i mtshan lags so/ lha gzhon nu'i thal gong rgyas pa dang/ skurostod song ge'i 'dra ba dang/
sku drazhing kho lag cha ba dang/ dad dmago shan tu zlum pa dang/ choms bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang tshunas mnyam pa dang/ tshems thags bzang ba dang/ mchu bani tu dkar ba dang/

'gram pa seng ge 'i 'dra ba dang/ ro bro ba' a chol ga dang ldan ma la bags te/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu nalcags shani tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/

lcagasashAni tu rang ba nyadi srab pa nyid kyi phyir/ ltags zhal nas phyung nas skra mtshams nas bzung sta/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ltalha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po/

skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ lha gzhon nu'itshangs pa 'a dbyangs dang/ ka la bda' skad ltar a dedu 'ong ba dang/ snga'i dbyangs can lag gas te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen pa'i
mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i spyan mthon mthang la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang/ gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang/ smana'atshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags ti lha 'di
na gzhon nu'i snyas bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lho bad dgag na gang dang ldan pa 'a 'go pa gnyas su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na ma la gas pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du/ 'dzag
rten du rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya'abar gyi/ skyas bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so// bdag nyid legs bsgoms skul ni/sku ya tha ma 'dzazhi mdzad pa'i/ thub pa
[p]chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// da zhu ba dag gas brjod par bgyi// 'di zhabs shan tu gnas pa sta/ sa la mnyan pa ra 'dab pa yani// 'du zhabs phyag bag ma thal la ni// 'khor 'donatud du bas 'ag
skyas// 'di'i zhabs rtong yangs ba dang// dan sa ra mo ring 'dre sadz+dzas// thugazhangs dra bas 'brel ba dang// shang bal ltabur 'jus pa dang// 'dazhabs long bu'atshama mngon// bzhi pa a na //

dang chungs// mchog sku ngam btud par// phyag gis pus mo'i lha nga slong// mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nung// n+yagro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab// ro stod spu nur ra nas// skye zhing de spu g.yas su 'khyal//
mdog nags ra spungs 'dra ba dang// kun nas 'dem gang 'od dang ldan// bcom ldan dan lugs phub 'ang// 'di sku bdun nam tho ba ste// bcom ldan thal gong rgyas pa dang// sku stodasang ga 'dra ba dang/
sku drung bo lag che ba dang// dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang// bcu phug ban a tshogs rnams na// yongs su rdzogs shing ma tshang med mnyam dang thags bzang nyid du// da a tshems na legs par gnas/

rab dkar sang ge'i 'gram pa 'dra// re ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang/ lcags na shan tu srab pa dang// nges ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan// rdzim ba 'od stan mthon na thang// sman ma' mtshams kyi 'dzod
spunI dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil// mchan bzangs sum cu rtsa gnyis 'ad ]/gzhab la na 'byung 'gyur pa// de ni 'gro ba gnyis 'gyur gyi// gsum par 'gyur bas la gas so// 'di ni gal
khyim gnas na// 'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid 'gyurati// duldan bunasong ba dang// gnod pa chu 'demakhas pa 'gyur// gal te rab byung rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang zag mnyan pa
god par 'gyur/ bshos dang btung dang na bza' dang/ gcams cha rnams kyang rnyed 'gyur la// 'di la 'khor nami byed cing// lus can kun gyi yodi du 'ong// lha rnams rjes su 'brang ba dang// mi rnams

si nad bzhin tu// chos kyi bdag po mchog 'gyur zhing// ma yul dbag tu'ang dkazhin 'gyur// mnyam pa med cing 'dra ba chod// rnam 'dren mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i
mtshan lags te/ gang dang ldan na go ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na legs zhes bya ba nas ma bzhin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpo'ashAkya thub pa bltams nas/

gyi zhag bdun lon pa dang/ de bskrun pa'i yum nongs par 'gyurato/ nongs ma thag tusum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i risagunom pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ byang chub sems dpa' m ma rnams la btud zhus/ mam

khyod kyis gzhon nu'adadus dus su sku mnye byas shayi// dus dus su khrus byas shag dus dus su zasabazhecig/ dus dus su ya nga dag pa bde bas bstun bkur byos shig/ mam dga' ba lag pa gnyis kyis dbyangs
nas dus dus su skumanyes byed// dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zas sbyin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bdebs bsan bkur byed do// yang de'i shin tu yad du 'ong ba'i bo gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs

shang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan/ yab zas gtsang la phul pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis blangs te/dga' bas pad du bzhi gnas /yang dang gang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya

thub pa na bgazugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa// ma'i kha dog las yang dag par 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ma thob ba/ skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na/ngoms mi shes shing dga' pa thob/ 2

dper na 'dzam bu chub 'i gsar 'amagar ba mkhas pas rgyan brdungs pa// la ba dkar po gsar pa'i steng du bzhagan[】]shanatugasal zhing 'baral rnam par 'atsho ba d bzhi zhi du/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa

gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bltan sdug ba/ mi'i kha dog las 'das shing/ lha' kha dog nas thob pa yanano// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa shAkya thub pa// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdig pa

dang yod pu'ong bar 'gyur//yang 'daskye bo'i tshogs chen pos/ de phrag pa nas phrag khar sgo bar byed pa ni/ dpar na ston kha'i bdu bya ba'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yang du 'ong bas/ skya bo'i tshogs chen

khos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te/ snga ma bzhin no// chos nyidakyis byang chub sems dad babaltams pa'i tshod nas spunam 'dzunas bar gatsugs rnams la blta ste/de skrun 'dzums pa ni/

dbar nasum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhinano// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sman pa las skyas pa'i lha'i spun dang/ ngas pa nyin mtshan dadapag tshad
gcig khe rakhor yug tu garbag sa so// las bcas las byang du yod spyan gyas na// gzugs chen po dang de bzhin dra rab rnams// nyin dang mtshan du khor yug dang ga tshadaganyis//
mdun na gnas pa bzhin du'ang gatrags par gyur// chos nyid kyis byang chubs nas dwang ba bltam pa'i mod nas/ gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang/ gsung snyan pa dang/ gsungayade du 'ong ba yin te/dpar na

gangs can gyi bya skad snyan ci 'dzangs pa dang/ skad snyan pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas/ gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang/ gsung snyan pa dang/ gsung yade
pu'ong ba yin no/ kun 'dzan la drang srong nyon mongs mdacas bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa byams pa'i bdag nyid can/de dang ldan pa/ skye dgu la ma'os gshan pa zhig gnas

te/ de la tsha bo mas byin zhes bya ba yod pa dang/ da da'i tshe phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams te 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal boragyur pa'i snang ba d mthong ba dang/
nyon mongs med la smras pa// mkhan po// 'dang nyes thams cad dag dmicar byang bar gyur tum tshe// 'di ltar ri ni yug bcas pa// 'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur// nyon mongs med kyis nga la smras pa/
nyi ma'i 'od nargyun du no// du chag snangad 'di dag// yan lag reg na 'od bsal ngos// sa par thub pa de yi 'od// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chanani// nges par lhums nas bltams gyural/
bltams nas sems dpa' chen po de'i// 'od gzur gsar dang 'dra ba ni// dri ma med pa 'di dag gis// 'jig rten gsum nas nig byas yani// mas can gyis smras pa/ mkhan po bzhud/ rtsi shage 'khor sa/

sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ram/ 'on te bla na med pa'i la shes rtogs par 'gyur ba ranyid kyi bltabar mdzod cig/ drang srong nyon mos mad kyis smasar dad ltane rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'a khyim/nyi 'og gi rgyal

po dang/ mkhar gyi rgyal po dang/ chong pa dang/ chong dpon dang/ dedadapo na rnams dang/ bram bra dang/ khyim bdag brgya stong dang ga tu mang bas kun tu khyab nas 'dug gi/ gangag ched dban dar gyur pa de'atshe/ rgyal po zas

gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du skye ma'odrang srong nyon mongs med skung gis sar skya'i gzhir 'ongs na ra ma rung snyam dusams so// de nas drang srong nyon mongs med stong

gnam mkha' la mngon bar 'aphags nas rgyal po zas gtsangama'i khrang sgor ni ba dang/ jitsam na sgo srungs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ dwang srong nyon mongs med 'dang ma'i
so zhes rag par byas pa dang/ rgyal po dras gtsang mas thos te dga' ba dang mgu ba dang/ rab dga' ba dang/ mchog tu rangs pas byung nas mchog tu gus pas mchod de 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong
chen po legs par 'ongs so// dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag 'dir// khyod sras blta ba'i phu'i mtshes te// 'jig rten gtsobo rnam 'dren pa// thub pa
de ni mthong bar 'tshal// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na ni gzhon nu nyid log gas sad kyi bar du pe shage sdod cig/ nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams/ ]

mtshan mo'abazhi cha nyal ba ltar// dges pa denaganyera rnams kyi gnyid// mag la sunarang la gnas so// da nas lab shon nu shAkya thub pa mam 'arang na 'dug pa drang srong nyon mongs mdal byin pa dang drang srong nyon mongs

chod kyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yud tsam brtags te smras pa/ lha gzhon nu'adas tshan mkhan rnams kyis ja skad lung bstan/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ rin po sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los

sgyur ba'irgyal por 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis/ byang chub soms dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad ng slas pa// sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los

sgyuram 'byung// bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni// nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur// mtshan ma gsal dang ldan n mi dbang po// gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur/ thub

bong mtshan shan tu gsal bas na// mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor los sgyur// da nas drang srong nyon mongs mad kyis bdag 'di kyas tsha'amatha'angs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon por byang chub pa

brtags pa la zhugs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas kha6nas byung// lo drug tu dka' ba spyod bar 'gyurato/ de nas bdud rtsi stegs pa la 'gyur ba mthong ngo// bdag na bar skabs der
0 'chiba'i dus byed par mthong nas/ dmig mchi mas gang sa 'dug kha/ rgyal pobras gtsags mthong nas/ sdas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis mthong ba na// ngoms par ma 'gyur

dga' ba thob 'gyur// lus bzang dag byed de 'dir mthong nas// drang srong chen po ru smad du bzhari 'gyur// ga las bdag ga gzhon nu'ajigs ba 'am// tshe zad 'gyur ba nyi bar ma gnas grang// de na myur du

legs da ra bdag la snyos// khyod kyi mchims bdagan 'dar bar gyur// drang srong nyon mongs tshad kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di sa stong du nam mkha' las// rdo rjes ra drag 'arangs ra ba
gyur kyang// thub pa chen po'i sku las ba spu na// nyag ma gcig kyang g.yos par ma nus so// ma chen rlung gshugs kyis bdas pa dang// mtshon cha rnon po shan tus dbyud dang// drag po'i dug dang sbrul
gyi dug rnon a nga// gzhon nu lo bab skad cig 'jage mi 'gyur// thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang la gso da// 'jags pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// de ni 'jig rten kun gyi 'dzugs 'dzo

na/ rnami dbang 'di la 'jags ra ga la 'byung// 'jig rtenan na nga dag nyidi cha rnams kyi// gtsor gyur bdag nyidichen po gang zhag la// tshangs bcas lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa// ma dbang de la 'jigs
pa ga la 'byung// ma dbang bdag pa/rgud pa mthong nas ni// gang phya zhi ba'i thob bdag du yod// chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang phrad nas na// donam thob par bdag ni 'chibar 'gyur// gang dag smra ba
dam pa mtshungs med pa// 'di la chos thes 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang// rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag/ skyad cing bsod nams ldan l rams nad bral// de nas drang srong nyon mongs

med byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams so// nyams pa dang/ nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rkang pa kho nas grong khyer nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos

pa dang/ grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang/ gsagam dang 'gyo mo rnams gsal nas spos dang du mas khyab par byed du gcug go/ de nas drang srong nyon mongs med 'byor pa chen po sa grong khyer nas byung ste rim gyis

rib kun 'dzan du bzhi pa dang/ mi sbyin la smras pa/ ngas gzhon nu mthong ste blun mad pa 'a mdashas rtogs par 'gyur na/ ngas nad slabs par ma 'gyur te/ nga na bar skabs su dus khyad par 'gyur gyis/ khyod ni de'i

thad du rab tu byung la/ nga rgyal dang drags pa nges par bcom par gyur pa dang/ tshangs par spyod pa la spyad par bya su/ rages kyis dregs par mi bya/ rus kyis drags par ma bya/ rigs rgyud kyis drags par ma byas

khyod kyis kyang yun ring po ma thogs par bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur gyis zhes smras nas/ yang chags su bcad de smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na// shar phyogs su na khyod 'dug dang/ rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// red par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon num ma'i pang na 'dug pa la yang dang yang du lta zhing pa'i du mi 'dra ba de lta bu nasa'i
sang na su la yang mang do snyam du sems shari shani tudag 'bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas rang po ma lon par m sa' pang du bzhugs nas/ gsar gyi gzhong par ni

'bras dang shar bsras pa' chen gsol ba na/ de ma mas bkab kyang ma thub mang por gsol nas 'phrog par brtsams pa dang/ 'phrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsangal ldan pa dang/ rgyal pos btsun mo dang/

lhan cig gis 'phrog par brtsams pa dang/ des kyang ma nus so// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang/ sar skya na gnas pa'i skyo po'i tshogs rnams la bsgo na/ de rnams kyis kyang 'phrog par ma nus so// de nas
glang po chalnga brgya la btags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gas/ ma la bdag gso mdzub mo bkug pas gsar gyi gzhong pa nas bzung ngosnyam

nas des mdzub mo bkug pas gse ra gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang/ glang po cha lnga brgya po de dag kha phyir bsgyur te grangs nas dadagags kyang gasar gyi gzhong du 'phrog par ma nus so// rgyal po zas gtsang

gse bsams pa/ ja ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po chelnga brgya drang ba dang sbyar na gdon mi za bor lag pa gnyis kyisi naglang bo che stong thub kyis de bas na/ gzhon nu'i mang glang po chastong gi

stobs can zhes gdags so zhes btags so// grong khyer sar skya'i gnod sbyin shAkya rephal zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so// shAkya rnams kun tu spyod pa ni/ shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u 'am bu mo btsas
kha gang yin pa de dag gnod spyin shAkya 'phal gyi rkang pa la phyag tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir khrid ba yin pas/ rgyal bos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag de par gzhon zhuganod sbyin shAkya
'phal gyi skung pa la phyag 'tshaladu chugashag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' glang bo chal bskyon te dpung gi tshogs dpag tu chad pas yongs su bskor te/ grong khyarasar skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams

ba dang/ glopa khyar sar skya'i gzhi sgoracu gnyis dang bral bar gyur cing/ byang chub sams dpa' de nang du zhugs pa na thub ba bzhin du gnas par gyurato// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsams pa grong khyer/

'da' da lta ste/ glang po che'i sgra dang/ rta' sgra dang/ shang chu'i sgra dang/ dpung bu chung gi sgra dang/ dung go sgyu dang/ ja bo che'i sgra dang/ d+ha de'i sgra dang/ rwadung gi sgra dang/ gar gyi sgra dang/ glu'i sgra dang/ rol mo'i sgra

dang / sbyin ba nibyin/ bsod namasan pos/ pas naa gnas lan nyi bar gnas/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas gnyis bya ba'i sgra sta/ sgra bcuganyis dang bral zhing gzhon nud nang du zhugs pas thub ba nga zhin

pu'i bar gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes btags so zhes byang chub sems dpa' mang shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba btags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ba/nod skyone shAkya 'phel gyi gam du khyer ba dang

ba gnodasbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang phyi'i byanas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dang 'a rkang ba gnyis la gtugs te phyag byas so//

mthong ba dang rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa// lhas kyang chung ba gnyis la gtugs pas 'ad ni lha'i yang lha yan pas gzhon nu'i zhing lha 'a yang lha zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' mang lha' sel lha zhes
bya bar btags so// de nas ra'i rgyal po khrag gtsang ga dgos pa'i dal 'dug nas/ don zab mo'i tshig dang/ ya gi dag shes rab kyis so sor 'dud par byed do// de nas byang chub sa mas

dam shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang a ma'i slob dpon sunimu go cha la yi ge slob bar gtad nas a ga'i slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa' la yi gar sa nas 'phog pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpas smras pa/ 'di ni ngas shes so// de nas des yi ge gnyis dang/ gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas thog pa dang/ byang chub sams dpas smras pa// 'di dag thams cad kyang ngas
shes kyis gzhan dag smos shig/ srin bu go chas smras pa/ 'jig rten na ya sog 'di tsam spyod kyi/ gzhan bdag gso mtshal lo// da nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge dras taM/ sran bu go cha la
ban nas gsungs pa/ yi ga 'di'i ming tsazhi smos de'age/ des smras pa ma 'tshalal/ byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten duganyese shage byung na mngon par 'gyur tu 1 byang chub sems
dang 'a dang 'khor los sgyur ba'o// nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa// srin bu go cha byang chub sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de dobazhin [“]/ ya gi 'ang ni 'jig rtan du gnyis shig
byung na mngon par gyuha/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am 'khor los sgyur 'argyal po'o// byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklubs la/ nam mkha'i ngos la
