gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas bas tshangs pa'i yi ga zhes bya bar gyuto// de nas byang chub sams dpa' yaba'a mthar zhi ba dang/ 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas par bzang len dbalhar

'tsha bcas zhes bya ba 'khong gi slob dpon gan du 'phong ga gnas su gtad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas lnga po rgyang nas phog pa dang/ sgrudrug par phog pa dang/ gzhad du thog pa dang/ ma 'tsho bar
phog pa dang/ tshabs che ba la byang bar gyur to// de nas bzang lan dang lhar bcas pa 'di snyam du sems taM/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di na sAde can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad bslab kyi/

lha sbyin 'di nogadug pa yin pas 'jig rten thams cad duganod par gyur na na mi rung bas 'di la gnad du bsnun pa bslab par ma bya'o// da nas dus gzhan zhig na lha sbyin gyis ngang pa lcags mdas bsnun pa
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stong gi khang bzungs kyagazhi la bzhugs pa de'i pang bar da ltung ngo// danas byang chub sems dar sa bzungs nas mda' phyungasku/ sman gyis phyugs pos
sos so// lha phran gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'/ dang ra 'di'i ngos yongs su bcud ba yan gyis skur cig/ byang chub sems dang sa smras pa/ ngas chos sngar yongs subazung sta gang gi tsho bla na
mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyed pa de kho na'i tsha yongs su bzung ngo/ der byang chub sems dpal lha sbyin gnod sems dang/ bzod pa ma yin pa dang/ phabs lam yan la
byung bar gyur to// de nas lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nulnga brgya byung ba dang/ lha sbyin ras kyis bcings nas/ shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bstsal la// jatsam na byang chub
sems dpa' phyogs der bzhud pa dang/ lha sbyin gyis smras pa// byang chub sams dpa' rtsal sdod/ byang chub sems dpas kyang ras bcangs te/ shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bstsal le//

nga nas lha spyan ras kyis bcings pa dang/ byang chub sems de sa bzung su rkang pa gyen du bstan nas gan skyal du bskyil ba dang/ der yang byang chub sams da pa' la lha sbyin gnod sa mas dang dam bzod/
pa dang bag ma labs pa'i sams gnyis pa skyes par gyur to// de nas shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya mda' gzhu thogs te phyi rol du byung nas tel la tshabs byed pa la zhugs pa dwang/ la lasan/
la gcig phabs so// la las ni gnyis so// lha sbyin gyis nagasum mo// byang chub sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa rong/ shing ta la bdun pags pa las ji srid rlung gis bskyod da

thams cad 'gyel ba'i bar du rgya cher sbyar ro// da nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis 'bab chu ro hita ka'i 'gram na shang dag pa'i snying bo zhes bya ba nyi mgacig mu khru brgyar spyi ba/ mtshan mo
gnas ni mos kyang bcad du rung la/ nyan par na mtshon gyis kyang bcad par mi nus pa zhig yod pa dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis gang bse shange dag la'i snying po rtsa ba stong du ston

nas hi ta'i nang du bcug pa de lta bu'i rlung dang chubrab cig sngal go/ nga rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang/ lags par rab sad kyis thos nas shang 'das grong khyarab rlag par ma gyur ram snyam nas srogachags

brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang/ shing dag ba'ising po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dad/ 'khor brgya stong dpag tu med pas drangs su zin kyang dzatsam na bskyod par yang ma nusaso// 'char kas smras pa//
lha byang chub sams dpa' sgron cig/ rgyal bos smas pa// kho bos gzhon nu la bka' stsal par mi nus so// 'char kas spus pa/ khyad rnams kyis mo'i sgra gsang mthon po sgrogs shig/ nas
kyang ngs byang chub sems dpa' gshegs par bya'o// de nas skya bo' tshogs de rnams kyis/ sgra gsang mthon po dang chen pos ca co'i sgra bsgrags so// 'charake byang chub sems dpa' thad du song ba dang/
( byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'charaka ca co'i sgra 'ad mizhig yani/ 'char kasa rnam pa de dag rgya cher gsol to// da nus byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa// gal te de lta na 'byin du 'dang/ danas

'char ka dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos pa dang/ jitsaman khung nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung ngo// 'char kas byang chub sems dpa' zin par gyur du 'ong ngo zhes ral gri rnon pos skyod pa bcad pa dang/
sprul gyi dug ga/dbugs kyis 'char ka kha thog sa/ da nag por gyur nas de ba mang yang 'char ga nag po zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shang dag ba'i snying po gang na ba der bzhud/

de byin pa dang/ lha sbyin la gsungs pa// khyod kyi stobs ji tsam pa blta As bskyod cig/ lha sbyin gyis 'bad de cung zad cig bstsal to// dga' bos ni cung zad dwangasaso// ji tsam na byang chub sa nas dpa'

stobs kyi nyam song par mdzad cing shang dge ba'i snying po thug gse blangs te/ 'bab chu ro ha ta ka'i 'gram nas 'a dngas do/ byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa// shas ldan dga' ng dag ba'i snying bo 'ang na bsu'i

ba'i rang bzhin yin pa sa mkhris pa'i nad dang/ shwa ba dang/ phol ma'i byung ba la byugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyis dum bur ngos la sbyar tu rang rang gi khyim du zhag shig/ yang du can du glang po chazhag sus pa dang/

de nas yangs pa can gyi la rtsa bya rnams kyis glang po nga mtshan dang ldan pa zhig red nas/ de rnams kyis bsam da/ rgyal bo bras gtsang gi sras mchan sukhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por

'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus grang po che rin po che 'di byang gis deng la de kho na la dbul la sAmamo// de rnams kyis glang po che rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba lasaM ral gyase sar

skya'i gzhi'i phune nas/ rgyal bo'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che'i dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang/ ma ltos te ba/dug pa'i las can lha sbyin par byang ba des glang po che'i dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa ra mthong nas
dedas phrag dog chen po skyes te/ de phrag dog dang ma bzodapa sa pas dras pa/ glang bo che'i dam pa 'di su'i yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa// gzhon nu shAkyathub pa mtshan mkhan rnamA

dos phrag dogachan pa skyas tu/ dgrags kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bor lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang bo cha'ad skyes su phul lo// lha sbyin lhag par ma bzod pa skyes nas smras pa// rje shage da 'khor los sgyur
bar ma gyur par/ khyed cag glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas// jal lcag gas glang po bsad de// ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dras pa// shes ldan
dab glang po bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha sman gyis bsad do// des bsams pa gdon mi za bar 'ad la lha sbyin gyis mthu sud kyis ma la bdag gis kyang b.le'athus da
par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung lta gom pa bdun du bor ro// ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas/ dras pa glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs//
de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ sus bsad/ lha spyan gyis so// 'gron rnams la 'gron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin nam legs pa zhig byas so// phyogs gang du bsad/ la gAr ro//
'di ri sus drud/ dga' bos so// des dgongs pa 'dir gdonami za bar de gnyis i 'del mthu sad kyis ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung sta ra ba'i khar
'phangs pa las ra ba ba rim pa bdun dang 'obs bdumalas bzlas te bor ro// de ltung bas gshong gtod pa glang po cha' gshong glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to// 'dir smras pa/
lha sbyin gyis na glang chen dabang po bsad// dga' bos de na gom pa bdun du drud// byang chub sa mas dpas phyag gas bar snang la/ rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol
rgyang 'dres 'a dngas// mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ gal te gzhon nu 'o bcu gnyis kyi bar du rob tum byang na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang

ma 'di snyam du sams te/ ma la bdag gis 'di la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga thal po cha bzhin de lta na ni de rnams la dga' bas rab tu byung bar ma 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub semA

dpa'i mdun du gos dang/ rgyan gyi phung po bzhag nas sbas pa/ deng khyed kyis shAkya'i bu mo rnams la rgyan dang shos rnams byani cig// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ser skya'i grong khyer du deng gzhon nu gos

dang rgyan rnams skor bar 'gyur gyis shAkya'i bu mo thams cad shog rug rus dril sgrog tu bcug go/ de nas shAkya'i bu mo gzhon nu ma lnga brgya 'ongs pa dang/ thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' gos dang

rgyan rnams byin no// de nas shAkya dbyigs pa can la grags 'dzan ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo yod pa dang/ des de la sas pa/ khyad la sa nga gzhon nu gos dang rgyan rnamA sar bar 'gyur gyis song/ de nas grags 'dzani
ma bdag la byang chung sams dpa' las gzhan su zhig khyer 'gyur snyam du bsams nas/ byang chub sems dad 'a thad du song ba dang/ jatsam na gos dang rgyan thams cad byan zin
nas ci yang ma lus pa dang/ des byang chub sams dpa' ma gul na shani tunadzis shang ran che ba'achu tig phrang cig lus pa mthong nas de da la dga' bas bag 'khum pa mad par rang nyid kyis bkrol te//
rang gi mgul du btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i thad nas song ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bu mo 'di'i phabs shing brtan pa las 'das gzhon nu'i thugs dang

ka bstan par zhus kyis 'di blang bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ grags 'dzan ma bud med kyi 'khor nya kha dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i btsunamor blangs so// rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la

@# smras pa/ song la las kyi mtha' ji tsam pa la ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zas gtsang nas bsgo ba gsanate shing rta bzang bo la zhugs nas/ phyi rol du ba gshegs te yab rgyal po zang gtsang ma'i

las kyis tha' gzagis shange byang chub sems dpa' las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa rnams kyi gan du byon pa dang/ gshol lnga brgya dang zhing rmad cing zhing pa'i mi de rnams kyang gshol gnon cing 'dren pas stobs

nye bar nyams pa/ mgo lus rdul gyis log pa/ rlung dang than ngas lus la gdungs pas lus rtsub cing mdog ngan pa// rkang pa dang lag pa gas pa/ dengs shang dri ma can gyi gos gyon pa/ rkang pa dri ma can/

ltogs pa dang/ skoms pas mdog ngan cang lkog ma dang mkhur ba dang/ mgi ga legs bskams pa dang/ glang de rnams kyang chon pa lcagagazir du rnon po can gyis lus dral bas rgyab dang mdun phyogs khrag gas
chog pa// rtogs pa dang/ sgom pas dbugs brtsa gas shang sang ka'i phogs nas dbugs brtsigs par rang du 'dren la/ ga20shang gas mnan pa'i las rnag khrag 'dzag pa lag sbrang bu dang 'bu'i tshogs zub/

thong lcags kyis rkang pa ma byung zhing kha dang sna nas kha chu dang sna chu 'dzag la sbrang ma dang sha sbrang dang/ sgrung du mchu ranges kyis log pa rnams gzags so// gzabs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod na/
bskyed cing bsags pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i shugs kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so// shes ldan dag khyed su yin/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'o lags so//

jis gsungs pa shes ldan dag myong dang phan chad bran du mi bya/ mngag gzhug par mi bya/ rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar byas/ bde ba la rag pa la gnas shog/ rtsonan pa rnams kyang dkrel nas gsungs pa//

khyad cag kyang deng phan chad rtswa mchog ma nyams pa la za zhing/ chum brkul ma rtogs shing dang ba dag la 'thungasashag khyad la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsal ba ldang bar gyur cig/ de nas byang chub semA

dpa' yang byang ba de nyid kyis/ ya bshAkya zas gtsang gzhang blas kyi mtha' la ba gzigs nas/ snum zhing sngo la 'dab ma 'thug cing grib ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i shing ga gab ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/

ngagu yicu tham pa/// shange 'dzam bu'i grub ma la bzhugs te/ 'dod pa las dben pa sdug pa ma dag pa'i chos rnams las dgon pa// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing/ dban pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba

dang bde ba rdzog pa med pa dang 'ad pa'i bsam gtan dang gol snyoms par bzhugs so// skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' spangs te ma 'gro bar shang gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do// rgyal po zas
gtsangags bsams pa/ byang chub sams dpa'i ming zhig thogs te/ 'di ltar de'i dus las yol gyis bltar 'gro'i zhas de shang rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song// phan tshun du byang chub sems

dpa' chol zhing shang 'dzam bu'i drung du phyin to// de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shange gzhan rnams kyi grabi ma shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/shar phyogs su bab par gyur to// byang chub son

dpa'i mthus shange 'dzam bu'i grib ma na byang chub sems dang 'a sku ma gtong ngo// rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma'i gung yol nagashang gzhan rnams kyi grib ma na shar phyogs su gzhol shar phyogs su 'bad

pa shar phyogs su bab par gyur na shing 'dzam bu'i grabe sa ni byang chub sems dang 'a sku ma gtong ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu na rdzu 'phrul chazhing mthu che ba yin/ 'di lta

kha da nyi ma'i gung yol nas/ shinge gzhan rnams kyi grib ma mishar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur na shange 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sesams dpa' sku mi gtong ba

mtshar che'o snyam mo// de nas dga' ba'i bsti stang byas taM/ byang chub sems dang 'a zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa// ji ltar bltam tshes na g.yos pa ltar// 'dzam bu'i grabi ma khyod
sku ma gtong ba// bla chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di sa// kun gzigs khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzan de las bzhengs nas shang rtar zhugs pa dang/

rje tsag na gter skyong ba/ skra dang kha sladang san mo range ba gtor thogs te byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song sa pa'i nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'ad skad ces gsol to// lha gter 'di rnams bzhes
shag byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'du ba nga ga lha skyes bu gapazhag dus las 'das pa de rnams kyis lags so// byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa// 'di rnams kyase tshog gis/ reshage de rnams kyis

blun po'i yongs su gzung ba byas nas ci zhig bya/ khyad nga la dgos pa med kyis song shage/ chags su brgyud ra sa kyang gsungs pa// gang gse nga la 'ba' gtam smras pa// de dag kyang 'i gtam du gyur pa yin//

bangag kyang sha nas rang po ma thogs par// gzhan dag gi ya nga gtam du 'gyur pa 'ong// de rnams kyis yang sgra phyung ba/ gzhon nu gal te ma bzhes na bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go/ byang chub sem

dang sa phyir bzhugs shag ces gsus pa dang/ de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so// de nas gzhas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'disnyam du se mas te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgya'i stobs
ga/ can Ani modakyi/'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya dgos te/'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po mang rgyan gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas/byang chub sems dpa'i dur khrod kyi nang nas gshegs pa na lha rnamA
! kyis a ri rnam par bcos pa dang/ rnam par nags pa dang/ rnam par 'bus gzhig pa dang/ rnam par bam pa dang/ rnam par zos pa zhig bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas gzugs nas skyo ba 'khru
a so// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' lam gzhan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par byas so// de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi'i bud med kyi tshogs skar

khung dang skar khung dwapa can dang/ ba gam dag na byang chub sems dar la la lta zhing 'dug pa dang/ shAkya dus legs kyi bu mo sa 'tshon zhes bya ba sang ga khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug pa// byang chub
sems dpa' la rtog ban/ rkang pa'i ma tha bos sa bskos te khrag byung yang ma tshor ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ya nga sa 'tsho ma la gags pa na bag ga yas kyis mda' phyamar glags so// kha lo bas lugs

mda' rul ba dang/ de yang phyi mar glags so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'dasnyam du sems te/'di ni gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstan pa ranus so snyam mo// de nas pa la sgyur bas shang rta dwangs ba dang shAkya pa'i bu

kyi sgra'i bu mo rarigs skyes zhes bya bas phyang chub sems dpa' sha nyar zhugs te byon pa mthong ba dang/ mang snang gi khang ba ngas kyi gzhi la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa dkyim 'di'i yum bde zhing/ yab kyang

shazhe tu pade ba man// kye ma gang ba khyim thab 'gyur// bud med de yang mya ngan 'das// skyes mchog bsam gtan pa de yis// mya ngana'adas pa'i sgra gsazhanas// mya ngan 'das pa ni nyid du// mkhyen nas de la thugs dgyes

'gyur// de nas byang chub sanas da pas mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra gsan bas ra degs skyes la dgyes/ mgul nas mu tig phreng gcig phog ste/ 'bangasanas shang rta de la bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad

do brang ba de yang de'i mgul du 'khris par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis na byang chub sams dpa' thugs dang bstun par nus so snyam nas sa mtsho ma bud med 'u khrasebaskor

kha dang/ 'degs skyes kyang bud med nyi khris bskor ba byang chub sems dpa'i btsunamor blangs so// de ltar n grags 'dzin ma dang/ sa mtsho ma dang/ ra dgos skyes la sogs pa btsun mo stong phrag drug cu byung bar

gyur to// mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te byang chung sa nas dar 'a 'o bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du
sams te/ ma la bdag bas byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po chazhagog spyan par bya'o snyam Mnas bal bon no// mtshan mkhan gyis gal te byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba bdun

gyi bar du ma byung na gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lta shin tu yang mang du byan te/ 'di
ltar yang 'du mngon par dga' bas rab tu 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro snyam mo// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'atsho/ la

sgyur ba la kya kha lo sgyur ba de shag bzhon pa pazang po myur du shems shig dang der zhugs nas skyed mos tshul gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di sgyur ba la ba sgo ba/

kha lo sgyu ba'i go bzhon pa bzang po myur du goms shig dang/ der zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro// lha bka' bzhazhi 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur pa la byang chub sems dar lashAkyakhrub pa'i ltar
mnyan nas/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du shims te/ byang chub sams dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkyA thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so// ltakhacabs
kha ba brang po bshams lags kyisaM/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub ra ba zhen pa bzang po zhugs nas/ spyod chos tshal gyi gzhi'i byang ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi rgas 'khogs bzhugs pa/ sgur po lcam dgu po ltar kyang skyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro bu/ de'i ska sa ba ji ltar yang
mi gzhan dag dang ma 'dra ba zhig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs kha/ kha 'kho sgyur ba mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa// sur ro phyan dgu po ltar kyar khyoracan madun nas 'khar

ba la rten rung lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba de' ska sa pa ji ltar yang mi gzhan dang mi 'dra ba ci yan/ lham 'dams pa zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sbyar ba rgyas pa zhes bya ba 'di ru yin/ lham 'di rang de ma thog/

pa khonar 'gum ra ra 'gyur bas/ de rgas pa zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rga ba' chos dang rgya pa'i chos 'di las ma 'das sam/ lha yang u0f7c ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so// kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir

shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo/ 'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas/ nga rgya ba las ma 'das so zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o// kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir sgyur nas pho brang nyid du
chas te/ der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang nang du byon nas/ nga yang na ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig cas mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so// 'dir smras pa/ dar ya la rgyas shing
sgrar la mgo skya pa// lag na 'khar ba thogs pa 'a ma gzigs nas// 'ang de dag cha las ma 'das cas grag ces// de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad// de nas rgyal po zas
gtsang gas kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba mu gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyong mos rgyal gyi gzhir byung ngam/ skyed mos tshal la mngon ra ra dga' 'am/ lha ma lags so//
da cha'i slad du zhe na/ lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs pa na mi rgas 'khegs gtugs pa sgur po phyom dgu po ltar kyar khyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rtenatsang lus 'dar zhing
lca// ma la/ de'i sas ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang ma 'dra ba zhig ga lags so// gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kha lo sgyur ba mi rgas
'khogs gtugs pa/ sgur po dzam dgu bo ltar kyar khyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten dang lus 'dar zhing 'gro la/ de'i sku sa ba/ ji ltar na nga mi gzhan dang ma 'dra ba 'ad pa yin/de la bdag
gas 'di skad ces gsol to// lha 'di rgyas pa zhes bgyi'o// de 'dra skad ces gsung ste/ kha lo sgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gsa'adaskad ces gsol to// lham 'di ring
po ma thogs pa kho na 'gum par 'gyur bas lha de ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o// de 'di skad ces gsung// kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rga ba'i chos dang rga ba'i tshes nyid las ma 'das sam/de la bdag gis

'di skad ces gsol to// lha yang rga ba'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so// de 'di skad ces gsung ste/ kha lo sgyur ba de'i bya shang rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo// 'di ltar

pho brang du phyin nas nga rga ba las ma 'das so zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par byago/ lha gzhon nu du pho brang gi nang du gshags// de nas rga ba las ma 'das pa lta shag ces ma dgyes shing thugs ngan/
dgos so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram zer rnams kyis tshig yang dag par bden par ma 'gyur grang/ gzhon nu sku dang kha spu bregs
tagos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byang bar 'gyur du 'ong gis ma la bdag gse gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po chazhag ban la nas

kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dar 'ashAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che byon te ci nas kyang
'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so// 'dir sa pa/ kha lo sgyur pa'i tshig de thos pa dang// gzhon nu la na yib de dogs gzhen na// de tsho nyar dga' nags su mi 'gro'i phyir//

'dod pa'i yon tan ltar bcos mang du byon/ de nas chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs ra ra bzhed pa gyur pa de'i tshe/kha lo sgyur ba kyi kha lo sgyur pa ra shig bzhon pa/
bzang po myur du shoms shag/ dal nga zhon nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsungs pa 'gyur bas de nas byang chub sems da pas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs ra/ kyi kha lo sgyur ba shag bzhon pa
bzang bo myur du shoms shig/ de la nga zhon nas bskyod mos tshal gyi gzhir gzhugs so// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bar byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pab ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bar
po bshamasaMti/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad sa gsogato// lha babs ba bzang po bshams lags na/
lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pabazhon pa bzang por zhugs nas/ skyed mos tshul gyi gzhir byang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'

shAkya thub pas mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung pa dbang po nyams pa// skye bo mang po'i mag gas blta mi phod pa zhigagazig gas so// gakhrags nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa// (khasgyur ba mi skya ba

chab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba dang nga po nyams pa skya bomang bo' mis gas blta ma yod pa 'di ci yin/ lha 'di ni sngond kyi thabs pa zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sgyur ba bro nad kyi thobs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin lhami
'di gang gas 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gnas de gti/ lca'ad na phyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sgyur ba nga yang nad kyi chos dad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha yang snyan gyis tshes dang/

snyan gyi tshes nyid las ma 'das so// kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shAng rta phyir sgyur cig/ pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo/ 'od ltar pho brang du dbyin nas/ nga nad las ma 'das zhes bya ba'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o// kha 'a

sbyor bas shing rta phyir sbyar nas/ pho brang nyid du chas to/ der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gnang du gshegs nas bdag kyang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs
si// 'ar smras pa// mi lus rade skya bo rbab rbab po// rang dbang mang pa'i nad thebs 'dir gzigs nas// nad las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces// de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad

nga nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi kha lo sgyur ba la sbas pa/ kha lo sgyurd kyi gzhon nu yade dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/bskyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/lha ma lags

so deci'i slad du zhen/ lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na/ ma skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa skyilo mang po'i mag pa/sa lta mi bod pa zhig gakhrig/saso// gakhrags nas

kyang bdag la bka' sul pa/ kha lo sgyur ba mi skya bo rbab rbab po 'dor nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa skya bo mang po'i zhig gis lta mi phod pa 'di su an/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// lta 'din
bro nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o// da'adi skad ces gsung ste/kha 'kho sgyur band kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yan/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// mi 'di gang gnod pa 'das 'gus pa'i

gnas mchis te/ lha de na dris thob pa zhes bgyi'o// de'ang skadachas gsung sku/ kha 'kho sgyur ba nga yang nad kyis chos dang nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/de la bdag gis 'di yang rtses gsol to// lta yang

snyan gyi chos dang snyan gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so// de 'ad skadatsus gsung// kha lo sgyu'od de'i phyi'i shangarta phyir sgyur cig/ pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo// 'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas ngand las ma 'das
zhes grag pa'i donod nyid bsam par bya'o// gzhon nu de pho brang gzhung du gshegs nas [“]nga yang nad las ma 'das lo lta zhig ces mi dgyes shang thugs ngan dgongs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma
'dasnyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas khan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden pa ra ma 'gyur grang zhes bya pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// 'da'i skyas pa/de'
ga' nas ba dag 'dor ma gzhug phyir// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang// reg bya yad du 'ong ba gtso rnams kyi// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bo de bzhin no// chos nyid kyise byang chub sems

dang 'a shAkya thub pa bskyang tshos tshul gyi gzhiragshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kha la sbyar ba la bka' stsal pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin// byang chub sems da pa' shAkya thub par s kha dog sna tshog

las byas pa'i bla res bris pa dang/ khyogs khyer ba dang/ mdunan mo sgron thogs pa dang/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang/ bud mad sku bshag pa rnams du zhang rjes bzhin du 'brang ba zhig
gzagegs so// garngags nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs ma/ kha lo sgyur ba rdzas kha dogs tshegs byas ra 'a bla res byas pa dang/ phyogs khur ba dang/ mdun nas ma sgron thogs pa dang/ sku ba'i
zlachogags chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang/ bud mar ska bshab pa rnams du zhing rjes bzhin du 'brang ba 'di ci yin/ lha 'di ni gus pa zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sgyur ba sha ba zhes bya ba 'ad cu yin lham

'das sman chad sdug pa'i pha mas mthong zhing bu mo dang/ bu mo dang/ bran po dang/ bran mo dang de las brgyad pa dang/ zho shas re cho ba'i mi rnams kyang ma lag so la/ de dag gse snyan chad 'ad mi mthong
bas lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sgyur ba nga yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'ba' chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha yang 'a ri ba'i sa dang 'chi ba'i chos nyani las ma 'das so// kha 'thosgyur ba

de'i phyir shing rta pa re sgyur cig/ pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo// 'di ltar nga pho brang du dzan nas nga 'chib las ma 'das zhes grag nga 'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o// kha lo sgyur bas shing rta pa'i sbyar na
pho brang nyid du chas ta der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang 'chib las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongasaso// 'dare sa ra//
tshe khrag dang bas 'du shes bral gyur cing// sems med ma yi ro zhage gzab sa nas ni// 'che las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces// de nas e dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad//de nas rgyal po/
zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba losas ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa na snga ma bzhin no// 'dare sa nga/ grong byar dam pa dpal ldan yade 'ong dar// lA yi lhar gyur sgron ma dang mtshungs dang// 'dod

pa'i yon tan lnga dngos kunodagyas dang// mag stong dga' ba'i tshalanagazhes pa bzhin// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dang 'a ni rgyu'i stobs can yin

mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgyan bsgrub par bya dgos/ 'ang ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas/nga rnams kyis ma skra bregs shing gos ngur smig gyon pa lag pa lhung byed thigs pa zhig/
khyim nas khyim dang/ khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig sprul to// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhi'i gshags par bzhed par gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni

snga ma bzhin no// bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smig gyon pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyi'i dang/ khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing/

'gro ba zhig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang kha tshosgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha 'alo sgyur ba mi skya brag shang lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang/ khang pa nas khad par rgya zhing 'grol/ 'di'i gos kyang kha dog ma mtshungs

ji ltar yang na gzhan dag ga dang mi 'dra ba mi yin lhad ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sgyurab rib tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yani/ lharab tu byung ba nga na dul ba lags pa dang yang da pa par sdom pa lags pa/
dang 3ngon spyod pa legs pa dang/ chos spyod pa legs pa dang/ dge ba spyod pa lags pa dang/ dge legs spyod ra ra ragi nas/ su dang kha spu bregs te/ gos dur ga bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho

nas khyim nas khyim med nga ra rab tu byang ba ste/ lha 'di ni reb tubyung ba zhig bgyi'o// kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyi shade na bad reb tu byung ba gang ba de logs su sgyur cig/ lcabaka' bzhina'atshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas

byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i lor mnyan nas shange rta de rab du byung ba gang na ba der sgyur to// de nas byang chub sems dapo' shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kyani khyod

ru'i pha'i sa drags shing lag pa na lhang bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang khang pa nas khang pa ra rgya zhang 'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ji ltar yang ma gzhan dgag dang ma 'dra ba ni
ngas 'di skad cas pas so// gzhon nu bdag na rab tu byang ba zhes bgyi'o// kya ni khyod ji ltar n rab tu byung ba zhes bya/ gzhon nubadagags dul ba lags pa dang/ yang dag par dom pa lags pa dang/
don sbyod pa 'a gas de dang/ chos spyod pa legs pa dang/ dag pa spyod pa legs ra dang/ dge legs spyodir legs par rag nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa re nas

khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// kya ma khyod kyis dul ba 'a gas pa dang/ yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang/ ngon spyod pa legs po dang/ chos spyod pa/
legs pa dang/ dge ba stod pa legs pa dang/ dge legs spyod pa legs par rag nas/ skadang kha spu brags te gos ngur smig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu

byung ba lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pos kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa// kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyi'i sgyur cig/ pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo// 'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas don

'o de kho na bsam par bya'o// kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir sgyur nas/pho brang nyid du chas te/ der pho brang nyidi dugshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa kye ma 'o bdag ni skra dang kha spu brag
te gos dur smag bgos nas dad pa dang dag pa kho nas byas nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa'i don de nyid dgongs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gas kha lo sgyur pa la

smras pa la sogs pa na snga ma bzhin no// de nas skyadagu'i bdag mo chen mos rmi lam rmis pa// dbang po'i tog ltung ba dang/ shAkya rnams phyag dar gyis khebs pa dang/ sa ldog pa dang/ dpal khyim nas byang ba dang/

phyi rol na skad cig rdug du zhang dgong pa la bdag nyid lta ba dang nyi ma gang nas shar ba de de nas nub pa'o// byang chur sams dpas dogasan pa dang/ dgongs pa nga meshAkya rnams kyi dbang po'i tog/
gnas yin pa dang/ nga grong khyer nas 'byunganadapal 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang rmi lam rmis pa dpal gyi mal khri chag pa dang pha'i rgyud chad pa'o/ byang chub sems dpas de

( gsan pa dang/ de da bzhin te/ nga ni grags 'odzan ma'i dpal gyi gzhas su gyur pa dang/ zas gtsang ma'i ral ba rigs brgyud kyi gnas su gyur pas nga rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi rigs brgyud chad par 'gyur
ro/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du gal te gzhon nu zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tum phyung na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/
'di skad ces kyang smras te/ gal te de ni bzang bo gzags bzhed na/ de'i slad dgung bdun bar du srungs shig dang// ma dbang gdugatso ni bdal bar gyurayaM ltagi/ rin chen sna bdun 'byung bar/
0 the tshom med// khyod sras ran chen bdun po yi// dbang phyug ga ni rgyal por 'gyur// rgyam tsho la mthug pa'i sa// chad pa med pas skyong bar 'gyur// 'on tes na spangs nas su// bsAngs mang/
nags su bzhud na ni// thams cad mkhyenapa thob gyur nas// 'gro ba sgrol bar mdzad par gyur zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rdas gtsang dang/ bras dkar dang/ bre bo zas dang/ bdud rtsi zas bzhi lhan cig

gcig tu tshogs gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na/'khor los

sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis de lta bas na bdag gas byang chub sems dpa' zhag bdun gyi bar du bsgoms te bsrung bar bya zhing grong khyer yang legs par srung bar bya'o// de nas de rnams kyis sar

skye'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rim pa bdun dang/ 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor nas/ grong khyer gyi sgo 'phar lcags las byas shang sgo bar rnams la dra'i bu ban tu sgra gsal ba btags te sgo phya na de'i sgras

dar ga tshadagacig kho ra khor yug tu grag pa 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dang 'a khang bzangs kyi gzhin bud med de 'phrog pa/ gzugs bzang ba rnams dang/ garadang/ ga dang/ rol mo rnams kyi rtsod pas bstan
bkur byed du bcug go/ sanga'an tu che ba spor rung ba mi lnga brgyas bteg pa byas so// sa pa sngags ldan gyis phyogs ni zangs ma'i glegs dus g.yog shang gser gyi sa'i khrol gyi dwa ba btags pas//
khya/ bskore'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni stong ga khang bzangs kyi gzhaskyes pa med par zhugs nas/ba thang dang/ gling budang/ 'khar rnga dang/ sgra bar n la sogs pa
shu rol mo'i che pyad dag rtakhar lan cing 'byor ba chen pos bzhugs so// mtshan mo'i rgyal po zas gtsang yang dapung gi tshogs yan lagakhazhi dang/ shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go/ lte phyogs
( na'i zas// nub phyogasazhanazas dkaro// byang phyogs nan bdud rtsi zas so// grong khyer gyi dbus kyi 'dram po byed pa kishAkamang can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'o//
shar sgor song nas smras pa/su zhig mal tshe byed/ su zhigamal tsa byed/ rgyal po zas gtsangags smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do// lha malatsamadzod cig/ mal mdzod dang khyod la
legs par 'gyur zhes sus nas/ tshig gas su bcad du smras kha/ 'jig rten gnyid log dang mtshungs// gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song// 'di ni mi nyal rtag tu mkhas// de bas ma nyal mal
byas// lce skor song nas smras pa/su zhag mal tshe byad/ bra bo zas kyis smras pa/ kho bo malartsakhyad do// lha mol rnamadzod cig/ mal rtsamadzodadang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas

tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten gnyid log rodang mtshungs//ga nyidi lo bo bdud kyi dbang du song/ ga nyidi kho 'chi bdag dbang du song// dbas ma nyal ma la byas// skul skor song na smras pa su zhage mal po byad//
09 zas dkar gyis smras pa/ kho bemal tshe byed do// ltamal tsamadzod cig/ malatsamadzod dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gnyid log pa ni rtag tu
myos// myos 'gyur bra bos 'thungs pa nyal// dgon pa nags su nyal ba 'dras// dbas mnyalamal ci byos// byang sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhigamal tsa byed su zhig la byed/
bdud rtsi zas kyis smras pa// kho bo mal tsabyed do// lha mal tse mdzod cig/ malatsamadzod dang khyod la legs par 'gyur zhes smras nas/ gas su bcad de smras pa/ ri nyalar sul nyal ba bzhin/

rgya mtsho'i churan nyil ba bzhin/ de bas ma nya2mal tshe byos// dbus kyi gzhi mdo dang sum mdodag tu song nas smras pa/ su zhig mal tshe khyad/ su zhag mal du byad/ srungs ma rnams kyi smras pa/ bdag cag
mel rtsi bgyid do// mol tshe byes shage/ mal ni gos dang legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ chos spyodachos ma yin m spyod// bden pa smos shag brdzun sgra/
mun pa chen por 'jug par 'gyur/ de bas ma nyal mal rtsi byas/ de nas nam nas nas/ shAkya mang chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha dgung sangs lags// dgung bdun la dgung
gcig na thal/ dgung drug ni lus so// rgyal po zas gtsang gse smras pa/ lags kyis zhag drug 'das nas/ gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur bar gyuran/ bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu bde gling/
bzhir phyi bzhin 'dong ngo// de bzhin du dgung gcig lus so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dasnyam du sams te/ me dbang shAkya'i sras po/
thub pa 'di// bdag nyid chen po pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// thub rnams dbyas par mdzad pa dka' thub 'tshal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su gshags par bzhed// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag la gzhan dag gzhon nu kya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir grags 'dzin ma dang/ sa mtshom dang/ ri degs skyas dang/
bud med drug khri spangs nas/ rab du 'byung ngo zhes gzhi des kha zer bar 'gyur du 'ong gse/ ma la bdag gis grags 'dzan ma dang 1 lhan cig dga' dgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas//
des grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cug dga' dgur spyad pa dang/ grags 'dzanam sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de 'dasnyam du sems te/ nam langs nas byang chub sams dpa' snyan du gsol
losnyam mo// de nas byang chung sams dpas de'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa ( bud mad dang khyim bdag nyal ba'agi/ rtsam deng gi 'di yin te/ phyin chad
khyim du bud med dang// nga ni lhan cig mi gnas so// de nas bud med de rnams gar dang glu dang rol mos ngal zhing lul dub nas/ kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing sku zhig la gos dang lag pa dang lhag par
tang nas/ brla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log go/ byang bsams dang sa bud med de dag thams cad kha nas kha chu 'dzabagacing sku zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas/
brlaba'atsheg byung rgyal du brdolo zhing gnyid log pa gzages so// gzags nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes so// de nas byang chub sams dba' skyo ba 'khrungs pa dang/ tshigs su
bcad de gsungs la/ rlung gshugs kyis pad+ma'atshol ltar s gzhi 'a'i/ lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas 'gyel gyur te/ skya rnams zhag cing mdoms dang rkub kyi phyogs snang ba// shAkya'i sras

kyis gzigs nas rang bzhin skyo bar 'gyur// tshul dang bral ba'i bud med na chung tshogs 'di dag/ dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin 'drar mthong nas/ gsems can byas pa'i spyod pa'i yul la dang dga'

na// sams dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yin nam// 'dod pa thachad 'dam dang mda' mdud dug ma 'dra// rmilam lta bu yin tanonu'ired nga mtshungs// 'dod pa phung bad rtsod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa//
mtha' ngan sbrul kyi kha 'dra bdag gis spang bar bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa'/ gzims mal chen po la gzigs pa na mtshan mo de nyid la rmi lalnga rmis/ sa chen pa nyid gzims mal du

byas shing/ rirab ri'i rgyal bo dbu rten du bcug/ phyag ga son pa shar phyogs kyi rgya mtshon po 'jug/ phyag g.yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po 'jug/ zhabs gnyis rgya mtshochen por 'jug pa dang/
'greng ba zhes bya ba'i rtswa 'i rags lta ba nas byung nas nam mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang/ bya kun nas dkar lamago gnag pa rnams kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas
pus mo'i lha nga la zugag bar du lta ba dang byasna tshogs phyogs pa nas 'ongs nas/ mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ ma gtsang ba'i lo'i stong na bdag nyidi mi gtsang bas ma gos par 'jug pa'o//

da lta rmis nas kyang thugs dgyas te dgongs la/ nga'i rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis pas ring po ma thogs pa kho ra khra named pa'i ya shas thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo// grags 'dzan mas kyang rmi lam du mthong ba/
bdag gso kun lhags pa dang// dung gi dpung ba chag pa dang// zla ba sa la lhung ba dang// skar ma rnams n ngu ba'o// grags 'dzanims rmi lam rmis pa de byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa dang/
byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa// khyod kyi so na kha nang gnas// zla ba 'di ni mkhar gnas kyis// yod kyi gdung ba bsal nas ni// dogs med bde bar gnyid log cig/ de nas grags 'dzin
ma 'di snyam dusams te/ rmi lam 'jagis pa rmis pas na// bdag yid dogs dang bcas par gyur// dang ga mtshan mo sdug pa dang// 'bral ba dag tu mi 'gyur grang// de nas lha'i dbang po
kyi brgya byin 'di snyam du sams to/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ji ltar rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya dgos te/ 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rgyun gyi stobasal
00 ltos so snyam nas/ byang chub sems dar 'a gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ khang bzag gzhi la 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// nags kyi spre'u ni spyod tshul rgyu/
'dra zhing/ tshan par 'dug pa'i spre'u dang 'dra ba'i thugs// gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlag na// dalasashin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs// blo gros bzang po bzhengahashago bzhengs//
sa naspangs te bzhud mdzod la// thams cad mkhyen nyid b.res nas na// 'gro ba dag na bsgrol bar mdzod// byang chub sems dpas gsungs la/ko'u shaka ma mthong ngam// nga na ri dgas bdag po rgyas

bskor ltar// mi mthu ldan gzhu mtshon ral gri thogs// rtaglang shang rta da pung tshogs mang po las// grong khyer sar skya kun nas yongs su bskor// khrus gtsang la sogs shAkya'i tshogs 'di dag/ glang chen rta

zhon legs par go khagos lus// ma sdug sna tshogs lag na mtshon thogs te// khyams dang rta babs khang bzangs gzhan ng ba/nas// pho brang dang nakhyim sgo dang// dbazhi'i grong khya sgo dag dang// bcasanas

gnas la dam bcug ste// de bzhin kun nas bsrungs bar gyur// ru dung pa Ta ha dang rnga sgra yis// khyams dang rta babs khang bzangs nang gnas shing// glang chen rta dmag 'bad pa'i skye bo'i tshogs// rgyun dung mi gtang

phyi'i srung bar byed// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ des na mar la mdzad kyis lung bstan dang/ sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'jig rtan 'ad deng sang// khyed kyi sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs mdzod la// khab dag spangs
tings lapa'i byung bar mdzod// ji ltar khyed na bgags med par// deng nyid nags su gshags 'gyur ba// bdag cag tshangs sogs bcas pa la// lha rnams kyis 'di bzhin bgyi//
byang chub sems da pas legs so zhes gsungs nas/ thugs dgyes par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnyid kyis myos par byas nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chan po lngas

zatshan la bsgo ba/ grogs po byang chub sems dpa' snang gi khang bzangs nas 'bab kyis skas lang shagi/ des skas blangs pa la byang chub sems dpa' babs pa dang/ de nas brgya bun gyis brda byas la thag tu
nam ring ba 'dun pa gang na ba deragashagasan/ jitsam na 'dun pa gnyid stug pos non pa gakhrags nas/ byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslang nas tshigasasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs la/ 'dun ra

longs kyi khyim nas myur du ni// nga na rta pho rana chen basngags ldan long// sngon gyi rgyal bas longs spyad dka' thub tshal// thub rnams dgyes par mdzad par da gshags so// 'dun pa gnyid log pa'i mag phyi nas
smras pa/ lha khyod skyed mos tshal gyas dus ma bab/ des n khyod dang 'ga' ya len ma mchis// khyod la dag po su yang ma mchis na// dgung phyad khyod la bcibs ngas ci zhig bgyi// byang chub sems dpas
bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa khyod kyisal 'ga' yang// nga yi tshiganam bcag na/ ngas dang dus thamal// nga yatshig 'damagacog shage/ 'dun bas khagasol ba/ gzhon numtshan mo 'di//
na 'jigs pa dang/ 'jigs su rung ba mchis pas bdag bcibs pa ma len no// byang chub sems da pas dgongs la/ lan dang yang lan gyis gdon ma za bar skye bo sad par 'gyur gyis//

bdag nyid songal rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan sta gon bya'o snyam nas/ de nyid kyis pho brang gi sgo phyi nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan gzung bar brtsams pa na/ mde kyog byed la phar 'bros tshur 'gros
shaji 'dug tu ma btub po// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod zhams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ 'khor lo dang/ bkra shas dang/ g.yung drung 'khyal ba mnga' bo/ skrag pa
rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa/ bsngags ston tham yin khur sing ste/ dka' thub nags sum thogs nga skyol cig/ byang chub thob nas myur du 'gro ba kun//
bsam gtan rnam thar char gyis tshim par byas// chos nyid kyis dud 'gro yang gdams na phyi lang ma byed pas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan ma g.yo bar 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sin dpar thugs
dgyes pa skyes taM/ rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bstad de// ji tsam shAs mang chen 'dram po byed pa skya bo nyul zhing phyogasader phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems da pa' gshags par chas pa mthong
denas skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas sdus pa/ gzhon nu 'di mdzad/ mang chen 'gro'i// gzhon nu'adani rigs pa ma lags so// byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/
mang chen 'di ni rigs pa yin te/ gang gi phyir ngas bskal pa grangs mad pa gsum du dka' brgya stong dums sems can rnams kyi denadu byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na
du mi khyim na 'dug yod dam/ 'di ni ngas dka' thub kyi tshul du 'gro'o// gang zhig 'bar ba'i khyim chen las// mkhas rnams myur du 'byung ba la// legs min sla bar ma'os kyi// den bsngogs par 'os
nyid yin// de bzhin rgand 'chib pas// rab 'bar srid pa'i gzab 'alasan// 'byung bar 'dod gyur gang yanal// 'dir name gis tsazhig mthong// daltar gsung drag pos spos pa dang/ mang chen gdong las
mchim char bzhin du 'bab cing dachongs 'dabs la la zhugs te kyi hud dang du rgyal po zas gtsang dang/ shAkya dpag na thams cad kyis// yang dang yang du bsams pa ya// rong 'bras bum da par gyur//

dang du rgyal po zas gtsang ni// sras kyi mya ngan gyis gdungs pas// lag bsrung bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing// mi bzad sgra 'byin par 'gyur// sa mtsho grags 'dzin ri dgas skyes// de bzhin pa tsun mo 'kher

rgyas pa 'ang// don grub dang ni bral ba yis// in yusdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// zhes smras nas/ de sngangs pas grags 'dzan ma bslang ste smras pa// don grub 'di'i gshegs gyur gyis// khyim thab sdug bsngal gyis gdungu

ba nas sdug bsngal nyam thag dum 'ong// khyim thab sdug pa de klog shog/ khyod kyi khyim bdag gshags 'gyur 'di'i mthong dka' ste// khyod kyis 'di ltes khyim thab mthong sa'i pha ma yin// kyi dud phongs pas bdag gsi mtshan mo khus btab kyang

sus kyang lan ma ster bas bdag gis mnyis so// des nadi ltar khus btab kyang// 'di ltar lhan ms byin rlabs kyis// dgon pa ra lo de dngos pa bzhin/kha ba yang thos par ma gyur to// danas byang chub sems da pa ba 'ad snyam du

dgosataM/ gang bdag gas ya ba lam bltas par 'gro ba na/nga'i tshul dang mthun pa ma lano// snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang la gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyis non par gyurato// de nas 'ad/

snyam du dgongs te/jaltar ng 'jig rtan thams cad kyi par gyur cing 'jig rtan gyi bla ma dang 'jig rten gyi thu bo yin mod kyi/ de lta na yang pha dang ma ni skyes bu'i slob dpon du gyur pa dang/ lhar gyur dang/ tshangs par gyur pa yin/

'de shin tu phan pa byed pa yin no snyam du da gong sa nas 'dab kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de bskor ba lan gsum mdzad nas/ 'di skadatses bdasungasaso// bdag kyang yod la btsar ldan zhing// bdag kyang nye du rnams la
dga'/ 'on kyang 'khor bar ng bzhin ngan// 'di ma 'ongs na mchi lags// gal tog nad 'chab dang// sdug nga 'i gnyen bralas byung ba' ]/gnod byed sdug bsngal m mchis na// khyadan slong bar su zhag bcad//

gang phyir mi 'dod bzhin du na// rab chaganyen gyi da kyil 'khor dang// mdza' bshes chung ma dbang drug rnams// yun mi ring bar 'kher bar 'gyur// da bsam chags yadi kyis na// 'khor ba las na rnam grol phyir//

brtsor ldan nye du spangs nas ni ]/skya bo med nag sa stan pa lags// lus can 'du ba nges bar na// mthar na'i bral 'gyur 'di lags pas// bdag ni rjes su dgongs nas na/rmongs pas thub sa na ma mdzad cig/
cas gsungs nas chas so// de nas mang chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la bsang ste smras pa/ don grub 'di'i bzhud lags kyis// sa bdag de ni bzlog par mdzod// sras kyimya ngan
gyis thebs nas// sdug bsngal gyis gdungs bshums 'gyuramachi// ma thos dad yang gnyid ma sad do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya bzhi byase lha'i bu myu gu dang ]ang ku ra dang/ 'od gzer
can dang/ lo ma gyon bo sa bzhi la smras pa/ grogs po dal khyod rnams kyis byang chub sems da pa' ga dag par zhus sam/ da rnams kyis skyas pa/ shin tu yang nus lags so// khyed rnams la stobs ji
yo ma gus smras pa/ bad pa gas na sa la ra ji snyad yod pa de phrag pa gcig tu thogs te/ nyam nga ba rlung dus 'gro nus pa tsam gyi stobs yod do// mang ku ras smras pa/ bdag gis kyang sa la chung

yod pa thams cad brag pa gcig tu thogs nas 'gro nus so// 'od gzer can gyis smras pa/ bdag gse kyangs la rdul ja snyad yod pa de thams cad rlag par thogs te nyam nga ba chung du 'gro nus so// lem khyen pas/

smras pa/bdag gas kyangs la rtswa dang shangadang la ga dang lo ma ji snyad bde thams cad phrag pa gcig tu thob/sa te/ nyam nga ba chung dus 'gro nus so// brgyad dun gyis sa pa/ grogs po dag stobs 'di dang ldan na/ byang chubs mas

dpar ga gdeg pang nus kyis/ de nas myu gu dang/ mang kur dang 'od gzar can dang/ lo ma gyon pa ste bzhis chibs rin po sngags ldan khyerade/ byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/ byang chub mA

dpa' su la bzhugs/ deshas byang chub sems dpa' 'dasnyam du dgongs te 'di rnams na bdag cag gse byang chub sems dpa' ba zhig ste/ bar snang la khyer ro zhes dregs pa skye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ byang chub sems dang 'a

rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ da rnams kyas bsgul bar ya ngam zhus nas/ ngo mtshar skyes te gsol pa/gzhon nubadag cag gisan byang chub sems dpa' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra ba mnga' bar ma 'tshal to/

'di nas byang chub sems dpa' chibs rin po che bsngags ldan la bcibs/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lta'i sa thus chabs rin po chu bsngags ldan dang/

bdun pa steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags so// de nas brgya bzhi dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ byang chub

sams dpa' bskor cing dong sta/ g.yas phyogs nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams spyod lam zhi ba dang/ g.yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyis rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bskyang nas/lta'i rol mo'i khyad par

snyatshogs dang/ mdun nas brgya bzhi dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rang rang gi spyod lam gyis dong ngo// nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i lha brgya stong du mas ni/byang chub sems dera'i stong nas/lha'i ma tog u

la dang// pad+ma dang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor ro// a ka ru'i phyi ma dang/ tsanadan gyi phye ma dang/ tam la 'dab ma'i phyi ma dang/ lha'am tog mnar bas kyang gtor to// lha'i rol
byug/ mo'i cha byad sna tshogs kyang brdungs so// gos rnams kyang gtor ro// 'dir snyasapa/ mkha' lta rnams ba/zha'i sgra chen 'byin byed la// dga' ba'i yid kyis gos kyi

g.yab mos bde bas byed cing// kha cig byung chub sems dpal ba stod byed da// nam mkha' lan sor mo brgya phrag sgyur bar byed// kha cig dag na sgo rnams 'byed byed cing// ma tog man+da ra bas sa 'ther bar
byed/ kha cig dga' ba bis pa'i chung 'dzin ming// pad bar gshags la rtog cing rjes bzhin 'brang/ kha nug dag kyang g.yas nas rdzas bzhin 'brang// g.yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rdzas bzhin 'byung

brgya byind bzhi tshangs par bcas pa dang// lus ngan bdag nyidi shul na mchon par byed// zla ba nya ba rgyu skar tshogs kyis ltar// bdag nyid chen po lha tshogs ma dun bdar nas// bka' thub nags na thub rnams
dbyas khyad pa// 'phags pa dgyes pa 'anags su thugs dgyas gshags/ dazhis byang chub sems da pas bsngags ldan la da dung gas phyung ba'i phyi'i gsungs pa/ ma skyo ma skyo stebs
nakhe zung bar gyis// 'gro don la ba gtsagan de rang long// ma ring byang chub thob nas 'gro ba rnams// bsam gtan rnam thar gyis tshim byed por bya// byang chub ba mas da pa' dpag tshad bcu gnyis su/

bzhud nas nang par grong khyer dang mad du byonato// de nas lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' byun gnas / 'dasar yang rang ba grong khyer du 'jug par ma 'gyur ram snyam pa la/ sku thams cad kyis ga yas phyogs su
glang 'alta stangs kyis gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa yi// lam gyis chog nas thob par// grong khyer sar skya'i gzhirar// ni'ajug bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs so// danas byang chub
sems dpa'i zhabs la bskorab lan gsum byas nas rang rang gi gnas su song ngo// byang chub sams dpas chabs las babs te rgyan bkrol nas 'dun pa la bka' stsal ba/ 'dunangs rgyan dang rta khyer la gyur/

songashog/ 'dirisnyas pa/ kha lo sgyurang khyedanga'i 'di dang/ rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnya' ba dag la ni// dga' dod ba rgya chen spangs nas su// da ltar 'danyid du narang 'byung bya// 'dod bkad spu gri'i so 'dra zhing//

me 'obs 'bar dang mtshungs shing mtha'o ngan pa// 'jig rtan phan phyir snying rjes ngas spangs te// dgon pa song nas khyim gyi bar mi ldog/ de nas 'dun pa gdong pa mchis char bzhin 'bab pas byang bsams
dpa' la gsol pa/sangag stag gas ba ltatsha ba dang// phyugs rjes ba las nga 'i nags tshal du// 'ba' shag sku gnyan dang bral bas// 'phags pa ji ltar spyod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang sa
gsungs pa/skya dgu 'di'i skyal 'ong gcig bu skya/ bzhin 'gan 'ang gcig du 'bar 'gyur// 'dazhigatsug dus sdug bsngal myong 'gyur gyi// 'khor ba la zhi grogs yod ma yazhin// 'dun pas gsol
ba kyi dedud gzhonanus sdug bsngal la gzigs te// zhabs 'jam glang chen rta la khabs goms pa// sa gzhi rtswa dang rdobs ba ltag rtsub bar// ji ltar zhabs kyis gshags shing nags su rgyu// byang chub
samasad pas gsungs ba// 'a bdag 'jags pa da lan 'ga' yang// skyed la btsam med bde bar goms lamin// mgon bcas laman rigs btsun la ma yin// dpa' dang
btson ma'i skya bo da ga' la mni// cha bas 'chi bdag 'jigs pa dag/ bskyed nas 'ongs par 'gyur zhes grag/ donom byas shing ma brtsams pa ra// 'chi bar yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'dun pas
gsol pa/ rgyal bo bgras po ni sras kyi mya ngan gyis 'grongs par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang bkyatshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun pa'i tshig thugs la ma bab po/

danas byang chub sems dpas ut+pal sngon po 'dra ba'i ral gri shubs nas phyung nas ga dus gdud brags rta/ stang gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya ba'i gyis blangs nas bkur sti chan

bo byas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer nas gtsug phud kyimachod pa chen po btsugs so// de nas lha'adibang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sams te/gzhon nu'i rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis
'das bzlog par mi nus so snyam nas dga' bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la gsungs pa/ khyed kyis bsngags ldan pho brang gi nang dum bkril ga/ da skad ces gsungs pa dang/

'dun pa skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang nas/ rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan khridi de/ yang dang yang du byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhange song ste/ ser skya'i gzhir yun pa dang/ dar ca co skyes te/ jitsam na

0 rgyal po zas gtsang ma la snyas pa/lha gzhon nu bde gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/grongakhyerasar skya'i gzhir yang sba gsang chen po bsgragasaso// rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan pho brang gi nang du zhugs
ba dang/ btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis bsngags ldan gyi mgul du 'jus ta du bar brtsams so// bsngags ldan yang dbugs khong dusong sta da nyid du dus byas so// zhes de sgra gcan gyi bram

sa drug la brtson pa zhig gi rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'am gyas dang srong ngan slong gi bsti gnas su gdags pa dang/ de'i tshe drang srong ngan slong gi bu lag
ba 'gram la la gtad nas/ sams khongs su tshud cing 'dug b/ de lta bu de byang chub sems dar sa gzigs nas gsungs pa/drang srong chen po ci phyir lag pa 'gram la la la/tadanas sems khongs su chud cing
'dug la/ des gsolar ]bdag ga ba ste gnas 'di'i shing rta la rnams gsar gyi lam dang ma tog dang 'bras bu cham/sa pa las/ de rnams snga mkho bzhin dum gyur to// byang chub sems dpas gsungs la/ drung

srong chen po gang gi mthus bsko ba/nas 'di ni shing rta la rnams gsar gyi lam dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bur ldan pa// rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yod byung ste/ dka' thub kyi nags su
gnas babs so// gal te des rga ba dang/ na ba dad/ 'chib yang dag par mthong nas yod byung// dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par ma gyur na skyed mos tshal 'di de'i gzhi ra zhig/ de skad ces gsungs pa
nang @#/ dang drang srongan slongag bus byang chub sems dpa' la brtag par brtsams so// de nas gzugs bzang zhing zhi ba 'a'i bya da du mthong nas/ yun ring du brtags tu ngomatshar skyes nas gsol pa

ba kyi rab tubyung ba de khyed khon ma lags grangs/ byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/drangason po de ltar saso// de nas nga na sbyong ba bu ya mtshan skyes pa mig bgrad de bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thog

sgyu mar gdan la spyan drangs te/ma rtog dang 'bras bu ba dngas so// grong khyer dpa mdan khyam bdag phyug pa dang/ nor mang la'ang spyod che ba zhes bya ba nas de la khye'u bcu btsas so// zhes bya ba'i bar dulta/ de dag thams

cad kyang rab tu byung nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so// jitsam na bdag nyid chen po de rnams la ma rganamos sha la'i gos dag cig bzhi pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum mkhyen par mdzod cig/

rgyal po zas gtsang gas sras gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba rgya ba dang/ na ba dang/ sha ba mthong nas kun tu skyo ba'i yid kyis nags su song nas de bu namad la yang dag par rdzogs ra 'i byang chub mngon pa ra
rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gnas par ma nus pas bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// shana'alis 'ad rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras la khyod

kyis thul cig/ bdag nyid chen po de ni bla na mad pa'i shas thugs su chud par 'gyur la/ khyed kyis kyang 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes sas nas 'bar ba dang de gsal pa dang/ chab 'ababs pa dang/
glog 'ban pa'i cho'aphrul dag byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// rgan mo des kyang 'dir gos de dag bu mo la gtad nas ji ltar

gyur pa rnams smras so// de'i bu mo de yang nad kyis thabs de ba par shes nas/ des kyang shing rung gcig tu bzhag nas/ shange de la gnas pa'i lha gang yazhi pa de khyed kyi 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang

gi sras la phul cig ces gsol ba btab po// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba na 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des de dag shes nas blangs te/ de nas rngon pa rgas 'khogs pa lta bu zhig tubadag
nyida mngon par sprul nas/ de dag bgos te lag pa la mda' gzhu thogs nas/ byang chub sams dpa' gshags pa'i lam bgar bsdad pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' yang rim gyis lam der byon nas/ jon pa lag

namada' gzhu thogos shang gis dur smig gyon pa zhig gzags so// gzigs nas kyang mi de la gsungs la/ kA ya nang rje shana'i gos 'o na deg na rab tu byung ba la 'tsham la yan gyis/ ka shaka' ras phran 'di dag
khyer la 'o na dog ngal bzhi cig/ sa gsol pa/ gzhon nu bdag la gzhan dag khyed kyis rgyal bu gzhon nub krongs nas kashaka' ras phran gyi gos 'di dag blangs so zhes gzhi sa g.yar mchibar 'gyur
lags pas/ bdag 'di dag ma 'bul lo// byang chub sams dpas gsungs pa/ kyi na rdzong mthu ji ltar dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyas shas pa/ su zhig gas nga bkrongs par nus/ khyod kyis
nga bkrongs par su zhig yad chas kyis bas/ ba mad par byani mi// dgas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chubs mas pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas sha na'i gos

dag phul te/ kashaka'i sa phran rnams blangs so// byang chub sa mas dpa'i sku dang sha na'i gos dag 'tsham par ma gyur pa dang/ de'ang snyam du dgongs// byamakho sha na'i gos rnams bdag mo sku dang 'am

par gyur cig snyam nas tshig smras ma thag tu/ gzha' gos de dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' mthudang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang 'tsham par
gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'ad snyam du dgongs te/ dan bdag rab tu byung zin gyis 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung bar bya snyam mo// danas byang chub sems dpa' mthar
[a ]gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab tu khyen to// byang chub sems dpa'i bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas des shang ka ra ba ra' las lhung bzed

byas nas spyod lam zhi bas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ da'atshargyal po gzugs can snying po stong ga khang bzangs kyis gzhin 'dug pa des 'gro ba dang/ ldog pa dang/ lho pa dang/
tsha rnam par balta ba dang/ bskum pa dang/ bskyang ba dang/ chos gos snam sbyar dang/ lhung bzed thogasanas mdzes pas bsod snyoms spyod pa mthong ngo// ma bo n gnas kyang 'di snyam du sams

rgyal po'i khab na rab tu byung ba jisnyad cig gnas pa la rab tu byung ba 'di'i sbyor lam dalta bu n 'ba' langamad do snyam mo// 'di'i sas pa/ ji ltar m ba can 'agro ba ltar// rab du byung ba ba gags pa bya//

'dis ni brtag pa mdzad nasaM su// rab tu byung ba yang dag bzhad// khyayi gnas 'di'i sdug bsngal te// 'di ni rdul gyis gnas yin zhing// rab tu byung ba khar sang ltar// mkhyen nas de tsho rab tu byung//
rab tu byung nas sku las ni// sdug ba'i las ni spangs pa dang/ gsus sde yig pa spangs nas ni// 'tsho ba kun nas dag par mdzad// danas ma ga d+ha yin// grong chog rgyal po khab gshegs nas// me gon bo
shas bzhin dran ldan pa// bsod nams phyari nagshegs pa der// bzo sbyangs ma ga d+hA yi bdag/ khang bzongs nana' dug las mthong// mthong nas sems dad de nas ni// blon po rnams la da skad smag/
mtshan mchog gas ni rgyas gyur cing// lag phun sum tshogs pa dang// gnya' shing gang du lta ba yi// 'di la shes ldan dag ltos shig/ skrun mi 'dag la 'di bzhus shing// dman pa'i rigs las ma 'khrungs
'di gang du gnas par gshab/sa 'gyur la/ rgyal pos bo nyarjes bzhin btang// de nas pho lha la bsgo ba// de so dan gar 'gro zhing// gang du gnas na btab pa yi// rjes bzhin du ni 'brang ba gyis/ dan
bsod snyoms gshags ba na/ sgo drug legs par bsdams nas ni// shes bzhin dran pa ldan pa las// lhung bzed myur du gang bar mdzad// bsod snyoms smad pa byas nas kyang// thub pa grong khyer ni byang
nas skya bseng la naman gshegs te/ de la gnas ni pitab par 'gyur// gnas btab kha na shes nas kyang// kho nya gcig gs bsdad byas nas// gzhan 'gyur dusar ba/

tha rgyal bo la ni tshig smras pa// rgyal po chen po dag song de// seng ge 'am stag gi phru gu dag/ ri sul dag na gnas pa ltar// skyags nga gi ni ste ngan gzhas// phonya rnams kyis tshig thong nas// sa bdagashang dung

tsA/ zhugs nas ni// de na blon pos yongs bskor nas// myur ba kho nar deng bar gyur// gzhon pas grod nga 'i sa zhen/ da na bzhon pa las babs nas/ rkang gas nye bar song nas ni// de nas de bzhin gshags pa mthong//
o rgya la po 'dug nas dgyes pa dang// mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gsol nas// da nam khengs mi rung bar// de don 'di dag rab smras so// dag slong lang tsho dang po la// babs par yang dag gnas gyur cing//
'di 'dra gzi brjid ldan pa la// bsod snyoms spyod pa mdzes ma lags// khang ba nyams dga' dag dang na// bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang// 'phongs spyod mchog ni khyod gsolan// 'di kyi gdung 'azhu
pas bgasungs// rgyal po gangs ra nye ba na// yul gyi ljongs ni noradag dang// 'brudag gas na gang gyur la// ko sa la zhes grags pa yod// bu ram shing pa nyidimi'i rus// shAkya dag nidi na gnas//
! rgyal bo nganargyal ragis ta// ngan 'dod pa don gnyer// sa 'diraring bcas shing rgya mtshor bcas// rin chen kun dang ldan par 'byor gyur kyang// mi rnams kyang ngoms par mi 'gyur te// so gatshadus
shing gsam bzhin go/ 'dod pa rnams mig khe 'breces gsungs/ mi dbang rgal bar dakazhing 'dam rdzab 'ad// sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan 'jigs pa gi rtsa pa'i gtso skyo sha rnams kyis

bstan// rgyal po ngas namyu ma thag tu yang// 'dodo ba rnams lami dgu'i blo bskyadan// 'bigs byed chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa dag/ der ba de go sar yang ji ltakhang// rtsi mo sna tshogs langs par gyur pa la//

lhun po gas can rlung gis bskyod srid kyi// nga yi blo ni thor pa la brtan lag/ 'dod pa'i shugs kyis pa skyod par mi nus so// 'jig rtan 'di na 'dod par byas gyur nas// 'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khyams/
ba la// ma dbang dang skyabs yazhe gzhan med pas// 'jigs pa che las 'phar bar bya// 'dod pa rnams kyis nyes dmigs mkhyen// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba gzigs// spang phyir gang dung ya 'di// dga'
bdag tu 'gro bar bya// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa// kya rab tubyung ba brtul zhugs 'das ri zhig don tu gter// des gsungs pa/ bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo//

rgyal pos gsol ba/rab tu byung ba/ gang ba tsho khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag la yang dgongs shig/ byang chub sems dpas gsungs

pa de bzhin du bsam par bya'o zhisaM gsungs nas rgyal ro pa'i khab nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dong ha cang yang mi ring bar drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas dar gshags so// donas spyod pa dang/
gnas bas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te/ danams gang girkang kha gcig gse nyan thun gcig 'geng ba de'i tshe byang chub sems da pa'i ni'i thun gnyis su bzhugs so//

gal ted nams gdung ba lnga'i sbyor bas nyan thun gcig 'dug pa de'i/ byang chub sems dpas kyang sbyor ba des thun gnyase su bzhugs so// danas de rnams ya mtshan skyes nas dag sbyong da ni na po zhag go
zhes smras pas/dag sbyong chen bo zhes bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpas de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhige den gnyer/ da na kha cag gas gsol kha/brgya byin nyid
da// khacig gse gsol pa/bdag cag na tshongs pa nyid do// kha ci'i gas gsol pa/ bdag cag na bdud nyade do// byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ drang srong 'di dag na sA ra ya nga ltung ba/lam leg
bar zhugs pa'o// lam 'di shes par zhus pa ma yane/ mthong ba zhus pa ma yani/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i lam

danyid nus pa med par mkhyen nas/sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gangan bar der gshegs te byon pa dang/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so// ring 'phur gal te khyod la mi bde ba midan khyod kyi drung du khe'o

tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// des smras kha/ tshe dang ldan pa go'u tam bdag la ma bde ba med kyis/ ci bdeb khon khazhugs shage/ byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ rang 'khur khyed kyis chos rje snyad cagi rang ga mngon par

shes pas rtogs par gyur/ des ma gsol pa/tshodang ldan pa go'u ta ma yang med pa'i skyom dkyibar du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu'ang 'a bur dad pa de la na de dad dad la/

sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab yod pa ltar/ bdag la yang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzani dang shes rab ye de sa/ sgyurtsa la shas kyi bu ring 'phur sa ru yang med pa'i

sku mchod kyi bar gyis chos de snyad mngon sum du byas na/ ci'i phyir bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag mngon sum du mabya snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos de rnams la khe na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang ma rtogs pa rtogs

par bya ba'i phyir dang/ mngon sum du ma byas la mngon sum du bya ba'i phyire gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rdzun pa dang ldan pa/bdag nyid gtod par gnas da/ gcig bu dban pa bag yod pa rten pa dang ldan pa bdag nyidi gtod par

gnas ban/ ring po mi thogs pa khon rachos de dag mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to// chos dadag mngon sum du mdzad nas/ yang sgyu rtsal shas kyi bu ring 'phur gang na ba der gshab sa rta/ byon nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phul

'di skad ces gsungs so// range 'phur khyod kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi mngon par shas rasaM mngon sum du byas sam/ das 'daskad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma mad de bdag

gseci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos dad lag mngon sum du byas so// byang bas mas dpas gsungs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rang 'a phur bdag gse kyang cha yang na da pa' su mchod kyi bar gyis chos de dag rang
ga mngon par shes pa sa mazhasum du byas so// tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta mde lta na khyod kyitsim pa bdag gi yang datsam la/ bdag gis ji tsam la khyod kyi yang datsam pas don 'di

la skol mtshungs shinge mnyam sna 'dabar thob kyis tshur spyon ngoskol gnyis kas 'khor 'ad yongs su drang bar bgyi'o// de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyabu ring 'phur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rjod pa 'dem pas

rjod cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod de// de'i rtogs pa dag la yang dga' ba dang mgu bar skyurato// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'a 'di'ishes par nus pa ma yazhi/ mthong bar nus pa/

ma yin/ blun chad pa yang dag par rdzogs par nus pa ma yin nosnyam mo// danas byang chub sams dpas lam danus pa med par rasi nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gangan pa der gshags te byon nas/rangs byed kyi bu

lhag spyod la 'ad skad ces gsungs so// lhag spyod gal te khyod la ma bad ba mad na/ khyod kyi drung du tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// des gsol pa/ dang ldan pa go'u ta ma bdag la mi bde ba mad kyis/ khyod ci bde ba kho nar

zhugs shage/ khyod kyis chos ji snyad cage mngon du byas/ tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma 'du shes med 'du shes mdamen byas skya mchod kyi bar du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rangs byed kyi

bu lhag spyod gang la dad pa de la ni bdag kyang dad la/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang ting nge 'jin dang/ shes rab yod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang/ ting nge
bzhi dang/ shes rab n bdag la yodan/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes mang mi stsamadakyi ba gyis chos 'di snyacig mngon sum du byas na/ bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag ci'i phyi'i
mngon sum dum bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams khazhi ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang/ ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i ri dang/ mngon sum du ma byas pa
kan sum du bya ba'i 'i/ gcig bu dben pa bag yod pa/ rku ba dang ldan pa/ bdag nyidi gtod par gnas ta/ gcig bu dbas par bag yod pa bdag nyidi gtod par gnas pa na/ ring bo ma thogs ba kho

nang chos da mngon du mdzad par gyurato// chos de mngon sum du'adzad nas/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod btang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so lhag

spyod khyod kyis 'du shes da 'du shes med man gyi skyamachod kyi bar du chos 'adi dag rang gis mngon sum du sa sa mtshodang ldan pa go'u taa mad lags te/ bdag gis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skyed mched
kyi bar gyi chos 'di ga mngon sum du bgyis so// byang chub sems dpas gsungs kha/tshe dang ldan ba lhab spyod bdag gas kyang 'dushes chad 'du shes med mnargyad ma dgyil gyi chos 'di dag rang gsa mngon

sum du byas so// tshe dang ldan ba go tam de lta na khyod kyis jitsam ba bdogagag yang de tsam la/ bdag gi jirim pa khyed kyi yang de tsam pas don 'ad la skol mtshungs shang mnyam lta 'dra bar thob kyis/ tshur spyon skol
gnyikas tshogs 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi/ des rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' larjedapa dam bas rjod pa'i mchod pa dam

ba'il chod do// de'i shas ba rnams la yang dag 'i dang mgu bar 'gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'ad snyam du dgongs na// lam 'di ni shes pa zhus pa ma yazhi/ mthong bar nus ba ma yin/ blun med pa

yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dbas lam de yang nus pa med par gnas gshegs so// de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'a bur gyi 'a khor gsum dang/

mtsho ras byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi 'khor gnyis te drang srong lnga byang chubs mas dpa'i rjes su 'brangs so// de nas byang chub sanas dpa' lnga po dang lhan cig pa'i lho phyogs na ltang rgyas 'od srung gi sde'i

rgyu grong rdal gang na ba der rgya zhi gshegs te byon nas de phan tshun 'chag pa na/ phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/ mukrung ni ran nga sa'i bar la bab par/ gas gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing

mtha' rgyatsho la gsang ma sngon po dang/ shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig gzigs so// gzagasanas kyang 'di snyam dudagongs do/ kye ma'o sa phyogs 'di ni dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa

nags tshang tshing ma rjes pa/ chu klungani rany+dzan pasil par 'bab pa/ gas gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsang ma sngon po dang/ shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig ste/ kyam spyong

bden du gnyer ba'i rigs kyipu nags khrod 'dir brtan pa spong ba bya bar nus so// bdag spong ba na du gnyer ba yin pas/mal dag gas kyang nags khrod 'a dpe brtan la spong bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang
chub sems dpa' nags khrod du zhugs te/ shang drung du bzhugs nas tshems la tshems gdaljags dkan la b.rur nas thugs kyi thugs mngon du bzung/ mngon du bsdams/ shane tu mngon du bsdams so//
da lugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung/ mngon du bsdams/ shan tu mngon du bsdams pas/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ rdul byung bar gyur taM/ dpar nam stobs dang ldan pas/ mi stobs shan tuchung ba zhig

phying ka leg tu bcings/mngon du sdoms/ shani tu mngon du bsams na des de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams tshod las rdul byung ba de bzhin du de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' chems la tshams gtad/ lcags dkan la bcar
ti thugs kyi thugs mngon du bzung/ mngon du bsdams/ shin tu mngon du bdams pa las sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// donas byang chub sams dpa' 'adi snyam du da gongs te/ ma la bdag gis
rnam pa rab m pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms pa la 'jug par bya'o snyam mo// des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa ra brtsams da/ des rnam ra rab m pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par

zhugs pa na zhal dngashangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgagasaso// de'i zhal dngashangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa na rlung thams cad spyi bo'i nang du zhugs pas de'i dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu
mi bzad la skyes so// dpanam stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba'i spyi bor lcags kyi phurang rnon pos btab na/ dbamago la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes la de bzhin du//

byang chub sams dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ dbu la dngu'i tshor ba shin tu mib zad pa skyes kyang de zhums pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ sku ma sbyangs

bam yan gyi sbyangs pab yane/ rmugs pa ma yin te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtsa gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no// byang chub sams dang 'a sdug bsngal ma bsdad pa rdzu ba pa tsha ba yod du ma 'ong ba'i tshor

'a[F ]ba de lta bu myong yang/ 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs da ma gnas so// da 'ad snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gse lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par
'jug par bya'o snyam mo// des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang shangs nas
dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so// de zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas rlung thams cad sun gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyus par gyur to// dparan mgar bas spud pa dus la

rlung thams cad kyi rgyun grwa gnyis kyi bu ga nas sgrub de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtanadag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ rlung thams cad kyi rgyun snyan gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyus par gyur

nya kyang de zhum pa ma man gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yane zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis lhag par yang rnam par bam pa'i bsam
gtanadag lasnyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo// des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam bar bam pa 'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na//

zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so// de'i zhal dang shongs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/ shanetu rgyas par gyur to// dper na

ma ga pas mkhas pa'i spud pa bud na gang bar 'gyur/ shan du gang bar kha gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpo' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na phul gyi zhing thams cad rgyas par

gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhan no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs taM/ ma la bdag gas rnam par
bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo// de nas lhag par rnam par bam pa ba bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug bar brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms
par zhugs pan/ zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so// de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang/ de'i tshe dbu la dbu'i tshor bshan tu mi bzad
pa skyes so// dpar na ma stobs dang ldan pas ma stobs shan tu chung ba'i mgo 'phrang bas ya nga nas lang du in de ba mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shan tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe
byang chub sams dang 'a rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tum bzad pa skya sa kyang/ zhum pa ma yin gyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba
la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gas rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug bar bya'o snyam mo
de lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam ba gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa

dang 'byang ba bgags so// pa'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang de'i tsha khong du khong gi tshor ba mi bzad pa skyes so// dper na ba lang gshan pa mkhas ba 'am/ ba lang gi

sha' pa'i slob ma mkhas khas/ ba la nga bsad pa'i gri rnon pos ba lang ga ste dril na de'i khong du khong ga tshor ba88na tu mi bzad pa skya ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam

gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang/ de zhum pa ma yin kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa na rdzam bzhin no// de nas byang chub
d+ha sams dpa' de 'dasnyam du dgongs ma 'badag gis rnam pa bam pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o// de lhag par rnamakhar bam pa'i ring bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/
des rnam pa'i bam pa'i bsam gtan dag lasnyoms par zhugs pa na/zhal dngashangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba/gas so// de'i zhal dang shangasazhas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa na de'i

tshe sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu ma brjod pa skyes so// dbar namade'an tu stobs dad ldan pa gnyis kyis mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig nga ka log tu bzung// ma deng gi nang du sbyangs na/ de'i lus la lus

kyi gdung ba shin tum bad pa skya ba de bzhin du da'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam ra ra bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na sku la sku'i gdung ba shan tu ma bzad pa skyes kyang/ da zhum pa ma

yan gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sob gas pa ni snga ma bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dang ba de gad snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za ba bsgrub

par bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha rab tu mang po'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'ad skad ces smras so// grogasaM

bo gal te khyed me'i kha zas kyis 'dzem par mdzad/ ngo tshabar mdzad/smod par mdzad na/ bdag cag gis khyed kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/lha'amadangs bsgrub par bgyis te khyed kyis bdag gar mdzod cig/
ga/ de nas byang chub sems da pa 'a 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ gal te bdag gis mi'i lngas ma bzab bar dam bcas la ]bad ba/ gas ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du lha rnams kyis lha'i mdangs/

thabasgrubs nas/ de bdag ga'i byed pa ni bdag gikhardzun yin la/ bdag gi brdzun gang yin pa de ni bdag gi lag pa yin no// bad ga ga khog pa gang yin pa de'i rkyen gyis ni 'dan sems can kha cig lus zhag ste

gis ngan song ngan 'gro log par lhung ba soms can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi tsheg ni thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs la kha zas nyung ba dang cung zad chung chung bza'akha

la 'am yang na mo sran sdo'ub khu ba 'am/ 'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba 'am/ yan ha rinu kub 'bras bu'i khu ba btung ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe lha rnams kyis tshig thams cad kyi thams cad du

glangs nas/ zhal zas nyung ba dang chung ba dang/ cung zad dang/ chang chung gsol ba 'am/ yang na mon sran sde'u'i khub bam/ 'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba 'am/yan harinaka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba gsol lo// de nas
byang chub sems dpa'i zhal zas nyung ba 'am
chung ba dang/ cung zad dngachung chung gsol pa na/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kun tu zhum ste/ skams zhing sku dbal chung bar gyur to// da par na ldam bu a

gna' gdang nying lag thams cad zhus/ kun tu zhum ste/ skam zhing sku dba' chung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sams dpa' de'atshozhalazas nyung ba dang/ chung ba dang/ cung zad dang/ chang chung gsol bzha/

dbu la dbu'i lpags pa rnyas kun tu nAs te 'khums shang 'bar 'bur du gyur to// dper na ku ba ba rtsa ba nas bcad na rAs kun tu rnyes pas 'khums la 'bar 'bur du gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshabyang chub sems

dab la zhal zas nyung ba dang/ chung ba dang/ chung zad dang/ chang chung gsol ba na/ dbu la dbu'i lpags pa ris kun tu res to/ 'khums shange 'bar 'bur du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyis brtson 'grus brtsam
