pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa na snga ma bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhal zas nyung pa dang/ chung ba dang/ cung zad dang/ chung chung gsol ba dang/ spyan gnyis kyis spyan gyi 'bras bu bu//

tu song zhinge shan tu phug tu song sta/ zab ba shan tuzab par rang du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang ngo// dparan khren pa zab mo'i chur skar ma'i gzugs brnyan phug du song zhangeshon tu phug tu song sta/ zab pa ni tu zab

par 'di dusong bar gtam du bya ba de bzhin du de'i tsha/ byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang/ chung pa dang/ cung zad dang/ chang chung gsol ba na/ spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyis 'b+D4249ras bu phug tu song/shin tu khug tu song

na/ zab pa shin tu zab par rang du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang yang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no// de nas byang chub sams dpa'i zhal zas nyung ba dang/
chung ba dang/ nung zad dang/ chang chur gsol ba na/'tsho rtsibama'i bar mtho dam can du gyur// dpar rtsa khang lo gnyis sam gsum 'an pa'i phul dgu bo mtho dman can du gyur pa//

de bzhin du de'i tshabyang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang/ chung ba dang/ cung zad dang/ chang chung gsol ba na/ rtsabama'i bar mtho dman can du gyur kyang/ de zhum pa ma yan gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa

yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams na snga ma bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhal bas nyung ba dang/ chung ba dang/ cung zad dang/ chang chung gsol ban/ skal pa'i tshigs ba da lta ste/ skra'i lan bu lta

bur gyur to// 'jug de'i 'od lta ste/ rnga mo'i rkang pa lta bu gyur to// de lan 'ga' ldang bar 'dod na kha sbub du 'gyal la/ lan 'ga' 'dug par 'dod nagalaskyal du 'gyel la/ de ro stod la brtenanas resmad
'jog par byed/ rosmad l brten nas ro stod 'jog par byed do// de phyag gnyas kyi sku la byugs yongs su byugs de'i tshe spu rnams drung rul bas sa la lhags par gyur to// de nas byang chub/

sems dpa' de 'ad snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di ye shes par nus pa ma yazhi mthong ba nus pa ma yin/ bla named pa mang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' de 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gas til 'bru gcig gas zas bza' bar bya'o zhes te des til 'bru gcig gas zas gsol to// dadi'i 'bru gcig ga zas gsol ba na/ yan lag dang
nying lag thams cad zhum kun tu zhum ste/ skam zhing sku dbal chung bar gyurato// til 'bru gcig gas ji ltar par 'bras 'bru gcug dang/ sran ko la 'bru gcig dang/ rgya sran 'bra gcig dang mon hran

gro'u 'bru gcug dang/ mon sran sdo 'u 'bru gcig dang/ rtsa' gdang ba la mnal bar mdzad do// rgyal po zas gtsang gas dka' ba spyad pa'i gnas skabs da thes nas nyi ma re re zhing bot+ta ba nyis brgya lnga bcu

gtong bar byed do// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis kyang nyis brgya lnga banu'o//de dag nyi ma ri'i zhing de gnyis la myur ba myur bar gtam la bar byed do// bya chub sems dpa' na 'di 'dra ba'i dka' ba spyod do/
til 'bru gcig dang/ 'bras 'bru gcig dang/ sran ko la 'bru gcig dang/ rgya sun 'bru bag cig dang/ mon sAn gre'u 'bru gcig dang/ mon sun sde 'u 'bru gcig ga zas gsol zhing rtswa gdang ga lamanal

bar mdzad do zhes smra'o// de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bu'i mya ngan gyis non pas lhag par dang kan zhing mag mchims rnas te gdungs nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par rtswa'i gdang ba la nyal bar
byed do// grags 'dzanams kyang r thos pa dang/ khyim thab gyi mya ngan gyis non te dal 'a bru gcig za ba dang/ de'i rum mi bde ba de nyid du zhu bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di
snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yin mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ bzhamad pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'ad snyam d
dgos te/ ma la bdag gas kha zas shin tu ngan pa bza' bar bya'o snyam ste/des kha zas kazhe tungan pa gsol bar mdzad do// delazas phal pa ni 'di yazhe te/ be'u byang nas re po
malon pa'i 'o ma 'thung ba gang yin pa de rnams kyi gcig dang lci ba yin no// de jisade de'i sku las mdangs yal bar gyur de srid du zas gnyis pa ma gsol to// yal nas kha zas phyi ma gsol bar
mdzad do// dur khrod lor gshegs nas kyang mdzodadu rten du bcug/ zhabs la zhabs bzhag ste snang ba'i 'du shes dang dran pa dang shas bzhin dang ldan pa'i'adu shes sade la mdzad pas glo g.yas pas

'a mnal bar mdzad do// de'i tshe grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams dang/ grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma rnams lhags nas shang dus de'i snyan gnyis kyi bu gar 'dzugs par byed/ rnab ga2sa ka nas 'dren par byed

cing 'ad skad ces kyi phyag dar khrod kyasha za la sa/ kyi phyag dar khrod kyis sha za la ltos nas smra bar yang byed do// de'i tsha phyagadar dang bong rdog dang/ gsogams kyang 'thong bar byed do// 'on kyang byang chub

sams dpa' ni grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams sam/ grong khyer gyi bo/zhon num de rnams la ngan sems bskyed pa 'am/ sdig pa'i tshig dbyung bar mi dgongs so// byang chub sams dpa' dka' thub chen po la dka' bar
spyod bsan/dag sbyong chen po dag sbyong chen po zhes ya mtshan du gyur// de ltar le drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad par mdzad do// de nas lha gsum zhig byang chub sems dar 'a gang na ba der lhags te/

de nas lha ga chag gas 'daskad ces smras so// dge sbyong gi go'u tu man zhig po zhig go/ gnyis las 'daskad ces smras so// 'di nag po ma yin gyi 'od kyang sngo bsangs zhig go/ gsum pasa'ad skad ces smras so//

da'od ni nag po yang ma yazhe sngo bsangs kyang ma man gyi dmar smug ga cage se// byang chub sems dpa'i sku mdog bzang por snang ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur to// de nas de 'tshe ba chub 'as

dma' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe gsum zhag gsan pa 'ad lta ste/ shangerlon pachu can zhagegachu nas phyung ste/ nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang/ de nas mi don du gnyer ba tsho'a bzhi gi 'dar 'ongs nas/ des de 'gatsub stan

byas ta/ gtsub shang ngazha gnas gtsuban/ 'di ltar shingede rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir mo 'byung ba dang 'bar du ma btub pa de bzhin du dag sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang sems kyis thag
bsrang bar ma gnas kyi/ nams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang/ 'dod pa la chags pa dang/ 'dod pa la dga' ba dang/ 'dod pa la zhen pa dang/ 'dod la 'chums pa dang/ 'dodo bal
lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de zhari rnams kyi sams yongs su bgatugs te gnas pa ma yin bas lus dang sams kyi thag sring bar mi gnas pa rnams kyi nad dang 'dra'o// de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sbug
bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tshab yid du ma 'ong ba'i tshorapa de lta bu nyams su myong yod kyi/ 'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong ba nus pa ma yin/ blo namad pa yang dag par
rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin taM/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems da pa' 'a sngon ma gsan pa 'di pa snang pa dang do yazhe ne// da par n shang snon pa nu can zhig chu/

nas khyung ste/ nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang// da nas mi'i don du gnyer ba/ ma tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas de la des gatshub stan byas te/ gtsub shang bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing di rlon pa chu can yin

pa'i phyire ma ma 'byung ba dang 'bar dum btub pa de bzhin dudag sbyong ngam bram zakha cig 'ded pa rnams la lus kyis spong bar gnas kyi sams kyis ma yin pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang/ 'dod pa
la chagasal dang/ 'dod pa la dga' ba dang/ 'dod pa la zhen pa dang/ 'dod pa la 'chums pa dang/ 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa ba/nga yAn pa de rnams kyi a mas yongs su gtugs da gnas pam yin no//

da rnams bdag nyid la nod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad partsub pa tsha ba yad du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang da rnams shes par nus pa ma yazhi/ mthong bar zhus ba ma yin/blunamad
pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa 'i dpa snang ba gnyis pa yin no// 'di lta stange skam leg stong chu med pa

zhige chud nga thag ring por skam la gzhag pa dang/ dezhum mi don du gnyer ba ma tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas des da gtsub stan byas ta/ gtsub shang bzhag nas gatshubs na yang 'di ltar shang de skams shang khong stong pa'i
phyiram 'byung ba dang/ 'bar du btub pa da bzhin du dag sbyong ngam bram ze khacig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang sams kyis thag bde bar gnas pa da rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang/ 'dod pa
chags pa dang/ 'dod pa la dga' ba dang/ 'dod pa la zhen pa dang/ 'dod pa la 'chugs pa dang/ 'dod pa la lhag par zhan pa gang ye pa don de rnams kyis soms yongs su gtugs mi gnas pa yin/

no de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yad du ma 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang de rnams kyisashas par sa/ mthong ba nus/ blanamad pa yang
dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus// de la 'dan de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpa snang ba gsum pa yin no// de nas byang chub samasadapa' 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ gang su
dag sdug bsngal spong bar brtson pa gnas pa de dag thams cad ni'ad tsam du zad de/ dalas lhag pa yang mad/ dgongan yang madan/ lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yan/ mthong bar zhus pa ma yin
bun med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yan no// da nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs tashes par nus pa dang/ mthong bar nus pa dang/ bun med pa yang dag par rdzogs

par byang chub par nus pa'i lam de gang yin snyam na/ de 'di snyam du dgongs taM/ bdag yab shAkya zas gtsang gi khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/zhing las kyi mtha'i drung du song nas/ shange 'dzam bu'i grib ma la/
'dug ste 'dod pa las dben pa/ sdug pa ma dag pa'i chos las dban pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing dbanar las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam/
gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de mngon par dran// da ni lam yin/ de na sgrub pa yin/ shes par nus pa yin/ mthong bar nus pa yin bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub bar
nus pa yanan/ de la bodag gis bskyad du yang 'di ltar rad cing nyam chung ba zhan pas so ba ma yazhi te/ ma la bdag gis ru bder dbugs rngub pa dang/ ci bder dbugs dbyung ba dang/ rtsa bder 'bras chan
tsha dang / zan dron gyi kha zas rags pa bza' zhing/ lus mar sar dang/ lamar gyi phyugs la/ mU'ajam pos lus bkru bar bya'o snyam ste/ da ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang/ ci bder dbugasadabyang ba dang/
ci bder 'bras chan dang/ zan dren gyi zhal zasarags pa ba/sol zhinge/ sku til mar dong marasar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad do// dunas rim gro pa de rnams 'di snyam du

sams taM/ shas ldan dag dag sbyong go'u ta ma 'ad ni sdom pa lhodapa/bya ba mang ba ]mang pos 'tsho ba/ sbyong banyams par gyur pa yin to/ 'di da ltar 'bras chan dang/ zan sngon gyi kha zas mang du zal/ lus zhun mar

dang/ til mar gyis byugs nas tshul jam pos lus khrus byed d/'as danacung zad kyang thob par ma nus so snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' bor te dong ba las rim gyis wA ra Na sar phyin nas/ drang srong smra ba ra/
dgas kyi nags na gnas so// de nas byang chub sems da pa' rami gyis lus kyi stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyod nas ram gyi sde can gyi grong khyer du bgshegs so/ de nas grong

khya sde can zhes bya ba nanorany+dzana' che chu bo'i 'gram na bzhugs pa dang/ bram ze lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi grogs par shas su gyur pa de sde can gyi grong khyer na gnas pa dang/ des byang chub sems dpa'i dka'

bar spyod pa mdzad pa mthong nas grong pa'i bu mo dag ba mo dang dga' stobs ma gnyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras mtshan mkhan gyis gal te rab tu byung bam gyur na/khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal

por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de thos sam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyis kyang gal nyid 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag cag de'i btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab lags so//

bram ze lhas smras pa/ bdag nyid chen po de ni dka' thub kyis lus gdungs pas slong ba las bzhengs na/ khyod gnyis kyis de la thog ma kho nar bsod snyoms phul cig dang/ da khyed cag gnyis kyi yun ring po'i
khan pa dang/ bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo dga' mo dang/ dga' stobs mas thos pa dang/ bstong bzhos so// bzhos nas kyang pa lnga brgya la blud do// ba lnga brgya bzhes nas bltas brgya

lnga bcu la blud do// ba nyis brgyalnga banubazhos nas kyang brgya la blud do// brgya bzhes nas kyang lnga bumul blud do// lnga ba bzhes nas kyang rta'u la blud do// nyi shu bzhos de ma sbor nas shel las byas pa'i snod kyin ng du
chu gsanas 'o thug skol bar brtsams pan/bram ze rnams kyis bsams pa/'dare ngas par khagam len tam bag ma gtong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ bram ze mang 'dus par

gyur pa dang/ 'o thug stong du bzlas pa skol ban/bum pa bzang bo dang/ dpal be'udang/ g.yurlung 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma dag byung ba snang ba dang/kun targyun bar 'gros bya bas mthong nas bsams la/ 'oma'ajug
ba 'di sus 'thungs pa des ni blonamad pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gas bsang ngo snyam mo// de nas brgya byin 'dasAm du sams rta/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ad ni deka' thub kyi
sku lugs nyams chung zhing sku la sgribs pa dang/ skyoms pas nyan pa yazhe la/ byang chub sems dpas thugs gsol na/ bla na med pa'i shes thugs suchud par 'gyur na/ bram ze 'di deg na ring bzhin
gyis bdam pa dag 'dir 'dus bar gyur bas/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byed par 'gyur snyam nas/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang nas lha'i sman skyangs te/ ra shane tu gzugs bzang ba'i khrim zi
zhig du mngon par sprul nas/ thug de sol ba'i stang du 'dug ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis der sman mthubaskyad zhes bya ba blugasaso// de nas dga' modang/ dga' stobasams

'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar dongar ba stong dubasgos ba skol nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod nyidirgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras yin nam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa// de na de'i mkhan po yazhi

nganadi'i slob ma 'dzin// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar na ngar pa stong du bsdus pa blangs so// blangs nas kyang dga' mo dang dga' stobs la gnyis la smras pa/ sbyin pa 'dis khyed
gnyis ci gi don du gnyer gang gi rin du yon bsngo bar bya/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bsod ba phul ba'i bsod nams ci mchis pas// grags dang ldan pa don rnams kun grub pa/ mi'i mchog gyur blo chog/
ldan pa de'i/ don kun myur du shan tu grub gyur cig/ donas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung na rany+dzar zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad ra/ brgal bar bzhad pa dang/ sku nyam chung ba nyid kyis bsgral/
bar mi spyod na/ lha rnams kyis a rdza na'i yal ga btud pa dang/ de la 'jus nas byang chub sems dpas brgal bar mdzad de/ chos gos bsnams nas chu klung ne rany+dzana'i 'gram na bzhugs so// dmas

lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar bzhugs par 'genas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar dngar ba stong du bsgras pa yol gor blugs te/ byang chub sems dang re la bstangs so// byang chub sems
dpas kyang gsol nas yon bsngo bar mdzad do/ dad nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung norany+dzana'i 'gram na phan tshun du bzhugs pa'i sa btsal ba dang/ ji tsam na ra brag chen po me tog dang 'bras
du sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig gzigs nas de de la 'dzegs te phyogs dben zhing gsal ba'i sa phyogs su skyal mong krung bcas te bzhugs so// bzhugs ma thag tur de nyid du rul to// de nas byang chub
sams dpa' 'dasnyam dudagongs taM/ 'dari rgyu zhig yod ranIle bar gyur ca'ongakha/lha rnams mngon par mi dga' 'am/ 'on te bgags 'ga' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam/
mo/ lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shas nas gsol lo/ byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad kyis gzung bar dzeg thogs pa ni gnyis// dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa gang lags pa dang/
dag ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs ba gang lags pa ste/ khyod ni dag ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa lags so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'i gnas ma lags te/ 'on kyang mdun du bzhud cig dang/ de na

rdo rje'i gdan machis te der ni 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'abyang chubs mas dang 'a thams cad bzhugs nas/ bla na med pa'i ya shas thob par gyur cing thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang

chub sems dpas lhas lam bstan pa bzhin gshegs pa na/ de'i zhabs bzhag par de du dag byung bar gyur to// rgya mtshon bo bzhalas kyang chu bab pa nas pad+ma'i rdzong dag byung bar gyur to// gom pa bor nas man

pa nas chen po 'di'i khar ba'i snod bzhin du sgra 'bazhi par brtsams so// bya shadang/ rigs dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byed do// rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang dal bu dal bus rung
gtong bar byed do// char pa 'babs pa'i lha'akhu rnams kyis kyang char pa cung zad 'ababs par byed do/ da nas byang chub sams dpa' 'ad snyom du dgongs te 'dra ba'i mtshan ma bzang bo byang bar

0 gyur bas/rang nyid bdag gis bla namad pa'i ya shas thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ chu klungane rany+dzana'i 'gram na klu'i rgyal po dus can zhes bya ba yod pa zhig gnas te dar ba las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ga

'og byung bar gyur to/ des sa rgyas byung ba na mgi thob par 'gyural/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das khan/ slar long bar 'gyur ro// das 'a sgra grag pas gnas nas phyung ba dang/ rgyang ring po kho na nas byang chub/
sams pa'i sku skyes bu'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/da ba khyadabazang po brgyad cus smras pa/'od 'dom gang gi brgyan pa/ mi stong bas lhag pa'i 'od gzer dang/ rin po'abab 'grol
ltar kun nas mdzes pa mthong ngo// mthongs thapag tu byang chub sems dpAl tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod par brtsams pa/ dga' ba'i dbyangs kyis kun gang ba'i// sa yi san thos nas kyang//
klu la gnas nas phyung nas su// phyogs kun tu yang lta bar byed// byung gas 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste// klu yi rgyal po mthu chen gyis// rany+dzana'i ngogs su ni// 'jig rten 'dren pa gshags pa mthong//
sangs rgyas 'byung bo'i mthu yis ni// klu yas mig na thob gyur te// sems nadegalazhing 'di ma gunas// des na 'od skad tshigs gsol to// bdag gsos sngon mthong ba yi// sangs rgyas mchand rnams
dang/ thub pa khyedan mthong gyur na// de dang tha dadabyer ma mchis// thub ba ji ltar thog mar ni// ga las pa'i zhabs na 'dags pa lags// khyedan sangs rgyas dang gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi ni son gnas/
'gyur// ji ltachos gos mnabs pa dang// nar ma'i nubasal la// ji lta bur 'jug pa las// de'ang khyodan sa ngas rgyas 'gyur// ji ltar rab brtan 'gros su gshegs pa
tha dang// ba glang mchog bgyid pa ltar gshegs pas na// skyes bu'i khyu mchog chos 'dzin rnams kyi mtshog/ deng 'dir khyod ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro// ji ltamakha' la tsasha brgya phrag gis//

khyod sku rgya chen rgya chen mdzad de la// ldang zhing skor bar bgyid par gyur pa las// ma mchog dang sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro// ji ltar dri zhimarlung naldang ba dang// ri dgas bya sa tshigs kyang m sgrig la//
na shang rlung gis g.yos par ma gyur pas/ mi mchog ded na sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro// ji ltar btsun pa khyod kyi zhal gyi 'od// dumad gsar 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba'i/ rnam par mdzes shing kha dog ldan
pas na// mi mchog deng sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po dus nan gyis yang dag par bstod nas/ rdo rje'i gdan logs su gshegs so//

danas byang chub sams dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rtswa gdange ba la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang/ del rtsa'i dgos pa byung bar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya ban gyis sa mas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i

dgos pa shes nas/ ri spos kyi dad ldang las shange bal gyi 'da' ba ltar reg na bde ba'i rtswa khur chag blangs nas/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shas kyi cha byad dubadag nyid mngon par sprul taM/ byang chub sems dpa'i
san sngan sdod do// byang chub sa mas da ngas gsungs pa/ bzhin bzas rtsa 'o na de ga nga la phul cig/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs ba gnyis la gtugs nas
gus pa dang bcas nas phu la la// byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa 'tshong bkra shas las rtswa bzhes te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi sad sdud par byed pa 'i spyod lam gyis 'gro ba rnams dad par mdzad rung lcam

kyis bstan pa'i lam nas byang chub kyi sAng po gang na bar der gshegs kastong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba lta bu'i rdo rje'i gdan la brtan zhing/ ngos par nyid kyis rtsa
rnams ma 'khrugs pa dang/ stug srab mad par bkram nas thugs bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsungs pa/ ji srid sdug bsngal kun gyi mthatso/ zag zad yang dag ma thob la/ de sud srog ma phar gyur kyang na/

sul krung 'di ni gzhig ma bya/ zhes gsungs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la mdzegs da brang gis 'gro ba'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba lta bu'i skyel mo krung bcas nas// sku drang/
bor bsrangs nas dran pa mngon du bzhi g nas bzhugs so// bzhugs pa'i mod kho na la bdud sdig can gyis gnas g.yos par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems/
ci'i phyir nga'i gnas ga yos snyam pa dang/ jitsam na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ngo// danas bdud sdig can 'di snyam dusams te/ shAkya zas gtsang gi bu rdo rje'i gdan la
'dug gas/ ji tsam bdag gis yul ma 'das kyi bar dud la bgags bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ zhi yag la kha skya gyon du 'greng bsha na'i smad g.yogs bgos pa zhig gas kha/

dog tuman pa ra sprul nas byang chub sems dapa' gang nadasong ste/ phyin nas btabs par smras pa/ grong khyer sar skya'i gzhi ni lha sbyin gyis mnan/ pho brang ni bcom/b+hAkya rnams ni kha btags na khyod ci'i phyir
lca gnas babs 'dug/ danus byang chub sams dpa' la sdig pa ma dag ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum rgyas pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ gnodas mas kyis rnam par rtog

dang/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o// de la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni grags 'dzin m dang/ ri degs skyas dngas mtshola'o// gnod sa mas kyi rnam par rtog pa na lha sbyin la'o// rnam par 'tshe ba'i

( rnam par rtog pa po'i rjes su 'tsho ba'i shAkya rnams la'o// da nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs ta/ ci'i phyir bdag la sdig pa ma dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes snyam na/ jitsam na bdud stag
ca'adi lta ste/'khrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs pa gzags so// danas byang chub sems dpa' dag ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes pa 'di lta ste nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang/

gnod sams med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ ma par mi 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o// yang bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod ci'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug/ byang chub sems dpas bka' sul la/ bla na

bas mad pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod kyis bla na med pa'i yashas ga la thob// byang nubs mas dpas bka' stsal pa// sdig pa can khyod kyis ri shage mchod sbyin gcig byas pas

kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par gyuran/ sa bsal pa grangs med pa gsum du ma chod sbyin bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum byas shing/ sems can rnams kyi rten gyi phyir/ mgo dang

lag pa dang/ skang pa dang/ mig dang/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ dbyig dang/ gsar la sogs pa yongs su btang nas/ bla na med pa'i ya shas thob par 'gyurang lta smos kyang ci dgos te/
ngas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur pa de srid re skan/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bdud kyis smras pa/ ge ji ltar bdag gas mchod sbyin gcig gas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyag thob

bar gyur pa'i bdag gi dmang na khyod nyid yin na/ ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ya shas thob par bya ba'i phyi'i bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du/ mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shes mas
can rnams kyi phyir/ mgo dang/lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mag dang/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ bu dang chung ma dang/ dbyig dang/ gsaral sogs la yongs su gtang bar khyedal dpang su yod/
danas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khorale dang/ bkrashas dang/ g.yu drung 'khyil ba dang/ dra bas 'brel ba dang/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ skabag pa rnam la/
dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la ragapa ra mdzad nas/ ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum dumachod sbyin bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum byas shing/ sems can nanA/
kyi phyi'i/ mgo dang lagapa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mag dang/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ dbyig dang/ gsar la sogs pa longs su gtang ba'i nga'i dpang nas 'ad yonano//
denas sa' lhas sa brtol nas thal mo sbyar te skad phyung ba/ sngage can bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' su la pa de bzhin yazhino zhes de skad smras pa dang/ bdud sdig can nam sa bar gyur to/
zhum zhum por gyur/ bag 'khums par gyur/ spyi bo smad nas phebs pa mod la sams khongs su chud cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/bdag

zlogs zas gtsang gi bu la da ltar byas kyang glags ma rnyedakyis ma la 'ad la bdag gas yang pazad gs zhag bya'o snyam nas/ dpung mchog dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum nu rtsa drug po glang po chadang/ rtadang/
mo dang/ ra dang/ ri dgas dang/ a ho dang/ pag dang/ khyi dang/ 'ug pa dang/ ne'u li dang/ sbra dang/ wa la sogs pa 'dra ba ral gri dang/ mda' bo che dang/ mtshon rtse gcig pa dang/ 'khor lo
dang mdung thung dang/ gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ lcag gas kyidabyug pa la sogs d mtshon cha rnams 'aphur pa 'jigs su rung ba rnams dang/ lhan cag byang chub sems dpa' kun nas

yongs su bskor nas gnas shing bdud sdig can ranganyid gzhun drung du bkang nas 'dug go/ danas byang chub sams dang sa gzugs rnam pa du ma can/mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang rgyus pa de rnamA
gzigs nas/ dgongs pa de shage skyes pa phal pa zhig dang lhan cig 'thab pa la rtsoman yang/ de'i gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyor bar byed na/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 'di la lta smos kyang cad gos

kyis ma la bdag gis gnyan po'i phyogs la sbyar bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs la dgongs par brtsams so// bdud kyang 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang lhan cig tu/
byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas 'khor lo dang/ mdung thung dang/ mda' bo dang/ mtshon rtse gcig pa dang/ ched lasoka te mtshon cha rnams dbab par brtsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpas shel/
las byas pa'i gzhal yas man par sprul ba dang/ mtshon cha thams cad gzhal yas khang de'i stang du 'bab kha dang/ gzhal yas khang ga sgras bdud kyi sde thams cad ska gnas kun tu 'byar bar gyur
do[;]denas byang chub sems da pa'i m gyi thun dang po la rtag tu bya pa dang/'grus skyong dpaldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su
brtson pa sa bzhugs so// de nam gyi thun dang po la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa dum
mtha/ nyams su myong bar mdzad de/ gcig tu gyur cape mang por gyur la/mang bor gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ba dang/ snang bar gyur cing a snang bar gyur pa ye shes gzigs pas nyams

za su myong bar mdzad do// skus rtsig pa dang/ ridang/ ra ba la yang thad dkar gshegs par mdzad de/ dparan nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// sa la yang stong du 'byung ba dang/ bye'u zul mdzad de/ da bar
chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu'i rgyun la yang ma nyams par gshegs te/ dpar nas la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la skya la mo krung gses gshegs par mdzad do/ dpa'i na'adab chags bya pa bzhin no// nyi ma

'a6 dang zla ba 'di gnyase 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul cha ba/ 'di ltar gzi brjid chab la ya nga lug gse nom zhing shug par mdzad cing/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang sgyur bar mdzad do// danas

bdud stag na 'di snyam dusams te/ bsam gtan gyi tsher ma na sgra yazhe pas ma la bdag gsi rgyang ring po kho nar 'jug la sgra dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas/ das 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang/ 'jigs pa
chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra phyung ngo// byang chub sems dpas kyang sbrab pa'i phur dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du shing ka dam pa'i tshul smral bas des na/ sgra dardugs pasam grag go/
sgo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs nas ma la bdag gis lha'i rna ba shes pas mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon dupazhag nas/ a na lha dang mi rnams kyi u0f7a/

gang dag thos bar 'dod pa de dag mnyan par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa bzhag pa na/ da lta'i snyan rnam par dag la mi rnams kyis las/
'das pas sgra gnyis po mi rnams kyi dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyi dang/ gang dag rangeng ba dang/ gang dag nye ba yang gsan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs/

bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bya ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug las/ bdag la su dag na gnod par sems/ su dag na ma yonazhas de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam pa dang/ da nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'ad snyam du/

dgongs te/ sems kyi rnams grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas/ danam gyi gung thun la sa mas kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon pa ra shes pa la dgongs
pa mngon du bzhag pa na/de'i thugs kyas sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag gis rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa'i ya di ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen// 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i
sams la 'dachags dang ba cas pa'i sems zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyenato// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa mas la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tumkhyen to//

zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang/ zhe sdang dang bral ba dang/ gti mug dang bcas ba dang/ gti mug dang bral kha dang/ bsdus pa dang/ rnam par g.yos pa dang/ zhum pa dang/ rab tu'adzan pa dang/ rgod pa dang/
@#/// mi rgod pa dang/ nyob ma zhib dang/ nyib zhib dang/ mnyam pa ma bzhag pa dang/ mnyam ra ra bzhag pa dang/ ma bsgoms pa dang/ bsgoms pa dang/ sems rnam pas grol/
ba dang/ rnam par grol ba zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tumkhyen to// shin tu rnamakhar grol ba'i sams la shani tu rnam par grol ba'i somasashes pa da dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tuman to/
denas byang chub sems dang ga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdud kyi mngag gzhug pa 'di rnyems las su dag tshe rabs gzhan na/ mar 'brel pa 'am/ phar 'brel pa su dag gshed pa 'am/ phyir rgol ba 'am/

dgrar gyur pa de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ sngon bya'i gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa'i mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam zhas/

danam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/ des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dum rjes su dgongs te/ 'di lta staskya

ba gcig dang/ gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi dang/ lnga dang/ drug dang/ bdun dang/ brgyad dang/ dgu dang/ banu dang/ nyi shudang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga banudang/ su ba rgya dang/ skya ba stong

dang skya ba brgya stong dang/ skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang/ skyo ba stong phrag dum dang/ skyo ba brgya stong phrag dum dang/ 'jigs pa'i skal pa dang/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang/ 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bsal/
0 pa dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa dum dang/ 'jig kha dang brnags pa'i bskal pa dum rjes su dgongs ta/ bdag sngonasems can 'di dag gnang na gnas pa na/ mang na
'dazhis bya/ rigs na 'di zhes bya/ rus na 'di zhes bya/ zasan 'dalta bu zhi zla za/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal na 'dalta bu zhig nyams su myong chen 'disrid cig lon/ yunan 'dasridi 'dug 'dug/
tsho'adasrid cig len te/ gnas de nas bdag sha 'phos ta chog mo zhig tu skyes so// de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'di skyas so zhes rnam pa dang bcas pa yul phyogs dang bcas par sngon gyi
gzhas rnam pa dus rjes su dgos so// de nas byang chub sams dpala'adi snyam dudagongs taM/ bdud kyi mngag gzhug 'di rnams las su dab/ni ngan song du 'gro/ su dganangan song du mi 'gro ba de dag cha

ltar ng shes par bsam mo// de nas byang chub sams dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs ta/ 'chi'apho dang/ skya bshas pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam ste/ nganam gyi thun tha ma la 'chi'abo dang
rgya bshes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhi g pa na/ dusalha'i spyan rnam par dag pa ma rnams kyi las 'das pas gzags na/ sems can rnams kyi 'chi'i lo dang/

skya ba dang/ kha dog bzang po dang/ kha deg ngan pa dang/ dman pa dang/ rgyanom pa dang dbang 'gro dang/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams ji lta ba bzhin rjes su 'gro ba/ lta ba bzhin du rab tumakhyanata/
gshes ldan sems can 'dazhes bya ba dane'us kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldati/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa khog par/

lta ba sa/ lob khang lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par budwapa'i ches/rgyud dang rgyan des lus zhig nas/ shaba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'grog par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skya ba ba'agyurano//
shes ldan sems can 'di de ga na lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'bags pa rnams la skur ba mi 'dabs shang yang dag pa la lta ba ste/ nad dag
par lta ba'i chos dang/ las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyas/ rgyad dang rgyan das lus zhig nas sha khe'i 'og tu bde 'gromathorasi kyi 'jig rtan du lha dang mi rnams su skya bar 'gyur ro/ danas

byang chub sams dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te/ rtag tu bya ba dang/ 'grus skyong dang ldan zhing/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la sgom pa'i rnal 'byor kyi rdzas su 'thun pas bzhugs
ta/ de nam gyi thun tham zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shis pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhi g pa na/ sa 'dan sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bdan pa'o zhis jel ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//
'danIsdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba 'a phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyan to// de de ltar shes shing de ltar
ma'o na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sams rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhinge/ srade ba'i zag pa dang/ marage pa'i zag pa las sams rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grolan ba dag ga skye ba na zad do//

tshangs par spyod pa la bstan to// bya ba byas so// 'di la srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes ri nyid du yang bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes thugs su chud/
bar gyur cing/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das nam gyi thun tha ma la bdud 'byung po bya ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang bcas pa las byams pa'i tshonagyis mngon par rgyal te/ bla na med pa'i yashes bar s so//

nas bdud sdig can kyi lag pa nas gzhushor ba dang/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo thur du lta ba dang/ gnas g.yos par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag sum cu dang bcas par sdug bsngal zhing
yang mi bde la yid la gcags ted nyid du ma snang bar gyur nas/ rang gi gnas su song sta/ sdug bsngal zhing yid m bdal pam par gyur ras sems pa la zhugs te/ mdas sa la 'di zhing gnas pagyur/

de nas bdud gyi bu mo sred ma dang/ dga' byang ma dang/ dga' spyod ma zhes bya ba bdung gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'daskad ces smras so// yab khyod ru'iphyir thugs ma dgyes// ci'i phyiren
'di ltar bzhugs// gang gis khyed la gnod byed pa'i// skyes bu gang la rjes su sams// gsungs shig de ni 'dod chagasakyi// zhags pas nags nas glang po bzhin// bcings nas bdag cag 'tshal tu
ma de na khyod kyi dbang du 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa// skyes bu 'dod chags pa bral// chags pas legs par da dugaminus// bdud kyi sprul 'das de yi phyir// nganag tu/

mya ngan byed// de nas sridam dang/ dga' byed ma dang/ dga' spyodam ste bdud kyi bu mo gsum po sngonelas byung ba'i glog bzhin du gzakhirjid rab tu 'bar zhing rangag gnas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs
su song ste yun pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdayeg can gyi bu mo gsum gyis 'daskad
@# ces gsol to// kya dag sbyo khyod kyi zhabs la bstan bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyed kyi rami gror bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das can s kyang srid pa yang dag par brad cing nam par
grol la thugs yang dag par k+Shani rnam par grol ba bla na med pa b.ros pas de la dgongs pa ma mdzad de// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bumo gsum gyis 'daskad ces gsol to//

kyi dge sbyong khyed kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing/ bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro ba byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis lanag nyis 'an gsum du yang nas kyang srid pa yang dag par khrid cing rnam par grol la
kyi thugs yang dag par shan du rnam par grol ba blon med pa b.res pas de la dgos par ma mdzad de/ de nas bdud kyi bumo gsum phyogs gcig tu song ste phan tshun smra zhing kun tu bgres pa/
shes ldan sman zla dag skyes pa rnams kyi bud med la sred pa ni tha dad pa yin pas/ma la bdag cag gis gzhon num mdog mdangs brgya phrag gdang/ gos dang/ kha dog brgya phrag pa bcas par mngon par
sprula'ang/ bu btsas ma myong ba dang/ lan cig btsas pa dang/ lan gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ lan bzhi btsas pa mngon par sprul zhing/ bud med bar ma brgya phrag du mar bdag nyadi mngon par

sbul la/ dag sbyong go'u ta ma gang na ba dor lta bar 'gro bar bya'o// phyin nas kyang dag sbyong go'uta ma la 'di skadachos dag sbyong khyed kyi zhabs la bstan bkur byed cing bde bar gshags pa khyod la rim gro
bgyid do zhes smra bar bya'o// de nas bdud kyi bu mo ba/sum po gzhon nu'i mdog brgya stong du mar bdag nyidi mngon par sprul zhingagos kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas panas/ ji srid du bud mad bar/
ma'i tshul brgya phrag du ba dag nyidi mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisazhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs
gcig tu 'du gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ khyadagasbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bstan pa kur bgyid cing/ bde bar gshegs pa khyedakyi rim gro la brgyad do// bcom ldan 'das
nas kyang srid pa yang dag par bad mi rnam par grol ba bla na med pa b.res ngas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do// lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis de skad
du gsol kyang/ lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs pa ram mdzad do// de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum phyogs gcig tusong/
nas phan tshun 'daskad ces smrasta/ spun zla dag 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i skyes bu dag 'di lta bu'i thabs mang pos nye bar bstan cing gnas ni de'isams g.yas par 'gyur ba 'am/
snying 'gas par 'gyur ba 'am/ khanas khrag dron mo skyug par 'gyur ba'i gnas de na yodan/ dag sbyong go'utama' de ni yu bu cag la samasagatod par mi byed kyis/ rgyas pa rnams kyis bud med la srid/

pa na me dad pa yan gyis/ ma la bdag cag bud mad r gnas o'i tshul brgya phrag dum mngon par sprul la/ dag sbyong go'u ta ma'i gan du 'gro na de lta na na rig sbyong go'u ta ma bdag cag rnams la 'dun pa skyed pa ma
srid par 'gyur gyis zhas mas te/ bdud kyis bu mo gsum po bud mdargan mo'atshul brgya phrag du bdag nyidi mnar ra sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song sa sngam bzhin du bsnyen bkur bgyid pa/
ba khasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das chinas kyang sud pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shan tu rnam par grol la khu nad pa b.ros pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/

de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgos// 'di dag ni rang nyid kyis rgan mo'i dngos por byas pa ya'i gyas ma la ngas kyang 'di rnams nyidi kun rtoskyo ba skyed pa'i phyir/ rgan pa 'di nyid du byin gyis

brlab par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi bu mo gnamor byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rgan pa dam sna ngamakha'adod kyang ma snang bar bya ba ma nus so// de nas bdud kyi bu mo
gsum po bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs shing gzugs kyis ngo tsha bzhin durgyas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/ sgur po lcam dgu po ltar kyar kyos can/ mdunanas 'khar ba la brtan cing 'us 'dar bzhin du
bdud sdig can ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu 'dod chags rab bral te// chags pas legs par dgugaminus// bdud kyi yul 'das de ya phyi'i
nga na shan tu mya ngan byed// ces bdag cag rnams la gsung ba na ya ba mad de// ga bzhi g gzhan soms rmongs byed pa// bdag cag gas nam byas pa'o// rnam pa de na yod min na// de lta na yang dbang ma
gyur// thamar gzugs ni 'di 'dra ba/ byas nas da gan nyarasongan// jiltar rgan pa nyid gnas pa// daltard yis byin gyis brlabs// de bas yab kyis bdag cag rnams// rgas pa 'di ni mi
snang mdzod// bdud kyis smras pa/ khyed rnams gzugs kyis drags nas ni// sprin gyi tshogs las glog bzhin du// gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba dang// spro ba'i nga rgyal gnas pas song// dpa' chan deb/
gan phyin pa dang/ rlung gas shang bal bzhin du brlag/ gapazhib chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i// sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byed pa// ri san mos bkod ba dang// so las lcags na 'cha' ba dang//
pad gzhon nu'i sdong bu las// rabo gzhag par 'dod pa yAni// gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin bgi/ sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byar 'dod// rgya mtsho bdos par
gyur nas ni// zab pa 'gating chol 'dod pa yin// gang zhig chags kun mthar 'bade nga'// sa ngas rgyas la 'di'i gnod byar 'dod// rlung zhags pas 'ching ba dang// zla ba mkha' las/
dbab pa dang/ rgya mtsho 'a ga las 'chupa dang// gangs can la zhi gal ba dang// snangashang srog bcas 'bar ba yi// ma la mkhyad par 'dod pa yin// gang zhig dka' ba byed 'ded ba'i/den
! 'di ltar 'gyur ba yin// ji srid thul ba de nyid la// skyabs su 'gro bar gyis shag dang// de nyidi rga pa'i gzugs 'di'i// don gzhan du zhi byed par 'gyur// de yi thugs rje che ldan pas// ngas par

khyadakyi sa khar 'gyur// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang/ bdud dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dngabacas pa dang/ dag sbyong dang bram zer pa cas pa'i skye dgu rnams dang/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin duracas
pa'i 'jig rten na// khyadanams kyi rga ba'i dngos po ma snang bar byed padan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas de nyid las gzhan dbang/
yang ma mthong// khyad rnams song la bcom ldan 'das de nyidimanyes par gyis shig/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum bcom ldan 'das ba la ba de legs su song na phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyab byas te/ phyogs khagacig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan/
'das bdag gas byas pa ji lta bdang/ rmongs pa ji lta ba dang/ mi gsal ba lta bdang/ thabs mi mkhas pa ji lta ba ja tsam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyi ba mnyes par ma bgyis pa na nings lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'dasanongs pa gzung du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bzod par mdzad du gsol/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag gse rgas pa'i dngos po la snang bar mdzad du gsol/ bdabar gshegs pa bdag cag gis rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi

rgas pa'i dngos po ma snang bar mdzad do// de nas bdud kyis bu mo gsum po rang gi gzugs nyade rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur pa dang/ ri re/
du ma snang bar gyur to/// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang la rang gi skyes bun las kyi lha dgyes par bskyod du gsol/ gzhon nus bla na med pa'i ingashes brnyes so// de thos pa dang nyi ma de nyid la grogs

'dzin m la yang khye'u zhig ba tsas so// bdud rtsi zas la yang khye'u zhig btsas so// de nyid kyi nyon mo zla ba yang sgra gcan gyis zin to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis phun sumatshogs pa de mthong nas/ dga' ba dang/
mgu ba dad/ rang dga' ba dang/ rangs pa rgya chen po dang 'debad ba skyes par gyur to// de nas grong khyer sar skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang/ gab bam dang/ gyomo rnams bsal nas//
tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tudI'am pa'i dog por nye bar bshams/ dar gyi rgyun phyang mang pos dpyangs/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng/ ma tog sna tshogs

grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang/ sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin gtong gi khang pa ba rdzogs so// de nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ spyod ra pa dang/ kun tu rgyudang/ ngan pa dang/ mgon
mad pa dang/ bkrin pa dang/ phongs pa dang/ slongs mo pa rnams la gang sbyin pa dpag gtong ngo// lho dang nub dang/ byang dang/ dbus kyi sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag gtong ngo// bsod
nams dag dang do// grags 'dzanama'i bu mang 'dogs par byed de/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skya bos smras pa/ 'debatsas pa na zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pas/ de bas na khye'u'i ming sgra gcan bzhi zhes
gdags so// bdud rtsi zas kyi yang de bzhin du sbyin pa dag btang/ bsod nams dag dus nas khye'u'amang ni gdags zhes ba'i ming 'dogs par byed do// rta dudag gis smras pa// gang ga
'di btsas pas grong khyer thams cad dga' bar gyur par/ de phyi khye'u 'di'i ming kun dga' bor gdags so zhes gdags so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ grags 'dzin ma'i bu gang
gzhi pa 'di ni kya thub pa'i bu ma yanano zhes smras pa/ grags 'dzin mas thos nas ya chad par gyur to// de nas des byang chub sems dpa' rang tshad kyi pha bong la bskyon nas/ rol pa'i rdzong 'gram du
'dug ste/ bden pa gsol ba btab pa/ gal te 'di byang chub sems dpar las skyes pa yin/ de bzhin du rdzing 'dar pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur cig/ ji ma yan na cing bar gyur cig

ces sus nas chur bor ba dang/ de yang bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du pha bong dang lhan cig 'a po bar gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang gas ya mtshan du gyur pa de thos nas/ skya bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bsko
dbang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzong 'gam du dong na/ ji tsaman sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i rang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du 'phro ba mthong ngo//
mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ rang pa rgya chen po dang/ yang bde ba skyes te/ de ma thag tu rdzing dar zhugs nas/ gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po lang du blangs
nas langs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bya ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug byams pa'i mchon kyisa mngon du btul nas/ bla na med pa'o ya shes bar s pa de'i tshosan po
'di shin tu g.yos par gyur to// 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snong ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smagatugyur pa nyes
dang/ zla pa 'ad gnyasi 'daltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba'i sna nga bas snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang/ de'i snang ba rgya rgan pos gsal bar gyur nas//
derasems can gang dag skyes pa de rnams kyis snang ba des samaMs can gcig gas gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'di'i skyes pa lta zhig/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang
'dar rgyas la lta zhig ces ngoshis par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas skyal mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad do// danas tshangs ris kyi/

lha pa/ nyae shagi tshangs pa'i 'jab rtan na 'dug pa'i dasum du nyams (sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung noran dzana'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring
po ma len par ma'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ skyil mo krung gcig gas zhag bdun 'da' bar na dzad na/ de la sus kyang bsod snyomasam yul gyis/ ma la bdag cag der song la tshigasung chad pa ra sa ma
par bstod de// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha de gnyis kyis 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dpaldan pa'i dpung pa bskums te bskyang r 'am/ rkyalha bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs ris kyilha gnyas kyi
tshangs ris kyi 'jig rtan nas mi snang bar gyurata/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug sta/ tshas ris kyi lhaganyis las gajug ba sa tshugs su bcad te gsol la/ ded dpon g yul
las rnam ba ra rgyal ba po// sdig pa ma tshang bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs// rin chanachos na'atshal bar 'gyur mchis kyis// bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du gsol// cig shos kyis
kyang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ nga rgyal bcom zhang g.yul las rnam rgyal ba// sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs// bco lnga lon pa'i dgung zla nya ba ltar// khyod kyi thugs phyogs/
tu rnam dag la gas/ zhes gsol nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das tang de badzan de las bzhengs nas/ pa'i tsha tshigs su bcad de//

bka'astsal pa/ 'jig rten 'dod nga 'i bde gang dang// lha yul byung ba de gang yane pa// srid pa zad pa'i bde de la// bcu drug char yang mi phod de// khur khyer ba ni sdug bsngal te// khur lci ba rnams
bor na// gzhan dag blang bar ma bya'o// srid pa thams cad rnams pas shung// 'dus byas thams cad zad nas ni// dngos po thams cad yongasatanas nas// slar yang srid par 'ong ngo//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ skunyams su bstar ba las skyil mo krung gcag gse zhag bdun 'das par mdzad pa na// de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma

phul la// de'i tshatshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis shange lnga brgya tsam dang/ lhan cig dong ban lam de nyid du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po'i sngon gyi grogs po dang/ blon bo dang/
nyi dudang/ mdza' bshes su gyur pa'i lha 'bag yod pa 'di snyam du sa mas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung ni rany+dzana'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs ta/
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam ra ra grol ba'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba nyams su bstar nas/ skyil mo krung gcig gso zhag bdun 'das par mdzad nas/ de la sus kyang
bsod snyoms ma phul gyis/ de la chong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis kyis dar thog mar bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug na/ da natshong pa ga gon dang bzang bo de gnyis kyi yun ring po'i don dang/ na pa dang/
bde bar 'gyur byas/ ma la bdag rang gis 'dilta ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms 'bul du u0f8bzhugs pa'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha des shing rta dang/ tshong pa thams na

snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas/ tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshong pa tshong pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ltang rgyas na chu klung nar T+Thana'i 'gram byang chub
kyi shing drung na bzhugs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon bar grol ba'i dga' ba dang bad ba sku nyams su bstar ba na/ skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das pa mdzad

@# / de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis de la khyed kyi dar thog mar bsod snyoms phul na/ ngan khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ lha de nyid du ma snang bar
gyur to// de nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang bo gnyis 'di snyam dusams te/ sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/ chos bshad pa la mchogs yan pa la yazhitaM/ gang gi phyi 'ad/

ltar lhasakyang 'ad lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir brtson par byed do snyam nas/ nang par sngar las ta/ sbrang rtsi dang lde gumang du khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das de'i ched du 'dir bdag gi srung rtsi ba lde gu mang du 'tshal dmachis kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtsa ba nye bar bzungs 'dabazhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'a dgam du dgongs
tigal te bdag gi phyag gis bsod snyoms bzhes na/ dbar namu stags can bzhin du 'gyur bas da ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis ma la bdag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog
chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms gang du bzhes pa bsam par bya'o snyam pa na/ bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon gyi sa nga dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
srog chags rnams la sman pa ra bgyi ba'i slad du/ lhung bzed du bsod snyoms bzhes lags so// bco0 ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs shing ya shas gzab sa pa bskyed na/ sngon gyi sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyis sro bag chab sa rnams la phan pa 'a phyir bsod snyoms lhung bzed du bzhes par gyur nas/ don bcom ldan 'das la lhung ba zad kyis bgos pa byung/ de nas/
rgyal lon po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi bgos pa byung par rig nas/ ri bag can zhag la rdo ba las byas pa'i lhung bzed mi ma yin bsabyas sharigs yazhi bas zin par byas la gsal khag tsam
ba dri ma zhim pa mad pa kha'akhyer taM/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
ba nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cas gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi mkho ba byung bar bdag cag gse 'tshal nas/ ri bag can zhig las rdo'i lhung bzed
a ma lags pas bgyis shang ma ma 'gas ra sa bgyis pa gsal ba gtsang ba/ dri nga ba ma mchis pa bzhi'adir 'tshal tam ches na bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol// de nas
bcom ldan 'das 'disnyam du dgongs taM/ gal te bdag gis rgyal po chen po gcig las lhung bzed gcig bzhes na gsum gyi sems ma dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te gnyas las naganyis kyi sa mas mi
tshe dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te gsum las ni gcig gi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gsi rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes la/ lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs par bya'o
sAmanas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes te/ lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang/ bzang
po las sgo ga chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms bzhis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshong pa dag khyed tshur
sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng shig/ chos la skyabs su deng shig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba gang yan pa de la yang skyabs su deng shig/ btsun pa bdag cag
sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// chos la skyabs su mchi'o// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun gang lags pa de' la nga skyabs su mchi'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshong pa ga gon dang brlang po'i spun pa de la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de// gang gi den du sbyin pa gtang// des don du 'gyur ba ste// bad pa'i don du sbyin btang na// de nabad bar 'gyur ba yin//
bsod nams rnam smin bde ba dang// bsam ra la nga na grub par 'gyur// myur du zhi ba dam pa yi// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs par 'gyur// pha rol las byung gnod pa ni// lha dang bdud kyi ris
dag gis// bsod nams kho na byed pa na// bar chad bya bar mi nus so// gal te 'phags pa'i shes rab phye'i// gtong ldan da ni dbang byed na// sdug bsngal tha mar byed pa dag/ rnam pa
'thapazhes rig par 'gyur// de nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' sa/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dongango// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po las bsod snyoms bzhes

nas/ chu klung na rany+dza na gang na bar gshegs dbyon nas chu klung nirawana' 'gram du bzhugs te/ zhal zasakyi bya ba mdzad do// de nas sbrang rtsi yang rlung slong bas des na bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi spunabyas

thapas so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis 'apas par rag nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so// bde bar gshegs ra yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so// n gnas bcom ldan 'das 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta ste
dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir bdud sdig can 'di na bar 'ongs so snyam dgongs nas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can ji sAdi nga'i nyan thos mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/ pha rol

gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams chos bzhin gyis tshar gcod zhus pa/ rang gi skya pa gsal bar byed nus pa/ dge slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ dge bstan dang/ dge bsnyan ma rnams byung bar ma gyur pa dang/

nga'i tshangs par spyod pa cachen po skye bo mang po dang/ lha dang/ mi'i bar la rgya char yangs par legs par rab tu ma bstan gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sa ma

ta kyi mkho dag sbyong go'u tam ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o// snyam du bsam nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la 'gyod pas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis

bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas shange 'dzam bu zhes bya bas 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa gang yazhi pa darang ha cang mi ring ba'agan a ru ra chen bo tshol yod de/ de nas kha dog dang
dri dang/ ro dang ldan pa'i a rur blangs na// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogasagacig tu bdug go/ phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bad skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsar ma'i snyan nad kyis thabs par bdag gas 'tshal nas/
shanga'adzam bu zhes bgyi bas 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa gang lags pa de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na a rur namo'i tshal mchis taM/ de nas bdag gas kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i a ru
ra'adari'achol tu mchis kyi/ dbcom ldan 'das gsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol ba dang bsar ma dang mthun par 'gyur zhing bser ma'i snyan nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//
'a@#// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang/ rlung dang mthun par gyur/ rlung nad kyi snyan nya ba zhi bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shan tu bzod cing lhag par re/
bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis kyi bar du/ byang chub kyi shang dung dubazhugs nas/ klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas gang na ba der gshegs te khyon nas/ shang gi drung du brtan//
skyal mo krung bcas nas/ sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs so// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas su zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags
a par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po btangabazung gas zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par ra gnas / gnas nas mngon par 'a ya pa/sa to/ bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun po 'di la bsar/
bar 'gyur du 'ang/ tsha pa dang/ sbrang ma dang/ sha sbrang dang/ rlung dang/ nyi ma dang/ sdige sbrul gyis rig pas sku la gnod par 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis la lan
bdun dudakAs te/ stong dumago'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go/ de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun gyi dus ma 5na pa'i sngan chags pamed par ' gnas / bcom ldan 'das
kyi sku las lus dral te/ dpung rgyan dang/ rna rgyan dang/ phrang ba dang/ rgyanatshogs dang/ byug pas byugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legasasu thal mo sbyar btud de/ bcom ldan
'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun po 'di dag la bsar bar ma gyur tam/ tshab dang/ sbrang ma dang/ sha sbrang dang/ bsar ma dang// gdugs dang/ sdag sgra/
gyi gnod pas sku la reg pa ra ma gyur tam/ danas bcom ldan 'dus kyis de'i tshigs su bcad de bka' su la pa/ bden pa'i dga' ba bde ba yin// chos thos pa la lta ba dang// srog chags/
rnams la sdom pa yi// 'jig rten 'tsho ba med pa bde// 'dzage rten 'dod chags bral ba dang// 'dod pa rnams la 'gal ba bde// 'o nga rgyal dul ba gang// de nyid bde ba'i dam pa yin/
de nas bcom ldan 'das jitsam bzhad kyi bar du klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshags ta byon pa dang/ rtsa' gdang ba bshams pa 'di la
skyal mo krung bcas sku drang por bsan gnas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzha gnas bzhugs te/ skyal mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad cing rtan cing 'brel bar 'byungab yan lag bcug/nyase po

lugs dang 'thun pa dang/ lugs dang mi 'thunas 'di nyid la gzigs par mdzad d/ 'dilta ste 'ad yod pas 'di lod/ 'di skyes pas 'di skyo ba 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rgyan gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis

rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i skyon gyis mnge dang gzugs dang// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skya mchod drug/ skyom chod drug gi rkyen gyis ragal/ rig pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa/
srid pa'i rgyan gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis sud pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skya ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ lad mi

wa bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shag po 'di 'byungar ra 'gyur ro// 'di'i ste 'dimadan 'di mdal/ 'da'agags pa 'di'agag par 'gyur te 'di
blta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam da re shes pa 'gags pa sa ming dang gzugs 'gag mang dang gzugs 'gags pa sa skya mchod drug
'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag// reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa
'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skya ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya nganadang sde sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ sad mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug ra rnam sa 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug
bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'ashag po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldama'adas kyise zhag bdun po de nyid 'das par mdzad nas tingang 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ 'tsho
tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal la/ gang tsho chos 'di dag naskyod byed pa'i// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtanatshangs pa yin// gang tshe chos rnams rgyu dang bcas shes ra/ nas da ya som rithams cad
'bral// gang tshe chos 'di dag ni dpyad pa'i// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa mAn// gang tshe sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas shes pa// de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral// gang tshe
chos 'di dag ni skyod byed pa'i// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin// gang tshachar pa zad pa thob gyur pa// de nas de yi som nyi thams cad babral// gang tshe chos 'di dag ni da
byed pa'i// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin// gang tshe rkyen rnams zad pa thob nas ni// da nas de'i tshe som nyathams cad 'bral// gang chos 'di dgan spyod byed pa'i//
brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtanatshangs pa pa'i// gang tshe zag pa zad pa thob gyur nas// de nas de yi som nyi thams cud 'bul// gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyod byed pa// brtson 'grus ldan

pa'i bas ma gtan tshangs pa yin// 'jig rten kun tu snang bar 'dug pa na// ji ltar bar snang ni ma shar ba bzhin// gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyod byed pa'i// nga rtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs
pa yin// bdud kyi snga rnams rnam par bcom gnas te// sangs rgyas kun tu sbyor la sa rnam par grol// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis chos zab mo zab par snang ba mthong
bar dka' zhing khong du chud par dka' ba// rtog ge ba rnams kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin/ zhib mo mdzangs pa'i makhas pa dang/ rig pas rnam par shes par bya ba rtogs te/ de bdag gis gzhan
la smras kyang gzhan gyis dmadeshes bas/ des bdag dub par 'agyur/ ngal bar 'gyur/ soms la spro ba med pa kho nar 'gyur bar zad pas/ ma la bdag cag du dgon
ba'i nags stug por mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung dus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol
bar mdzad ming/ chos 'chad pa la ma yin no// de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag de 'di snyam du sems te dkyama'o 'jig rten 'di ni ma rung ngo// kye ma'o 'jig rten 'jig rtan 'di ma rung na/
gang gi phyir da ltar brgya lam na/ lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog[”]ra ba'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba na/ dper na u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin no//
bcom ldan 'das dod ltar thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing/ tshos 'chad pa la ma pa ni pas/ ma la bdag der song la de la gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo//
danas tshangs pa ma mdzad kyi bdag pos da bar n skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums nas brkyang pa 'am/ brkyang nas bskums latsam gyis tshangs pa ma ma jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig
rtan nas mi snang bar byas taM/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ dazhas tshangs pa ma mdzad kyi bdag pos/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol pa/ ma ga d+har ni sngon chad chos
byug/ dag pa ma lag dra ma bcas pas rtogs// bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgo ni phyi mdzod la// mchod pas rtogs pa bshad pa mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atsho tshigs subacad de bka' stsal pa//
tshangs pa dasan tshogs chen gyis// skyon rnams bcom nas rtogs gyur pa// srid dang chags pas dkris rnams kyis// chos 'di legs par rtogs ma 'gyur// rgyun las zlog phyogs 'gro ba'i lam//

khabacing 'di tu mthong dka' ba// mun pa'i zung bos bsgrubs pa ya// 'dod chags zhen pas mthong mi 'gyur// btsun pa 'jig rtan du skyes sha 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la/dbang po rnon po dang/

dbang po 'bring po dang/ dbang po rtul po dang/ drangob sla ba dang/ gdul sla ba dang/ nyon mongs pa chung ba dang/ rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis taM/ dadag gse dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par
'gyur lags so// btsun pa dparan ut+pal 'am/ pad+ma 'am/ kumu ta 'am/ pad dkar mo dag chab nasaskyes shange chab nas chen por gyur to/ chab nas 'phags te kha cig ni ba dang mnyam/ kha cig na chab

kyi nang du nub cing mchis pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'jig rten du rgyas shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la lang/ dbad po rnon po dang/ dbang po 'brang po dang/ dbang po rtul po dang/ dang sla ba
dang/ gdul sla ba dang/ nyon mongs pa chung ba dang/ rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te/ de dag gas dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bas/ chos ni po che'atshal bar 'gyur ba mchis kyis//
bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsolag/ bad bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/ dunas bcom ldan 'das 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ ma la nganyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
za 'jig rten la lta bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyisangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi 'jig rten la gzigs te/ 'dzag rtenar skyas shang 'jig rten dugs pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon

po dang/ dbang po 'bring bo dang/ dbang po rtul bo dang/ drang sla ba dang/ gdul sla ba dang/ nyon mongs pa chung ba dang/ rdul chung ba'i rang bzhin yod do// de dag dam pa'i chos ma thosazha yongs su
nyams par 'gyur bar gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po gzhol bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdun rtsi'i
sgomo dga' bya bar byas// 'un par su 'dod som nyisol cig dang/ tshangs ba ma rnams la ni gya nom chos/ klan ka ma btsal mdotsam bshad par bya// de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi
bdag po 'disnyam du sems te kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par 'gyur ro// kye ma bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/ dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/
zla mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dga' ba rgya chen bo dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de
nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dasnyam dudagongs taM/ ngas su la thog mar chos bshad par bya snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dasAm dudagongs ta/ cha la ngas sgyu rtsal/
shes kyi bu ring du 'phur de la thog mar chos bshad par b/ don de'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yid bzhin du rjod pa'i dam pas rjod cing mchod pa'i rim pas mchod la/ rtogs pa dam pa dag
la yang ya rangasashang dad par gyur pa yin no snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa// btsun pa sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu bum nas dgung bdun lags so// bcom ldan 'das
kyis kyang dgongs ba la zhugs te ye shes gzigs pa bskyad na sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur sha nas zhag bdun len no// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o sgyu rtsal

shes kyi bu rang du'aphur sha ba da na taM por ma skyes so// e ma'o skyo rtsal shes kyi bu rang du 'phur ba de shin tu rta bor sa stes te/ chos 'dul ba 'ad sa thos so// gal te chos 'dul ba 'di phyis na
shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs ti ma langs thogamar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dasnyam du dgongs do/
ma la ngas rang byed kyi bu lhag spyod de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de na de'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjod pa'i dam pas rjod cing mchod pa 'i dam pa sa mchod la/ rtogs pa
dam pa dag la yaderangs shing dad par gyurato snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa// btsun pa ras byad kyi bu lhag spyodamadangs sum srid la dum lags so//

bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa la zhugs ti se shes gzigs pa bskyang n rangs byed kyi du lhag spyod srod la sha bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs// e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod

@#la sha ba dand por ma stos te/ a ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi nga da na shAn tu tu par ma sos/ chos 'dul ba 'dam thos so// gal tatshes 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhag snyam mo// de nas

bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas thog ma su zhig la chos/ bshad snyam mo// danas 'di snyam du dgongs taM/ ma la ngas sde lnga'i dag slong de rnams la thog mar chos bshad par bya bsta/ de dag

gse nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par gnas pa na bla mdang/ gus pa dang/ sdug pa dang bcas pas gnas la ya'i no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/

lnga sde'i dge slong rnams da ltar gangan 'dug snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa'i mi rnams kyi las 'das pas lnga sde'i dag slong rnams wA ra Nas na drang srong smra ba ra dgas kyi gnas

na 'khod pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dzatsim bzhad kyi bar du byang chub kyi shang drung du bzhugs nas/ wA ra NA si na kasha'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// de'i tshe kun tu 'tsho

tsaka nyer 'gro lamade nyid du lam du zhugs par gyur te/ kun tu 'tshonyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong go'u ta ma khyed kyi dbang
po rnams ni dengs/ bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag/ pags pa'i mdog ni gsalan/ tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma khyod kyi ston pa na gang khyod su las brten tu rab tu byung khyed su'i chos la dga'//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshatshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga dang 'dra ba yod man pas/ nga la slob dpon 'ga'amad de// 'jig rten sangs rgyas nga gcig pu// yang dag byang chub dam pa thob/
thams cad zil mnan 'jig rten kun mkhyen la// 'di ni chos kun gyis ni nga ma gos// thams cad spangs shang srad bral rnam grol te/ rangags mngon par shes na su la rten// de bzhin gshegs
pa lha mi'i ston pa po// thums cad mkhyen pa 'i stobs nakun ldan pas// 2de kyis byang chub rtogs nas rab gsungs pa// mi mnyam mtshungs pa med na sul rten// ngani 'jig rtenadag
bcom lta/ 'jig rten bla mad nga yin pas// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// nga na rgyal ba bdud za'i gnyen// tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma rgyal ba zhes gsungs ngam/ ]gang gis zag pa
zad thob pa// rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par bya// sdig pa'i chos ni ngas bcom pas// de bas stor 'gro nga rgyal ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa go'u tan gang du bzhud// wAr NA sir gshegs nas ni/
ngas ni chos kyi rdzabardung zhing// 'jig rten ma bskor gang yin pa// chos kyi 'khor la rang tubaskor// 'jig rten chags pa las rgal ba'i// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas
zhing gyur pa// 'jig rten bsgral ba ma byas par// skyes bu dam pa grags mi sridi// tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma rgyal ba lags so zhes gsolanas/ kun tu 'tshonyer gro lam nas song ngo// de nas bcom

ldan 'das yul ka sha'i ljongs rgyu'ange ba gshegs pa na/ wA ra NA sar byon// de'i tshalnga snga'i dge sbyong nams wA ra NA si drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na 'khod do// lngasnga'i dge slong rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas chad du bsams te/ lags par 'dug nas khrims su bcas pa/ shes ldan dag ngag song go'u ta mam brtan pa// bya ba gang ba/
mang pos 'tsho ba spong ba nyams pa de dang/ 'bras chan dang/ zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing/ lus mar sar dang la mar gyis phyugs nasachu 'jam pos lus khrus byed cing 'ong gis de bdang/

cag gi drung du 'ongs dang/ de la smra bar ma bya/ phyag mi bya/ ldang bar ma bya/ langs te stan bstabs par mi bya'o// gzhan du na stan nar ma khen btang la tshig 'dakad ces tshe dang ldan pa go'u tam
stan yod kyis ji ste 'dod na 'dug cig ces brjod par bya'o zhes bcas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta ji ltar lnga sde'i dge slong+ka nams la gzigs pa'i ngaranye bar gshegs pa de lta de ltar
lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid dang/ dar la dang/ bkur sti ma bzodanas stan las langs nas/ kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdon shom mo// khacig
nizhabs bkru ba'i chudang zhabs kyi ldan dag mtha' gcig tu' jog par byed do// kha cig na bsu sta na bza' chos gos dag blangs nas 'di skad cesashas ldan go'u ta ma tshur spyon shes ldan go'u
tu ma byon pa legs so// shes ldan go'u ta ma gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shag ces zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma snyas bu blun po bde rnams kyis
khrims bcas nas rang gas btazhig go snyam du mkhyen nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs s// de na lnga sde'i dgasonganams lcags par yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtsha nas brjod/
gdung nas brjod/ tshe dang ldan pas brjod kun tu brjod par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dgeslong dag khyed lhag par yang de bzhin gsheg
pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa dang/ gdung nas brjod pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pas brjod pas kun tu m rjod cig/ khyad la yun ring por gnod pa dang/ phan pa ma yin pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
ro// da ci'i phyir zhan/ dag slong dag gang la la lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa dang/ gdung nas rjod pa dang/
tshe dang ldan pas brjod pa'i kun parjod pa de ni rgyas bu lhun po de dag lo yun ring bozhas gnodapa dang/ phan ba ma yin pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// dadagags 'di skad ces

the gsol to// tshodang ldan pa go'u dam khyod kyis shage sngon gyi tshul dang/ spyod pa dang/ dga' bar spyad ra des mi'i tshos bla ma 'phags pa'i khyad par thob par zhus pa 'am/ shes pa 'am/ mthong ba dang/

tsa rig par gnas pa cung zad kyang ma thob na/ da ltar byed ma ba rtan zhing bya ba mang la/ mang pos 'tsho zhing spong ba nyams pas/ da khyod 'bras chan dang zan don gyi kha zas mang du zazhing lus mar sar dang/ dil mar

gyi byags nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mdog dang/ dbang po rnams gsal ba sngon las tha dad du bya ba gzhan lta mthong ngam/

nga rnamaMs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma de de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sda'adeg slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag rab tu byung bas na mtha' 'ad gnyis
la bstan par mi bya/ bsnyan par mi bya/ bsnyan bkur mi bya ste/ gnyis gang zhen/'dod ng rnams la 'dod chags bsod nyams kyi rjes su brtson pa dman pa ngan pa tsa chad lo rabs gang yin pa dang/
bdag nyid du pa la rjes su brtson pa sdug bsngal ba/ 'phags pa ma yin pa gnod pa dang ldan pa gang yan pa'o// khyed kyis mtha' 'di gnyis la mi rton par dabu ma'i lam mig byed pas/ yashas
byed pa/ nyabar zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rdzogs par byang chub pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur pa yod de/ dbu ma'i lam gang zhan/ 'phags pa lilam yan lag brgyad pa 'di

lta sta/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyis tha' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/
yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha sde'i dge slong rnams la shes par bya ba 'das shes par mdzad spyod pas/ bcom ldan 'das lnga sdeb deg song rnams las gnyis la snga dro
gdams ngag dngeg pa na/gsum grong dubasod snyoms la 'jug ste/ gsum gyis bsgrubs pa gang yin pa des drug char 'tshob ra byed do// bcom ldan 'das lnga rnams kyi dge song gsum la phyi
dro gdams ngag dbog pa na/ gnyasigrong khyer du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/ gnyis kyis bsgrubs pa gang yan pa des lnga sogs 'tsho bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa ni snga dro'i dus kho nar gsol ba
yan no// de nas bcom ldan 'angs kyi lnga pa'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di nisdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhis tshul bzhin yod
la byed pa na mi skyes so// de shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byang ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal
'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal ba gog pa 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes tshul khazhin na/de la byed pa namage rgyas so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong
dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon pa ra shes pas yongs su shes par bya'o zhis tshul bzhin yod la byed pas na mabe ga skyes so// shes pa dang/
gi pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'a pa/sa pa'i bden pa dengs mngon par shes pas spang bar bya'o zhis tshul
bzhan yid la byed pa na mig skyas so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dag slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden
pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bya'ozhes tshul bzhin yad la byed pa na mag skyes so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag nga sngonam
thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa ra 'gro ba'i lam 'a phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pa sa bsgom par bya'o zhis tshul bzhin yod la byed pas na mag skyas so// shes pa dang/
rag kha dang/ blo dang/ [“]rtogs pa skyasaso// dag slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas yongs su shes so zhes
tshul bzhin ade la byed pas na ma ga skyas so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blodang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dag slongad gang sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun byung 'phags pa'i
bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas spangs so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na skug skyas so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dag slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i/
chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so zhes tshul bzhin pa de la byed pa na mgi skyes so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang
rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'bags pa'i bden pa da ngas mngon par shes pa sa bsgoms so zhes tshul bzhin mdel/
byed pa na mig skyas so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dag slong dag ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam ra
bcu gnyas su bskor ba'i mig ma skyas/ shes pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yan/ blo ma yin/ rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid du lha dang bcas pa 'i 'jig rtan bdud dang tshangs ba dang bcas/ dag sbyong
dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mar bcas pa 'ad las grol ba dang nges par 'byung ba dang ma ldan pa dang/ rab tu spel ba dang/ phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sa mas kyis mang du
gnas par ma gyur cig dag slong dag ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar shes so// dag so dang

ngas gang na 'phags pa 'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa banuganyis su skor pa'i mig skyes shing shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes pa de nas nga lha

tsa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang tshangs pa dang bcas/ dag sbyong dang bram zar bcas pa 'a skya dgu dang lha dang mar bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang mi ldan pa dang/ rab tu grol ba

'tsho dang/ phun ca leg dang bral ba'i sa mas kyis mang du gnas par gyur cig/ dag slong dag ngas da nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar shes so/

chos kyi rnam grangs de bka' stsal pan/ tshodang ldan pa ko'u nga n+ya dang/ lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang pal ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ko'u de skye la
bka' stsal pa// ko'ud na khyed kyi chos kun shes sam/ bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so// ka'adu tsho khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ kun shes sam/ bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lag
so/ kun 'tshal lags so// tshe dang ldan pa ko'u da nus chos kun shes pa sade'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'ud n+ya zhes bla dgas su btags so// tshe dang ldan pa ko'u dunus chos kun shes
sazhas sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams sgra sgrogs par byed de// grogs po dag bcom ldan 'dasakyis wA ra Na ga ri drang srong snaba'i ri dgas kyi gnas su lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos

kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan par/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor pa skya bo mang po la bzhi pa dang/ snyabo mang po
la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don da/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phur bskor bas lha'i rigs mngon par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes
dbus bsgrags so// sa bla'i gnod sngon rnams kyis sgra thos nas/ nam mkha' 'a rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ros dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang/ 'thab bral dang/
dga' ldan dang/ 'o ldul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas/ skad cig dadang/ thang cig de dang/ yud tsam de dang/ skad cig dang/ thang cig dang/ yud tsam
de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rtan gyi bar dus sgrugs so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sgra sgrogs par byed de/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis wA ra NA sar drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas
kyi nags su lan gsum dubazlas/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan ng 'dag sbyong ma/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdung dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang
pa [48zh]// 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par 'ga' yang ma bskor ba/ skya bo mang bo la phan pa dang/ skya bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rtagal sAng brtsi ba dang/ lta dang ba rnams kyi
don dang tshan pa dang/ bde ba'i dare bskor bas lha'i rase mngon par 'phal zhing/ lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyangs bsgrags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis wA ra NA sar dwangagong
