smra ba'i ri dgas kyi gnas su lanagasum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan par bskor pas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhas tshig
bla dgas su btags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' sum pa// dag slong 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang
zha na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'ibaden pa dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa go/ sdug bsngal
'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhen/ skya ba sdug bsngal ba dang/ rgya ba sdug bsngal ba dang/ na ba sdug bsngal ba dang/ 'chib sdug bsngal ba dang/ sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal ba dang/ ma sdug
la dang phrad pa sdug bsngal ba dang/ gang 'dod pa tshal te mared pa de yang sdug bsngal ba dang/ mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba so/ de yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir
'a phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ yang srid pa'i srid pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa//
da dung de la mngon par 'dod pa ste/ de spang pa'i phyir 'a chags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal 'gog tu 'a gas pa'i bden pa gang zhan/ yang srid pa'i
srid pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa dang de la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de nyid ma lus par spangs pa dang bor ba dang/ bsal ba dang/ zad pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral
ba dang/ 'gags pa dang/ nye bar zhi ba dang/ nub pa lta/ da mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags
pa'i bden pa gang zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sa/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'
dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i dang nga 'dzin de/ de yang bsgom par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pan/

tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di su len pa mad nga ra zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// lnga snga'i dag song lhag ma rnams la na chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/
da' tsha'ajig rten na dgu bcom pa gcig dang/ gnyis pa na bcom ldan 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag slong lnga snga'i lhag ma rnams la bka' stsal pa
dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no// dag slong dag gal te gzugs bdag yin na/ gzugs la gnod pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar ma 'gyur zhing gzugs la bdag ga gzugs 'di lta bur gyur
mchog 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang thob par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gang gi bya'i gzugs bdag ma yin pa de'i re gzugs la gnod pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing gzugs la dag gi
gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig/ 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam pa yang thob par ma 'gyur ro// dge slong dag tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang// 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin no// dge slong dag
gal da rnam par shes pa bdag yin na rnam ra ra shes pa la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar ma 'gyur zhing/ rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'ad lta bur gyur cig/ 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam
na yang thob par 'gyurano// dge slong dag gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par
tsha shas pa 'di lta bur gyur cig/ 'di lta buram gyur cig snyam n yang thob par ma 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa
ba/ gang an da sdug bsngal yazhe nam/ sdug bsngal ma yane/ btsun pa sdug bsngal ba lags so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos/
thos pa dang ldan po de 'di na bdag go bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam/ btsun pa ma lags so// dag song dag ji snyam du sams/ tshor ba dang/ 'du
shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam nga ra shes pa rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa ma rtag lags so// ma rtog pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yan dam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa sngag bsngal lags
so Da me rtag pa sdug bsngal pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'ad ni bdag go// bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di na bdag gi bod ga ge zhes
bdag tu khas len ta/ btsun pa ma lags so// dag slong dag de lta bas na gzugs gang yin pa de ci 'ang rung ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ daltar byang ba 'am/ nang ga 'am/ phyi'i
'am rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin/ bdag na de ma yan/ da nubadag gi
ma yin no zhes ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o// dag slong dag de lta bas na tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ja snyad pa gang yang rung ba
'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar bya ba'am/ nang ga 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba
'am/ thabaganyebade dag thams cad na bdag ma yin/ bdagan de ma yin/ nga na bdag gis ma yin no zhes ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o// dag slong dag 'di ltar bar
pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni/ na bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di bdag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin par lta ste/ da de ltar lta ba na 'jig rten ru yang len pa med do// lanar mad na
yongs su gdung pa mad do// yongs su gdung ba mang na bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba sta/ bdag gi skye bzad do// tshangs par spyod pa la bstan to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las
pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad ngashad pa na lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams kyis len pa med par zag ba las sams rnam par grol lo// de'atsho dgra bcom pa
ltadang/ drug pa ni bcom ldan 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das wA ra Na sa'i 'babachu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na bzhugs so// de'i tshe wA ra NA sa na rigs kyi gtsobo zhes
bya ba'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rinyim re razhing bud med kyis rtsis pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pas lus snyom/ lus dub pa/ lus dgudapa
0 myur du gnyid leg par gyur to// bud mad de rnams kyang lus snyom/ lus dub lus dgud pas myur du gnyid log gyur to// rigs kyi bu gtso bo'ibu grags bamtshan mo gnyid sad pa dang//

bud med de dag thams cad brdol zhing skrunamor byung la skra'ang lag pa brkyang ste byung rgyal du bla ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang da bdag gachung ma la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de nas rigs/
kyi gtso bo'i bu grub/sa pa mal chen po las babs te/ rin po che' lham brgya stongar ba zung cig gyon nas nyal khang gasgo gang na ba der song lta bu n nas/ grog po bdagan gtsus so// grogs po
bdab/na nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang/ de'i sgom ma yin pa rnams kyis phyanas skad kyang ma grag par byas so// danas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khyigyi gang na ba der song na phyin/
nas grogs po bdagan gtses so// grogs po pa dag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang/ de'i sgom ma yin pa rnams kyis phyi nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so// de nas rigs kyi gtso
bo'i bu grags pa grong khyer gyi sgo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag gtses so// grogs po bdag na nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang/ de'i sgo ma ma yazhipa rnams kyis
phya nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so// de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'bab chu gnod pa can gang na ba der song ba na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'graman//
00 @#// gtsug lag khang ga pa rol bla gab med pa na/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i khu khrags pa 'ong ba la yang dang yang bzhes shange 'chag pas 'chag go/ rags kyi gtso bo'i sku
grags pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'bab tshuganod pa can gyi 'gal na/ 'chag pa rgyarang bo nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dag slong bdag naganyis so// dge slong bdagazhinyams so zhes skad ngan phyung//
dunas bcom ldan 'dus kyis rigs kyi gtso bo de grug pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gshen zhutshur shog/ gnas 'di khyod la 'tshe ba med pa ya'i/ 'di ni nyams ba med pa yin/ da nag gis

kyi sa tso bo ni'u grag pa ran ngo tshil lham brgya go yaM bzung cag po 'bab chuganod pa can gyi 'gram du budanas/ 'bab chuganod pa can rgal taM/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song sta phyan nas/ bcol
ldan 'o das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas taM/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khrid de/ nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gang na ba der
gshegs nas/ byon pa dang Da gdon bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag
bar bstan/ yang dag par 'dzazhi du bcug// yang dag par gzangabastod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi dam
ba0 glang ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin ra 'a gtam dang/ tshul khrims kyi gtam dang/ mtho ris kyi gtam dang/ 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang/ kun nas nyon mongs ma/
dang / rnam bar dang pa dang/ ngos ra byang ba dang rab tu dban pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang/ rnam pa ra byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do// gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga'
ba'i sems dang/ mgu ba'asogs dang/ sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang/ skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ yang dag rdul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yan pa 'dalta ste/ 'phags pa'i nga den pa bzhi ngo// sdug bsngal drang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam de rgya char
bshad de// dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog mad patshon rtse'i 'os pa'i nang du bcugan/ chonartsilegs par 'dzin du btubo pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug
bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i bdun ba bzhi po 'di lta sta/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang lam rtogs so// de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags kha chos mthong ba dang// chos bo
pa dang/ chos rigs pa dang/ chos kyi gting rlabs po dang/ som nyalas rgal ba dang/ tha tshom las rgal ba dang/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang/ gzhan gyis ma bkri ba dang/ ston las
bstan pa 'i chos rnams la ma 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba/
btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdagabcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su
mchilags kyis/ bdag dag bstan du gzung du gsol/ deng sman chad ji sang 'tsho'i bar du srog dang nang bsdos te skyabs sumachibang mngon par dang lags so// dran mo zhig de nyid kyi mtshan mo gnyid
tsha'i leg pa las sadan/ gzhon nu grags pa mal chen po na misang bar mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang rabs kyi gtso bo'i gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag rags kyi gtso bo'i 'daskad ces
gsol to// jo bo mkhyen par mdzod rtsa'i// gzhon nu grags pa ni rang gi mal chen po nam ganga' lags so// dazhus khyae bdagarigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems/ gzhon nu nor gyi par chom rkun nam/

g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol du khrid par ma gyur grang snyam du sems shang/ phyogs bzhi'i pho nya rtab dag bkye nas/ rang nyid ma lag na sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu gnod pa can

zla gang na ba de lags su song ba dang/ khyim bdagarigs kyi gtso ngos 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na/ rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig phud pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du/
sams te/ gzhonanun nor gyi ru'i chom rkun nam/ g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol du ma khridi kyi 'daltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi graman/ rin po che'i lham brgya stong ra bi zung cag sud pa las na/
gzhon nu 'bab chuganod pa can gyi gos 'di nyidi nas rgal bar ma gyur grang/ 'ad ltar 'bab tshuganod pa can gyi 'gram na/ rin po cha' lham pa rgya stongar ba zung cag bor ro snyam du bsams nas/ 'dab
chu gnod pa can gyi rigs de nyid nas rgal to/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring bo nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang 'ad

snyam du dgongs te/ can s kyang ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas khyim bdag rabs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhi'i ma mthong ba de lta bu
zhag bu'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon ra ra 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ khyam bdag rags kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan ra nyidi la 'dug bzhi du
mi mthong pa de lta bu mdzang do// de nas khyim bdag rags kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songs zhinas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mgo
gzhon nu grags ba gatrages sam/ khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shage dang/ stan 'di bon la gzhen zhu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang gzhi pa de yod do// de nas khyim bdag
[g]@#// 'gres kyi gtsobo 'di snyam du sems te/ gdenam za ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu grags pa gzigs par gyur to// 'ad ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces
bdag de'i phyir 'dug shagadang/ stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug ba mthong bar 'gyurab 'i gnas gang yin pa de yodazhes bka' sul do snyam du rage nas/ dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ mchog/
tu dga' ba dang/ dga' ba rgya chen po dang/ yade bang ba rgyas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bo phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ khyim
bdag ragis kyi gtso bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no// chos kyi rnam grangs bad bshad pa na/ khyim bdag rags

kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul mad cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// tshe dang ldan pa grags pa yang gyon thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol
bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas/ de'i tshigs su bcad pas bka' su la pa/ rgyan kyis brgyan bzhin du ni chos spyad de//dul zhing yang dag
sdom pa tshangs spyod la 'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ni// de ni bram ze dag sbyong dge slong yin// de'i tsha'ajig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang ]bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das so// khyim bdag rigs
kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang gzhon nu grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu tshur shog/ khyod kyi mi lus ngal zhang lus dub pas sa
sngags gdon gyis khyim du 'dong/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag rdzasnyam dusams/ gang gas mi slob pa'i shas ra dang
maslob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhapa// 'di lta sta/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mngon par rtogs pa de cig pa khyim pa khyim na gnas pa 'am/ gsog
'jog ga longs spyod kyi/ 'dod pa langos spong par 'gyur ma/ btsun pa ma lags so// khyim bdag ji ltar khyed kyis slob ra'ashes pa dang/ slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i ba den pa bzhi po/
'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin du gzhon nu grags pas mi slob pa'i shes pa dang/ mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa
bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mngon par rtogs so// btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gsan/ mi slob pa'i lta bas 'a pa gas pa'i bden pa
bzhi po 'di lta ste sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ las mngon par rtogs pa nipiris pa legs par red lags so// bcom ldan 'das slad bzhin du 'brang ba'i dag sbyong
@#// grags pa la thugs brtsi ba nye bar bzungs ste/ rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der gshegs na legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bad ga rigegs kyi gtso bo la rang
mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas khyim bdag rag sa kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs bas gnangabar ragi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song de// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te ngu bzhin 'brong pa'i

dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang/ khyim bdag rags kyi gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so// de'atsho tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang

du bsdu ba'i phyire ba'i sgo na sdod do// tshodang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ gdan bshamA nas
tsha 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das gdan shams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan
'das gdan gshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// danas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i m dang chung ma gnyis kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo ri sa phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
[n ] phyogs gachag tu'akhod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i sa dang chung ma gnyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam byas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzan du bcug/ yang dag
par gzengs bstod/ da nga dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad d/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng pa gang yin pa 'ad lta ste// sbyin pa'i gtam dang/
tshul khrims kyi gtam dang/ mtho ris kyi gtam dang/ 'dod pa rnams la mnogachung zhing nyes dmigs dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang/ rab dudaben
pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do// gang gi tshe de gnyas btsem ldan 'das kyi dga' ba'i sems dang/ na gu ba' saMatsA dang sgrub pa dang
bral ba'i som sa dang/ skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus pa la/thalegs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa/
gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam de rgya cher bshad de// dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtse
'os pa nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chud ma gnyis kyis sman de nyidi la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa 'i bden pa bzhi po
'da'// sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lama mngon par rtogasaso// de nas tshodang ldan pa grags pa'i sa dang chung ma gnyis kyase chos mthong
ba dang/ chos thos pa dang/ chos ra gi lo dang/ chos kyi gdung slas pa dang/ som las rgal ba dang/ the tsom las rgal ba dang/ gzhan gyi dringam 'jog pa dang/ gzhan gyis ma bkra ba dang/ ston pas//
bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jig pa thob nas stan las langs ta bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag
cagan 'phags so// bdag cag na mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang/ dag slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs sumachi lags kyis/ dag bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ dang slan chad
ji srang 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mngon kharadad lags so// btsun pa de'i slad du 'dare zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
grags ba'i ma dang chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// dazhas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma pa/nyas kyis bcom ldan 'das ma gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan/
'das gdan la bde bar bzhugs pa dang/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang/ bcar ba dag rang ga lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed d/ rnam grangs du mas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba
[z]dang bca'i pa dag ga rang gi lag nas khostabasadashang tshim par byas nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed rgyu bar ri gnas / snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom/
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i re 'bod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang
dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 'dzad/ yang dag par gzangs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de rnam grangs dumar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ a nga dag par
'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' ba mdzad nas/ gangan las khazhings lhagshegs so/ wAr Na san khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa
dang gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa gang po dang/ dri mad dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smig bgos nas
dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bzhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems de// kya ma'osangs rgyas mchog ma yin pa ma yin 'ang chos bstan pa yang mchog
ma yin pa ma yin taM/ gang gi phyi'i daltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa bshagashin tu gzhon pa/ shani tu bde ba 'dod pa yang sku dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang [H.]
[03 ]@#// dag kha kho nas khyim nas i med par rab tu byung gsi/ ma la bdag cag ga gses kyang skadang kha spu bregs te gos dung snag bgos nas dad pa dang dag pa bonas khyi zhas khyamachad pa/
kho nar rab tu byung bar bya'o/ snyam mo// de nas rigs kyi gtsobo'i bu gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa gang po dang/ dri mang dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ lag bzangs te/
rabs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams wAr Nas nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sa lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas/ phyogs kha rug tu
'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa gang po dang/ dAmod dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ lag bzangs do/
rgyu rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu byung ba dang/ bsAn par rdzogs par
dag slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsung sa pa'i tshos 'dul ba la rab tu
byung ba dang/ bsnyan par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob ste// de ltar rab tu byung nas tsho dang ldan pa de dag ga cig bu dben pa bag yod pa/ brtan pa dang ldan pas bdag taMng gtod par gnas
0 so gtsag pu dben pa bag yod pa brdzun pa dang ldan pa// bdag nyidi gtod par gnas pa na/ gang gi phyi'i rags kyi bu dag sku dang/ kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig bgos nas dad pa yang dag
pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byang bar byed pa/ tshangs par spyod pa ba mtha' bran mod pa tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/ bsgrubs nas bdag cag ge
skya ba zad do// tshadas par spyod pas bstan to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di la sa gzhan ma shes so// zhes go bar byed cing/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag soms shin tu rnam par grol ba/
kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to// da' tsho 'jig rten na dgra btsem pa bcu dang/ bcu gcig pa na bcom ldan 'das so// wAr NA si na grongamigatse bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u
lnga b.rus rabs gyi gcongo'i bu dang po dang/ gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa ste/ grags pa dang/ gang po dang/ dran r dang/ ba lang bdag dang dalag bzangs
ta rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang kha spu brags te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so// shes nas kyang
de dag 'di snyam du sams te/ kyi ma sangs rgyas rna mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin taM/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang
@#// gnyas ra dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa sta grags ba dang/ gang po dang/ dri med dang/ b.lang bdag dang/ lag bzangasataM/ rabs kyi gtsobo'akhu

rnams na ri shag shan tu gzhon ra/ shan tu bde ba 'dod pa yang sku dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur sgrig bgos nas dad ba yang dag ba kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gas/ ma la bdagacag kyang skra dang

kha spu bregasanas gos dur snyag bgos taM/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyi med par rab tu byung ngo snyam mo// de nas grong khyer gyi gtsobo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu bo dag wA ra NA sir bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der song sa lhags pa dang/ rtsom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khodanas grongama'i gtso bo'i khyilulngakhacu po 'dab gas

zla/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par ma gsungs pa'i tshogs 'dul ba la rab tu byang ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dag spong ba dngos po gnang na bdabod lcag da pasom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs bar spyod pa spyad bar ra bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa 'anyis 'dul ba la rab tubyung ba dang/ bsnyan par rdzogs bdag seng ge dngos po thob//
da ltar rab tubya nas/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dang na la bag yod la rten pa dang ldan pa bdag nyade gtod par gnas so/ gcig pu dban pa bag yodapa rdzun pa dang ldan pa// bdag nyid gtod
[e ]par gnas pa na/ gang gi par rigs kyi bu dag snga ma bzhin du ji sridas nas shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dag bcom par gyur to// da' tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang
drug cu gcig pa na bcom ldan 'das so// n gnas bcom ldan 'das wAr NAsi'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so// nga nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dag song mas

la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag nga na lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yazhi pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slongadag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad 'as grol ba 5na gyis

dag slong dag spyi bo mang po la thun ba dang/ skya bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten lasAng brtsi ba dang/ lha dang ma rnams la phan pa dang/ bad pa'i ched du rgyu zhing dang la/ khyed gnyis shang na gcig

tum 'gro shag/ nga ya nga ltang rgyas grong khyer pa can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ de nas bdud stag to can 'di snyam du sams te/ dab sbyong go'u ta mo 'ad wAr Na si'i drang srong smra ba'i ro degs

kyi nags su 'dug nas/ de nyan thosa rnams la 'di skad ces chos ston te/ dge slong dag nga na lha dang mi 'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dag slong dag khyed kyang lha dang ma'i/

'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba an gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing dang shage ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyaragang na
[z/ ]@#// bder rgyu zhing 'gro zhes zeragyis/mal bdag kha sa de la 'di lta stadakrug pa'i las shag tu kha'i phyi de nyibar 'gro'o snyam mo/ danas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u yacha byad du
bdag dig ngon 'grwa la te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas 'di nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug statshigs su bcad pas gso ba pa/ ma grol grol bar 'du shasan// jaltar ba dag
'di grol bar sems// bdag gis dag sbyong m grol bas// 'ching ba chen pos bcing ba yin/ gdan s pa com ldan 'das 'a desnyam du da gos ta e ma'o 'dazhibadud sgra'i can yin 'alta ste/
dkrug pa bas kyi bar na par 'os so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshig gu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ni lha dang mi rnams kyis// 'ching ba gang yin kun las grol// bar chad byed pa khyed
bcom par// sngale can de ltar shes par gyis// danas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bsams te/ dag sbyong go'u taa'isams kyis ba dag gis so snyam du ragazhas/ sdug bsngal zhing yadaoM bad
kha yar la bcags nas/ de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyage su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dag slong dag na lha dang ma rnams kyi 'ching ba
gang yin kha thams cad las grol ba yin no// dag so dag khyed kyang lha dang ma rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dag slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes
[08 ]bya kha nas rgyu zhing dang shig/cas byakha'i bar gongam bzhin du'o/ da 5steng rgyas gyis grong khya gyi snga can gang nab der gshegs so// btsun pa bka' bzhi'i 'tshal nas dag slong rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das las mnyananas ljongs rgya zhing dong ngo/ dunas bcom ldan 'das kyis wAr Nasar jatsamakhazhadakyibar du bzhugs nas ltang rgyas kyis grong khyer rdo 'gangazhabadar rgyu'ang
gshags taM/ rim kyis rgyu zhing gshags po dang/ grong khyer sdacan du byon to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ral pa can gyi nags tshang tshang gang na ba der gshakhag tazhin sa nga
zhig gi drung du bstan ta/ nyon bar gyi gnas pas bzhugs so// de'itsho drug nus bzang bo'i tshogs grong khyer lta can gyis khyi'il du nyag re zhing bud med kyis byas pa 'arol mos rtsa bar byed/ dga'
bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ de rnams las budachad ga dal ba cas pa la rta bros so// danas drug cu sde ba dang po 'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal gyi nags tshatshang gang na
nga ra 'dong ba dang/ drug cu sde ba 'ang bo'i tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes la dad par 'os la/ khang po kha/ thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba zhi ba dang dul dang ldan pa/gsar gyi
nyed sbyong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing gang zhig ga dungan brtan bzhugs kha mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
(@#// gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cag bud med cig gzigs sam/ gzhonazhu dag bud mad de khyed cag gi ru 'ong/ btsun pa 'dan bdagacag drug nus pa zang po 'tshogs/
grong khyer sde can gyis skad rol du bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rolamos rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid dga'i dgur spyod par bgyid da/ denams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyod/ dga' bar bgyid/
dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pan/ bud med cig dam bcas pa dul rta boranas bdagacagacholalags so// gzhan nudag ji snyam du sams/ bud med la ba gang yin pa dang/ bdag nyid tshol ba
gang yan ba gang ba dam btsun pa bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyid/ bdag cag bdag nyid tshel ba gang lags de 'dam lags so// gzhon nu dag da' phur 'dug shag dang/ khyed la
chos bshad do// de nas drug chu snga bzang bo'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas yartsol ldan
'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'itshogs chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi yang dag par stan ba la sogs pa sngam zhin no/ de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis snyan di nyid la 'khor bzhin du 'phag
ba'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mngon par rtogs so// nga nas drug ru sde bzang po'itshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang/ chos thob pa dang/
chos rig pa dang/ chos kyis gtang slebs pa dang/ som nyi las rgal ba dang/ thartsom las rgal ba dang/ gzhan gyis drang ma 'jog pa dang/ gzhan gyis mi bkra ba dang/ ston pas bstan pa'i
chos rnams la ma 'jig pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag tagacig tug zer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'a rags so/ bdag cag khacom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dag slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag cag
dag pasnyan du gzung du gsol/dang na chab srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang ang bsdos te/ skyabs su mchibara mngon nga ra dad lab sa so// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa la mngon par dga' sta/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo/des lug byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga zhus dong ngo// danas
bcom ldan 'das de 'chub mo'adas nas/ sdadon bza'atanam thapatshanabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sdo can du bsod snyom la zhugs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das grong
khyar rdo can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas gro khyer sogs can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/ de nas khacom ldan 'das 'di na dudagongs
[S11 ]/ gta ngos grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang/ dga' skyo bas ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ dedag gas nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byol rjes su brtson pas gnas pa/

na bdas mar sar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar dngar ba'i bstan bkur byas so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa'i mi dag 'tsho dang dga' sto ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so// grong pa'i bu mo
dam/ ba mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das tshur
spyon bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das gdan gshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so//
donas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas ta phyogs gcig tu'adugago/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i

bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstaces bya ba nas mngon par dad nas skyabs su song pozhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// dunas grong pa'i bu mo dga'
@#mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol te// btsun pa de'i sad du 'di zhal zas kyis mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga'
stobs ma la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo// de nas grong pa 'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobasams bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhug par rab gnas/
gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing a
par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i rta phyag bcabs shang lhung bzed 'gyur bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'angasakyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i du mo dga' mo dang dga' stobasam la ches dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag la 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bazangs bstod/ ya dang/
par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// danas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sngacan s gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgos tangs rta yul mgat+ta 'dir ngang tshul

bzang por bkur ba'i dag stong ngam bram za bgang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas tshogs chung dus skye bo'i tshigs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yong snyam go/ de'atsholtang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
can btsas nas le brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs ba zhig yod pa de mkha sna'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang/ blamar bya ba dang/ rjed par bya bdang/ mchod par bya bas dag bcom par
dkur rung khor lnga brgya dnganorawan chu klung gse 'gram gyis bste gnas ni dka' thub spyod do// de nas btsom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te steng rgyas 'o dasungs
ral paca'adatsasazhas le brgya nyi shu na pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'dis bkada' mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do// zhes bya pa'i bar gongam bzhin du// ma la ngas stangargyas

'osangs ral pa can dbang du byas te 'di dbang du gyur na tshogs chung dus su lo tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo// danas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs skal pa can gyis bcad gnas ngan pa
der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ra la pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi chad du gdan bshams nas 'daskad ces kyang gsol to//
dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon/ dag sbyong chen po byon pa legs so// dag sbyong chen po yun ring mo zhig la gzhu gang nas 'khor du 'dir byon/ dag sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shag cas
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi gdon bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// danas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can dang/ bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ mgu
bar ba gyur ba'i gtum rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'ad skad ces bka' sulato/

khod srungs gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyed kyis ma khang du bzhag cig gcig 'dug go/ dag sbyong chen po bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyed mtho btsas par

'gyur du mchi// 'od srungs nge shig gnang bar gyis shag dang/ mtho tsam par mi 'gyur ro// dge sbyong chen po gal te khyed la mtho ma tshiman ngag sbyong chen po ci bde ba khor nar bzhugs zhig/ danas bcom ldan

'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can gyis ma khang gang na ba der gshigs da/ zhi nas mi kha nga ga phyi rol tu zhabs nga sa la nas mi khang ba nang du zhugs te// nyid kyis rtswa 'i gdang la bshams nas sku drang bor bsrang

ste/ spyi la mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyog par bzhi g ste gzhugs so// klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud pa chung ngo// bcom ldan
'das kyis kyang rdzu 'khrul gyis mthus dud pa phyung ngo// klu gdug pa khros pa'i mithus 'bar bar byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma khams la snyoms par zhugs so// ngo nas//gdug la khros
ba'i mthu dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus mi khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar tu/ ma lce gcig tu gyur ba srogapar byed do// de nas klu lding rgyas 'od srungs ralapa

can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta pa na ma khang thams cad 'bar kun tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar ta/ ma 'u gcig tu gyur nas sdug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sams da/ dge sbyong chen po ko'u tam
bya@#/ 'daltar mdzes pa/ klugadug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur grang/ kyi hud nyon mong pa bdag gi tshig ma mnyan no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'ad snyam du dgongs taM
nga steng rgyas 'od srungasaral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas chad pa bcad byas/ ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba sogs mnyam da ra bzhag na mas klu gdug pa'i ma zal gyis mnanal

das kyang de'i lus la gnod pa ma byed cing dul bar byas nas lhung bzad kyi nang du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul
a/ ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mas klu gdugapa' ma zal kyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa ma byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de dul bar mkhyen
nas lhung bzad du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs gang na ba der bsnams te gshagasaso// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang
bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// dag sbyong chen po gson pa lha zhig 'od srus gson no// dag sbyong chen po khyod kyis lhung bzed na bsams te byon pa ni/ 'od srungs klu gdug

kha gang gi mthus khyod kyi ma khang du mir gyur pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su ma skor ba de ngas brtul nas lhung bzed du gcug nas khyer te 'ongs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can

'dasnyam du sams te/ 'ad ltar dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul zhing mthu che ba yin te// ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yan no snyam mo// da nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas
'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas kyis nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// da'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam ma la longs su spyod pa'i
ma tha ba gsum gsum sta ma thab stong lnga brgya yod do// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams mi la yongs su spyod par 'dod nam sbar bar ma nus so// de nas bram za' khyabu de rnams ltang rgyas 'od
srus ral ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la longs su spyod
khar 'a tshal na zhugs de sbyar bar rdzong thog lags go/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mkhu zhig ma byung
grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cas gsol to// dag sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod

cig 'dir bdag gi bram ze khya'u lnga brgya tsam ma la lo ngos su spyod par 'tshal na/ ma de sbar bar rdzom thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag gi nye 'khoran dag sbyong chen po bzhugs nad 'i mthu
zhi ge ma byung gong snyam bgyid do// 'od spus ma sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chan de sngar du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lhan/

kyi lha 'am jus ma de rang nyang 'babor gyur to// de nas steng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can 'ad snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'phru'achazhimathu che ba yin// ya mtshan che tshod kyi bdag
kyang dgrwa kha com pa yin no snyam mo// danas bram ze'i khya'u da rnams ma la yongs bu spyang nas/ ma bsad pa ra 'dodon bsadar ra ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srungs
ral pa can gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig dang/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su sbyang nasaM
zla zhugs 'a gum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i dri ma thogs lags so// da nas steng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'a di snyam du sems te/ dag sbyong chen po// bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na da'o mgru zhig
ma byung grang snyam go/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ba/ sol to// dge sbyo chan bo mkhyen par mdzad du
! gsol/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams shugs la yongs su spyad nas zhug dgum par 'tshal na/ dgum pa'i rdzom thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dag sbyong chan po bgA
zhapa' mthu zhig ma byung grong snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs mad ngas da dam/ dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/ dan sa'altar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis ma budang/ lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus

sa de rang nyidi shi'i da nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam dus nas ti/ 'di ltar dag sbyong chen po na rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom ba yin no

snyam mo// de nas yang dus gzhan zhig na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can rang nying ma la yongs su spyod par 'dengon sbyar bar ma nus so zhes bya ba'i bar du nas bdag kyang dgra bcom pa la gnas bya ba'i bar du/

gong ma bzhazhi ni// de bzhin du yongs su spyad nas bsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas bdag kyang dgra bcom pa ya ni nozhas bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// da nas dus gzhag zhige na lteng rgyas 'od srung
ral pa can gyis ma khang thams cang 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ ma rtse gcig tu gyur nas srog pa rabyad ba de la ltang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang gzhan yang

rgya bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsgrims kyang bas da bar ma nus so// de nas lding rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'ang snyam du sa mas du/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dag sbyong chen po gnas na deb na thu zhag byung bar ma gyur
grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dag sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du
ga lagasol dag sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gis mo khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar tsa/ malcagacig gyur nas grub par bgyid ra de la bdag 'khor dang
bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims nas zhugs 'gum pa'i dzem thob/sa nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor ni/ dag sbyong na po pa zhugs na/ de'i mthu
wa zhage khyung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs mo de zhi bar bya 'am/ dag sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ danas 'di ltar s ngas rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thu dang [Y]

lha rnams kyis lha'i mthu ma khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to// de nas ltang rgyus 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam dusams te/ 'di ltar dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul chazhang mthu che ba yin to/ ya mtshan
chamod kyi/ bdag kyang dgrakhacom pa man no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srus ral pa can gyis bsti gnas nags tshang tshang na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po
bzhi'i bdag kha dog ga 'bags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang nab der dong ste lha gnas / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ da rnams dpar
nama'i phung bo 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ ma rtse gcig tu gyur nas bsub par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'dusnyam du sa mas do dag sbyong chen po yang
ma la longs su spyod// 'di ltar dada'i spyan ldan/ ma'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ mo lcagacig tu gyur nas grogs bar byed pa yod do snyam mo// de nas/
lang rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can nang bar sngar las taM/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen pomkhyen/
par mdzad du gsol/ 'di'i bdag mdang gsum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ dge sbyong chen po'i sbyin lta na zhugs kyis rung da sas 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar
rtam lta gcig tu gyur te bsrog kha brgyad ba bzhi mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'ad snyam du sams te/ dag sbyong chen po yang ma la yongs su spyod de/ de ltar de'i spyan snga na/ ma'i dung
kho 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ ma rtsa gcig du gyur nas bsrag par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo// 'od srungs cing mal yongs su spyod dom nga ma la yongs su mi
spyod de/ mkhas pa kun nas nyon mongs pas// sems ni yongs su blog khyed kyis/ ma 'am yang na chun la ga la// yongs rtan yon tan ci zhig yod// de lta tshod kyis 'di mdang
gsum rgyal pochen po pa'i po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshamo la bab ba na/ nga gang na ba der 'ong du lhag nas/ ngab zhabs gnyas la mgo bos phyag byas te ra rnams dbor nama' rung po 'bar
rab tu 'bara kun tu rab tu 'bar tu/ malcagacig tugyur nas srog khar byed par byed pa bzhi bo lta bu'i lus kya phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yazhin// danas lteng rgyas 'od srungs

la ba can 'dasnyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul chazhang mthu chab yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyis dag kyang dgra bcom pa ya'i no snyam mo// de nas lha rnams dag gi dbang po brgya byon
kha dog 'khags pas mtshan mo 'khab la na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ da dang gnama'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu
'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ rtse gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po dag las kyang ches lhagatsang 'jags la ches bzang ba lta bu lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lung rgyas 'od srungs ral pa

glu can de nyid kyis mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na mi'i phung bo 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'a phul zhing mthu cha ba gan/ amtshan cha tshod kyi bdag
kyang dag btsem ba gzhi no snyam mo zhes bya pa'i bar du bo/ngas bzhin no// danas ma mdzad kyis bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
zhinas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ dadapon che'i lung po khazhi po de dag nyid stacha khazhin du sdug pa zhes bya ba nas ma 'phung bo chen po lnga khongs rtse gcig gyur
nas srog ra ra byed dozhes bya ba de dag bas kyang ches lhag mang chas 'bags la ches bzang ba lta bu lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ stong rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can de nyid kyis mtshan mo rgyu/

skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngazhatsho'i phung pochen po 'khar zhes bya ba nas/ dag sbyon po rdzu 'phrul chazhangan thu che pa ya na te/ ya mtshan chatshod kyis bdag kyang dgra bcom la
zhe no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du ge ma bzhin no// de'i tshe stong rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can gyis 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdunar byed pa la bab bo// de nas steng rgyas 'od srung saral pa/

can 'dasnyam du sams te/ gal te ma ga d+ha' mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul chu zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na/ nganyid la bya ba byed pas sakyi/ bdag la na de lta ma yin pa'i
gnas yod kyis kyi cha dag sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo// danas bcom ldan 'das lam kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srural pa can gyis sa nas mkhyen
nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do// de'i tshe zhag bdun du lcang rgya sa 'od srungs ral pa can la red pa dang/ bkur sti chen po byung nas/ bza' ba dang/ ca' pa rab tu mang po dang ldan pa skye bo'i
tshogs chen po dang ldan/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po ya nga dbang du gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang/ 'di snyam dus nas de
zhag bdun po 'di la bdag rnyed pa dang/ bkur stechen po byung nas bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen bo yang dbang dugyur gyis/ kyam da na
dag sbyong chen po 'ong kyang ci ma rung/ bdag gis de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug gosnyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis sems mkhyen nas/
lteng rgyas 'od srungs gang na ba der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'dasus ral pa can gyas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyabcom ldan 'das la 'di skad las
gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan dubazhud pa lags/ 'od srungs khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag

bdun du byed ma la bab nas/ 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dag sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na/ dbon la bya ba byed par sa mas kyis bdag la
de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dag sbyong chen bo zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song yang ma rung snyam sems pa ma yan nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyed kyi sams shas nas/
zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo// 'on tsa'i slad du 'dir byon lags ]'ongasas khyod kyi mchod spyi'i zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rAd pa dang/bkur ste chen po/

bya zhing bza' ba dang/ bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skya bo'atshigs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma dag sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang min rung/ bdag gis de yang de la yongasu 'a'ongs srong
du gzhug go snyam dusams pa ma yin nam/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar lags so// nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyis sems shes nas da 'ongs pa yan no// dpag srong chen po ci bde kho nar longs sad du gso/

nganag ltang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/bad ltar dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa ya na 'o sAmamo/ de nas
lteng rgyas 'od srungs rol pa can gyis bcom ldan bdas la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyochen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang/ bdag gi khyed la chos dang mthun pa'i
'tsho ba sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pacan la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas ltengargyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho na
g.yos byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dag sbyong chen po gdugachod lags shing mchog na/ dag sbyong chen po de'i dus
la bab par dgongs su gsol 'od srungs de'i phyir song shage nga yang 'ong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can song nas rang bo ma lon par mkhyan nas/ ji ltar
thugs mnyam par gzhagazhas shang 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdag la de las kha dog dang dra 'am pa dang/ bodang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snyan rnams kyis
lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/ ltargyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyag pa sti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu ting nga'adzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa 'di la
ba zhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu 'ang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'ongs nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyas bcom ldan 'das bste gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa na gong
ngo mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dag sbyong chen bo byon tam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// ngag sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchig/ 'dir ngas 'od srungs khyod song
nas ring bo ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thug mnyam par gzhag na/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gi 'dzam bu'i glang du btags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang/ ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snyan
rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu ting nge 'a na la snyoms par zhug kyis gal te 'dod na leng stod ca// dge sbyong chen po mi bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas stong rgyas
khod srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'ang ltar dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu cha ba yin// ya mtshan cha tshod kyi bdag kyang dag btsem pa na ni no snyam mo// shade 'dzam
bu zhes bya ba gang gi/ 'dzam bu gling du btab pa dedang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na a rur 'inab pa dang/ nga la 'gas dang/ ka pad thazhigs dang/ skyaru ra'i nags kyang de bzhin no//
byang gi sgra snyan gyi gling dug/shegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lus lhung bar bkang ste bsnams nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can gyis bsti gnas khang nang dar kha/shags te/
byon nas gdan bshams ba nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lhung rgyas 'od sungs ral ba can 'ongs nas/ lang rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das khas kha nas kyis
gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dag sbyong chen po khyonatam/ 'od sungs 'ongasaso// dgi stong chen byed kyi lha bzad n
cigachis/ 'da'i das 'od srungs khyod song nas rang lo ma len par mkhyen nas ji ltar tshugs mnyam par bzhagan/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyis gang du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i gas sa lu
lhung bzed bkang nas/ 'dir phyin pa de lta bu ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod si/ dge sbyong chen po ci'ir ba kho nara' tshal lags so// de nas rgyas 'od
srus ral pa can 'disAm dusams te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi lo dag kyang dgra bcom pa la nanosnyam mo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
lteng rgyas 'od srungs rol pa can gyis bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyis bya ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i
dgos pa zhig byung ngo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la nus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song staphyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
many+tsa/ sbyan sngar lag khos sa la bsnun pa dang/ de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste/ chu 'bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do// 'ang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bas gnas

na 'chags na bkod ma chen po byang ste chu 'kha kha pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'ad snyam du sa mas te/ chu 'di sngon na yong na chu 'di da ltar gang nas 'bab snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs
ral ba can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songs bya'i nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dag sbyong chen bo mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'da'i bsti gnas na
'chag ban bkod ma chen po'i chabs gcig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'disngonan ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di dag gang nas 'bab snyam bgyid do//
'od srungs 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyis bya ba mdzad ba na/ nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
brgya zhigyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byur bar shes nas/ da gang na ba der 'ong sta bzhinas da'i mdun nas lag pas nga la bsnyan la las de nas bkod na chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus

chu'i bya ba mdzad de 'od srungs ljade 'dazhi lag bas brkos pa zhes bya ba'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'ang snyam du sams te/ 'di ltar dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che
ba yin te/ ya mtshan med kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa gzhi nasnyam go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bya 'khrid nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing bu lag bas bskos pa gang na ba der
gshegs te byonanas/ rdzing lag pas bskos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tun bza'achos gos rnams ba zhig ste/ rje ngalag pas brko sa bar zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad de/ rdzong khag pas
brkos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na/ shing ardzun gang na ba de legs su phyag brkyang ngo// de nas a rdzu ma'i sa la ga chen po dud par gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzong la ga
bas brkos ba nas byung ngo// steng rgyas 'od srus ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na ljang lag pas bskos pa'i 'gram na a rdza na 'a ra la ga chen po dud pa zhig mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang 'di
snyam du sems te/ Ardzu na'i ya la ba 'di sngon ni dung ba re ma gyur na/ ardzu na' la kha lag chen po 'di da su zhig gis btud snyam mo// de nas 'ang rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can bcom ldan 'das
[Fe]// gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rje

lnga khag las brkos pa'i 'gram na a rdzuna' la la ga chen po la dud pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sams te/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'ang sngon na dud par ma gyur na su zhig gi bdud snyam/
bgyid do// 'od srungs 'dar byed 'grangan nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzheng nas/ rdzing lag pas bskos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu
ts+tso na bza'achos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing la lag pas bskos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag las bskos pa nas byang bar 'dod nas/ shing Ardzu na 'di dag gang na ba de legs su lag
[– ]kha brkyang ba dang/ de nas ardzun yal ba ga chen po 'di dun par gyur te/ de la ngas 'jus nas rdzung lag pas bskos ba nas byung ngo// 'od srungs 'di ni a rdzu na lag pas bzung bzhes bya'o//

nga nas steng rgyas 'od sru ga ra kha ba can 'di snyam du sams te/ 'di ltar dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra macom pa yin no snyam mo// de'i tshe
bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod pa 'di sha na'i ras dag b.res nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod parisha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo// de nas lha rnams//
kyi dpang po brgya byin gyi sa chas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs la shes nas/ ri brag gcig la sa rdo leb che ba rang ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nga nang par song ste pan nas/ chos/
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'ang sa dag 'di la bkru bar ba/so/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa de na'i ras rnams bkrus
so/ tade nas bcom ldan 'das 'dasnyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha narasa rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sam kyis bon lhag 'das
kyid ges bar shes nas/ brag cig pas rdo leb che la rang pa zhig khyer nas nga rem ldan 'das gang na ba der song tshu phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ba sol te// rtsol ldan
'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa lisha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ reg khacom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod 'desha na'i ras dag bkramatsho// lang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bsti gnas

ga 'chag kha na rdzolag chu la rang ba dag mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdol ba cha la ring ba 'ang dag snon ni yod na/ rdol ba che la ring ba khang dag da su zhig gi khyer te 'ong snyam mo//
de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can ba com ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ngag sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// 'dar
[fo]@#/// bdag bste gnas na 'chag pa na/ rjelab chu la rang ba dag cig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam dusams te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon na ya ma mchis
sban rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag su zhig gis 'tshal te ma chas nyam bgyid do// 'od srungs 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'isha na'aras dag bar s so// nga nas nga 'dasnyam du dgongs te phyag dar khrod

pa'isha na'i ras dag gang bkru snyam pa dang/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis da'i dgongs pa shas nas brag cig las rje leb cha la range ba zhig blangs to/ dgang na ba der 'ong ba'i
tsho nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i shana'i ras rnams bkrubar gsol/ dus de la phyag dar khrod la' shana' ras rnams bkrugs so// nga 'di snyam du/

rgyu dgongs te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i risha na'angs rnams gang du ngagam snyam pa dang/ nga nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams kyis nga'i dgongs pa shi nas brag cig las rdo la ba cha la rang ba zhig
blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ongs te can nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'isha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ ngas de la ga dar khrod pa'i//
shana' ras rnams bkram mo// 'od srungs rdo leb chazhing rang ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs ba zhes bya ba'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sams te/ 'di ltar
dag srong chen po rdzu 'phrul zhingamathu chab yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pacan gyi pa

gnas kyi nags tshangs tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe norany+dzana'achu char bru gnas bab bo// de nas bcom ldama'adas chu klung ma gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i lding na rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag
las 'chag par mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ralapa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dag sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chun po brug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po
btsalasnyam du bsam nas/ shang ga pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na ltang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung ma gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng na//
sa rdul gyi yo ga ba bla gab med pa na 'chag pas 'chag ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'doskad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson nam/ 'od srungs gsan no//
ngag sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srungs 'jug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam ra ra bzhag na shing gcig pa'i

gru ji lto bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing ga cig pa'i phru ja lta bar chu la
'jug de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'disAmadu sams te/ 'di ltar dag sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yanete
ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ldengargyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis sems mkhyen pas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'ong sungs khyod na dgra bcom ba ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so// de nas
lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen do snyam du rag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// dag sbyong

chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ snyan par rdzogs pa dag skyong gdangos po thob pa ltan/ dag sbyong chen po'i sbyan sngar dag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//
'od srungs khyod kyi 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po mi bltas lags so// 'od srungs de'i phyi'i re shig 'khor la ltos shig 'dir khyod lta bu'i ma grags pa dang ldan ba bshes gnyin can
rnams kyis na 'khor la lta ba legs pa mnano// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na bdar songs phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras r/ bram ze'i
khye'u dgashes bar gyis shig/ bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bon/ dag sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par spyad na shes ldan dag tu byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gas cung zad ci 'tshal ba ste/
thams cad ni mkhan po la brtenanas lags ras/ gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyongan/ bdag cagakyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo//
bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dang shang shun dang/ 'khor ba dang/ ral ba'i spyi'u blugs dang/ blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung nerany+dzana'i 'gram du bor shog/ mkhan po
bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'udo rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang shang shun dang/ 'khar ba dang/ ril ba spyi'u blugs dang/ blub gzar rnams chu klung na rany+dzana'i gram du bor nas/ stong
rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ mkhan po 'dir bdag 'di ltar bdag cag gi bdagags bgyi ba
gang lags de bgyis lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral bcan 'khor lnga brgya dang/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol/
ti// dag sbyong n po bdag gi 'khor la bltas lags ta/ bdag legs par gasung ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bstan par rdzogs pa dge sbyong gi dngos po thob pa la na/
bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srungs tshur shog// tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyi tsho dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung
bdang/ sa bsnyan par rdzogs pa dang/ des dag song gi dngos por gyur to// de'i tshe stengargyas 'od srus ral pacan gyis spun chu klung 'od srungs dang 'od srungs gas/ 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang
chu klung ne rany+dzana'i 'jug gi 'gram gyis bste gnas ni dka' thub spyodado// chu klung 'ong srus dang/ ga ya 'od srungs spun gnyis kyi g.yang gzhi dang/ shang shun dang/ 'khar ba dang/ ral ba/
spyi'u blugs dang/ blug gzar de dag chu klung ne rany+dzanas khyer ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams/ rgyal bo 'a mchog
rkun nam ma'am chus 'os dmag 'ga' zheg byar bar ma gyur grang/ ma la bdag cag gas tshang pa mtshung par stong pa rnams btsal losnyam mo// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs

spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can tsho'i zhing lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bste gnas gang na ba der song ba dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can sku phyi snam sbyar
bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// chu klung 'od srungasadang/ ga ya 'od srungs gas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can
[8 ]sku phyi snam sbyar bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sn gnas mnyan pa'i phur 'dug pa mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan ng lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so//
'od srungs 'da mchog yin la de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srungs deb 'dazhi mchog yanitaM/ don ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs spun dga' ng ma dus nas/ sangs rgyas/

bcom ldan 'das na mchog yan zhing chos bshas pa yang mchogam yan pa ma yan te/ gang ga phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can btsas nas brgya nyi shu lhag na pa rgas 'khog gdug pa ma ga dra'i/
mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ blamar bas/ rjed par byas/ mchod pa byas shang dgra bcom par bakurang da ang lan gnyis kyi bar du dag spong na ro'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyis
ma la bdag cag kyang dag sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// dag stong chen po bdag cag legs par

gsung pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba/ bstan pa pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na bdag cag drag sbyong chen po'i spyan sngaratshangs par spong ba spyad par brgya'i// khyad kyis 'khor la
bltas sam/dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od su ngas dag de'i phyirar shag 'khor la ltos shig/ 'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grag par ng ldan pa/ ngo'as gnyen can dag gis ni'i khor
la blta ba legs pa yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs skrun rang ga bas gnas gang na ba der song sta na nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skadacas

thasmras so// bram ze'i khye'u dgashes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag ni dag sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na shes ldan dag ci byad/ mkhan po dag bdag cag cud blad rtsa'atshal ba

nga thams cad na mkhan po dag la brten nas lags kyis/ gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs bar spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'irjes su rab tu 'byung
ka ngo/ bram ze'akhye'u dag pa'i dus nga yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs sbyin 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bihud/ bcom ldan
lta 'das gang na ba der der so lhag nas/ btsem ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to 'dag sbyong chen po bdag cag gas 'khe la bltas 'gas// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag lag par gsung/
pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyan par rdzogs la dgasong ga dngos po thob pa lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spang par bgyi'o// 'od srungs dag
tshur shog/ tshangs par sbyod pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rang tu byung ba dang/ des bsnyan par rdzogs pa dang/ das dge slong gang ngos por gyur to/ donas bcom ]
ldan 'das kyisaral pa can stong po de dag rab tu byung/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzan gnas / lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhad kyis bar du bzhugs nas/ ga ya gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshags te/
rim gyis rgyu zhing gshags pa na ga yar byon nas ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon gyi sa ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'ad/
kyis dge slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'don par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul byase cho 'phrul dang/ kun rjod gyi cho 'phrul dang/ rjes su bstan pa 'i tshe 'phrul le/ de la bcom ldan
'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis tsho ba phul ni 'di yin tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na nyid kyi gdan gyis nang du ma snang bar gyur cing/ shar phyogs kyi stong gi bar snang
la sngon nga ra'i rags sa spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad d/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang de bzhengs pa dang/ bzhugs pa dang/ mnal bar mdzad do// ma'i tang nga 'a dzan la snyoms par zhug
bar mdzad de// ma' dang nga 'dzin la snyom par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad do// 'di ltaste/ sngon po dang
sar lo dang dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel gyi kha dog dag go/ cho 'phrul zung du bang ston pa mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas ma 'bar bar madzang la/ sku'i stong
las chu grang mo'irgyun 'bab par mdzad do/ sku'astodanas ma 'bar bar mdzad la sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'babs ta ra na dzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'a
phral snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ja lta ba bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul/
mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus to/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te da del 'ad zhib tsem ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phul yin no// de la bcom
ldan 'das kyis kun rdzor ba tsho 'phral na 'ad yan te/ dge slong dag khyed kyi sa mas na 'di lta bu 'o/ khyed kyi yang na 'di lta bu 'o/ rnam par shes pa na 'od lta bu 'o// 'dazhe rtogs shig/
'ad ni ma rtogs shig/ 'di na yid la byas shag/ 'di na yid la ma byed cig/ 'di na stongs shig/ 'di ni ma spangashag/ 'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis//
gnos shig ces smra ba 'di na bcom ldan 'das kyis kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul na 'ad yin te/ dag slong 'di thams cad
kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yon zhin/ dge slong dgamag dang/ gzugs dang/ mig gas rnam par shes pa dang/ mag ga 'dus rta rag pa
0 kun tu 'bar ba yin 'ang/ mag gas 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yani/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yan pa de
yang kun tu 'bar ba yanano// dag song dag rnakha dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/lus dang/ yid dang/ chos dang/ yadakyas rnam par shes pa dang/ ad kyis 'dus rta rag pa kun tu 'bar ba
yan zhing/ yod kyis 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis nang ga tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bad ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal bo yang ma yan pa 'byung bo gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba
yan no// gang ga'i kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi ma dang/ zhe sdang gi ma dang gtamug ga mi kun tu 'bar/ skya ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang/ smra sngags
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yad ma bdeb dang/ 'khrug pa sta/ sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes pa'o// 'ad ni com ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phral yan
no chos kyis rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dag song da len pa med par zagar rnams las sems rnam par grol da nas btsemaldan 'das ga
ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dag slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ byabacasapa/ byed pa byas pa khur por ba/rang ga
rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad ng/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sa mas shan tu rnam par grol bsha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// rgyal

bo gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mo rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu gang ra'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong sar skya'abasta gnas dang ha cang mi rang

blo ba zhig tu phyung ba de bran zon tshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te khyam par gyur te/ khyim n gnas na na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhi'i
rnam par rgyal ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyurati/de'i rin po che sna bdun na 'di lta bu dag yazhi par 'gyur ro// 'di lta saM/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin

po chadang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bud mad ran po che dang/ khyim bdag ran po che dang/ bdun pa blon po rin po che yin no// de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byang bar 'gyur te/ dang 'a ba rtul phod pa/
yan lag mchogag gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'a dzoms pa/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i s chen po ma lus par/ gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshob mad pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon
gyis bda' pa da la/ chos dang mthunu'ang ston pas gu ra ra ra ba ste/ gnas par 'gyur ro// gal tas dang kha spu bregs ta gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag ra khe nas khyim nasal

mad par rab tu byang bar gyuran/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa na nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gu 'jag rtan dusla rnam par grag par 'gyur bar lung bag zha do zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ma gtsA'i

rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzug can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ma gan+ta'i rgyal po'i bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i
u lan rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kya gzhonanu gang ra'i ngos nas bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa' sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sku rnam pa ragrags par 'gyur bar lung
bstan pa zhig thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong sa bzhin du'o// lha de khum shagi/ lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bo 'gyur dumachi'o// grong pa dgashAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu gangs ri'os zhig
bya ba nas grag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i par gong ma ba zhin te/ lha de khun sha/ lha bas gtso bo bas chos gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'ozhas khyed cag de skad ma skyashag da ci'i phyir zhi na/ grong pa
dag shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te 'khora'as sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te sku dang kha spu drags te gos ngur sgrub
bgos nas dad pa yang dag ba kho nas khyai nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur tu/ de bzhin gshagos pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par
grags par gyuran/ dal nyan thos su khas blang bar bya'o// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo spungs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug zhas/
tha smon pa'i gzhi la smon par byed de/ kye ma bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rag pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bad
bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ spyas bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ blan chad ba/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang/ de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag
bar 'gro ba dang/ nye bar song na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dpaM/ bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shigs pa dang/ bdag gas chos shesaM nas bsub pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang
bangag gas blangs te gnas kyang nu ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dag song dgam ga d+ha'i rgyal bo gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng
ga khang bzangs kyi gzhal 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhal smon par byed do/ kyi ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de nga zhan gshegs pa dgrwabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag cig ljongs rgyu ba dang/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan

gang rta'a'i gram drang srong sar skya 'a ba ste gnas dang ha cayang marang ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa da bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rtan du sgyu rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/

zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smagabagos nas dad pa yang dag pa khenas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla zhatshad ba yang dag par rdzog
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag/ ga ya na ga ya' mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dag slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/
bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba// bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa// yang dag pa'i shas lasasams shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ma gda'irgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song sa lhags nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal por blo sbyangs gzugs can snying po/
la 'di skad ces smras so// lhamkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dan lha'i yul na rgyu ban shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nugang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rtan du sgyu rnam par grags par

'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin duste/ de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyam nas khyim mad ra ra rab tu byung ba de// bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzog
kha'i khyang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de dgag ya na ga ya'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can dugyur pa'i dag slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcos
pa khrag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sam shan tu rnam par grol bsha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ lha de la'akur skomadzod cig dang/ de lta na lha
gtso bo bas chesagatsor 'gyur ro// des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos ma ga la bsgo ba/ kA ya nang tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la song nas kho po'i
tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyungangs/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang ngan/ stobs dang/ bde ba dang/
[W ]sku nyams dang ldan nam/ rig par spyod dam zhes zhus la/ 'ad skad ces kyang gsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ja sung 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos
gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzamis cha dang/ snyan dpyad kyi rgyun snyan dang/ yo khang rnams kyis bsnyan bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshags su gsol/
zhes gsol cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhag ma des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan te bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgopos phyag byas// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das lam des 'ad skad ces gsolato// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+ha'i rgyal/

bar zo sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngas/ nyam nga bachung ngam zhag bya banas rig par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhan du g+ho/ snyun gsol la gas ga
kya ma khyod dang ma gang+ga'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo stangs gzugasacan snying po'i mchid nas/ 'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das
dge slong ba dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ ngosrid 'tsho ba'i bar du na pakha' dang/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzams cha dang/ snyan dpyad kyi kyis snyan dang/ yo byad rnams kyis bstan
bkur bgyadan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ba/ shegs su gsol zhes mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis da la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das
cang mi gsung bas gnang bar ra gnas / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas taM/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sn gnas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du
gyur ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chan po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu ma
ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshags pa na/ yul nag rno pa rnams kyi mchod rten lags par rab gnas lta 'angag tshal yod pa gang na ba der gshags so// de nas bcom[R]
ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma gcu pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltangabrang gatshal yod pa na bzhugs so// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stod ga deg slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/ sems ni tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du sta/ ma ga
d+hal ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten lags par rab gnas 'altang brang ga tshal na yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ ma gad+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab
gnas ltang brong gi tshal na yod pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang shang rda bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ rgyal bo'i mthuchan po dang/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pos rta dang/ shing rta
