brgya stong sung dang lhan cig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang/ rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/
de'i shing rta'i 'khor lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to// des bsams pa bdag gis las skyon can cung zad cig byas par ma gyur grang snyam mo// lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po
khyad kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi/ khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gangasan pa de dag btson ra na 'dug gas/ dadag thon cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te da ltar gdon no zhes rgyal/
ngos btson rnams 'den du bcug go ]yang rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na/ de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go/ ngas yang bsam pa bde ba gsin gangonam za par las skyon can zhig byas

ta des na bdag la ltas ngan bgazhan sgol dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo/ ltade rnams kyis ya nga sbas pa/ rgyal po chen po khyed skyabs las skyon can ma byas modakyi/ khyed dang lhan cig las mtshung
par spyad pa gang yan ba de dag kha cig na 'dus/ kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhas bya ba dag na/ las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sngon cig/ rgyal pos yu la de na gnas pa'i spyi bo'i

tshogs thams cad kyang bkug go/ de nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang/ zhabs 'bring ba rda pa'i tshogs khri brgya stong dang/ mag d+ha'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang
lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas pang sta bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ bstan bkur ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo// de ji tsam gzhon pa'i sa'i par du bzhon
bas song ste/ bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar bzhugs so// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag ji tsam nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i
bar da nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po za'u kha dang/ gdugs dang/ ral gri dang/ nor bu'i rnga yab dang/ lham khra bo rnams skud do// danas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs/
gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i ma tshanam lnga bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song sku zhi ba dang/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud de/ de rang gi ming nas phyungs/ lan gsum du gsol pa/ btsun pa bdagan ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so// btsun pa bdag na ma ga d+ha'i
rgyal ba khablo sbyangs gzugs can snying bo lags so// rgyal po'ags so// rgyal po rdodabazhin no// da de bzhinato/ rgyal po chen po khyod ma gad+ma'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying

bo yan no// rgyal po chen po khyed ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no// rgyal po yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shag/ danas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
po bzo spungs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas taM/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ ma ga d+ha' bram ze dang/ khyim bdag kha cig na/ bcom ldan 'angs/
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha cig na bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang/ yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i
0 gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas taM/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha cig na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'khod do// kha cag nabcom ldan 'das rgyang rang pozhas/

mthong nas cang mi smra par phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas dad nyid du 'dus shang 'dug par gyur to// de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram za dang khyim bdag rnamA

'ad snyam du sams te/ rudag sbyong chen po lcang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi tshangs bar spyod pa la spyod dam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral da na dag sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyor snyam mo//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi ma ga d+ha'i bram za dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ tshad ldan ba ltang rgyas 'od srungs la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmos pa/
lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dar ru mthong na// ma sangs nas na brtul zhugs bad dag spyod// khyod kyis ji ltar ma yi mchod spangs pa// ngonang 'od srungs nga la smra bar gyis// lteng rgyus
bod spungs gas gsol pa/ 'di na kha cig zas skom de bzhin ro// 'dod pa dag dang bud med kho na /// de dag phung po 'dri mar rab mthong ste// ngag bdag mchod ni ma dga' bsrog
blugs min// khyed na 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang// de bzhin re la ya di na ma dga' na/ lha mi 'dzag rgan la mu khyodakyi yod/ dga' ba yin nam 'od srungs dra yas smos//
phung po ma mchis zhi ba ci ma mchis// 'dod sridam chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis// gzhan gyis ma da kra'i go 'a yang mchog mthong// das bdag mchod sprin ma dga'/
bsreg blags mni// go 'phangs ma nyams mchog ni ma mthong bas// mchod sbyani brtul zhugs dang na zhugs dag gis// grol snyam bdag ga yaden rmongs gyur to// dmus leng gyur nas sku
'ga'i rjes bzhazhi mthong// skyob pa gtso bo mchog gas legs bshad pa// go 'phang 'dus ma byas de gzod mthong na// thub pa go'u tam rnam par 'dAn khyed ni// skya bo'i sde la char don brtson
bden la zhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis rtogs pa legs rtogs te// khyed kyis nyes par bsams pa yin// rab tu phye ba'i chos rnams la// gco
cha bo gang yin de blangs so// 'od srungs 'khor skyo ba skyed cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa ltang rgyas 'od srungs bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phyi nas/ ji ltar sams mnyam par gzhag na rang gi stan gyi
nang du ma snang bar gyur cing/ shar phyogs kyi stang gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam bzhi byed de/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul rnam bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul
chi mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs taM/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'bad skad rus gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na bdag ga ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das na ston pa/
lags so// bdag na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// 'od srungs de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'od srungs nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yan no// khyongan pa'i nyan thos sa na no// 'od

srungs nga na khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srongs khyod rang ga stan ji lta ba la 'dug shag [” ]/da nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs kyis bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram khra dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sams te 1 ngag sdong chan po na lteng rgyas 'od srung

ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa lam srod kyi/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can nyid ni dag sdong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la srong do snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ma gad+ha'i rgyal/
bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba yang yod/ 'jog pa yang yod/de'i skyo ba dang/ 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o/ rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang
'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa ra shes pa la skye ba ya nga yod/ 'jag kha sa nga yod de/ da' skyo ba dang/ 'dzag pa yang rag par bya'o// rgyal po chen po yang rags kyis bus gzugs/
kyi spyi ba dang/ 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ gzugs de yongs su shas so// rgyal bo chen po ragis kyi bus/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par
shes pa'i skyo ba dang/ 'jig pa'i chos nyidi rag nas/ rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po ragis kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na/ gzugs la bdag gam bdag
gar khas mi len na/ ma 'dzan lhag par ma gnas/ mngon par zhan pa ram byedud// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam cha ra shas ra
yongs su shes na/ bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len na/ mi 'dza/ lhag par ma gnas/ mngon par zhan par ma byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag
gam bdag girakhas ma yin/ ma 'dzan/ lhag bar ma gnas/ mngon par zhan par ma byed na/ tshad mad cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// zhes pa'o// rgyal po chen
po rigs kyi bus chor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gar khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhan par bang na/
tshad mad pa'i grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o// de nas ma ga d+ha' bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gal du gzugs bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa bdagam yanan/ 'o na bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skya ba 'am 1 gso ba po 'am/ gang zag gam/ shad las/
skyas sa ma/ shed bu 'am/ byed pa po'am/ byed du 'jug pa po 'am/ shes pa de 'am/ kun nas shes pa de 'am/ song ba de 'am/ kun nas slong ba bo 'am/ smra ba po'am/
tshor bu do 'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung byung bar ma 'gyur zhing/ da ltar yang yod pa ma ya na pa gang gas de dang der dag ba dang/ sdig pa las byas pa rnams kyi rnam
bar sman pa so sor nyams su myong zhing/ gang gses phung po 'di pir da phung po ga zhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yazhi par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis/
ma gda' bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyan nas/dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag bdag bdag cas bya ba ni byis pa so so 'i ngo dzes pa dang ma ldan pas
btags pa'i rjes su lhung ba yin te/ 'di la bdagaca 'am bdag ga med kyi/ dag slong dag skya ngan sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing/ 'gag ba na yang sdug bsngal 'ang 'gag ge/ skye ba na 'du byung/
rnams skya zhing 'gag pa na 'du byad rnams 'gag par 'gyur/ rgyu de dang rgyan de la brtan nas sems can M rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug go/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshags ja ga 'du byang kyi
nyang mtshams sbyor ra thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'bodang/ skya ba 'dogs par mdzad da/dag slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das
nga sa gnas can rnams kyi 'chi 'a bo nas bya ba nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur re zhig bya bar mkhyen te zhes bya ba'i bar du gongam bzhin no// dge slong dag ngas
da ltar mkhyen caded ltarogazages pas nga 'di skad ces bdag gam/ sems can nam zhes bya ba nas tshor ba po zhes bya ba'ang ra gong ma bzhin sta/ gangan byung 'byung dar ma 'gyur 'ang da ltar yang

yod pa ma yin pas gang ga de dang der sdog pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par snyan pa so sor myo bzhi ng/ gang gag phung po 'ang bor da dung po gzhan dang zhi mtshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar brtag
pa 'di yin no zhas ma gsung ngo/ de la chos kyi brdar btags bzhi'ang ya nite/ 'dalta ste/ 'ad yod pas bad yod/ 'di gyos ra sa bad skyo ba sta/ 'dal ste/ ma ragi pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byad/ 'du
khyad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis mang dang/ zugs/ mdze dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skya mchad drug gi rgyan gyis reg pa/ rig pa'i rgyun gyis
tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rgyan gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rgyan gyis lag la/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis rgya ba/ skya ba'i skyon gyis rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags
'don pa dang/ sdug sngal ba dang/ yod na ga da ba dang/ 'khrug ra rnams 'byung// de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po' ba'ashag ngo 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/
'di med pas 'di yod la/ 'ad 'gags pas 'ad 'gag par 'gyur to/ 'di lta sta/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gag bas rnam bar shas ba 'gag/ rnam
par shes pa 'gag pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ mang dang gzugs 'gag pas sku mched drug 'gag/ skyamachar drug 'gags pas/ rag pa 'gag/ rig pa 'gag pas ra sa tshor
ba 'gag/ chor ba 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags dpag/ lan pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skya ba 'gag/ skya nga 'og grwa pa sa cha
shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yad ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de lta na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag
bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'du byed rnams n sdug bsngal lo// mya ngan las 'das pan zhiba'o// rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal
'a ga ga ste/ rgyu ba cad pas mi 'byung zhange nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas/ 'gag pa 'di nyidi ni sdug bsngal gyi u0f00tha' in no// dge slong dag de la yongs su mya ngan laMs 'das pa
gapan na/ gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de nanyi bar zhib/ da ni sa la bar gyur pa de na nub pa ste/ dag snyingadag zhi ba'a gnas 'di yin te/'di
sa phung po thams cad spangs pa/ sradapa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gagal/ mya ngan las 'das pa yan no// da nas bcom ldan 'das yang ma gtsA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzug
can snying bo la lan gzhes su bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sams/ gzugs rtag kha ma ma rtag/ btsun pa 'di mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin/
lanam/ sdug bsngal m ya na btsun pa bad ni sdug bsngal la gas so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'byung ba chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan ng/ 'dan
padag yin no// bdag na'od lanano// 'dan de dag ga bdag go zhes bdag tu laMs 'a na ma ra byed dmaM/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po jasnyam du sems/ chor ba dang/ 'du shes dang ]
'du byed dad rnam pa bshas pa rtag gam mi rtag btsun pa 'ad ni mo rtag lags so// sa rtag ra gang yin ra desdug bsngal yazhinam/ sdug bsngal ma yani/ btsun ma 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so//
mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'achos can gang yin ba de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan// 'di ni lo ngag yanin// bdag ni 'di yin// 'ang no bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas
len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang ci yang rung/ 'das pa'i m/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ daltar byung ba 'am/ nang ga'am//
pa' 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa'i m/ gang dag thag rang ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye bar yang rung ste/ da thams cad la 'ad ni bdagam yan no// bdag na 'dam yan no// 'di
bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'ire shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar du go/ rgyal bo chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed gang ci dang
rung pa dang/ rnam par shes pa gang ya ru la nga rung pa 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang ga 'am/ phyi'i'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/
khya nom ba 'am/ gang dag thag range ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye bar sa nga rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yan no// bdag ni 'ang ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma ya na nozhes

de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du lta bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar ma thong ba na gzugs la ang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang/
'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la yang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yod byung na 'dod chags dang 'bral lo// 'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//
rnam par grolan bdag gaskya ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa bstan to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'ad las gzhan na shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ya shes mthong
wA bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad de shad pa na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang lha brgyad khri dang/ ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag 'bum phrag dum
chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul mad tsang dri ma dang bral ba skyas so/ 'danas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbungs gzugs can snyang pos tshes mthong ba dang/ chos thob pa dang/ chos rag pa
dang/ chos kyi gting skyabs pa dang/ som nya las rgal ba dang/ thatsom las rgal ba dang/ gzhan gyi drang ma 'jog pa dang gzhan gyis ma bkra ba dang/ ston pas bstan pa'i
chos rnams la ma 'jags pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
rdzol 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa nga dag na 'dzags so// na ngon par 'phags so// bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang dag slong ba dge 'dun la skyabs su
mchi lags kyis dag bstan du gzung du gsol dang slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos ta skyabs su mang bar mngon par dad lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cagabcom
ldan 'das dang/ dag slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la/ dza srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang 'gams chu dang/ snyan dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams
kyis/ bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po' khang tugshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi/
gsung bas gnang/ de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po ba bcom ldan 'das cangam gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos

phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgya zhing gshegs pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab du byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa

na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khong na mu stags yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes nas ring por ma len ra ra de rnams kyi ston pa dus byas par gyur pa dang/ de rnams kyi nang na 'o rgyal dang/ pang nas
skyabs zhes bya ba gnyis tshogs su sdud pa dang/ tshogs kyi 'dren par gyur pa gang ya na pa da/ yongs su 'dren pa na da gzhas gyis 'di ltar yu bu cag las gcig gas bdud rtsi sngar rAd pa des gcig la
gcig smra bar bya'o zhes ram bca' bar byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang/ chos gos thogs te 'gro ba dang ldeg ra dang/ cung zad blta ba dang/
rnam par blta ba dang/ bskum pa dang/ brkyang ba dang/ snam sbyar dang/ chos gos dang/ lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes bas rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la zhugs so//

sha dang tshan kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba shage gaphare spyod yul du zhugs pas/ tshe dang ldan brta thul 'go bdang/ ldog pa dang/ cung zad blta ba dang/ rnam par blta ba dang/ bskum pa dang/
brkyang bu dang/ snam sbyar dang/ chos gos dang/ lhang bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag range bo nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ' da snyam du sams//

rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyid lhags shing gnas pa dag 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam lta bu na bdag gi sngonachad 'ga' yang ma mthong gas ma la bdab/de'i gan du song ste//
dag slong khyed kyi ston pa nigang yin/ gang ga pari na rab tu byung/ su'i chos la na dega' zhes dra'i snyam du ragisanas/ lan po tsharub pa zhig na 'gro ba dang/ ldeg pas shas cher
sdong tsange 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gang na ba der dong ngo// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'ad skadams gas so//
dge slong khyed kyi ston pa gang yani/ ba/ngag phyir na rab tu byung/ su'achos lan dga'/ tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i tshos kyi dag sbyong go'u tam shAkya'i gis las sku dang khaspu bregs nas gos ra
smig dag bgos te dad pa yang dag pa lonas khyi nas khyim med par rang rung ba zhig yod de/ de blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byung chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kho bo'i
son pa na bcom ldan 'das de mno// kho bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo// kho'o da'achos la dga'o// dag slong de 'khyer chos ston cig/ tshodang ldan pa kho bo'i gzhen pa dang rab tu byung ba gsar
bas/ de' ra kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa/ shagasar dag nga tshor ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ga ngas rgyas res bstan pa rgyanar yang dag par rab tu bstan par skul ma yin te// 'on kyang 'di

ltar des bstan par bya'o// dge slong ba po la ni don dgos kyi tshig ri'an tu mang bos kyang bya ste/ khyod kyis de mang yang rung nyung yang rung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis rab tshe tshigs su
bcad pas smras ka/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang// da ya rgyudang de 'gog pa dang yin ba 'ang// de bzhin gshags pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to// de skad gsung pa'i tshul dag spyong cha/
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pan/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la chos kyi cho le rdul med cinganAm dang pal ba skyes so/ nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang/ chos thos pa dang/
chos rig pa dang/ chos kyi gting subs pa dang/ som zhwa las rgal bar ng/ thatsom las rgal ba dang/ gzhan gyi dwang na 'jog pa dang/ gzhan gyis mi bkra ba dang/ ston pas
@# ]/bstan pa 'chos rnams la ma 'jigs pa thob pas da re stod bsung nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang// chadang ldan pa rta thulag la ba de legs su thal mo sAr ba btud do/
nga' tsho tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// skyob pa rnams kyichos bad yan// bskal pa bya ba khrug khrug tu// sngon chadam mthong ma thos pa'i/ 'chi med u ngan mad pa yi// go 'phang 'di
la rjes su rtogs// tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la nga zhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab na/ 'ongam 'tshal ka lan ta ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal

tshe dang ldan pa rta bul gyis slas pa la mngon par bstod pa dang/ rjes su ma rang bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// tshongang ldan pa rta thul la lan

gsum bskor ba byas ta song nas/ kun tu rgyu rang nas skyas ga la ba der song ngo/ kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal thag rang lo khe nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang kun tu rgyu nye rgyal/
la 'ad skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams na rnamar/radangs/ bzhin gyi mdog na yongs su dag/ lngags ra'i mdog na yi ngas su dkar na/ khyod kyis bdud rtsi red

dam/ dang ldan pa rnyed do// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos ston cig/ de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyas pa'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ chos rnams gang ngag rgyu las byung ba dang// de yi rgyu dang

[4 ]/de 'gog la/nga azhi ta// da pa zhan gshigs pa nyid kyis bka' su la to// de skad bag du nga nga 'tshul can de ba skyong rgyu/ tshe dang ldan pa da dung yang lan gcig rdzong tsag/ tshe dang ldan pa nga rjod par bya'o/
chos rnams pad dag rgyu las byung ba dang// zhas khyu ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pan/ kun tu rgyur ngas rgyas chos rnams 'chos kyi ma rdul mad cing dri
ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas kun tu rgyu bang nas skyes tshos mthong ba dang/ chos thob pa dang/ chos rig pa dang/ tshes kyi gting slobag ga dang/ som nya las rgal ba dang/ 2 tsam las

gal ba dang/ gzhan gyi dri ma 'jog kha dang/ gzhan gyis me bkra ba dang/ ston ra sa bstan pa 'chos namA la ma 'dzagis pa thob nas// mostongabasAdAnas lag la gdabs pa brkyang// kun tu zhi rgyal ga la ba
nga lab/sa su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'atsho tshigs su bcad pa snyas ra/ skyob pa rnam sa kyi chos 'di yan/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrag tu// sngon chad ma mthong la thos ba'//
'chid mya ngan mang ba la// go 'phang 'angal rjes su rtogs// tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan la rgyal po'i kha ba 'od ma'i tshal ka lan ta ka' ba gnas

'di nyingana'o// tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o// tsho dpaldan pa de'i phyir rdza 'khor la blta bar bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu mi grags ba dang
ldan pa shas par gyur pa dog gse 'khol bltab na 'gas pa yan no// da nas kun tu nye rgyal dang/ pang nas sa ca tis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa// baa na
khya'anams shes par gyis shige/ kho bo cag gnyis na bcom ldan 'das kyi lhan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed na/ khyed cag ji ltar byed/ mkhan po ga'us bdag cag cud zad mi'atshal ba gang
lags pa dedub/thams cang mkhan po gnyase la brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/ gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po ga2sa
rab tu byung ba'i rjes surab tu byang bar bgyi'o// bumazi'i khye'u rnams da de 'dus la bab par shes par gyis shas/ de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang/ pangazhas skyas gnyis 'kher nyas brgya lnga bcu
dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo// de'atshon bcom ldan 'das dag slong ga 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal/
dang [0f10]bang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po khen nas gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsalar// dge slong dag khyod kyis grogs po'i tshogs yongs su sdad pa/ tshogs yongs su 'dren pa/
tshogs kyis mdun nas 'ongs ba 'di lta ste/ nye rgyal dang/ pang nas skyes gzhas mthong ngas/ btsun pa mthong ngo// 'di gnyis nanyin thos zug mchog dang/ zung bzang por gyur te/
gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyural/ cig shog shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong zhag gas de 'tsho tshigs subacad pa smras pa/ na ba
ngagongs u kha mkhaM' yas pa// skyes bu'i dbang po'akhyen mthar byon// bcom ldan srid ba mthar med pa// grogs po nyi rgyal pang nas skyes// 'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par// da ltar mchi
ba gzigs gyur nas// tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis n// 'di gnyis nga la nyan thos kyi// zung mchog 'gyurazhis ngas bstan to// gcig na rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog/ cig shos shes rab
ldan pa la// mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang/ pang nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba larab tubung ba dang/ bsnyan par rdzogs par
dag slong ga dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngaratshangs ra ra spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byang zhing/
dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ nga dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i 'jug kho nar/ sku byi ba dang/ snam sbyar gyon par gyur te leg na lhung bzed
bya@#// thogs pa/ skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang dge slong bsnyan par rdzogs nas le brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// yang snas pa/ de bzhin gshegs
sbra pas tshur shog bka' stsal pa// skabya rnam sbyar gyon pa 'a lug ldazhang// mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyurataM sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab pa ra gyur// danas dge slong
rab tumang po ngag snyadro sham thabs gos/ lhung bzod dang/ chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu
stags can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring bo ma len pas yag rangs shanga mngon par ma dga' ba de dag gas/ dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas ci 'dra'ang tshigs su
bcad pa snyas pa// sangs rgyaso ma ga d+ha dag ga/ grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid nas// phyin chad mig bkra bar bya// des dag song
rnams spagopazhingam dga' ba dang/ ma 'jigs pa mad par gyur to// denus dag slong rab dumang po dag rgyal bo'i khab du bsod snyoms brgyusanas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyi dro bsod snyoms
mi len pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ sdug bsngal zhing/ de mi bdebs/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang bo dag las 'di skad cas gsol to//
btsun pa 'dazhibadag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga drosham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzedadang/ chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po 'di'ang tu nga sod snyoms la zhugs par ng/ nas rgyal po'i khab kyi
ma gang dag yang dgag rgya la bcan gyi mu stegs can kyi chen s nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma len pas yid ma rangs shang mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gag/ dag slo dad dang
dag mthong nas 'dra zhing tshags su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyus ma ga d+ha dag gi/ gronga mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khroden/ phyin chad ci zhig bkaM
bar bya// zhes ma chi nas des bdag cag rnams sku gong zhangam da ga' ba dang/ ma 'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag rgyal po' khang
kyatsha de skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad ces/ 'ang de la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyis 'de mdzad do// de dag chos kyis 'da mdzad l// mkhas pa su zhag ma bzod byed//
chas brjod na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rol pa tsam 'am/ spobs pa tsam gang yan pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mad par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag/
@#// sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po 'khab du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ da nas rgyal re 'i khab kyis gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi nu/

stags can gyi gnas nas rab tu byang zhing bsnyen par rdzogasanas rang lo ma lon pas/ ya ma rangs shing mngon nga ran dga' ba de dag gas/ dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas cho 'dra zhing tshigs bcad/
ra snyas ra dbangs rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gas/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab ga shigs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'akun khradin// phyin chad pa zhig bkra bar bya// de nas dge slong zhag gas de'i
tshagase su bcad pa smras pa/'di la dpa' chen bad gshags dag/ dam pa'i chos kyi khring mdzad d// de dag chos kyis ('ang mdzad la// mkhas pa su zhag bzod mi byed// ngaskad ces smos pa
dang rgyal po'i khab kyi sa de skad zer ba rnams kyi rol ba tsam mam/ spobs pa tsam gang yan pa nga thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyurato// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyas ]rgyal po zas gtsang la spang sa ba bskur ba/ lhadabyas pa brgyad du gsol/

khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thobanas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gas thos kho na btang ba las da nga nyid du rab tu byung// bo'agang dang gang gtang ba de dang

dedag de nyid du legs ra ra gsungs pa 'a chos 'dul ba nyid rab tu byung bar gyur to// rgyal po khras gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang gtang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa/

chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas sogs khongs su chud cing 'dug pa/ 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugasami dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang

gi tsha gzhonu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod la da/kho bos sprang lag skyel ba 'am kha tang ba las/de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'das bzhugs so zhes
sla'o// da na kho bos 'gran pas skyel ba'i lo btang na 'ga' yang ba phrin khyar te ma 'ong na/ jaltar sams khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras ba/ lha bdagamachis te/ bka' mchidi'atshal/

la sar mchi'o// rgyal bo zas gtsang gsi smras ba/ 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang du'ang stan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug ngas khyod kyang sngon nga nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i
gnas gang yin pa de yod do// 'charakas smras pa/ lha sar mchilags so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyidakyis spreng yag bras ra// lhums su zhugs la bzung nas su/ khyod/
nagang gse cha bskrun te// nyon mongs ma rab 'bar bzhin du// rgyal ba ljon shang la bsdad na// de na khyod kyi slob ma yi// yal ga lcag la 'phel bar 'gyur bas// gzhan n ba de bas
dga' bor gyur// bdagan sdug bsngal skul bar ldan/ gzhan yang gong gas khyod na ljon shang lcag phran mtshungs tsam na// bdag ba bu na de yazhisnyam nas chung nas
bskrun bskrun te// bu gcig yul mas 'bras bu yongs su spyad pa thob gyur na// la yog ga'abras dum star khyod la snying rdzamade// gangatsho thogam bltas pa na// 'di den bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams//
shin tu chadong phan gdags zhes// khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas na// khyod kyi zhi gnas de bar d na// bdag dang gnyis kyi tshogs rnams la// thugs brtsa rjes su bzung maMdzod de// gshags
par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// zhes spang ba'i ya gi 'char kas khyer nas chas te ram byas mnyan yod du phyin pa dang/ lam gyis dub pa ngal gsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
sa ni nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po khras gtsang gas gsol pa/ sprang yage lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la sa yig dzul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bkrugs so// bkyags nas ya/
ga mtha' gcig tu bzhi g pa dang/ 'char kas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rtsalags/ ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/'char ka 'dong ngo/ 'char ka sngon bcom ldan
'das dang lhag par 'das pa yin pas/ da sngon gyi 'dus pa kho nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal te ma bzhud dam/ bdag ga mthus bkra bar bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba
'ad la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shang// budags bkra ba yod pa ma ran pa 'di// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' na sa mnga' ba de// gzhimangazhan gang ga gzha
yas bkra/ gang zhig yul gyi rgya mong ma chags shing// srung 'ogs bkra ba yod pa ma ya ra gi/ sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yartsal mngabad// gzhi mdanan gang gi gzhi yAkhakaM// gang zhig
bcom nas brtsigs pa ming gyur cig/ 'jig rtenam ba rtsom nyung zad lo dman pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mapa' ba da/ gzhamadanan gangag ga' las bkra// lan la spobs pa med/
nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi// rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rag par bgyi'o// 'char ka sa ngas rgyas kyi ngonya na 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char kas gsol la/ bcol ldan 'das mi 'dug/
zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yon byas/ khyod kyang rab tu byushig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gse rgyal po zas gtsangam la slar mchib ra dam bcas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
sku par/ 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'ad ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ yab dang/ yum dang/ mkhan po dang/
slob dpon dang/ bla ma dang/ bla ma'i gnas lta burnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar m bzlog pas/ 'char kas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal ted na rab tubyung lags so//
[g ]/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra'i bu 'char ka 'da'i yun ring po'i don dang rin pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig/ btsun
pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la gnyan nas 'char ka rab tu byung// bsnyan par rdzogs par byas nas kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/

! khacha raka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ dang phan chad bud mad dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tunyal khar ma nge 'o zhis bya ba dag go/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshalas 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa
gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas/ bcom ldan 'das gnab de song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
( to bcom ldan 'das sa skya'i gzhir mcher gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'char ka song la khyed mong khenar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug ra ra sgor sdod la shAkya'adag stong 'ongs
so zhes pa rjod par bya'o// gal du nang du spyon cigazen 'jug par ba'o// zhugs nas gal te shAkya'adag slong gzhan yang byon nam zhes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams

cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing chapyad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri'i/ 'ad 'dra zhing chang da 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu ya nga gnas par ma bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams
duka cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas pa ram byed dam zhes 'don/ ma bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dren dgon ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod/
bar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang me'ang zhes 'dun/ rgyal burgyal byed kyi tshal gyis rnam pa bus te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byonanam zhes 'drin/ byonanozhes
brjod par bya'o// ja sridi cagan byon zhes 'dran zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das na chu 'a gsaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
song shag/ sa bdag rnams n tshig gas te// lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing// de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyi// sems bskyed pas na thams cad 'grub// bcom ldan

'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'charaka ji ltar skad cig da nyid la grong khyer sar skya 'a gzhir song ba da ltar sun gyis brlabs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa drag po skyes pad rgyal po'i
khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smas la/ shes ldan dag rgyal bo la shAkya'i dge slong mchas so zhes gsol cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ rtsi shAkya'i dag slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do//
nganams kyis rgyal po la sgus pa/ shAkya'i dag slong mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thongashag/ donang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras ra/ 'charaka rab tu byung ngam/
lha rab tu byung ngo// khyod sku 'ong ngo zhes smras ba ma yaninam/ 'di yan/ 'char kas snusapa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rta ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal/
kha nas chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i par bdag cag rab tu byung mod kyi/ bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu 'byung ngo// rgyal po sa ya nalag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas/ stan bshams pa nyid la
'dug tu bcug ste/ de'i don tu chu btsags pa dang/ 'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas ta zar bcug go/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang/ dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji sAd
rjes su bstan pa'i tshe ga yongs su longs spyod de// rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te/ sus pa/ 'char ka ca gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam/
'cha kas snyas ba/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba na cung zad tsam lags so// dpar ji lta bu/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru nga zhan no// rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no// zhum dang srin bum
khyar bzhin no// nam mkha'i dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'abu ga bzhin no// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras la/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byang 'di 'dra 'am//
lha 'di 'dra'ang cha byad kyang 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po zas gtsang brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang/ chumang du btab nas dbugs slar phyung ste smras pa 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa khyon
nam/ 'charakas smras pa// lha byon no// dus ji tsam na dgung bdun lon na'o// rgyal bo zas gtsang gas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur byas//
rgyal bo'i khab dang pho brang kyi dbusashag/ 'charakas snyasal/ bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par ma mdzad do// rgyal pos smras pa// gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa
'am gtsuga'ag khang du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'charaka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi rnam ba ri mor bris te bstan to// de nas

rgyal pos blon po rnams la smas ra/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' r bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang/ khang phran drug cu brtsigatu chug 'ag lhabaka'

bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi lagyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang khang phran drug cu rtsa cag brtse ba tu
nug go/ de nas khacom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen de la bka' sul te/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu songal/ dag song rnams la bcom ldan 'das ga ra skya'i gzhir gag
te/ gab sras gdan 'dzoman/ khyod cag las su zhig lta bar sgro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig/ btsun pa bka'agazhani 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos bcom
ldan 'das las mnyananas/ dag slonganams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshags te/ yab sras gdan 'dzom na/ khyed cag sa
du lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag leng shag ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'kher dul ba/ zha ba'akhelazha ba grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs bzhi pa/ 'khe dbugs
phun pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam pa dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom ba/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral da/mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa//

khyu mchog ba lang gis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po'i phrug gu'i tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sa nga ga mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis
bskor ba lta du/ nam mkha' lding ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram khra slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dar 'a bo ruba' rdzogs kyi
bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'dren lo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyis rgyal po blon po'i chogs kyis ra skor ba lta bu/ 'khor 'os
sgyur ba'i rgyal bo bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla brgya skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam 'od zer stong gis bskor ba la bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lA ba 'phags ba
po gru la bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mgi mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyan gyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag zangs rasi lhazha5na gyi tshogs kyis

bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu// gran chu dang bcas pa lta bu//

glang po dam pa dag sa ba dang bu la ba ltar dbang po rnams 'gan tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa// sku skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dang byad bzang po brgyad nus
rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gas brgyan pa 'asku/ nyoma'i 'od zer stong bas lhags pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa stobs pa ru dang/ ma'i jags nga bzhi
dang/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang/ thugs rdzachen po dang ldan pa/ dag slong gis rag 'dun chen po dang thabs cig 'bab chu ro he te kar byonano// rgyal po zas gtsang
gas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'dapa chu ro hatekar byo na'o zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gas grobakhyar sar skya'i gzhi rdob dang/ gyo me dang/ gso gas ma rnams bsal nas

tshanadan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dra shin tu zhim po'i pog phor ha par bshams/ dar gyis chun 'phyang mang po dpangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi da ka nas la/nga ya nga n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba
@#// gda' bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam rar do kra ba dag shom du bcug go/ ngan 'bab chu ro da te kal dge song kha gan
lag pa 'khru bar byed do// kha cig na so shing 'dor bar byed do// kha cig na khrus byed do// sa ra skya'i gzhin gnas pa' shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so/
zhes thos so// thos nas kyang kha cig na sngon gyis dag ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha rugan pe na tshan skyas nas thams cad chu gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung// ru yab sras kyis zhabasal
phyag byed dam/ 'on ta sras yab kyi zhabs la byang pa blta'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nga zhabs kyis saMr skya'i gzhir gshagasan/ shAkya
nga rgyal can rnams kyi ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi gnas su gshegs pa nas/ ldog po zhig grub pa lta zhag ste/ de lha brgya stong phrag du mas lha 'brang byas nas
stang gnam mkha' las bgshegs te/ ngas de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas da zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta nas/ ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyams nas/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi stang gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste// 'chags pa dang
[e ]bzhengs pa dang/ bzhugs pa dang/ mnal ba mdzad do// ma 'a tang nga 'a dzan la snyoms ra ra 'jug pa ra mdzad de/ ma' ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od zeranas pa sna tshogs dga' zhi bar mdzad da/ 'di lta sta/ sngon po dang/ sar re dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ la brgan dang shel gyi kha deb de dag
gi cho 'phrul zung du yang ston r ra mdzad d/ sku'i smanas 'bar bar ma tshad la/ sku'i stod chu grang mo'i rgyun 'babs par mdzad do// sku'i stod nas kha ba ra bar mdzad la/ sku'i gcud nas chu
grang mo'i rgyun 'babs nga ra mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta bar/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang da dazhanano// phyogs bzhir
rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par 'du mdzad pa de bsdus te/ ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams na de la drug ga sad tsam na'o//
bcom ldan 'das drug ga sAde tsam na zhi// dag stong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga' sr-ide tsamanan// dgo song rnams bzhi'i sa de ru lta'o// bcom ldan 'das bzha2
sudi tsam nan/ dag slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi sride tsam na na dag skyong rnams gnyis kyi sring tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi nad tsam 'di/
dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi sridi tsaa na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi gAdi tsam na bzhugs nan/ dag song rnams ma drug ga sudi tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug
shwags slade tsamanan/ dge slong rnams lnga'i de tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lda' sridi tsamanan/ dag slong rnams bzhi'i sridi tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i sridatsamazhan ba song nam
! gsum gyi srid tsamana'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni/dge gonganams gnyis kyi sring tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi sridi tsam na na/ ngab slong rnams ni gang lhag tsam
na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni/ dag slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gas cho' phul da lta bu de dang/ dag slong mang po mthong nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das

gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs da ra gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'charaka 'di na ngur gagyor 'arab tu byung ba mang po zhag lo dan/ de la gzhon nu gang yan/ tshe dang ldan pa/
'chags bcom ldan 'das bstan nas sbas pa/ 'di no be com ldan 'das lags srid pa 'a mthar byed s masakyi dbang phyug 'dren pa logs/ 'ad na nyon mongs sal mdzad nyan byed donana kun tu snyan adzad/
lags/ 'di ni dgongs pa bzhinabares stobs bcu mnga'abs kun kyi rol gshegs pa lags/ dri med btsal ba chos kyis dbang phyug khyed kyi sras lags mdang nga de gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal bo
zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas ta/ tshigs su bcad nas gsol da// blo gros yangs pa khyed la 'di dang ni/ kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag brgyus te/ bltams pa 'di
tshen sa nag mos pa dang/ ladzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das ra 'o// de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud pa mthong nas/ de ltar yab sras

kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci'i thatshigatsas ma dad pa spyad do// rgyal po lngas bgatsang ba/sa shAkyadang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad cus smras so// shes ldan dag da gdod kho bos gzhan
nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gis tsho gzhon nu don thams cad thub pa bltams pa na/sa chan po gsog ra ra gyur cing/ 'jage rtan 'ad thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos

gsal bar gyur to/ 'jig rtan n 'jig rtan gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag slag tu gyur pa// 2ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'ad ltar rdzu 'phrul che da/ 'di ltar m thuchab 'i 'od kyis snang ba nyams su myong ba dang yan
pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag skyabs pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gas gcig mthong nas// shes ldan dag gi mas can gzhan dag kyang 'dir/

rgyas pa lta/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'di'i skyes pa lta shas ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tsho yang kho bos byang chub sems dang 'a zhababs 'a na go des phyag byas so// gang gis gzhon nu don
ta@#/// thams cad grub pa zhang khas kyi mtha' la gzigs pan/ shang 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa rnams la sa dben pa/ sdig pa mi dag ba'i tshosanam sa las dban

pa rtog pa dang bcas/da byed pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las smyos pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsams gtan dang po bsgrubs te bzhugs pan/ shang gzhan rnams kyi grib ma na shar
phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab kyang/ shang 'dzam bu'i glib ma ni byang chub sems dar 'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad dubyung ba'achos des/
kho bo'i yod bsdus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so// de bas nas 'ad skad ces/ blo gros/
yas pa khyed lo 'di dang ni/ kun sbyin zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ ltam pa'i tshanas na gsos pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i grab ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// zhes smras so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brkul nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma bral gyis mnan nas/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bigs
sa// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzar camagamachi mas gang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshags su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal mad khang gi gnas
00 rnams las// yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las// dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnams su// jalta bur na'aba'ang shag bzhugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
mi sa bdag po gang du na// khyam gyi 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phags pa ya na gnas pa bcus// thub pa rnams na gnas par mdzad// rgyal pos gsol pa// ba so
gsar gyis rtsa ba can// shin tu bde ba btang ba ya// khra la mnal bar ma dzad r las// btong ba la na ltar manal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam
spel gnas ma la// dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/ ma tog bkram pa ra chags med cing// yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal// rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo 'di kyi pho brang
na glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa/ tshor mar bcas pa 'as gzhi la// zhabs kyis ji ltar bshags par madz+dzad/ dbacoldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yi shangarta 'a la
rkang / yang dag rtsol ba'i kha zhen pa las/ sa kun rnam par rgyan na yang// nyon mongs cher mas gnod pa chad// rgyal po zas gtsang gas gsol na dar 'bo sngon nika shi ka'i
nabazo' mnabs nas mdzes pa la// dur smig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa// ji ltar khyedakyi sku yas bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo nga' gis ngotshashes/
nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te// da bshes thub pa zhi ba rnams// nags khrod na nA mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsolal/ 'dakar khyod son
gses ra gyi gzhong pa nas// du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las// 'di ltar gtso bo da lta' risod snyoms na// phal pa gsol ba ji ltar na gung du mchi// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsar/ zas kyi gde ba thams cad spangs na/ nges par byung dang mnyam pa ragazhag ldan pagi/ ngan chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi// 'jig rten kun la snyadang rtsa ba phyir
spyod do// rgyal bo zas gtsang gas gsol da/ mgur du bde pa mang bgyid pa// rgyun skyoms kha ra'i chab gsol na// dog pa can la dri nga ba'i// chab ni ji lta 'ag tu gsol//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'i bdag po gang 'thungasan// bdag la 'thung ba thams cad na// dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur ba// chab kyi ro mchog nga 'thung ngo// rgyal po khrus
gtsang ges gsol pa/ 'di lte khyodasngon bsal khang gzhal med khang// khang bzangs stangan ja lta'i dus pa zhani bzhugs// da ltar gtsag pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa// blo bzangs ja
ltar bsnyangs pa med par bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ go'u ta ma 'dzags pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa// dri ma nga ga chags bcas par yang spangs pas// nga namya ngan 'jigs
pa mad gnas te// da la 'dan 'jags pa cung zad mad// rgyal po zas gtsang gas gsolar/ khyed sngon khrus khang shani tu sa nga 'ongs par// khrus mchog khyad par 'phags ra sa rtag bsal na/
ga cig bu khyod nanags khrod gnas ldan par// thub dbang de ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur// nga rtsom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ go 'atam chos mtsho bran dratshad la// tshul khrams 'jug
ngegs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rag pa'i son tanam bkrus na// lus ma g.yor bar ra rol rab tu rgyal// rgyal po zas gtsang gas gsol ra/ dpa' bo nyid kyi khang nan// gsar
dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na// rtog pa can la drang ba/ chab kyas ji ltar khrus mdzad lapa ga// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u tam dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med//
bsod nams 'dzug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rag nga 'a yon tan ma sa bkrus na// lus mi g.yar bar n rol rab tu rgol/ rgyal po zas gtsang gas gsol pa// dpa' bo
khyed sngon sor skyas// tsan dan gyis ni bkrus shang// ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa las// de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ tshul khrim
nga la rgyan man ta// tshulakhrims nyidan phyagar yin// gas dang nor bu rna cha dag/ rmongs skyes nga la ci zhig bya// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// gang gas khyed na khyad du gsod//
gang la sa 'jigs su rung ba skya/ sad byung ba 'ang ba/nga las skyes// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gas nga khyung gso da dang//
gang zhig las 'jigs pa dang// gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag// nyon cig khyed la bshad par bya// rga dang na dang 'ching ste// gal te 'di gsum yod mnan// nga yang 'an tu yang 'ong ba'ade
yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gas gsol pa// shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba// legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo lags// khyod ni 'aN+Dag rten tshes brgyad
kyis ji lta bar na ngas gos so// da nas rab dga' dang pa rgyas byas nas// drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas na// thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas ta/ bde bar gshegs
la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems taM/ gang bdag gse dus yon tan gyi tshogs 'ad lta bu thob pa ni/ bdag ba ga rAd pa 'gas par rud do snyam mo//
pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun ra 'i tshes bshad pa mdzad da/ de thos
pas sa dkaral sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gas rgyun tu zhub/sa pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang na ma gtogs so// lha sbyin ng rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des 'don pa
mthong bar ma byas pas/ khro bas kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gas 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed par shes na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du/
bya ba zhig/ da la shAkya rnams kyis gshe ba'i tshig gi sas ra/ lho na bcom ldan 'das na rdzu 'phrul che ba yin gyis de skad ma sna shag/ cas bzlogs nas cang mi sla bar 'dug go/
tshangs pas bskor ba' ba skyed mos tshal du 'ad lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par grwa po zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri drug stong gse rgyu na tu zhugs/
pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha srin de kho na bzhin du zar ro// ro hati ka'i bskyang mos tshal du 'a da lta bu'i tshos bshad pa mdzad da/ da thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma
gtogs par bdud rtsi sras la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na/ lha spyani de kho na bzhin du zar ro// 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha
cig gis na nyan thos kyis byang chub tu sems bskyad do// kha cig gis na rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub tu/ kha cig gis na b+he na mad pa la nga dag ra ra rdzogs ra 'byang chub tu// kha cig
gis na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis na byar mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cag gas na rab tu byung nas nyon mong
khathams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis nas ngas rgyas la skyabs su song/ kha cig gsan tshis la/ kha cig gas na dge 'dun la sa/ 'khor de dag la/
char yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bang/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang 'di snyam du ba mas da/ sngon na bcom ldan 'das lha dang lham yan gyi 'gro bar

bcas pas ma chod pa dang rjod pa dang/ mngon du smra bar bya bar gyuran/ da ltan mas mchod kyis lhas na ma la na no snyam mo// de nas shAkya gzhon nuzhag ges tshigs su bcad de gsol ra/ drang srong chen po
skya mchog dam chos kyis// char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzod de/ mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rtan 'ad// drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyor bar mdzod// rgyal bo zas gtsang na 'ang snyam du/
bdag gi bu 'ba'ashag 'ad ltar rdzu 'phrul zhing 'di ltar na thu cheb ya nanosnyam ste/ lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis mdor na de' drigs pa slong du gzhug go/ rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar/
mi 'gyur te/ ha ca zhum pa dang/ shin tu dga' ba'o// nga la zhum pa'i soms dang shin tu dol rab tshod kyis/ ma la ngas da' zhum pa dang shin tu dga' ba gnyiso song du gzhug gosnyam nas/ de nas bcos

ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal ra/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'agalagyi bu chen/

0 pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyananas rgyal bo zas gtsang ga la ba der song ba dang/ rgyal po zas gtsangags tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan/
ra mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan
bshamasal de la bzhugs shag tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// nga nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sa mas ji ltar mnyam
khar bzhag na/ rang gas stan las mi snang bar gyurataM/ shar phyogs kyi stong ga bar snang la mngon par bar gas nas/ spyodalaa rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang/ 'breng ba
dang 'dug pa dang/ nyal bar byed do// ma'i ting 'dzan la yang snyoms par 'jug bar byed// ma'i ting nge 'dzan la sIn sa ra ra zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po'i
lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bazhi bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ sar po dang dmar lo dang/ dkar po dang/ la brgan dang/ shel gyi kha dog ngag ge/ cho 'phrul

zung du yang ston par byed do// lus kyi smad nas 'bar ba rakhyadal/ lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'ang bas par byed do// lus kyi stong nas 'bar bar byed la lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyan
'bangs par byed pa de lta bu'i tang 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba nga zhin du lha dang gzhub dang/ byang phyogs su ya nga da bzhin no// phyogs
bzhar rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'du la rnam pa bzhabastan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ nga nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
bu chen po la 'ad skad cesaMskyasaso/ khatsunar mo'u 'gal gyi bu chan po bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos 'ad ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu chab gzhan ma nga mchis lags sam rgyal po chan
ba mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de gas pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rage dang// sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang// zag zad dgra bcom gang yin pa// thub pa 'a nyan thos mang du mchis//

de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'dasnyam du soms ta/ bdag gab bu 'ba' shag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul chazhing mthu che bar ma zad de/ 'ang ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod dog na nas
da shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rtan ra 'dzugs bskyed par mdzad da/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lta rnams 'ongs na/
lha'a 'khoradag 'chos bshad do snyam pa dang/ chos nyid kyis gang ga tshosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dzag rten nga 'i thugs bskyang pa mdzad pa de 'tshi/ srog chags grog sbur nams kyi sems

kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs ra shes par gyur na ]brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gsetshe/badzag rten las 'das pa'i thugs baspyod pa rab no/ nyan thos

chen po rnams kyi sa mas kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa ma shes na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la 'os/ n gnas lha rnams
kyi dbang po brgya ban 'dasnyam du sa mas te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jab rten pa 'thugs bskyod pa mdzad snyam pa las/ de 'ad snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par
bzhed do snyam nas/ des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis/ n+ya grod+ma' kun dga' ra bar ran po cheswA

bzhi'i khang pa ba rtsags ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhige sbal ga/ ko'u shaka khyed kyi mchog tu bzang po nas lha'i bu bzo thams cad la lha'i dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te/ rgya gro d+ha'akun dga'

ra ba ni bo che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshoms pa zhig sprul to// de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhi zhes 'khod pa ni/ yul 'khor skyong dang/ 'phags skyes bo dang/ mgi mgazang dang/
lus ngan po ste/ shar sgon ni yul 'khor skyong/ dpung rgyan dang/ rna cha gdub 'khor dang/ phrang ba dang/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// lha'i rgyan thams cad
kyis brgyanar 'o// nub phyogs na na mig mi bzang ran po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// byang phyogs nas lus ngan po// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas lha rnams

kyidabang bo brgya byin gyis rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par ba/sol to// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la

sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ lha'i 'khor bal poma'i gung la ran po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i so nga ba 'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang
ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal bo zas gtsang khAde de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi buchen po nang du zhugs pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang
la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang dum 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ dar mar gyur pa 'jug
zla chum dbang ngo// bzhin bzangs khyod su zhagargyal po bdagan yul 'khor skyong ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang/ rgyal bo chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smas ra/
rgyal bo chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang bas mthong nas smras pa/ bzhan bzangs khyod su zhig/ 'phags skyes pos smras ra/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni'i phag
smyos po'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de deng sar gyur ba 'jug tu mi dbang ngo// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang/ rgyal po chen po
mgi cha bzang gas mthong nas sbas ba/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsangags mthong nas smras pa/ bzhan bzangs khyod su zhig/ mag ma bzang gis sbas pa/ rgyal bo
chen po bdag ni moge mkhazang ngo// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha' 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mar gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang
rgya la bo chen po rnam thos kyis bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis sdus pa/ bzhanabazangs khyod su zhige/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa//
rgyal bo chen po bdagan rnam thos kyis bu'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ dar mir gyur pa 'jug tu sa dbang ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das

lta'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de/ bdag gis blta'o snyam ba'a'adod pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyudagang yan pa dang bral bar gyur to/ danas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na/ khrag dron mo skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyurab 'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis/ de la thabs dashag bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyase rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs bgang yan pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo// mthong nas
kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ danas bcom ldan 'dasakyisargyal po zas gtsang ga bsam pa dang/
bag la nyal dang/ kham sa dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags ra 'bangan pa ba so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzaded/ de thos nga sa rgyal po zas gtsang gas 'dzagatshogs
la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi'u mtho ba/ yashes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tuzhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ dbaden pa mthong nas/ lan gsum du ched du rjod pa ched du brjod pa//
btsun pa las ma bgyis mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dgasbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdu ga pa dang/
rang gi spyi bo dang/ gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/ rus pa'i ri golas nabasgal/ ngan song
sgo rnams n bkum/ mtho ris dang thar ba'i sgo rnams ni myo/ bdag lta dang ma rnams bu na bzhag go/ yang gso la ra tha la 'a na du ran gdags pa// dam pa 'a bus na bgyi ba gang/ khyod kyis
bdag la mdzad lags te/ de sa nas na grol bar gzhol bar bgyis// khyed kyis bdag nangan 'gro' sa// drangs te mtho ris thar pa la// nga spemam 'tshal bar bzhag lag cu///
khyed kyis dga' ba mdzad pa lags// mgon po byams pa khyed kyis na// bdag ni tshong pa rod ldan ltar// mtho'ose rAd pas srid pa yi// longs spong dag ni rAng par mdzad// de nas
rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs// bla gos phrags pa cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de 'a gsasu thal^amo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la'ang skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das ngag song gis ngag 'dun dang thabs cig tu sa nga bdag gis snum par gdugs tshod sdor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la
cangam gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang btsom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rego nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas ta 1 bcom
kyi sgra snyan s chas te khras dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bras dkar la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu rgyal sring bod kyis khyer cig/ ci'i slad du/ ngar bcom ldan 'das kyi sn gnas ngar
bar ba mthong bas go/ gang ba gdugs la lags/ da rang kho na'o// bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gse lha mo lan+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa da'i nyim 'a shAkya bdun khri bdun stong
@#// dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du bye bo bras la rgyal srid khyed cag ces smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ bdag gas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gas mi

tshangs pas bskor ba'i sbyang mos tshal du ba shadar de 'a/ shAkya bdum khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa thong lags so// de bzhin du bad rtsi zas la rgyal srong khyer cigaces smras pa dang/ des smras pa
bdag gis kyang ga gse tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rohiti ka' skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de 'tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so// gal tu daltar byung nadasuzhig

rgyal srid la gzhag/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzangs ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal rab zang ldan rgyal srid kyis dbang ga la dbang bsku ra'o// de nas rgyal po zas

gtsang gas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dag lta gon byas nas/ nang pa sngar las te/ ganganang shams shang nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis
( dus tshod gso' pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la gsan/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsamA
ti/ dge slong bas tshog kyis yongs su bskor cing/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po zas gtsangags bkang sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dag so ga dge 'dun gyi gung la
gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po khrus gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slongag deg 'dunabade bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhabasod pa 'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang

gsi lag nas stobs shang tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang/ bca' bsarang gi lagazhas bstabs shang tsham par byas// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol bzhinas/jug bcabs te/

lhung bzed gyur bar rage nas/gsaragyis bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das lan+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rab phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ yon sngo bar mdzad pa// ne ra 'ig song

nams gang yin 'das// shAkya rnams kyi bsams pa yi// yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni// rtag pa'i gnas na thob par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi'ang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun rega' ra ba na bzhugs so//

da bzhin du bsam gtan ba rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gshing n+ya grortab kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nya

gcig na rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/ nyim gcig na btsun mo'i nang du gsol 'go/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams myong lam zhazhing sems dang yan na/
dka' thub drag po'i brtul zhugs kyi khyad pa bdag gis lus gdungs pas 'u samamadzes par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam dusems te/'di ltar ralar can 'di deg spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba
yin mod kyi// lus mdzes pa ma yanan/ 'khor ca 'dra ba zhage gas bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa 'gyurasam pa las des bas ma ra// shAkya'i 'khoragyas yazhe'o snyam nas/ de nas/

shAkya thams cad sogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu den thams cad grub pa rab tu byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'gyur/ 'khor sa sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyed cag mizhig byed nga ra'agyur

g.yog bsus bar 'gyur ro// da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i rgyalaM por gyurano/ khyed cag ci'i phying g.yog mi byed/ lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ rang du byung shagi/ thams cad dam/
[' ]khyim rar nas ra ra// bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhire dril sgrogs su b.rug ra/ rgyal po 'a zhau0f38nas pa'i yul ni gnas pa rishAkya rnams kyis byas
mar nas re re rab tu byung shage ces de skad bka' stsal to// dra bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang mang chen no// mang nan zhing byas kyis mtha'u0f8blhag pa ra brtson no// ma 'gags pa ni
stag khang bzangs kyi gzhal 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol chos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' magur spyod par byed do/ mnge chen la mas smras pa/ bu rgyal dos drau0f8bsgo gas su bcug ba shAkya

rnams las mi re renas rir rab tu phyung shig ces bsgos khyed rab tu phyungashagi/ des smras l/ bdag ni rab tu a 'byungags khyod kyi bu sdug pa dang bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa der ba tu phyang
shag bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen bocan gyisaMms can de la khyed 'ganam tshol cig/ yum khyod gang la dgyes ra de nga sodanams tu dbang thang chen po lags mod/ 'ang 'a cung zad kyam bskal
dang ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags samam la gas mngon par 'gyur ro// bu da ra zhan du byas te/ yade tshes bar bya'o// des gzab stong pa rje'us bkang nas kharas dkar po dkras de
rgya skyags la rgyus btab nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lagatu bskur nas bsgo la/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dra ba dang/ rtsa yang ma mchis so zhes smos shag/ dus de khyer nas song ba dang/ lha rnams kyi
dbang po brgya pan gyi shes pa mthong ba na 'og tu 'jug pa yazhi bas/ des bas dag pa rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yan ma de/ dang ci'i phyir bras kyis yongs par bya/
de'izan sbyar bar bya'ozhes rdzo'u de rnams sran tshod dang/ tshod ma sna tshog saro dang ldan pa'i zas kyis bkang ngo// jatsam na mngag gzhug mas der khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du mun pa dang/
ris smas pa/ bu mo 'o nan cayod/ des smras pa/ gzhonan ciyang ma mchis so// ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci lta bskor gdonam klu bar
'danici yangs yazhi ba zhes bya ba'i zas shigabaskur gyis/ ri shag blta'o zhig ji tsam na kha tshub dang/ rgyad mos tshal thams cad zasakyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te dor bsams nas
[+ ]// ma 'gags pa mchog la mchin skyes so// dam la gus pa yin pa des ma las zas kyi phud bskur nas sprab/ nus gdugs tshod re ra'ang zas rtsa yang ma azhi pa Tas
bgyis pa 'di lta bu bskurakha'i rigs so// des kyang mthong nas mchog tu yamtshan skyasate/ des mang chen la bstan nas bu mthong ngam/ sum mthong lags so// khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nyams

t+tA kyas dbang thang chen po'i sems can ma'i bskal pa bzang po dang ldan po la khyod 'gran mtshol rug rusam smras sam/ des snyas pa/ yul de bsod nams kyis dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung dam ldan
yang rung/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes ji ltar mang chen gnas skabs thams cad durab tu 'byung bar khas len dum btub bo// de nas des ma 'gags pa la sgus pa bu rgyal pos dral sgrog bcug
kha shAkya rnams la khume ri nas re ro rab tu byushig ces bsgo na/ khyod cha rab tu 'byung ngam/ na takhyim ra ra 'dug/ des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la rten yon tsamachis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/
khyab pa ra mchis pa la phan yon canyis dmigs rumachis/ bu rab tu byang bas legs par bsgrubasan/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang ma thob par
'gyur ro// khyam par 'dug ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi thob ngo// ma bskyangs na sams saMn dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ ya dgas thob bo// yumarab tu byung ba'i nyes dmags gang lags pa/
de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas/ de bas na khyaman gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis/ gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ rab tu 'byung ngo// des smras ra/ bu lags kyis de bzhin dugyis shig/ ma 'gags

pa'i no'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de btung du song ngo// de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pa wang lenataM/ nga lang 'o na pa na rgyud chang nas sgra gzhan du gyur to// ma 'gab/sa ra ra wang len pa

labyang ba yin pas des sgra cha 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzun gnas de skor bsdad de/ sgorasrungs kyis la smras pa/ kyenang rje song la rgyal po badzangs ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na
sdod cing mchis so zhes gsolachag/ sgo srungs song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras ra/ lham 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chapa sgo nasdod cing mchis so// ngas sA sa ra/
shes ldan ma 'gags nga la su 'gog shes ldan m 'gags pa nang du thong shog/ de nang du zhugs pa dang/ rgyal ngos 'khyud nas rang du bcug ste/bas pa/ khyong 'ongs nas rje sud 'a na/ sa

smras pa/ gang gi tsho khyedapa wang len pa na brgyudachad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so// de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas des snas ma khyod ra wang len pa la byang ba yan no// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan
gyis smras pa// gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongasaM/ ma 'gags pas sa ra/ lha'i rgyal po zas gtsang gas de'i sgrogs su bcugar shAkya rnams las las re re nas re rarab tu byung shagi ra ra bsko bas
nga khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig/ rab tu byung ngo// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltar n kho bo yang rab tu 'byung te gros bya ba yod kyis/ khyod da rang 'ad nyid du gnas thob shog
de de nyid du gnas btab bo// mal 'cha' bas ramis babad ga kAnyin gyi gos kyis btang zhing ma tog ga la na sa bkram ra 'amal du mo 'gags ra nyal ba dang/ de'i 'og na ma tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i rig
kha de'i nyams su tshor nas smras pa// ca'ada'i 'oganardodre'u yod dam/ de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams pa nam tog ga rtsa ba zhiga mthong anas/ de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar gyis so// 'gags
khamtshan mo me ba de zhang nyal nas niam mnangs so// rgyal pos smras pa// ma 'gags pa ji ga bde bar gnyidi 'a ga gam/ des smras pa/ lha bde bar gnyingan leg go rgyal pos smras pa// ci'i
phyi'i ma 'gags pa gnyidim log/ ltarims khagag dricenagyi gos bting bar ma tog sal ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus snyad lags so// rgyal bos mal 'cha' ba bku gnas / khyed kyis
mas bag gticin gyi gos bting staca/ mal 'cha' bas sgrub pa/ lha bdag la dkor bas gtud pa lags so// rgyal pos dkorab bkug nas smras pa// khyod kyi mis pag ga dri chen gyi gos
thog stachu bya/ desmras pa// lha bdag la thag pas gtad pa lags so// rgyal pos tha ga pa bkugs nas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir rams bag gatra can gyi gos 'bul/ thag pas smras ba
tsha00 lha rnams du 'kha ga nga 'i 'bro cung zhig lus pan/ bdag rims gyis btab bzhi bgyis pa la gas so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ des smras pa tshaba' dag la nyams
su myong bas rams bag gi dri lags so// rgyal po mchog tuya mtshan skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan 'gag pa ni shAkya'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa gzhano// de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan/
gyisams ba/ gzhon nugal te khe bo rab byungan/ lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal po 'gyur/ deshAkya rnams la gnod ba byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la/ lha sbyin spro ba bskyod
par bya'o zhes nAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nga bkug ste/ de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa// lha sbyin le bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na khyong byid/ lha sbyin gyis bsams pa/ gal te
rab tum 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang/ shAkya'i rgyal bo bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar ma 'gyur gyis/ dal thabs shagi bshams par bya sta/ bsu'o// gzhan ya nga bcom ldan 'das kyis gang

dganye lan gro d+ha'ikund gsar bar sgyu ma'achi 'phrul bstan pa de'i/ bdag blo skyes pa/ ji ltar 'di'i skye nas skya ba'i tshog sachen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams
so snyam nas smras pa/ khyod cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ca sa 'dug/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsaMms pa 'di ni brdzun du smras pa yin gyis dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba ma nga pos so sor rag
[s a]@#// par bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la dras nas grong khyer se ra skya'i gzhir dra'i sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer sa ra sku'i gshin gnas pa'i shes ldan
dag nyon cig/ bzang ldan dang nam gru dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ lha spyan lasogs te nyAkyalnga rgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis thos pa rgyas rab la rab tu dga' ba bskyed cig ces bsgo'o//
lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang/ de ma bde ba skyes nas/ gal te bdag gsashAkya'irgyal po khozang ldan nges par rab tu ba byang bar shes par gyur pa dang/ bdag khas len par

mi 'gyur ba zhag de ni gal te rab tum byung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par ma 'gyur bas/ thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dar tshad dam/ ri rab tu byung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin
du rgyal srad bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang 'dasnyam dusams te/ shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas/go'akhyar gsegs dang 'byo mi bsal/ tsanangagyi chus chag
chag btab/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan bsgrung/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/ shan tu dri zhim po'i pog ror nye bar gzhag/ ma tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du'acug go/

nga nas shAkya brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyis sgo nas ngaga'i khri la 'dug go/ shAkya mo dang/ shAkya gzhon nu ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung 'khel ma can dang/ sa khung dang
[e ]stags bu dag la 'dug go/ shAkya rnams kyi khyor ba la lta bar 'dod pa'i skyes bu'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhag pa dag kyang lam po che dang/ tshongs dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su
'dug go/ shAkya la su dag gas nas nyes par 'gyur/ su dgag ni thugs phyung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa'i bram zemtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhanadag bkug go/ shAkya rnams do shal dang gdu bu dang//

dpung rgyan dang/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang ma dang dag la bltas nas/so so'ashing rtar zhugs te/ phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba/ mtshan mkhan
rnams kyis mthong nas/de dag las smras pa/ragashage 'das namanyes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nam gru dang/ ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ban de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis
lung bstan to// de nas lha spyan phyir byung sta/ de phyir byung ba na bya khros gtsug gzhir du thogs pamtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di'i rtogs dang sbyar na

gdonami za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal bar gzholo bar 'gyur ro/[”]/koka la ka dang/ khand drab bya dang/ ka timo ra da ka dang/ rgyal dang/ rgya mtshos bya'i rnams phyir byung ba dang/ bong bu'i skor
gra gnas de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan nga/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan ba sbas nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ nyi dga' glang bo che la zhon nas
phan tshun du lta bar byed pan/ mu tig gdo shal lhungab dang/ deglang pocha las babs te blangs so// de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan la/ 'dahaca'adod zhen chas ra sa bams can

dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// dazhas bzang ldan dang/ nam rgudang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams brgyad chos tshal du dus ston la 'grob bzhin du bzang pos 'gran
nga/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der dong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gal tengs shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyungan/ kha cig gis namanyes par byed par/
'gyur/ khacig gas mnyes par byed par ma gyur taM/ mnyes par byed par ma 'gyur ba gang dag ldan pa de dag gzhan du sams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba nathams cad srid pa tham pa yin
pas ma la ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang/ pazhi'i 'a sa kyis rab tu byungab dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' bstsal
pa/ dag slong dag sor skya'ag/zhi'i shAkya rnams gsol ba dang/ bzhi'i las kyis rab tu dbyung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dag song
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to// rgyal bo zas gtsang gsar shAkya rnams kyi 'droga mkhananye bar 'kher zhes bya ba nganams rab tu 'byin pan/ sku 'drag par gotang nas/ shAkya'i rgyal po
pazang ldan gyi ka bdug pan/ da ngom zum gnag cing mchim 'dzag cing/ skad 'dzing cing dbugs tshugs bro 'grig par byed do// shAkya'irgyal po bzang ldan gyas smras pa// nyiba 'khor 'a phyir

dud snying rje rdzaskad du gcomachung ngur dal bus tshag ri nas smras ka/ lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling ga skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bgan bkur bgyid bgyid pa ma la pa/ rnams la yang bsnyarab kur bgyad par

'gyur ba lta zhig khyadakyis spangs te/ gson pas na gum mi bsngo'o// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan kyis smras pa/ bar 'akhong khyod kyis jo bo la sang nye ba'i ma nyes ra ra byab bstan na ta/ chog gus mya nam
