byed cig/ ngas ji ltar m phal ba rnams la bsnyan bkur byang pa rami 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o nas mas nas/ des phyob/sa gcig tu ras gcig btang nas shAkya gzhon nu rnams la smras lnga/ shes ldan gzhon
chudag nyon cig/ 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'das bdag cag la bkur sti byas la/ bdag cag kyang slar khyam du ma gnas kyis rgyan rnams ra' 'tsho ba'i rgyan tu ras kyi steng du tshog shag/ da rnams kyis

sa mo do dang/ do shal dang/ mgul rgyan dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dpa/ rna rgyun la sog pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyun pa'i rgyan khyang ra ra can rnams kyis ras kyi stod du phung po chen por smras so//
nye bar 'khor gyis re rnams mthar gyis sa bregs/do rnams khrus la rong ba dang/ des bsams pa jashag gzhon nu 'ang rag rigs dang 'byor pa dang/ lang tsho la khab cing chung ma dang ldan lamadzod dang
bang mdzod kyis kyang rgyus la yang sbyangs nas/ rab tu byung na bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa natshul yan pa sa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma

skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba larab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang/ sbyorab las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyi'i bsal ba dang 'bangs la brtson par bya ba zhig snyan
mo 'di ni chos nyade yan// ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamaMs nyin lan gsus mtshan lan gsum/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzags pa de bzhin du nyan thesachen po rnams kyang srid

khas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dug mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skye ba rgyas pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'dug mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song// phyi nas 'dreg mkhan lta bar 'khor la 'di

skad ces smras so// nyib 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongasasu chud cing 'dug 'a'i bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir/ nga ltar

gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang/ lang tsho la khab cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzong dang/ bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu byung na bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin/
pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na/ bdag kyang 'a gas par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang/ sbyor ba las yang dag

0 par 'dal bar bya ba'i phyir bsal ba dang/ 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sam sa khengs su chud ra pa ma 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang

po'i gsung rab 'di la nA rogis sAng por byed pa ma yin/ rus sAng bor byed pa ma yan/ rgyung sAng re'abyed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying re ra byed lam yanitaM/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po 'a gsung rab 'di la na
sgrub pasAri bor byed pa yazhino// de bzhin gshegs rnams rags dang ni// rgyudad rus la rtog ma mdzad// 'das nas yun ranga' na gi las rnams lan rtog par mdzad/ dga' legs par gsung
pachos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bstan par rdzogs pa dag slong gas dngos po 'dong na tshur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro// das las/
blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bug 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor bAder/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba deradong nas phan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te//
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dag skyong gi dngos po 'tshal lags
na/ thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang/ bsnyan pa ra rdzogs par mdzad du gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal ra/ ngag songatshur
sheg tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa'i yong kho nar sku bya ba dang/ snam sdur byon pa dang/ lag pa lhung bzed dang/ bya na dum gyis
'brel ba dang/ skra dang kha spu skyod nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang/ dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'bargya lon pa'i sbyong lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// las ra/ rna bzhin gshags pas tshur/
shog bka' stsal pa sa/ skye bya snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing/ mod la dbang po rab bar gnas gyur to// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// shAkya rab tu byung ba'i rnamA
ni rgan rams ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa khyad pas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na/ nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so// de nas des gdong ngatag lta gsol pa// bcom
ldan 'das 'di na nyi bar 'khor la gas na/ mu bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang gdud pa brgya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yan
da 'di na byas nga rgyal gyi rigs pa chog la thud cag/ ngas de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyurataM/ sa chen po 'di gsos rab tu g.yos de kun tu rang du g.yos
leg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs ngam 'o/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'
tsa dbus mthon mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon dadus dma' bar gyur to// nga ltar thams cad kyis rams bzhin du gtugs so/ lha sbyin gyisi ma btud pa dang/ pom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/
du nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis thud cig/ des gsol pa/ bdagags da' rkyang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa can ches zhus de 'dud du ma btub sko/ der thog mar bcom

ldan 'das kyi bka' lha sbyin gyis btsog go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na ba zhugs so// de nas sar skya'i gzhin gnas pa 'ad+d+heshAkya rab tu mang po 'dun

khang du tshogs shang/ 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dgag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams na gang las skyes/ thog ma ni nga yan/ rgyun ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
rgyud gang yani/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'di sta/ shes ldan dgashAkya rnams ni gang las skyas/ thog ma na gang yan/ rgyun ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi
gos rgyudan gang yin zhes de skad du 'drin/ bdag cag gis shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang/ thog ma gang yin pa dang/ rgyu ci zhig yan pa dang/ shAkya rnams kyis sngon gyi rigs rgyung na gang yin
pa sa ngo ma shes na/ dza skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong 'a lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan das la don de nyid zhusanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji
skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o// de nas saraskya'i gzhi na gnas pa shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong stalhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas taM/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas sar skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis bangasad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir bdag cag sar/
skya' gzhi'id+d+hishAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas/ bar skabs kyi bka'amachid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/thog man gang yin/ rgyun ci zhig yin/
shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyudan gang yan/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skang 'dra ste/ shes ldan ngag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gong yan/ rgyun ci/
zhag yan/ shA1 rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud na gang yin zhes de skad du 'dren/ bdag cag gas shAkya rnams na gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyun rmazhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi/
rigs rgyud gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das lo don 'di nying zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas/ nga'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'ang nyeng zhu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams rnag nga/
las skyes lags/ thog ma ni gang lags/ rgyun lags/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud nang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam dudagongs te/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs

rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs na (mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dgasbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod pa de lung ston pas bdag nyid bstod pa byed do zhes sla nga gang yon pa'i

gnas 'di yod pas/nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyu las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam byung bar nus ba su yod snyam mo/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de 'di du
'du'ang 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga ro rgyab srungs bas ra shag de bsal gyas/ khyod kyis shAkya

rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar slobs par byas shig/ tshong ldan ra mo'u 'gal gyis bu chan pos bcom ldan 'das la cang ma smra bas khas blangs so// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas/ snam sbyar bltab ste phangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pas phab ste zhabs kyi stong du zhang sa bzha gnas

snang ba'i 'du shes dang dran pa dang/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i'adu shes kho na ying camadzang pas mnal do/ dang chos tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gas sems
ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang/ thog ma gang yin pa dang rgyu gang yin pa dang/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yan pa mthong bar 'gyur bar lta bu'i

ting nga'adzan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen posasams ji ltar mnyam par bzhagan/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ating nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang/ thog ma gang yan pa dang/ rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang/ shAkya rnams
kyi sngon gyi rigs na gang yan pa mthong ngo// mthong nas ting nge 'dzanade las langs te/ jagasnying gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyudi la 'dug go/ 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
bu chen pos/ sar skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ go'u ta mo dag 'jig rten 'ang 'dzag cing 'jag rten 'gan/ sems can phal chera'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skyo bar 'gyur da/ da rnams de na
yod las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa// dbang po ma nyams shang ma tshang ba med/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can nam
mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyi tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de'i tshes chen po 'di chu 'ba' shag tu 'gyur 'dematshog tsag tu 'gyura'o// sa chen po' d+hu chu'ang
gag gzhatshog cig tugyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spres mchags pa dang/ mkhrags pa dang/ khebs par byed do// daren 'og bskol kha grangs par gyur pa 'asong du rlung bas smras chags pa
dang mkhregs pa dang/ khebs pa de bzhin dusachen po 'di chu 'ba' shagags mtshog cig tu gyur ba'i stang du rlung gas spris ma chags pa dang/ mkhrags pa dang/ khabs par byed do// sa'i
bcud dan kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dAphun sum tshogs pa/ phun sum tshogs pa yan zhing/ kha dogazhwa'adi lta bu yin te/ dbar namar sar lta bu 'o// 'o no 'dalta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang
btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do// go'u tam dag 'jig rten gang yazhi ba 'di 'chags shang 'jig rten chags na/ danas sems can kha cig tshe zad las zad/ bsod
naA zad nas/ 'od gsal gyi lha' ris nas sha'abos nas/ 'di lta buraa rnam sa dang skul ba mnyam pa 'ong zhang/ de rnams 'dzin yang las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams
shangam tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang/ nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing/ kha dogakhaTang pos gnas pa rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha'i la'agro ba dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshor

zhang yunar du gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nyi ma dang/ zla ba yang 'jig rtan du ma 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang mang skad cig dang thang cig dang/ yud tsam yang yod/ mtshan mo dang/ nyin mo yang
med/zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ dus tshigs dang/ 'a rnams kyang 'jig rten du'ang ban da do// skyes pa dang/ dud med dun ngon pa yang med kyi/ gzhan du na saMms can
sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// da nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo'i rtsomos sa'i nung rkyang bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de ltade ltar ngano//

ji lta ji ltar srid ra de ltade ltar kham gyi zas ram gyis khra'o// sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzubamortse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar myangs pa da lta da ltar drang la

ji lta ji ltar srid pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rims gyi za ba mthong ngo// mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar skya ngagar de lta de ltar srid do//
ji lta ji ltar srid pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o// gang gi sems can de rnams kyis sa'i bcud la khamagyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tsher rnams kyi lus lamakhrang pa dang/ ba zhugs par

gyur to/ nga rnams kyi kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa des nga nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// go'utam dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rtan du mun pa byungab na nya ma dang zla ba
gnyasi 'jige rtan du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar dang/ skad cig dang thang cig dang/ dudatsam dang mtshan mo dang/ nyin mo dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyang dang/ dus tshigs dang/ le'adzagin
du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nga rnams de za zhing/ zas su zab latshang zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las zas latshes nyung zad du za ba gang yan pa dan kha dogadang ldan par 'gyur ro/[GE]

kha zaso la chos mang du zla ba gang yan pa de na ba dog ngan par 'gyur te/ kha zasakyi tshad gnyis la brtan nas/ kha dog ga rnam pa gnyis mngon to/ kha doga rnam pa gnyasi yod pas/ kyis las can kho bon

kha dog dang ldan no/ khyod ni kha dog nag yano// zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod do// kha dog ga mngon pa'ing rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'irgyus sa'i bcudanub

ba rigyur to// go'u ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa nasems can de rnams tshogs shaba'adus nas 'di skad ces kya tung bro ba kyi hud dro bzhes smra sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyuto// dparand ltar

mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi ya le dang tshig dang/ tshig 'bru de nyadi rjes su dran nas/ 'daskad ces kyi chud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhinu/ sems can de rnams gabcudad

nub bzhatshogs shing 'dus nas 'daskadabus kyihud bu ba/ kyi hudabro ba zhes sma zhangasmra sngags 'don la nganadang/ sdug sngalabar gyukyang/ lcas ra 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ skyas pa 'di'i don ni 'di yazhin zhag

ri'idon namashes so// go'u tam rtagasems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcud do nub pa na/ sa'i zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyurataM/ kha dogazhi 'di lta bu yan ta (dparan dong ka'i ma tog lta bu 'o/
ro na'od lta bu yin te/ dbo ra nasbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi khatshur ba lta bu 'o// de rnams de nga shang de zas su za ba 'tsho rang zhing yun ring du gnas so// denams las khacas 'ches nyung du bab

gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan r gyur to// kha sbas sa mang du za ba gang yan pa da nAkha doganapar gyur to// zas kyi tshad gnyab la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyig yod

ngas kyi sems can kho bon kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gam ngon rang rgyal can ri rnams sdug lam dag la'i chos de

dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa ba zhig nub par gyurato// go'u tam dag sa zhag de nub par gyur pa na/ goms can de rnams tshegs shing 'dus nas 'daskad ces kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smra sngags 'don la/

mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang/ yang ma bde ba 'ga' shag gsarag ngan/ sngon gyi yo ga dang tshag dang tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas/ 'di skad ces
a ma'o kyi shud e ma'o kyi bung zhis sna ba de bzhin du sems can rnams sa zhag de nub pan chogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud dro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes sku zhang ma stag 'don lamya ngan dang/

sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras ra 'di'i don 'od ya ni/ smras ba 'a da'i rinan 'ad yan no zhes bya bar mi shes so// go'u ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi sa zhag de nub pan/ myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum
0 tshogs pa/ dri phun sumatshogs pa/ phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing/ kha dog 'ad lta bu yan taM/ dpan/shang ka dam pa ka'i mi tog lta bu 'o/ gna'adi ltabu yan te/ dpar na sbyang ma'i sbrang rtsi

btsur ba lta bu 'o/ de nams d bzhi nge de zas su za ba latshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// danamag las khazas la chas nyung bar zab gang yan pa rin/ kha dog dang ldan par gyurato// kha zas la ches
mang du za ba gang yan pa de na kha dog ngan par gyur to// khrus kyi tshadaganyas la bstan nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kya se mas can khe no kha gdang ldan la/

khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yanemozhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa ma dag pa'i chos de dag 'di bas 'is myu gu'atshal de nub par

gyur to// go ta ma dgatshuga'atsholar nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshegs shing 'dus nas 'ad skad ces mdunanas phar song mdunas phar song zhes smra zhang smra sngags don la mya ngan dang/ sngag
bsngal bar gyur to// darand ltar sa rnams 'ga' shagi ladragaro 'tshar gacod par 'adod na/ sngon gyi yig dang/ tshig dang/ tshig 'bru dadag nyidi rjes su zlos shing 'di skad ces mdun nas phar song/
mdun nas bar song nas smra ba de bzhin du sems cand nams myu gu 'tshal nub pa dang/ tshogs shing 'dus nas 'dakad ches mdun nas bar song mdunanas phar song zhes smra zhing smra sngags 'don la
mya ngan dang/ sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang skas pa 'di'i don 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di ya'i no zhes bya ba de'i don nam shes so// go'u ta mngagasems can de
nAms kyi myu gu'itshalanubanas/ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras butshon bzhi/ 1 phu ma med pa// sbyin samad pa/ shun pa mdab/dag pa gtsang ma skyes te/ danub brdasazhanang skye zhing/
smin par 'gyur/nang bas na nub skya nang smin par 'gyur bas/ brdzas shang bsakyang slar skyo bas brngas par yangs mngon no// de rnams de za zhing de za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so//

gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas sum gyis zos pa de nas de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad du byung bar gyurato// kha cag la na byas pa'i dbang po'o/
kha cig la na bud med kyi dbang po'o// den budamar gyi dbang pon gang yin pa rnams dang/ rgyas pa'i dbang po can gang yanipa rnams gcig la gcig mig gsam tshugs su lta'o// ji lta ji ltar
gcig la gcig mig mgatshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so// ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar zhan to// lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log khabazhugs so// sems can gzhan dag
gas kyang sems can gyis sems can l log par zhugs pa na thong ngo// mthong nas kyang sa dang bong ba dang/ gas gal dang/ gyo mo gtor nas 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams na bya ba ma yin
da byed do// sems can ngan pa tha chadanams na bye ba ma yin pa byed pa yan gyis/ kra ye saa can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes skya'o// dparan/ da ltar gyi ma rnams bag ma blangs pa/
lu ma dang/ dra deng/ phreng ba dang/ gos dang/ 'bras yongs kyis gter nas 'ad skad ceg bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba dma'an du/ sems can rnams kyis sems can log par zhugs pa mthong ba na/

sas gtor cing bong ba dang/ gsog ma dang/ gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor nas/ 'daskad ces sems can ngan pa tha chada rnams n bya bam yin pa byed do// sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams na bya ba ma yazhi pa byad

kyis kA ya sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smrab 'i dus gang yan pa de yod dgo dgo'u tan dag de ltar na sngon chos sa yan khara'adod pa gang an pa dang/ sngon gyi 'dul ba la ni par
'dod pa gang yanib de ni da ltar chos su 'dod do// 'dul bar 'dod do// sngon smad khur bya bar 'dod ' gang ma'i ra da'adi ltar bsngags par bya bar 'dod do/ da rnams kyis de zhag gcig tsag spangs pa
nas zhag gnyis dang gsum dang/ bdun du yang sangasaso// gang na sems can de rnams lhag pa can dam pa ma yin pa 'tshig des lhag bar sdog pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de rnams khang pa rtsig
la brtson par byed de/ 'di'i bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyod do// 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yazhi pa spyod do zhes zerabs khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags/ dgo'u ta ma dag 'di'i jag rtan du khong
ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byang kha'i rtsom pa dang po yin no// de yang chos kyis yan gyi chos ma yin pas ma gnati/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po 'tshos la'ang zhigatso bo yan no//
da rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs kaM/ nang bza' ba don du gnyerab ya nganang ra ra sa 'u 'ched du 'dong bar byed do// da nas soms can snyom 'a sa kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par
gyi sa khu nub blangs so// denus sems can gzhan zhage gsi soms can de la 'di skad sa sbas so// kya sems can dag khyong tshur sa lu'i phyir 'dong ngo// dunas sems can
des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kyisems can khyod rang gi sa lu la soms shig/ kho bosazhinang bar gyi sa lu nub blangs so// de nas sems can ng 'di snyam du sems te/ kya ma dan lag
sa kyamad na shan tu legs kyi/ ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang/ zhag gsum gyi dang/ zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sa lu byung ngo snyam nas/ des zhag gnyis kyi dang/ zhag gsum dang/ zhag bdun
gyi bar gyi sa lu blangasaso// de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kyesems can khyed tshur sa lu'i phyir 'dong ngo// de nas sems can des de la 'di skad ces
sbas so// kya sems can khyadarang gi sa lu la soms shig/ kho bos na zhag gnyis kyi deng/ gsum gyi dang/ zhag bdunagyi bar byas lu blangs zan no// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems
te kyam da na legs so// kyi ma de nadishan tulags kyis/ ma la bdag gas zla ba phyed dang/ zla ba gcig ga sa lu khung ngo snyam nas des zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig ga sa lu blangs so// gang nas
bams can de rnams kyis mtshos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru sog 'jog ga yongs su 'angs spyad pas zos pa de nas sa lu da 'a'abras bu phub ma dang/ sbyin ba dang/ shun pas log par gyur to/
brdzas shang brjes na yang phyir mi skyo bas brngas par yang mngon l/ sa lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to// de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas/ shes
ldan dag khadag cag la sngon yod las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dobang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba mngar/ yan lag rang/ nying lag thams cad rang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas

pa rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba khra zhing dga' ba'i zas kyi tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/ bdag cag la sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa// dri phun sumatshogs pa/
rophun sumatshogs la byang bar gyur te/ bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi ram gyis zos ta/ gang gi tshibadag cag gis sa'i bcud la/ kham gyi zas kyi rin gyisazong pa de'atshe bdag cag gi lus
la rtsub pa nyid dang/ ba nying zhugs par gyur to// kha dog bzang bo'i gsal kha gang yin pa de nub par gyur pas/ 'jig rtan du mun pa byung bar gyur to// bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la rang
zhung kun rang du gnas par gyur to// bdag cag las/kha zas la ches nyung du za ba yin nga da na kha dog bzang por gyur/ kha phas chos mang du zo ba gang yan pa den/ kha dog ngan
par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brtenanas/ kha dog ga rnam pa gnyis mngon te kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod ra sa/ kr-i ya saMms can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyed na kha dog ngan pa
in nozhes sems can gyi sams run la khyad du gsod par byed do// nga dag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams snag pa ma dag pa'i chos de dag nyid blangs ra 'a rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par

chur to// sa 'badud de nub ba na sa zhig kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ da phun sum tshogs pa/ rojun sumatshogs pa byung bar gyur taM/ bdag cag daza zhang/ dazas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun rang du gnas

so bdag cag las kha zas ches chung du za ba gang yin pa de kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zasachos mang du za ba gang ya nar de na kha dog ngan par gyur to/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brtan nas/ kha dog gnam pa

(gnyisi mngon no// kha dog rnam par gnyis yod pas kA ya sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag tugakha dog gi

mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sngageg la ma dge ba'i chos de dag nyade blangs pa'i sa sa zhag de nub bar gyur to// sa zhag de nub pa na/ myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ phun sum tshogs

kha byang bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la/ tshirange zhang yun ring du gnas so// bdag cag rnams las khazas ches nyung du za ba gang yan na de na kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zasarmis mang du

za ba gang yazhi pa de na kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha dog gi rnam pa gnyasa mngon no// kha dog rnam pags yod pas/ kwa ya sanasacan kho bo na kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod na kha dog nganapa yin no zhes sems can

gyase sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog ga mngon pa'i nga rgyal can sdug pa ma dag pa'i chos de dag 'di blangs pa'i rgyas myu gu'i tshul de nub par gyur to// smyu gu'i tshal de nub pa na/

ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lub 'bru chonabazhi ma/ thub ma med pa// sbun pa mad pa/ shun pa mad ra// dag pa gtsang ma skya sta/ danub bson nang skya 'ang sun par 'gyur gnang bas na nub skya zhang smin

bar 'gyurabs/ brdzas shang brjes kyang slar yang skya bas brngas par yang mi mngon to/ bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba latsha rang zhing yun rang du gnas so// gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa/

'bras sa lu'i 'bru sog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas thos pa de nas sa lu de'i 'bras bu bub ma dang/ sbyin pa dang/ shun pas log par gyur to// brdzas shange brjes na yang skar ma skya bsabarjes par

gang mngon la sa lu yang sbyabs la yod par gyur pas/ ma la bdag cag chogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te/ mtshams bcad la/ 'di ni khyed kya'o/ 'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug bri bar bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs
ka/ shang 'dus nas zhing bgos te/ mtshams su mu thugs bres so// go'u cha dag 'ad ni'ajig rten du ma thug 'dri ba'i las kyi mtha'arnyanas kyang ba'i rtsom pa dang po pa no//

tha de yang chos kyis yan gyi ma yan pas ni ma yin pas/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni tshosakyi mtsho yin no// de nas sems can zhig gas rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu ma byan par blang
wA so sems can gzhan dag gis sems can des rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lun tun par blangs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas sems can de la bde skad ces smras so// kA pa ams can khyed rang

ga sa lu yod pazhin du gzhan gyi sa lum byin par ci'i phyir gling zhes de ltar drangs tshur drangs nas ji tsam na 'khor ma'i nang du khrod de shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gis lu yod bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar
du gzhan gyis lu ma byon par lan to zhes sbyos so// de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can la 'di skad ces smras so// kA ya saMms can khyod rang ga sa lu yod bzhin dug shan gyi
sa lu ma byon par ci'i phyir byung/ ku ya soms can khyod song la phyi'i char de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag sems can 'angs
bdag sa lu' phyir par drangs tshur drangs te dzatsis na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas sa so// de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can la 'di skad ces smras so/ ku ya soms can khyodakyis sems can

la sa lu'i phyir sa tAs tshur drangs nas jatsaman 'khor gyi nang du yang rung nasa'i phyi'i spyos// kwa yab mas can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems
te shes ldan dag sa lu'i phyir ra 'dran tshur 'dren cing ji tsam na 'khor gyenang du spyi ba yang snang bas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shang 'dus la bdag cag gnangan pa mas can lhag par gzugs bzang ba///
lhag par blta na sdug pa// lhag par mdzesal/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de na bdag cag ga zhang rnams kyi bdag por bskos dang des bdag cag chad pas bcad par bya ba rnams
ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams lan phan 'dogs par 'gyur te// bdag ba zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yazhi pa de las de la chos bzhin du thog shas spyan par bya'o snyam
gas de rnams tshogs dang 'dus te// de rnams kyi nang nas lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa// lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yan pa de nang
rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/ 'ang skad ces kyi sems can khyed tshur shog/ kho bo cag las chad pas bcad par bya ba rnams ni chad pa sa chod cig/ phan ba dgas par bya ba rnams ni phan thog
shig kho bo cag gzhing dag las 'khrud pa gang yipad las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shes sbyin no// de de rnams la chad pas bcad par bya ba ni chad pas gcod/ phan gdags par
bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing/ del da rnams kyi 'di dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas dadul/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur ming

skya bo tshogs chen pos bkur bas mang po bkur ba mang po sa bkurang zhes grags so// zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na/nyamA pa las skyob par byed pas rgyal rageb rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so//
ltachos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed cing/ tshul khamasanyams su byas te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pasaM rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so// go'u du ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur
kyi ma rnams kyi mnge sems can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u dam dag rgyal bo mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste/ go'u tam dag rgyal po 'od mdzes kyi[& ]/ma rnams

kyi mang tshur shog tshur shog ces bya bar gyur to// 'od mdzes kyi bu dag pa zhes bya ste// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i tsho/ mi rnams kyi mnge skya ba can spyicu'i sa bya bar gyur to// go'utam dag pa'i bu dag

mchog chos byas/ go'u tam dag rgyal po dga mchog gi tsho mchims kyi mang sran mgrazhi sprinamagrin zhes bya bar gyur to// ngag mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'bags zhes bya ste go'atan dag rgyal po gso sbyong ' pags kyi tshe/

a rnams kyi ming ta la'ang ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal bo gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor rnan pa zhig skyes pa 'jamazhing shani tumnyan tedapan shang bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da'
0/ bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi byed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes ba skyes bu chen po' mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig/

byung ste/ spyi bo las skyes pas spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsunamo drug khra'i nang du bkra ba dang/ de rnams kyi nu ma la 'o ma zag nas
ri ras nga las nud las nu zhes smras pas nga las nu zhes bya bar gra ba/sa so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal bo nga las zhu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de 'tsho/ mi rnams sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed//
nya bar rtog par byed da/ de rnams bsams gzhal nye bar brtags nas/ bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas/ des na de rnams 5de las rgyas pa de la sa skyo gzhas

bya bar grags so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po drug po 'ad rig na tshe tshad mang cang tshadapag tu mad pa yin no// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu'i bar g.yas par sha rman zhag skyes pa 'jal zhing shin
tum nyan te/ dpar na shing bal gyi 'da' pa 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad gnod pa ma spyad do// da snyan nas brtol ba dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa// mdzes
pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung// brla g.yas pa las skyes pas mang mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu da rdzu 'phrul chazhang mthu cha
ba yin pas da rung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jugage/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes pa'i brlagayon pa rasha rman zhig skyes pa 'jamazhashin tu
zla mnyan// dpar shing bal gyi 'da'akha 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyod do// de smananas brtol ba dang/ khye'agazugs bzang ba/ bltanasdag pa/ mdzes

b+h+yA pa skyes bu chen po 'amtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung sta/ bar g.yon pa las skyes ra sa mang nyamadzes nyamadzes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhonanu de rdzu 'phrul cha zhang
mthu che ba yin pas/ da dung yang glang gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ go'u tam dag rgyal po nyi mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rman zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shAn tu
mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'aA/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa ma spyad do// de smin nas brtol ba dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug la/ mdzes pa/

zla skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig byung sta/ rkang pa g.yas pa las skyas pas/ ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing na thu chab

yin pas da dung du yang glang gnyis la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rman zhig skyes pa 'jam zhang nyanitumanyen te/
dpar na shange bal gyi 'da'ab 'am/ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhan du cung zad gnod pa ma bskyed do/ da sman nas brtol ba/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ brten sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mchan/

sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkangan g.yon kha las skyes pas/ mnge nyamadzes ldan rta mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul chazhang mthu che ba yan ras da dung du sapa/
gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ go'u ta ma dag de ltar na rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi bu 'od mdzes so// 'od mdzes kyi dge ba'o// dge ba'adeg mchog go/ dgo
khachog gi gso sbyong 'phagasaso// gso sbyong 'phags kyi nga las nu'o// nga las zhu'an dzas pa'o// mdzes pa 'a nyi mdzes so// nyamadzes kyi mdzes ldan no// nyamadzes ldan dang/ bzang po
dad 'gas kha brang dang/ btang ba dang/ btang bzung dang/ yan lag dang/ yan lag kAng rta dang/ ngan song dang/ skal ldan shing rta dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ rgya mtsho'i bu dang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang
sha kun dang/ sha kun chen po dang/ kusha dang/ nyi ba'i kun dang/ ku sha chen po dang/ legs mthong dang/ lags mthong chen bo dang/ rab thob dang/ rab thob chen bo dang/ rab tus bsgrigs dang
rag tu sgra bsgrags chen po dang/ 'od bad dang/ rtul phod dang dalhun po ldan dang/ lhun po yong dang/ 'od gazer dang/ 'od zer ldan dang/ 'od zer yong dang/ kun nas 'od zar ro// go'u ta ma
da@#// gdag kun nas 'od zer gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tshe dang/ sumatsha'i rgyud rgyal bo brgya tham pa tshul cu'adzin du byung ste/ danams kyi bam nargyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste

dgra 'dul bar byed pas dgra 'dul dgra 'dul zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sumatsha' rgyung rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gag mi tshug

wa par byang ngo// de rnams kyi tham ni/ rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed pas na/ margyal ba las rgyal ba/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags

so u0f8bgo'u ta ma dag/ rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tshe dang/ sum tsha' rgyud rgyal po sum khri drug stong yul wA ra NA sar byang sa/ de rnams kyi tha ma na rgyal po bzod dka'

zhes bya ba byang ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tshe dang/ sumatsha' rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong kim ba la'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tham na rgyal bo tshangs byin

zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal bo tshangs byin gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i rgyang rgyal po sum khri gnyis stong gang po cha'i grong khyer du byang ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma na rgyal po gang pos

sbyin zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u tam dag rgya la bo glang pos sbyin gyi bu dang/ tsha bo ngang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo'ajog tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bal bu can zhes

[4 ]/bya ba byung ngo// go'u tan dag rgyal po bal bu can gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal lo sum khri nyis stong grong khyer bang gis nyal du byung sta/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshan por 'dul

zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po tshan bo che 'dul gyi bu dang/ rmo bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sumatsha' rgyud sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po

rgyal sbyin zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal spyi'igyi bu dang/ tshabo dang/ yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyerakan+ya kub dzar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha man rgyal bo rgyal

sde zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sus tsha'argyung rgyal po khri brgyud stong grong khyer tsam par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po klu'i lha zhes bya ba

byung ngo// go'u tam dag rgyal po klu' lha'abu dang/ chabo dang/ yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyung rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer ta la'i 'phreng du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mi'i lha zhes bya ba byang ngo

go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mi'i lha'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri nyis stong grong khyer tam lar byung// de rnams kyi tha ma na rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u da lo dag

yi rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yapatshe dang/ sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khra brgyad stong grong khyer ba so'i grong du byung// da rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo//
go'u ta ma dag rgyal po blo gros bzang po'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha' rgyud rgyal po nyi khralnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tham na rgyal

bo mun salatsas bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tshe dang/ sum tsha'i nga rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer wA ra NA sar byung sta de rnams kyi tha man rgyal

bo dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal bo dbang phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tshe dang/ sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer rtswa can du byung

sa/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i snga zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u taMm dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i snga'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po stong yang grong khyer gru 'dzin/

du byas/ de rnams kyi tha ma na rgyal po dka' thub spyod chas bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dka' thub spyod kyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsho'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang

gro'ikhyer rtswa can du byung// de rnams kyibs ni/ rgyal po sar gongo zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i gdong ga bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha' rgyung rgyal po 'a bum yang

grong khyer wA ra NA sar byung// de rnams kyi tha ma na rgyal po sa'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i bdag po'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum cha'i rgyud rgyal po

'bum yang grong khyer dmag gis ma tshugs par byang ste/ de rnams kyi tha mnargyal po sa 'dzan zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u tu ma dag rgyal dos 'dzan gyi budang/ tsha po dang/ yang tsha dang/ sumatshu'i rgyud

rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer mi tha lar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal relha chen po'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tshargyu

rgyal bo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer mi thi lar drang srong gi tshangs par sbyod pa la spyad de/ de rnams kyi tha ma na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya bar byung ngo// mu khyud las 'bying ba dang/ sra ba'i chu khyud/
dang do ba dang nyo bar rko ba dang/ yod yod pa/ kun nas rko dang/ gya nom snang dang/ thos pa'i sde dang/ chos kyi sde dang/ rtogs pa dang/ rtogs pa chen mi dang/ rtogs pa' sde dang/ ma
med dang/ mya ngan bral dang/ brtan pa'i sde dang/ rga bas sbyar dang/ gran bsad dang/ skya rengs dang/ phyogs kyi bdag po dad/ rdul can dang/ bad byed dang/ kun dga' dang/ ma 'ang gdong
dang spyod kha dang/ kun nas skyed pa dang/ skya bo'i khyu mchog dang/ bza' btung can dang/ bza' btung mang bo can dang/ mi thub pa dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ gnas pa dang/
shazhitu gnas pa dang/ stobs chen dang/ stobs chen zhon dang/ lags pa'iblo gros dang/ brtan pa non dang/ gzhu bcu dang/ gzhubargya pa dang/ gzhu dgu bcu pa dang/ gzhu rgyal
dang gzhu bkra dang/ gzhus dang/ shang rta bcu pa dang/ shang rta brgya pa dang/ shing rta dgu bcu pa dang/ shing rta khra bo dang/ sha rta rgyal dang/ shing rta sra ba'o//

go'u tam dag rgyal po shing rta su'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sumatsha'irgyud rgyal po'adun khri bdun stong grong khyer kun tu snang par byangs/ da rnams kyi thaman rgyal bo kr-i kri zhes bya ba byung ngo// de'i/
ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ragi kha dang zhabs su ldan b/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhya'akha/ skyes bu 'dulaba'i kha losgyurag/ bla na mdal/

lharang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jagartan dubyung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpag ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam

yA btabanas tshangs par spyod ba spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/ go'u tu ma dag rgyal po kri kri'i bu legs skyasaso// go'u ta ma dag rgyal bo lags kyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/

sumatsha' rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung// de rnams kyi thamanargyal po rnab can zhes bya ba byung ngo/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po na ba can l bu gnyib taM/ go'u ta ma dang ba ra du dza'o//
de gnyis las go'u ta ma'i mngon par 'byung par dga'o// ba ra dwadzan rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o// de la chos dang chos ma yin pa sa rgyal sring byed pa mthong nas/ ngas bsams pa/
[8 ]/bdag yab 'das nas rgyal bo gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang chos m yin pas rgyal srid byas na/ sems can dmyal ba ra gzhol bar 'gyur bas/ 'dir 'dus la bab can shi nas khyog
med par rab tu 'byang bar bya'osnyam du bsam nas/ rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rkangam gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab pa/ yab mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdagan dad
bas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo// des smas pa/ bu gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod bar byed r dang/ sbyin srog sreg par byed pa dang/ dka' thub dka' thub spyod pa de dga' da'i
chad yonati/ nga 'dasanargyal sridi lag mthil du 'ong ga/ rgyalapo byed par 'gyuran/ ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung/ des smras r/ yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgya lasrad bgyid rngo mi thog go/
de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig/ rab tu 'byung ngo// de nas rgyal pos gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnong ngo// de'i tshe bsti gnas zhig na drang srong mdog gnag ces bya ba gnas so// danas gzhon
nu go'u ta ma rgyal bos gnang nas/ dga' zhing mgu la dga' ba chen po dang yang bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong mdog gnag gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang/ spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la
phyag byas nas snas ba/ drang srong chen po bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis/ bdag rab tu byung shagi/ des de rab tu phyung ngo// drang srong mdog gnag na 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba dang/ chu 'thung bas
de yang drang srong go'u ta ma/ drang srong go'u tam zhes bya bar gyurato// jatsatshan dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal bon ba can shanas/ gzhon nu ba rar dzapa'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug/
la dbang byed du bcug go/ ji tsam na dus gzhan zhag na drang srong go'u ta mas mkhan po la sa ra// mkhan po dgon pa'i gnas na zas kyis 'tsho bar rdzomathog gas/ grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi
des smras pa/burung gis grong ngam dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis mdor na dbang po bsrung pa yan gyag/ khyod song la gru 'dzazhi gya nyan 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas 'dug ga

mkhan po bka' bzhana'atshal zhis sbas nas/ drang srong go'u ta ma gru 'dzan gyi zhi 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bubyas te ba gnas so// de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzananasmad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang// myos bu
g.yo can btsA'i rtsa lag ces bya ba gnas te 'deg dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag bskur// de nas gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/ mi gzhan zhig kar sha pa Nalnga brgyathogs
tho kha 'ge 'ongs nas bzang mo dga' mgur sbyad kyis tshur shog/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag song na/ kar sha pa Na lnga brgya yang ma thob la/khyim du 'ongs pa spungs te/ gzhan du 'gro ba 'ad ni lag
bam yin no snyam nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhugs la mas la/ songal 'apa'i rtsa lag 'jo mo'i mchid nas de'abag bangagaskabs mamachis te skad kyis chi'ozhes smos shag des de'i gan dusong nas
masaso// mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas/ da de dang dga' dbakur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la so dang// des bsams pa/ nam tshod ring du yong bas/ de'asams kyang bsrung
bar nus so snyam nas/ des yang bumo de la bsgo ba/ papa'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la/ jome'i mchid nas sta gon ba grus lags na/ bskyod mos tshal ba gang dumachizhisazlos shag/ de'i gan du song nas
smras pa dang/ des smras pa// khyed kyi skad cig la skabs ched/ skad cig laskabs yod ca 'am/ bumo de de dang rogs ma 'phrod pa zhig pas des snas pa rje'i gras/ skabs ma mchis pa na cha lag
mod kyi/ de khyod kyi gos dang rgyan dag ga gis skye ba gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dagur spyod do// de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkras pa gang yan pa de dang bral bar gyur cing/ gnod sems kyis kun nas

dkras pa skyes taM/ de ma bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo song la/bzang mo pad+ma'i rtsa lag na re skyed mos tshal ga ga mo zhig tu shog shag rtsis byos shig/ de song nas pazang mo la byas nas da nas da pa spyad

mos tshal du song ba dang/ skyes bu bag yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gas smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par rab/sa sam/ des gas pa rje'i sras/ nga na bdag
gas nongs taM/ 'on kyang bud mang na rtag tu skyon can lags pas bod pa ramadzod cig/ danas de ma bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad do// de nas bu mo'angag gzhug nas jo mo bsad do//
jomo bsad ngo zhes ku co'i sgrachan bo bton pa skya lo'i tshogs chen po kun gyis thos nas/ rgyugs kha dang/ jitsaman bsti gnas ri nyid drang srong go'u takha gnas so// de nas sku

bugayon can bda'i rtsa lagad skra gnas / ral grwa khragacan drang srong go'u ta ma'i mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshog saMde nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// skya bo'i tshogs chen po des ral gri khrag can mthong nas

smras pa// rab tu byung ba 'das bzang kho bsad do zhes denas drang srong go'u ta ma de bskor taMm bzod pags nas smras pa/ kA ya rab tu byung ba/ drang srong gargyal mtshan thogs nas 'da'adrab ' las byed dam/
des mas ra/ kyis/ da rnams kyis skyas pa/bzang o dang khyod lhan cig dga' dgur spyad nas de bsad do// des smras pa kho bo'i sdig pa zhi pas las de ma byed de zhus/ des zhi ba lhas kyang skya'i
tshogs des lag pa byang g 'bog tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha rab tu byung ba 'diso bzangamo dang lhan cig dga' dgur sbyang nas da bkum lags so// rgyal po rnams nas rtog pa yin pas des
slas la/gal te de ltar gyuran/ rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis/ gsal shing la shon cig/ de nas rab tu byung bde me togakar bar 'i 'phreng ba mgul tu btags shing/ skyes pa gos sngon bo gyer/
gna mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ lam bo dang/ tsho nus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su sgrogs pa'i sgor bsgrags te/ grong khyer gyi lha tshogs kyi sgor byun gnas
gson po nyid du gsal shang la bskyonano/ de'a mkhan po mdog gnag de dus dus su de'i ste gnas su 'gro ba yazhi bas/ jatsam dus gzhan zhig na songar las ma mthong nas/ des na tshun du btsal bar
brtsams pa dang/ tsiman de gsal shing la gshon la mthong nas/ de yang ma gsal zhing/ mag mas mas gang la/ snying rje ba'i tshig pa la bu dal bus smras kha kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig/ des kyang skad ni

gsal zhing 'di chad la/ gnang du ra ba ba'i gnod pa 'i tshor ba skyes shang gdungs bas smras pa/ mkhan bo// gzhan ci lags/ las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu chu phyung ba 'am/ gnod pa zhig ma byas grang/
mkhan po bdag bag lus kyang byung ga/ sems kyi ma lan no// bu ji ltar shes/ mkhan po bden par gsol byas/ gson cig/ bden po dang bden pa'i tshig gang gisaM/ bdag gas lus kyi rma khyung gi/
sams kyi ma yazhin/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ mkhan po'i nga gas ba'i mdog nag po gang yin pa de gas ra gyi kha dog tu gyur cig/ bdag nyid chen bo de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas/

tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mngeganag ga bags pa nag po mi snang zhing/ gsar gyi kha dog tu gyur to// kun tu drang srong mdog nag gsar gyi kha dog tugyur to zhes sgra grags pas de'i mang gsar mdog ces

bya bar gyur te/ dengo mtshar mchog tugyur to// de nas drang nga go'u tu mas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag 'di nas sha'aphos nas 'gro ba nagang/ skya ba na gang/ tshe phyi ma na gang zhig lags/ nges smras pa/
bu bram ze rnams nar bu med pa la 'gro ba gad do zhes zeran/ khyod kyi bu 'ga' bskyod pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po// yab kyis rgyal srid kyi sad du go ba bskyoran/ bdag gzhon

chunyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshalan/ bdag gi bu skyo ba lta ba la mchis/ bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig/ mkhan bor ba drag pos nyen pas/
dazhib rag gi gnad rnams chad cing/ tshigs rnams bya ste/ 'gum ba gcig bu dran par bas na/ ji ltar sngon gyi khul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'a mkhan po mngon par shes ba thob
la nibs/ des rdzu 'phrul gyi rje char chen po sprul nas char ba'i thigs pa dulus la phog pa dang/ donas charab dang/ rlung grang mos reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/ des sngon
gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams go/ gang gi tshades 'khrigs pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las/ khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis M khrag dang lhan cig ltung ngo// bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i gnas na bzhi// bdag sems pa dang/ 'jig rtenasems pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi cha shas kyi yul sams
zla pa'o// khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nyima'i 'od zer byas ne nas rdol ba dang/ khye 'u gnyase ge byung nas/ ded ha cang yang mi ring ba'i
bu ram shang ga tshal gsab dar de gnyis zhugs so// n gnas nyi ma'i 'od zer shan tutshab byung ste// nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong go'u tamagadungs nas shi'o// de nas drang sogs mdos/ Do
ta shib mthong nas/ de gsal shing ga nyin kor du bltasan sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyas shag 'dug nas dpan tshunardzas gcod nge bu ma shang ba tshal gsab tu zhugs pa las/ jitsamanakhya'
gnyaseshagi mthong ngo// des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang/ drang srong go'u ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/ de nas da lhag par sdug pa skyes// des de gnyis bste gnas su khrodi
nas khasnyan bstod de/ des de gnyis kyi mang btags pa/ nyi ma shar ba'itsha nya ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di ba/2sa skyas par gyur pas de bas na nyama' rigs yin pas/des na nya ma'i
rigs shes bya bar gyur to// drang srong go'u ta ma'i bu yin pas mang gnyis pa go'u ta ma/ go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// rang gi yan lag las skyes pas/ ming gsum pa yan lag nas yan
lag skyes shes bya bar gyur to// bu ram shang gi tshalags ba nas rnyed pas/ maba' ba bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan 'gen rgyal po ba ra dwa dza bu med par sha nas/
blon po rnams 'dusanas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ deb gcon go'u ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal
sridi 'dazhi deb rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa zhi pas de dbang bskur ro// de nas da rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog ga rung du song// son pa dang/ rkang pa gnyis la
gtugs nas smras pa// drang srong chen po ko'u tim gang dumachis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do// donams kyis smras pa// drung srong chen po bdag mug gas de mthong bar ya ngamadragan
ji ltar bsad/ kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o/ mnongs so// des da nams dran par byas pa dang/ smras pa/dwangaso chen po gal te da ltan/ sdig pa spyod pa de mang tsam ya snyos pa ya nga bsgrags/
pa la gzhi byas zhogad dge/ des sdig pa'i las tsa byas 'di dang 'di'o// skyonam da la gnod pa ma byed pa des snga ba'i las ma byas par khyad cag gas bas dade/ dalta tsaman/ des ji ltar gyur pargyas/
par smras pa dang/ da rnams 'dim bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta nas ma legs kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes danams di skad du smras pa rabyed pan/ khya'

dganyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'os so// blon po rnams kyis smras la/ drang srong chen khyi'u'adi gnyis su'i lags des smras la/ de kho na'ibu'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/
'di gnyis kyi ming calags/ des khyung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis de thos te mngon du ngo tshar skyas nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btabanas/ dganyis
las gzhonanu pu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las da yang bumad par sha'o// de nas gcig shosazhu bo dbang bskur nas de 'tshong rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to//

go'u ta ma dgargyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sumatsha'irgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams thamanargyal po bu ram 'ba' ngag
skyes bo zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyas molo bu bzhi sta/ skar mda' gdong dang/ lag rna dang/ glang po che 'dul dang/ rkang gdub can no//
dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsunamo dam pa shanas/ de lag pa 'gram pa la btad de sams khong du chud cing 'dug go/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de
thugs ma dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa// nga'i btsun mo dam pa sha na/ ci'i phyir sams khongasasu chud cing ma 'dug/ lha D+ha gal te de ltan nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/
tsa'id du lha'i btsun mo dam pa ma btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa// gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'de dag yong na nga la su zhig bumo ster bar 'gyur/ lha dgongs
shog dang/ bdag cag gis btsal lo// dzatsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ btsunamo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de ma rnams kyis brtags taM
rgyal po 'i drung du dong nas/ de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po la reg par byas pa dang/ rgyal pos bsgol/ khug shag/ danas de rnams rgyal poT/
spyan sngar do nas/ rkang pa gdugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go/ gtam gyi skabaso rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha/ bkra shas par gyur cag/ bkra shas par gyur
cig/ rgyal bos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyad ci gsol/ rgyal bo bu ram shang ba 'phags rgyas po'i btsunamo dam pa gumanagar ba ched du sras mo stong ngo// rgyal bos smras pa/ 'thab re re
bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal tanga'i bu mo la khyabu zhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyag la gzhag pa lta na sbyin no// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/
mchis la lha la snyan tu gdags par gsol lo zhes de rnams dong nas/ rgyal po bu ram shang pa 'phags skyes po la jar gyur pa smras po dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gzhon nuchas
phu bo gyur pa/ rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nubo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de na 'os pa ma gzhi no// lha don 'di la nges pa ma mchis te/ ri shag btsun mo blangs la/ lha de dang
lhan cig rtsa dmo dang dgyes pa dang dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig/ del khye'u btsal bar 'gyur ram/ 'on takhumor 'gyur ram/ spyi ma mchis par 'gyur ba sus 'tshal/ rgyal bos smras 6/

shes ldan dag gal te de ltan dung la 'go shagi/ de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ ja tsam na rgyal po 'o de pal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ de yang rgyal pos ma ngon par 'dod par gyur te da nga de dang lhan
cig rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byad do// da rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan 'gan btsun sems can dpaldan par gyur to/
de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu 'das pa dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa// mdzes pa zhig btsas so// btsas nas de'i btsas pa'i r tsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming tsar gangag

zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ltar m skyes pa 'di nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas/ de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srong dga' zhes bgyi'o// khye'u rgyal srid

dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pa d+ma bzhin du myur du skyod par byed de zhib bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ de rgyal tshab kyi rgyalasung la ma bzhag pa// de'i zhang po rgyal

pos thos nas des de la pho nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub po dang bcas pa 'a spring yag spang ba/ khyod kyis sngon khas blangasazhing/ dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byang na de lta na legs gal te de ltar ma byas na/
khyod kyi mthu dang/ brtson 'grusakyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des sdod cig/ kho bo 'o nar 'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar brlag go/ rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pas/des thos nas skrag ste/
blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga la rgyal bo des 'di skad ces sangan/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha rgyal srid dga'/

rgyal tshab tu dbang skur lab sa mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu chas du bor gyurang/ rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs ti[Y]nubo rgyal srid kyis dbang bskur ba 'dazhi'os pa ma yin no//

da rnams kyis smras pa/ lha u0f10rgyal po don stobs dang bzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon ma 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa gang lags ra ' gnas de mchis pas/ rgyal sride dga' rgyal tshab kyi
dbang lug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la (gzhon nude rnams na smyug tu gsol/ rgyal bos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyon mad ci gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar phyug/ lha bdag cag
blon po logs te/ lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas/ skyon ma mchis pa dang/ nongs pa ma na ches pa yang smyug la/ skyon ma mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa na bzhag go/ rgyal pos

btang snyoms su bzha gnas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldanongag thabs shage bsham par bya ste// des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs

byung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya 'onas/ de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal gyi dor byas pa/ ratsho sna tshogs dras par shan tu dri zhim pa'i phog por nye bar bzhag/ dar gyi chun phyang nang dor tags/ ma togasga tshog

kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go/ de nas da rnams kyas/ blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de bya der byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas/ gzhon nu rgod dag can de rnams skyed mos tshal//
phyogs dang/ blon po rnams skyed mos tshal gyi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang/ gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa// 'dasu'i spyi nga tshos tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha' lags so/ de rnams spar
ldog par brtsams pa dang/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shag/ ci'i phyi'i sar ldeg/ de rnams kyanges smras pa/ lha'i skyad mos tshal yanan 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung/
bon po rnams kyis sbas pa 2 lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba tsamachas/ da rnams nang du zhugs da lta bar brtsams so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa// lha skya dmos tshal/
legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis/ lhagazigs pa'i dus la bab lags so// rgyal po chas da dang skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang bon po rnams la smras pa// shes ldan
ngag spyad mos tshalan ku co'o sgra gragan 'di na su zhig 'dug/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so// gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams sngangs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang pa

gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ pa zod pa mdzad cinga gzhon nu rnam sa spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras ra/ nga bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams smyug par chad pa dang de rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la
gtugs nas skyes ba/ lha/ gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi spyi bo dang lhan nugamachin/ de can s kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos ba sgo nas/

tha da rnams chas ban/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzan gyi sgo phye nas skyo bo'i tshogs rgyus so// blon po rnams

wAkya'i rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ gal te grong khyer gyi sgom bkumanarang po ma thogs par gru 'dzanistongs da ra 'gyur ro// gal ted lhan sgo chod cig/ de nas gzhon nu de rnams rangags sring mo 'di nas

mthar gyis re bo gas ra dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang sangam ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis dar la ma'i spyil bu dag byas te/ gnas
tsho batrab nas re dgas bsad myang/ bsang nas 'tsho ba byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar khyad de/ lang tsho dang dar la bab pa'i drigs pas bzhi pas/ 'dod chags kyis

na tu nyen rtag dra ngan pa skya bo bas babs nga bor gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhagan drang srong sar skyas de lta bu mthong nas dras pa/ khyed cagaci'i phyir skya bo bsang bsang por gyur/ de rnams kyis/
skyas la/ drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so// des smras pa/ rang rang gsAng mo spongs la/ nas dbyin gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cagi 'dug shig/ drang srong/
chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu brgya rungs/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal sring stor ba rnams kyis rung// dand rnams drang srong gatshigan tshadam ya na sAm nas/ 'dod pa'i/
'dod chags kyis rten ngas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ mas dbyan gyi sridi mo rnams dang lhan cig rna bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod da ra byed do// de rnams dang de dag lhan cig
bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dba' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te/ da rnams chen por gyur pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi tsher ma mosgra yin pas drang srong ser skya sems rtsa gcig pa
nyid du ma btub nas/ shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo bgazhan du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi tshiram ni sgra yin pas sems rtsa ba gcig pa nyid du ma btub pas so// dang
srong chen po khyod 'di nyidi na bzhugs shig/ bdagacagagazhan dumachin/ 'on kyang sa' phyogs shig bdag cag la phog shag/ shes ldan dag rung ngo// drang srong bdag nyade chen po de rnams na'adod

pa bzhin yod la ra ba 'grub pa yin pas/ dus gsar gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyerang rtsigs so// drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi
gnas kyi phyir bzhi yongs su btang bas ser skya'i gzhi sa skya'i gzhi zhes byabar gyuratod rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te/ dogs pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to// lha
rnams kyi sems kyis rinams kyi sogs shes nas/ phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang/ de rnams der dong ste/ grong khyer gcig shos brtsigasanas/ lhas bstan ny+nyas ba/

ba tsas bya bar gyur to// de nas de rnams tshog sa gange 'a dusanas/ zhatshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag ga nga giphyir bdag cag skyugs pa ni rigs mnyamakha las chunas blangasar de las gyur gyis

b+h+yA dalta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigasamanyam pa las chunam blang bar mi bya ste/ gcig khonas chog shes par bya'o// de rnams rigasaMmanyam pagacig khon las chung 'a na kyi[7 ]rkun ma na mi lin to//
danas dus gzhan zhi gan rgyal po'i pags skyes po bu sdug ba rnams rjes su dran nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ kyagrongar dag gzhon nu de nams da ltar gang na 'dug/ danAms kyis smras pa/

ts+tso lhasanongs pa 'ga' zhig la sprugs pa las/ da rnams rang rang gi srangeso 'ded/ 'di nas mchis pa na gangs ra dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srongasar skya'i bsti gnas dang hacangam ring
ba zhig tu gnas btapa g+ha/ rang rang gi sring mo sgos te/ mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dbalhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dag 'dagur spyod bar bgyid do// da rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga'
bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyidi la na/ bu pho dang/ bu mo dag btsas so// grong na dga gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed yod dam/ lha rdzothogs lags so// de nas rgyal bo bu ram shing pa
'phags skyes pos/ rostod bsrangs nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang lta/ ched du brjod pas ched du la rjod ba/ kyam bzhon nu rnams ni bod pa gzhi no/ kya ma gzhon nu rnams shin tu bod pa yazhi nas/ sems

kan dbang chen pos tshig tu byung ste/ kyam gzhon nu rnams ni bod pa yin no// kye ma gzhon nu rnams na shin tu bod pa yin no zhes byas pas de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig

rgyu pa bo buram shing pa 'phags skyes po shanas rgyal srid dga' rgyal sridi la dbang bskur to// de yang bumed par shanas 1 skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/ de yang du
mad par shi nas/ lag na rgyal bor gyur to// de yad du med par ng shi nas glang bo che 'dul rgyal bor gyur to// de yang du med pa shanas/ rkang gdub na rgyal por gyur to// de'i du ba ga nas 'jog

go go'utam dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyamamo/ 'go'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa khul gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum cha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grongakhyeraser skya'i gzhi'i byung ste/ de rnams

kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang/ shing rta brgya pa dang/ shing rta dgu bcu ba dang/ shing rta khra bo dang/ shing rta rgyal dang/ brtan pa 'i shing rta dang/ gzhu ba nu ba dang/ gzhu brgya pa dang/ gzhu dgu
bcu pa dang/ gzhu rgyal dang/ gzhu bkra dang/ gzhu brtan no// go'u ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ sangag 'gram dang/ seng ge sgra'o/ dgo'u ta na dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs
bya// snyad yod pa de rnams kyi nang nas nga ga 'grami mchog tu grags so// go'u tam dag sa ngag 'gram la bu bzhin+taM/ zas gtsang dang/ zas dkar dang bra go khras dang//
bdud rtsi zas so// bumo gtsang ma dang/ dkar mo dang/ bre bom dang/ bdud rtsi ma'o/ bras gtsang la gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'o// zas dkar la bu
ga nyas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no// bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ mang chen dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o// bdud rtsi zas la bu gnyis te/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ lhas sbyin no// gtsang ma'i bu na legs par rab bsad do// dkar mo'i bu na'aphreng ba can no// ba bo ma' na bzang len no// bdud rtsi ma'i na dag 'phul lo//

bcom ldan 'das kyi srasan sgra gcan 'dzin an te// go'u ta ma dgamang pos nga kur gyi rgyud tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzan du rdzogs/ srid pa'i breng rgyud chad/ 'khor ba zad de/ da nas nga gang pa mad/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'a gtam rdzogs pa ra mo khyenanas bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyabu chen po la bka' stsal pa//
o'u'agal gyi bu legs so legs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas/ chos kyi gtam smras pa yang
khyod legs so// mo'u'agal gyi bu mang pakhyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te/ chos kyi gtam rtag tu smos zhag dang/ des na de rnams la yun ring por phan pa dang/
bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dag song rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnam gas kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsan sar 'a chos kyi gtamachodag shig/
zung shig/ lhogs shig/ deci'i phyir zhan/ da song dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni rin dang ldan M/ chos dang ldan pa nas/ tshangs pa ra sprod pa'/
bar dang ldan pa lan te/ ga slong dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo dad pas rab tu byung bas/ shAkya rnams kyi sdon gyi rigs rgyud 'a sa brtsams pa'i chos kyi gdam zung zhang bklags pa'i gang
so de nas sa ra skya'i gzhi 'di shAkya rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mnor ra dga' ste rjes gu ya rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas ni/ brtson
ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo// de'i tshe grong khyer sar skya' ba gzhan/ rgyal po sangag 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid de dadu 'jug ste/ 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang 2 bde ba dang/ la gas/
dang / spyi bo dang/ mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ chom rkun mad cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang/ bu ram shing
[h]// 'phrang ba dang/ ba lang dang/ ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bstan du 'a gas par rab sad ces/
khyab rgyal bo byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ la legs pa dang/ skya bo dang mamang pos gang pa/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/

chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyurang/ 'bras dang/ bu ram shang ga'aphrang ba dang/ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshog sar ni/ bu gcig pa la sdug dpa bzhin du rgyal sring skyong bar byang do// rgyal po
lags par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa mdzes pa// ul gyi bzung mo lun nga nizhes bya ba yod do// rtsis bstazhan khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs
spyod cha ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya chab rnam thos kyi bu'anor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba/ma tog phun sum tshogs pa dang/
'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bya snyatshogs skang 'dun pas deb kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lcags
nas ngo na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do// lum ba nas de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa// lha/kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ da kun/
dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sban/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na/ khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang bo gzhan zhig bya'o// nga nas rgyal po 'gas par rab sad kyis/

lum ba mi'i ched du de bas khyad da ra du 'a phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhag byed du bcu gnas / de'i ming 'um bzhi'i tshil zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po se nga gi 'gram la yun ring bo nas/ kya ma 'o bdag gi rgyud la/

'khor los sgyur ba skyo bar gyur kyang rim rung snyam pa 'a ngas mang ba da yod do// rgyal po legs par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas kyi mkho ba da gnasaM ngag 'gram dang lhan cig gzhan du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i
bsam pa 'di yod do// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na/ nga'i btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod pa las dus gnama'agan/ btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur
nas de zla ba brgyud dam dgu 'das pan/ bumo gzugs bzang ba/ ngalta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsas ra de'i gzugs bzang
sa rgyal bo lags par rab sa da btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ lhas bstan gnas pa 'gyu bob tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ chos du gyur nas ci'ang bu mo yin nam/ 'on te
las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yazhesnyam mo// de pa tsas pa'i btsas ston nyim bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya chen byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming char gdags zhes ming 'dog par byed do//
blon po rnams kyi sprus pa/ lcas bstanan gnas pa'i skye bo' tshogs la lam po che dang/ chong 'dus dang/ sum mdo dang ba'i mdo rnams su grung pa kha cig gi mched
nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur tozhes mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mchid nas na 'dabu mo ma lags kyi/ 'on
wA tsazhin/ las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags bas/ nga bas na bu mo'amang sbya 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes pa'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so// bumo sgyu 'phrul la
ma brgyad la rjes su gtad do zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba' par gongam bzhin du'o// de la mtshan mkhan rnam sa kyis lung bstan mtshani phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa so bu ba/
btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhag stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// yang rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo gzugs bzang blta na sdug
kha mas la/ kha dog bzangalo// rgyas pa// mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos sbyang bar byas taM/ skya latsul la ji lta
ba bzhin du/ de'i gzugs bzang ba/ rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par ma nus so// de btsas pa'i batsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas da bumo 'ang 'tshang cir gdags zhes song 'dogs par
khyad do// blon bo rnams kyis sbas pa/ sgyu 'phrul bas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas/ sgyu 'phrul chanamo zhes bgyi bar gdags so// de yang bskyong gsungs nas chonamor gyur pa dang/ de
mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ ngan 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal por 'gyur rozhis zhes lung bstan to/
rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis/ rgyal po sad ga 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bumo gnyas shag btsas pa na/ sgyu 'phruladang/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ nga la gcig la na mtshan tho/
cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing/ den stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ gcig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sumacu rtsa gnyis kyis
brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing/ de na'e khe lesasgyur ba'i rgyal bor 'gyur ros lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsangagi chung mar snyoms shig/ seng ge 'gus
gyis sar gde ba/ gnyis ka ya nga gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chungam 'drab gnyis gcig la bzhag pas bu bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu
tsa' bar 'gyur zhing/ de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ra shig 'dod do// gcig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o// des 'khor lnga brgya dngabakra'o//
de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bsang zhes bya ba ra brod pa gcig yo danas/ shAkya rnams 'dus taM/ rgyal bo gang ga'i 'gram gyi rung du song nas/ lha skya bseng ri khrod/
labadag cag la gnod pa brgyad kyis/ grogs mdzad du gsol/ sa smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo rgas pa sa/ de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so// lha gzhon nu zas
gtsang btang du gsol/ dam zhag khaca' so/ gal te gzhon nung lta bu 'dod pa'i rim pa gcig bslangs pa'i dam pa da zhi pa lta na gtong ngo// de rnams kyis smras pa/lha/ bka' bzhin
'tshal/ sal bar bgyi'o// rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi la gzhon nu zas gtsang la sngo nas/ des ra khrod pa de rnams bcom/ rab tu'am stachag bta'o// da nas shAkya rnams mgu nas/
rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du deng sta/ lha/ gzhon nus re khrid pa rnams la rtsom/ rab tu bcom ste/ rma ga ba ta' labs pas/ bad ga cag glo ba dga' na/ gzhon nu mchogaci bzhed gsungs shig/
bdabul lo// shes ldan dag/ kya rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa/ gus kyang manyam las chunam bzhagakharami bya'o zhes bcasaso/ lha ci khrims 'dul lam/ des snas pa/ lhag par
gzhi tu bsdam bya la bar l can 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa gtsag slong ba na mnyam pa las chung ba blangs pa yin no// lha rang gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/ da nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par
0 rang sad la po lta btang nas// kho bos tshogs brtags zin gyis/ bumo gcig shes kyang bkr-itishig/ des de yaba 'khor lnga brgya dang// gzhon nu zas gtsangags gnyis karlangs so////
ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po sengag 'gram shanas/ sangaskyabazhin/ rgyal bo zas gtsang rgyal sridi byed du 'jug ste 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ legasal/ skya bo/
dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ chom rkun yod cing nad rab tu zhi kharagyurar/ 'bras dang/ buram shing gi 'phreng ba dang/ ba lang dang/ ma ha/
khun sum tshogs pa na/ bug pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig stang gi khang bzangs kyi gzhaskyes la mda' dong
nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' khar byed M/ dga' dgagur spyod par byed do// 'di ni chos nyid yanAkaM/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pan/ 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas
gzabs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang/ yul la gzigs pa dang/ dus la gzigs pa dang/ rgyud la gzigs pa dang/ budachod la gzigs pa ste/ rgya cheratshado snam dang sgyur ro/
mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya garatsa mkhan po Atsang ma shwa b+ha dra dang zhu chen gyi la phyob dag slong rin chen bzang bos khasgyur mang zhus te gtan la phabalag
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud+d+hab lAd+han du tiha r+ya ba kucan n ra de sha nAmamahA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yul rnam par 'phrul/
u0f09 khastan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal 'go/ 'angaskad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'angs chu bo chen po' klung na rAn dza na'i 'gram
wAn 'phags pa sngan ras gza gegs kyi dbang phyug dang/ lag na rdo rje dang/ byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong dang/ rab 'byor dang/ shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u
'gal gyi bu la sob/sa ba nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs to/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon bo dang/ bram ze dang byas
sgyu bad ba thams cad kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ zhal zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis cham ra ra bus/ bskul/ gzengs bstod/ yang
dag par dga' bar byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos grong khyer wA ra NA sar gshegs te/ wAr Na sa ri shang am srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs/
de nas de'i tshon sa cher g.yos par gyur nas sang ga' khrachen po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i phang du dpag tshad gcig tsam/ zheng du dpag tshad spyod tsam gyi tshad 'ag/
par smras pa// shin tu dga' bar 'gyub/ yod du 'o pa/ dan gyi chun po brtags shing spungs la/ lha'in bza'abargya stong du ma btang ba lha'i ma tog chun po bya bdu ma rab tu spungs pa//
lta'adridang ldan pa// kha dog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes par mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig
byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das sang ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas pa la po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub gi masarapa' 'phag/
pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang/ lagan jo rje la bka' stsal pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug khyod song la/ mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams gzhan dag na khyod kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can bsAgs pa 'a rang nga zhin can s dad ma sdog pa spyod ra/ nyon mongs ra dang/ nyiba'i nyon mongs pa de dag las bsgribs pa/ mar
mebs pa/ ra ma shes pa/ dag sbyong du ma 'dzan pa/ bram zar ma 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad ba/ de dag thams cad lag na rdo rjedang/ gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/
ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi shugs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i sdus shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang byang chub sems dpa'i lag na rdo rjes
ga/ de bzhin gshegs las tshig 'di thos nas/ sems can thams cad la blta ba dang/ yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'ating nge 'dzin la snyoms ra ra zhugs so// de

'dzazhi de 'amathus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so// de nas lus las 'od zer brgya stong du ma byung ngo// byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jabag rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rtenaman chad gzugs man chad yod pa dang/ gzugs kyis khyab pa man chad du spung bar byas taM 'od der de dag las kyang yang dag par
bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo// bag yod pa dang nyon mongs med par byos// bag med ra 'i dbang du ma 'gro shig/ skye dang rga shis gtses pa 'i sdug bsngal to/ bde bar gshags pa'i

bstan pa 'byung bar dkon// bskal ba bya ba phrag brgya grangs med du/ srid pa'i rgya mtshor nges par 'khor ba dang/ nyon mongs dog par rtag tu 'khor ba na// 'tshab ma rungs ba ni skrag mi 'gyur// 'ad/

dang chags dang bud med rtag pa man// rtag tu glu gar sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan// bskal pa dumar bde ba myong nas kyang// phyis nasdug bsngal rjes su thob par 'gyur// rnam par sku bar gyur pa 'di la ltos//
'da'i mar gyur pa yang chungamar bgyur// de yi sha dag yongs su zos nas kyang// mimakhas pa dag mi shes dga' bara'adzan/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skya ba de// mis nam myong tshad la skrag
ba 0 pa med mi rnams kyi nadam pa'i chos 'chad kyis// bde bar gshegs pa mchod par brjod rnams deng/ ma dul kha lo sgyur ba de mthong nas/ ting 'dzan zha ba bsgom pa thob 'gyur gyis/ daphyis sdug
bsngal rgya mtsho mi gang rnams// skrag par byas la thar pa 'dod par byos// mi rnams kyi nirim pa de la mchod// gzhan gyi srog ma gcod dang 'anyidu// gzhan gyi radagom byashe len ma byed//
gzhan gyi bud med dag la 'tshe ma byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu gus par byos// nga rgyal rgyags dang nga mang ba spangs nas kyang// wAr NAs 'khyil ya/ a lha srungabamo yi tshong dudang/ mi

mchog la ni myur du blta bar byas// de'i bkod pa rgya cher yade du 'ong// dge slong dge 'dun rtag tu rdzu 'phrul ldan// byang chub sems da pa'i rgyachen rdzu 'phrul che/ sems can ma mkhas khong du chud
bya dang/ sems can bya ba mang po thar bya'i phyir// 'od gzer rtag tu gang gas btang bar// mtshan n spyan ras gzigs kyidabang phyagago/ gang dgang la rgyugs khengs bgyid gyur cing// sangs
rgyas chos la rim gro ma byed pa// lag na rdo rje mgon po sems can mchog/ rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhing go bar byed// de yi gzugosanas jas shing rdzu 'phrul che// bskal ba byabar de na nga shang
